The company offers general magnet wires for motors, transformers, generators, telecommunication, mobiles, auto-controlling, in-house products, electronic apparatus, and aerospace and aviation related equipment; self-bonding magnet wires; and special magnet wires, including ribbon wires, parallel-laid multi-wires, copper-clad aluminum wires, aluminum wires, litz wires, high-tension magnet wires, silver magnet wires, silver- plate magnet wires, and surge resistance magnet wires. Its products are used in motors, coils, and transformers. Jung Shing Wire Co., Ltd. was founded in 1971 and is based in Tainan City, Taiwan.

1702.TW.summary: Namchow Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in manufacturing, selling, and processing of edible and non-edible oil, frozen dough, and dish and laundry liquid detergent products in Taiwan, China, Thailand, and internationally. The company manufactures and sales cleaners, including crystal soap, personal hygiene, and dish/vegetable cleaning products; frozen and instant noodles; ice creams; and cooked rice and leisure foods, such as rice crackers. It is also involved in manufacturing and distribution of baking products, including baking oils, fats, and frozen doughs; and the dining business. In addition, it offers management consulting services. The company was formerly known as Namchow Chemical Industrial Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Namchow Holdings Co., Ltd. in August 2017. Namchow Holdings Co., Ltd. was founded in 1952 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

1707.TW.summary: Grape King Bio Ltd produces and sells pharmaceutical preparations, patent medicines, liquid tonics, drinks, and healthy foods in Taiwan, China, and internationally. It operates through Multi-Level Marketing, Distributors, and Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM) segments. The company offers mushroom mycelium products, such as ganoderma lucidum, agaricus blazei, antrodia cinnamomea, cordyceps sinensis, and coriolus versicolor; probiotics, including enterococcus, bifidobacterium, lactobacillus, pediococcus, streptococcus, saccharomyces, and clostridium; and enzymes. It also provides OEM, original design manufacturing, formulation design, research and development, and raw material supply services. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

1708.TW.summary: Sesoda Corporation manufactures and markets sulfate of potash (SOP) in Taiwan. The company offers standard, soluble, low chloride, granular, and industrial grade SOP products; and hydrochloric acid for use in acid washing in metallurgy and printed circuit boards, as well as manufacturing chloride chemicals and food processing. It also provides liquid calcium chloride for use in fluoride removal before waste water emission in the electronic and optoelectronic industries. In addition, the company trades in soda ash, sugar, sodium bicarbonate, sodium chloride, mixed calcium phosphate, solid calcium chloride, ammonium bicarbonate, and pearl luster pigment products. Further, it provides bulk shipping services through 6 vessels. Sesoda Corporation was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

1709.TW.summary: Formosan Union Chemical Corp. produces and sells chemical products in Taiwan. The company offers alkyl benzene, which is used as a raw material for detergents; nonyl phenol that is used as a basic raw material for surfactants, rubbers, plastic anti-oxidant agents, etc., as well as specialty chemicals; and hydrogenated hydrocarbon resin, which is used as a raw material for the production of ethylene-vinyl acetate polymer EVA and thermal plastic rubber TPR series hot melt adhesives. It also provides FuSyn-22, a synthetic alkylate that is used as a primary base oil or blend stock for various synthetic automotive and industrial applications. The company was founded in 1973 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

1711.TW.summary: Everlight Chemical Industrial Corporation produces and sells chemical products in Taiwan, rest of Asia, the Americas, Europe, and internationally. The company offers dyes for use in textile, leather, ink jet printing, digital textile printing, anodized aluminum, paper, and solar energy applications; specialty chemicals that are used in coatings, adhesives, plastics, polyurethanes, elastomers, and cosmetics; toners, cartridges, and carriers and developers for printers and ceramic ware; and electronic chemicals for use in yellow lithography, rinsing imaging, and substrate flattening process, as well as semiconductor and substrate surface cleaning, electroplating, surface coating, and electronic assembly applications. It also provides prostaglandin and other material medicines; and technical consulting services. Everlight Chemical Industrial Corporation was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

1712.TW.summary: Sinon Corporation manufactures and sells crop protection and nutrient solutions in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers crop protection products, such as herbicides, insecticides, and fungicides; crop nutrition products, including fertilizers, plant hormones, seed treatments, synthetic fertilizers, organomineral fertilizers, organic fertilizers, organic seed treatments, inoculants, and natural plant hormones; and agrochemicals, seeds, and agricultural equipment, as well as provides technical field training and support, product application seminars, and financial services. It also provides products and services comprising bottle design, mold design and manufacturing, plastic vacuum molding, plastic injection molding, PET mold blowing, and plastic printing and labeling products and services, as well as formulation recipes for the beauty, healthcare, and household segments. In addition, the company engages in the phalaenopsis orchid nursery and distribution business. Further, it operates 41 supermarkets in Taiwan; and prepares and delivers meals to schools and companies. Additionally, the company manufactures and sells cement. The company was formerly known as Shinung Chemical Industry Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Sinon Corporation in 1979. Sinon Corporation was founded in 1955 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

1714.TW.summary: Ho Tung Chemical Corp. develops, manufactures, markets, exports, and sells various chemical products in Taiwan, China, Southeast Asia, and internationally. The company offers normal paraffin; linear alkyl benzene sulfonate produced as intermediate in the production of surfactants for use in detergent; anionic surfactants, including linear alkylbenzene sulphonic acid, alcohol ether sulfates or sodium laureth sulphate; and cationic surfactants, such as palmityl tri-methyl ammonium chloride, stearyl tri-methyl ammonium chloride, and alkyl dimethyl benzyl ammonium chloride. It also provides non-ionic surfactants comprising fatty alcohols, fatty alcohol ethoxylates, and coconut diethanol amide; cocamidopropyl betaine and dodecyl dimethyl betaine; and de-aromatic solvents used in paints and coatings, consumer products, printing inks, and agricultural chemical applications. In addition, the company engages in the trading of oil; warehousing of petrol, diesel, and chemicals; loading and unloading at wharves; wholesale and trading of chemicals and fuels; development, leasing, construction, and rental of residence and buildings; manufacture and sale of cement and cement raw materials, PMMA light guide plate, and various commodities; and development of new energy and surfactant. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

1717.TW.summary: Eternal Materials Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells resin, high performance, and electronic materials. The company offers resins materials, including polyester polyol, polyurethane, alkyd, solvent and water-based acrylic coating, amino, fluorocarbon, saturated and unsaturated polyester, other coatings, vinyl ester, and fire retardant resins, as well as acrylic resin for adhesives and overprinting; and optoelectronic materials, photovoltaic materials, epoxy system, structural adhesive, and polyester for polyurethane foam. It also provides UV monomers and oligomers, special coatings, silicone powders, additives, and 3D UV printing materials. In addition, the company offers printed circuit board materials, including dry film photoresists, dry film solder masks, UV inks, dry film photosensitive polyimides, paper phenolic copper clad laminates, and composite epoxy copper clad laminates; flat panel display and touch panel materials, such as dry film photoresists, liquid polyimide materials, prism films, and protective films; and vacuum laminators and toll coating services. Further, it provides biomedical materials, which includes biochemical and molecular diagnostics, recombinant proteins, and antibodies; liquid molding compound for WLP; solid capacitor materials; lithium battery materials; green process-less CTP plate photoresist; thermoplastic composites; and hydrophilic films. The company's products are used in energy, transportation, building and furniture, electronics, consumer products, packaging and printing, health care and medical, and metal machinery applications. It has operations in Taiwan, China, Japan, Vietnam, Thailand, the United States, India, Indonesia, Malaysia, Korea, and Italy. The company was formerly known as Eternal Chemical Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Eternal Materials Co., Ltd. in 2014. Eternal Materials Co., Ltd. was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung City, Taiwan.

1721.TW.summary: Sunko Ink Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells flame retardants, elastomers, agrochemicals, electronic chemicals, polymer additives, polyurethane resins and top coating materials, and curing agents. The company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Taichung City, Taiwan.

1724.TW.summary: T.N.C. Industrial Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells coating raw materials and electronic chemicals for industrial applications worldwide. It offers a range of coating chemicals, including nitrocellulose, pigment, resin, etc. The company's nitrocellulose is used in coating, lacquer, printing ink, and various decorative films, as well as for wooden furniture, athletic facilities, cosmetics, metal, and leather products; pigments are used to make color of the surfaces and materials; and resin and derivatives are used for the adhesion of coating. It also offers electronic chemicals, such as process chemicals and mixed acids for semiconductor; display; and diode, solar cell, and LED industries. T.N.C. Industrial Co., Ltd. was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

1726.TW.short_name: YUNG CHI PAINT & VARNISH MFG CO
1726.TW.summary: Yung Chi Paint & Varnish Mfg.Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells coatings and paints primarily in Taiwan. The company offers architecture coatings, including water and solvent-based cement mortar paints, water-based lastomeric coatings, dirt off exterior acrylic emulsion paints, water-based epoxy topcoats, solvent-based acrylic paints, exterior wall and clear coatings, wood coatings, waterproof paints, and other used architecture coatings. It also provides heavy duty coatings, such as ready-mixed, top-long, enamel, PU, epoxy, vinyl ester, chlorinated rubber, yung flon, polyurethane, and polysiloxane paints; and epoxy flooring coatings and anti-corrosive and zinc rich primers. In addition, the company offers marine paints that include supermarine products; anti-fouling, marine primers and paints, and rainbow paints; and fire-retardant coatings and spray-applied fire resistive materials. Further, it provides specialty coatings, which comprise galvanized steel emulsions, anti-midew, baking, and heat-resisting paints; varnishes, putty, traffic paints, black board paints, paint removers, hammer tone paints, paint oils, flash rust inhibitors, weldable anti-corrosive primers, gold paints, and flat paints. Additionally, the company offers coil coatings and maintenance paints; green water-based waterproof paints, green epoxy topcoats, and green water-based cement mortar paints; and water-based clear white-board paints, textured paints, and snow-flake decorative paints. It also provides paint pigments, synthetic resins, fire protection coatings, cement made products, and steel drums, as well as can, nuclear, and curtain wall coatings; and engages in the coating, anti-corrosive, lining coating, rust removal by water-jet, and wet sand blasting construction, as well as electrolytic protection activities. The company was founded in 1951 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

1730.TW.summary: Farcent Enterprise Co., Ltd provides consumer products in Taiwan and internationally. It offers deodorants; personal care products, including perfumes; dehumidifiers; home cleaning lotions, such as bath and toilet cleaners, floor cleaners, pipe dredging glue and agents, and cleaning tablets; natural cleaning lotions, including dishwashing liquids, laundry detergents, floor cleaners, laundry tank detergents, and hand washing mousse; home cleaning tools comprising mops, dedusting papers, rags, and cleaning bags; and mosquito repellent products. It offers its products through supermarkets, cosmetic shops, convenient stores, chain stores, and agents, as well as online. The company was formerly known as Eutech Enterprise Co., Ltd and changed its name to Farcent Enterprise Co., Ltd in 1996. Farcent Enterprise Co., Ltd was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

1731.TW.summary: Maywufa Company Ltd. manufactures and sells hair and skin care products under the Maywufa brand in Taiwan. It offers hair color creams; health care products and food supplements; and mother and baby skin care products under the mustela brand. The company also provides pharmaceuticals and medical devices, such as PG2 Lyophilized injection for treatment of cancer-related fatigue; AmCad-UT Detection device, an ultrasound CAD for thyroid cancer detection; and Bio-Three tablets for the treatment of mild diarrhea, abdominal pain, and constipation. In addition, it sells and distributes pharmaceutical products; and operates and manages pharmacy chain under the Pharmacy Franchise name. Maywufa Company Ltd. was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

1732.TW.summary: Mao Bao Inc. manufactures and sells household and personal care products in Taiwan. The company offers laundry cleaning products, such as detergent, liquid soaps, soft essence, clothes stains, cold wash, and hand wash products; dishwashing liquids; kitchen cleaning, universal cleaning, bathroom cleaning, antibacterial cleaning, and appliances cleaning products; and floor cleaners. It also provides organic anti-mosquito repellents, oils, and gels; and personal cleaning products, such as antibacterial moisturizing hand wash. The company was founded in 1978 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

1733.TW.summary: Apex Biotechnology Corp. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of home care medical devices by using biosensor technology worldwide. The company offers blood glucose, uric acid, hemoglobin, cholesterol, lactate, HbA1C, and ketone monitoring systems, as well as coagulation and multifunctional self-testing, and hemoglobin screening systems. It also provides pesticide residues check systems; and care management and tele-health services. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

1734.TW.summary: Sinphar Pharmaceutical Co.,Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, researches, develops, manufactures, and sells therapeutic drugs, health care foods, and medical beauty products in Taiwan and internationally. It produces anti-cancer pharmaceuticals, such as injections, solid reagents, and hormone reagents; and tablets, soft gel capsules and powder and canned special nutrient products. The company also provides shampoo, body wash, tonic water, lotions, moisturizers, sunscreen lotions, and serums; and pharmaceutical packaging products, such as eye drop bottles, dry canisters, tablet bottles, and various medical grade plastic containers. In addition, it offers plant extracts and functional foods; and OEM services, such as product design, manufacturing, etc. to manufacturers. Sinphar Pharmaceutical Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Yilan City, Taiwan.

1735.TW.summary: Evermore Chemical Industry Co., Ltd. produces and sells synthetic leather polyurethane (PU) resins in China, Taiwan, and internationally. The company offers solvent based PU components, thermoplastic PU components, PU adhesives, aqueous based PU dispersion, polyurethane system polyester, poly isocyanates cross-linking agent hardners, polyester polyol components, and UV Monomer/Oligomer, etc. It serves various industries, such as footwear, synthetic leather, optical electronics, textiles, adhesives, coating, paints and ink, tube and hose, optical glass, etc. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Nantou, Taiwan. Evermore Chemical Industry Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Aica Kogyo Company, Limited.

1736.TW.summary: Johnson Health Tech. Co., Ltd. provides sports and fitness equipment in Asia and internationally. The company offers electric treadmills, indoor exercise bikes/flywheels, elliptical training products, and weight training/rowing equipment; electric massage chairs, and instep shoulder and neck massage equipment; and fitness accessories, bar/dumbells, yoga supplies, gloves/boxing products, and protective/weight gears. It also provides exercise products, including fitness and bicycle series, marathon products, and GPS sports watch, as well as polar accessories. The company offers its products principally under the Matrix, Vision, and Horizon brand names primarily through stores. Johnson Health Tech. Co., Ltd. was founded in 1975 and is based in Taichung City, Taiwan.

1737.TW.summary: Taiyen Biotech Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of salt products under the TAIYEN brand in Taiwan and internationally. The company's products include skincare, healthcare, cleaning, aqua, medical supplies, and snack food products. It also operates stores; and engages in the foundry business. The company was founded in 1952 and is based in Tainan, Taiwan.

1742.TWO.summary: Taiwan Wax Company,Ltd. manufactures and sells refined wax in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers refined paraffin wax, microcrystalline wax, and light/heavy foots oil wax. It also imports and sells aquatic products, such as king crab and salmon. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Chiayi, Taiwan.

1752.TWO.summary: Nang Kuang Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. operates as a pharmaceutical company primarily in Taiwan. The company provides parenterals, aseptic parenterals, lyophilized injections, pre-filled syringes, and pre-mixed IV infusion bags, as well as tablets, capsules, topical products, and oral suspensions. It offers various products in the areas of cardiovascular system, gastrointestinal system, nervous system, alimentary and metabolism, blood, antineoplastic and immunomodulatory, musculo-skeletal system, respiratory system, dermatological, genito-urinary and sex hormone, systemic hormone, systemic antibacterial, and cosmetics, as well as hospital solution. Nang Kuang Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.

1760.TW.summary: Panion & Bf Biotech Inc., a biotechnology pharmaceutical company, manufactures and sells various pharmaceutical products in Taiwan. The company offers products in the areas of medical beauty, kidney, respiratory tract, gastrointestinal tract, and diagnosis. It also provides oral drugs and topical preparations; hand and mechanical disinfection, body lotion, and skin disinfection products; and pet health products, including surgical and skin prescriptions. Panion & Bf Biotech Inc. was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

1762.TW.long_name: Chunghwa Chemical Synthesis & Biotech Co., Ltd.
1762.TW.summary: Chunghwa Chemical Synthesis & Biotech Co. Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and wholesale of active pharmaceutical ingredients (APIs) in Taiwan and the United States. It offers API products, which include immunosuppressant, pain management, oncology, cardiovascular, and other products, as well as peptide drugs. The company also develops bulk pharmaceutical products, such as anti-anxiety agents, antidiabetics, laxatives, antifungals, antihistamines, antiseptics, antiulcerants, cardiovascular drugs, skeletal, muscle relaxants, hypolipaemics, antineoplastic, antihyperlipedemias, and immunosuppressant products, as well as provides research and development, and contract manufacturing services to new drug developers and generic drug companies. In addition, it is developing renal dialysis and gastrointestinal drugs. The company was formerly known as China Chemical Synthesis Industry Co., Ltd. Chunghwa Chemical Synthesis & Biotech Co. Ltd. was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

1773.TW.summary: Shiny Chemical Industrial Company Limited manufactures and sells electronic and industrial solvents in Taiwan. The company's electronic solvents include menthyl acetates, ether alcohol esters, other solvents, and customized products; and industrial solvents comprise menthyl acetates, ether ester products, and other solvents. It also provides fumalin and urea glue; and leases storage tanks. The company was founded in 1979 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

1776.TW.summary: Headway Advanced Materials Inc. manufactures and sells polyurethane resin and thermoplastic polyurethane pellet products in the Asia-Pacific region. The company provides products, such as solvent and water borne polyurethane, solvent free PU, polyisocynate hardner, polyol, thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU), and others. Its products are used in various applications, such as textile, leather, furniture, footwear, building materials, electronics, food packing, transportation, medical care, and other industries. Headway Advanced Materials, Inc. was founded in 1976 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

1783.TW.summary: Maxigen Biotech Inc. engages in the development, manufacture, and marketing of biomedical and skincare products in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers Formagraft, a bone graft substitute; Formasetin, a bone void filler; and intra-articular injections under the ArtiAid, ArtiAid Plus, and ArtiBest names for use in orthopedic area. It also provides Foramic, a bone substitute granule; MaxiBone, a calcium phosphate ceramic; and GingivAid, a collagen dental grafts for use in orthopedic and dental areas. In addition, the company offers FormaAid, a collagen membrane; and E-TECH DENTISTAR II sterilizer and disinfectant for use in dental area, as well as HealiAid, a collagen wound dressing product for use in dental and wound dressing area. Further, it provides ophthalmic viscoelastic device under the ViscAid, PreviscAid, and BiVisc names; and Formaderm, a dermal filler injection for use in plastic surgery. Additionally, the company offers skincare products, including face, neck, body, limbs, and other masks; and make up remover, cleansing, exfoliating, toner, essence, men's care, sunscreen, body care, hand/foot care, and special care products. Maxigen Biotech Inc. was founded in 1998 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

1784.TWO.summary: BIONET Corp. provides cord blood banking services in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers stem cell banking services, including stem cell storage, mesenchymal stem cell storage, dental stem cell storage, adipose stem cell, and PBSC + immune cells; and genetic testing services. It also provides stem anti-aging, rose stem rejuvenation, ultimate protection and repair, and ANIKINE series products. BIONET Corp. was founded in 1999 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

1786.TW.summary: SciVision Biotech Inc. manufactures and sells hyaluronic acid products in Taiwan. It offers synovial fluid supplements, facial dermal implants, absorbable adhesion barriers, and intravesical instillation products. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

1789.TW.summary: ScinoPharm Taiwan, Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, researches and develops, produces, and sells CGMP active pharmaceutical ingredients (API) to pharmaceutical companies in Taiwan, the United States, Europe, India, rest of Asia, and internationally. The company offers custom synthesis services for biochemistry molecules, such as peptides and nucleic acids; generic API manufacturing services; and outsourcing services. It also provides CRAM services, such as chemistry skill, analytical and regulatory, chemical process development, clinical drug substance, and consulting services for the development and manufacturing of clinical, small-scale, and commercial-stage APIs and intermediates. In addition, the company develops peptide synthesis technologies. Further, it develops and manufactures western medicines and other chemical materials, albumin medicines, oligonucleotide medicines, injections, and new small molecule drugs, as well as provides biological technology services and technical services. The company has a strategic alliance with Baxter International Inc. to develop, manufacture, and commercialize of antiemetic drug in chemotherapy for cancer. ScinoPharm Taiwan, Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Tainan, Taiwan.

1795.TW.summary: Lotus Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells medicines in Taiwan, Korea, the United States, and internationally. Its product portfolio focuses on generics in the fields of oncology, cardiology, nephrology, and central nervous system disease. The company also sells and markets a portfolio of over-the-counter medicines. In addition, it engages in wholesale of cosmetics; retail of clinical machines; biotech technological services; and related consulting services. Lotus Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan. Lotus Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Alvogen Emerging Markets Holdings Limited.

1796.TWO.summary: GeneFerm Biotechnology Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, markets, and sells fermented products in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers a range of raw materials, such as fermented microbial, fungi, and fruits and vegetables products; probiotics; and herbal extracts and animal derived peptides and powders. It also provides ODM, as well as fermentation toll manufacturing services to companies for the development and manufacture of dietary supplements, functional foods, health food products, and various applications. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

1799.TWO.summary: Easywell Biomedicals, Inc., a biopharmaceutical and medical device company, develops and commercializes medical devices, drug substances, and pharmaceutical dosage forms in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers pharmaceutical products, which include high-barrier generics for the treatment of anti-cough, anti-urinary incontinence, breast cancer in PMS women, anti-depression, prevention of pneumocystis pneumonia, epilepsy, chronic angina, and inflammatory lesions of rosacea; and 505(b)(2) drugs for the treatment of Parkinson's, urinary, and pneumonia diseases. It also provides medical devices, including digital clinical, infrared ear, and non-contact forehead infrared thermometers. The company was formerly known as Actherm Inc. and changed its name to Easywell Biomedicals, Inc. in July 2015. Easywell Biomedicals, Inc. was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

1809.TW.summary: China Glaze Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells ceramic glaze materials. The company offers frits, pigments, ameloblasts, zirconium silicates, print glazes, vetrosa glazes, and digital inks. It also provides building construction materials, such as crystal glass; ceramic tiles; and photoelectric and nano materials. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

1810.TW.summary: Hocheng Corporation provides bathroom products in Taiwan and internationally. It offers toilets, wash basins, faucets, kitchen sinks, bathtubs, vanity cabinets, mirrors, sensor items, accessories, urinals, and other items. Hocheng Corporation was founded in 1931 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

1813.TWO.summary: Polylite Taiwan Co., Ltd. manufactures and distributes GIA polycarbonate lenses worldwide. Its products include FSV, SFSV, progressive, KID, and polarized lens. The company also offers dispending, fitting, and edging and finishing services. Polylite Taiwan Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

1815.TWO.summary: Fulltech Fiber Glass Corp. produces and sells fiber glass yarn and fabrics in Taiwan. It offers electronic grade fiber glass yarn for use in the manufacture of fiber glass fabric, printed circuit boards, desktop and laptop computers, cellular phones, PDAs, and projection cloths, as well as industrial grade fiber glass yarn for use in the manufacture of insulation tubes. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

1817.TW.summary: Sanitar Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells ceramic sanitary products in Taiwan. It offers faucets, acrylic bathtubs, and bathroom cabinets, as well as sinks, toilets, urinals, and accessories. The company was formerly known as Sanken Industrial Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Sanitar Co., Ltd. in 2003. Sanitar Co., Ltd. was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

1903.TW.summary: Shihlin Paper Corporation produces and sells paper-related products. The company offers cards for use as playing and game cards; color cards for use in folders and art cards; black boards for use in speakers, frame boards, and album boards; and non-coated boards that are used in shoe boxes and environmental cartons. It also provides duplex boards with white back for use in tag cards and packaging containers; duplex boards with gray back for use in shoe and tissue paper boxes, liner boards, and packaging containers; and chip boards for gift-wrapped boxes and book binding. The company was founded in 1918 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

1904.TW.summary: Cheng Loong Corporation manufactures and sells paper products in Taiwan, Mainland China, and Southeast Asia. The company offers industrial paper products, including linerboards, coated duplex boards, corrugating medium, white top liners, and core boards, etc.; and corrugated containers, such as corrugated sheet boards, corrugated containers, display containers, waterproof containers, and paper pallets, etc., as well as pre-print services. It also provides household paper products, such as toilet papers, facial tissues, kitchen papers, and paper towels under the Andante brand name, as well as diapers and hand wash mousse; fine and specialty papers; and bond papers, receipts, computer forms, paper voucher, paper invoice, medication bags, labels/tags and flexible packaging products, etc. In addition, the company offers green paper art products for children's educational toys, pet toys, and cultural and creative products, as well as builds residential and commercial premises for rent and sale. Further, it provides electronic components, optical instruments, glass products, and precision instruments; corrugated, display, and paper boxes; foams, anti-static bubble bags, plastic buffer packaging materials, and packaging decoration printing products; and water treatment, sewage treatment, and maintenance and technical repairment services. Cheng Loong Corporation was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

1906.TW.summary: Baolong International Co., Ltd. engages in the distribution of industrial paper products. It offers facial tissue and corrugated papers. The company was founded in 1965 and is based in Douliu, Taiwan.

1907.TW.summary: YFY Inc. manufactures and sells papers in Taiwan, Mainland China, and internationally. The company offers pulp, premium, Kraft, corrugated, and fine papers; cardboards, paper and pulp products, cardboard and colored cases and boxes, and food containers; napkins, tissue papers, and detergent; and styrene butadiene latex. It provides corrugated boxes and paper pallets; and commercial photography, brand packaging design, certification testing, and printing management services. The company offers color, art, and security printing services; paper, chemical, machinery, business paper, and material trading services; RFID technology solutions; production technologies for PCBS; and smart cards and application systems, information security products, and consumer service solutions. It provides banking, securities, investment trust, customer service technology, rental companies, insurance, and venture investment services. The company offers pharmaceutical and stem cell products; investment, management, and consultancy services for biotechnology companies; researches and develops pharmaceutical products and clinical applications, and internationally licenses medical devices; rare cell diagnostics technology and genetic testing; and information software services. It develops mobile applications and ePaper; operates an online store, Yuen Foong Shop, and restaurants; organic food, chemical, and electronic products; agricultural resource recycling; graphic and brand design services; wholesales agriculture products and building materials; and factoring and seedling cultivation businesses. The company offers active carbons and fertilizers; refractory materials, cement, and concrete products; environmental protection equipment; designs and prints magazines, posters, books, and advertisements; operates cogeneration facility; and constructs water processing, environmental, sewage treatment, and incinerator facilities. YFY Inc. was founded in 1924 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

1909.TW.summary: Longchen Paper & Packaging Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacturing, processing and trading of paper raw materials in Taiwan and Mainland China. The company operates through Containerboard, Corrugated Container, Waste Paper, Paper Distribution, and Others segments. It manufactures, processes, and sells paper, paperboard, paper products, novel packaging materials, cartons and paper boxes, package printed, and cogeneration products. The company also manufactures, prints, processes, and trades in corrugated containers; manufactures and sells paper machines; procures and sells waste paper; distributes paper products; and trades in bulk materials. In addition, it engages in the recycling/renewal of energy and resources, including turnkey design, trial-run, and operation of cogeneration and incinerator systems; warehousing; and public waste water treatment activities. Further, the company is involved general investment; wholesale, import, and export of packaging materials, paper products, electronic products, and hardware; provision of consulting services, market information, and investment strategies for investors; and sewage treatment. Additionally, it offers prints for packaging and decoration, and color-printed paper cartons; and manufactures and sells cartons, pearl wool and foam, etc. The company was formerly known as Long Chen Paper Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Longchen Paper & Packaging Co., Ltd. in June 2019. Longchen Paper & Packaging Co., Ltd. was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

2007.TW.summary: Yieh Hsing Enterprise Co., Ltd. produces and sells steel products in Taiwan. It offers stainless, carbon, alloy, and free-cutting steel wire rods. Its products are used in manufacturing of nuts, screws, wires, automobile parts, machine parts, hardware, tools, etc. The company also exports its products to North America, South America, China, India, South Asia, Northeast Asia, Europe, and the Middle East. The company was founded in 1978 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan. Yieh Hsing Enterprise Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Yieh Phui Enterprise Co., Ltd.

2008.TW.short_name: KAO HSIUNG CHANG IRON & STEEL C
2008.TW.long_name: Kao Hsing Chang Iron & Steel Corp.
2008.TW.summary: Kao Hsing Chang Iron & Steel Corp. produces and sells steel pipes and plates and tin plates in Taiwan. It offers cold and hot rolled and coated steel coils. The company was founded in 1966 and is based in Kaohsiung City, Taiwan.

2010.TW.long_name: Chun Yuan Steel Industry Co., Ltd.
2010.TW.summary: Chun Yuan Steel Industry Co., Ltd. provides metal solutions primarily in Taiwan. It operates through seven divisions: Commercials Steel, Commercials Steel Regional, Electrical Steel, Special Steel, Special Steel Strip, Automated Storage System, and Construction. The company offers hot and cold rolled steel sheets and bar coils; enamel and coated steel sheets and bar coils; aluminum and alloy-aluminum sheets and coils; magnetic steel sheets comprising motor core EI sheets and magnetic steel coils; special steel materials, such as plate/bar/round/square/angled steel; cold rolled carbon bar steel coils; and copper products, including brass and phosphor bronze. It also provides steel base and reinforced plates; machinery products; steel structures; and H-beam steel and cellular H-beam steel products for welded structures. In addition, the company offers storage equipment, including logistics equipment, 3-D automated storage systems, and shelfs for heavy materials; castings, such as container angles; and stamping parts comprising autos and electric appliances parts. Further, it provides civil and construction engineering services for factory buildings, multi-storey buildings, and bridges. The company was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2014.TW.summary: Chung Hung Steel Corporation manufactures and sells steel products in Taiwan, Asia, the United States, Europe, and internationally. The company offers hot-rolled steel coils, cold-rolled steel coils, hot-dipped galvanized steel coils, JIS steel pipes, ASTM steel pipes, API steel pipes, and PE coated steel pipes. Its products are used in steel pipes, sports equipment, bicycles, umbrellas, oil drums, electroplated pipes, home appliances and automobile parts, furniture, floor plates, piping and plumbing, mechanical structure, piling, construction equipment, pallet, garden tube, and display stand, as well as pipe products for pipeline transportation. The company was formerly known as Yieh Loong Enterprise Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Chung Hung Steel Corporation in July 2004. Chung Hung Steel Corporation was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan. Chung Hung Steel Corporation is a subsidiary of China Steel Corporation.

2015.TW.summary: Feng Hsin Steel Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of steel products in Taiwan. It offers angle, channel, flat, round, square, and deformed bars, as well as rebars; billets; and bar in coils. The company was incorporated in 1969 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

2017.TW.summary: Quintain Steel Co., LTD. produces and sells galvanized wires in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers hot rolled wire rod products; deformed bar in coil products; spheroidized annealed wire and hard drawn wire products; hot dip galvanized wire products; and ball thread/v-thread threaded rods, as well as drywall, tapping, and self drilling screw; and wood and deck screw. Its products are used primarily in the agriculture, construction, and processing industries, as well as in mesh-making and screw industries. The company was founded in 1973 and is based in Tainan City, Taiwan.

2020.TW.summary: Mayer Steel Pipe Corporation manufactures steel pipes and tubular products in Taiwan. It offers welded steel pipes for low pressure use; rigid steel conduits; carbon steel tubes for machine structural purposes; electric resistance welded carbon steel tubes for automobile structural purposes; and carbon steel square pipes for general structural purposes. The company also provides stainless steel pipes, such as boiler and heat exchanger tubes; stainless steel tubes for mechanical and structural purposes, and automobile exhaust; light gauge stainless steel pipes for ordinary piping; and general service tubes. In addition, it offers stainless steel plates and sheets; stainless steel surface processing and cutting services; and stainless steel paste protective films. Further, the company produces and markets various cast, polished, electroplated, and forged aluminum alloy automotive wheels in the United States, the European Union, Japan, and Southeast Asia. Its products are also used in air conditioning, fire protection, drainage, water supply, and electricity, as well as gas, structural, and hydraulic pipe applications. Mayer Steel Pipe Corporation was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2022.TW.summary: Tycoons Group Enterprise Co.,Ltd. produces and sells steel products worldwide. It offers billets; steel wire rods; steel bars; spheroidizing annealing wires; and drywall, roofing, wood, self-tapping, chipboard, Euro, collated, and window screws, as well as shear connectors. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in Kaohsiung City, Taiwan.

2023.TW.summary: Yieh Phui Enterprise Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, processes, manufactures, markets, imports and exports, and trades in steel products in Taiwan. It provides pickled steel coils, cold-rolled steel coils, galvanized steel coils, coated steel coils, and steel coil products; buildings, plants, and bridges steel structures; frame cranes; straddle carrier; container crane; steel pipes; aluminum-zinc plated steel coils; mechanical parts; stainless and carbon steel wires; alloy and free-cutting steel wires; steel and straight bars; and RFID products, walkie-talkies, and smart monitoring system for LED street lights, as well as OEM/ODM and piping engineering design services. The company also designs, manufactures, and installs EOT cranes, gantry cranes, and rail mounted gantry container cranes; offers black steel, pre-galvanized steel, EMT steel, square/rectangular steel, structural steel, rigid steel conduit, steel sprinkler, and oval steel pipes, as well as API casing and line pipes; develops, leases, and sells residential and commercial buildings, and department stores; manufactures and markets military specification printed circuit boards, and special high grade alloys; wholesales hardware, telecommunications equipment, and daily necessities; technical consultation for steel products; management services; manufactures metal; and mines for nickel, as well as operates hotels and radio. It exports its products to Mainland China, Southeast Asia, Europe, North America, Central and South America, Japan, the Middle East, Africa, and Australia. The company was formerly known as Kuo Chiao Enterprise Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Yieh Phui Enterprise Co., Ltd. in March 1986. Yieh Phui Enterprise Co., Ltd. was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

2024.TW.summary: Chih Lien Industrial Co., Ltd. produces and supplies steel wires and steel bars in Taiwan and internationally. It offers high and low carbon, free cutting, bearing, alloy, spring, and cold heading steel wires; and free cutting, carbon, tool, alloy, spring, and stainless steel bars. The company provides its products for use in industrial machinery, precision parts, bicycles, motorcycles, automobiles, tools, household products, electronics, OA machines, springs, furniture, construction, etc. Chih Lien Industrial Co., Ltd. was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

2025.TW.long_name: Chien Shing Stainless Steel Co., Ltd.
2025.TW.summary: Chien Shing Stainless Steel Co., Ltd. engages in the stainless steel business in Taiwan and internationally. It manufactures and trades in stainless steel coils and materials; and engages in cutting and sliding stainless steel coils. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.

2027.TW.long_name: Ta Chen Stainless Pipe Co., Ltd.
2027.TW.summary: Ta Chen Stainless Pipe Co., Ltd. produces and sells stainless steel and aluminum products. It operates in Stainless Steel and Aluminum, and Screws and Nuts segments. It offers stainless steel pipes, rolls, pipe fittings, plates, bars, valves, and castings; and imports, exports, and sells screws and nuts, as well as curtains and cloth products. The company offers its products in the United States, China, Taiwan, and internationally. Ta Chen Stainless Pipe Co., Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.

2028.TW.summary: Wei Chih Steel Industrial Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells steel products in Taiwan. It primarily offers steel bars, deformed bars, steel blanks, round bars, and billets. The company was founded in 1971 is based in Tainan City, Taiwan.

2030.TW.summary: Froch Enterprise Co., Ltd. manufactures, sells, and exports stainless steel welded tubes and pipes in Taiwan and internationally. It offers stainless steel pipes, large diameter stainless steel pipes, mechanical tubes, equal leg angle bars, square and rectangular tubes, sanitary tubes, inside polished pipes, coated pipes, sheets, plates, and coils, as well as flat bars; stainless steel tubes for boilers and heat-exchangers; and stainless steel light gauge tubes for general services. The company serves oil and gas, petrochemical, chemical, power utility, pulp and paper, food and beverage, automotive, furniture, construction, electronic, bio-tech, and other industries. Froch Enterprise Co., Ltd. was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Douliu, Taiwan.

2031.TW.summary: Hsin Kuang Steel Company Limited engages in the cutting, stamping, and sale of various steel products in Taiwan. Its products include steel coils and plates, round steel bar, stainless and alloy steel, and special steel. The company is also involved in the investment in various businesses, including manufacturing, securities investment, banking, and insurance, etc.; sale of metal products for architecture markets; manufacture and sale of metal products and energy related equipment; leasing and warehousing; and manufacturing and processing of metal structures, architectural components, and steel products. Hsin Kuang Steel Company Limited was founded in 1967 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

2032.TW.summary: Sinkang Industries Co., Ltd. manufactures, processes, and sells stainless steel in Taiwan and internationally. The company primarily offers SUS 300 and 400 series stainless steel. Its products are principally used in the construction and decoration, kitchen and dining cutlery, and household electrical appliances, as well as in the petrochemical, food processing, transportation equipment, electrical machinery, office equipment, and other processing industries. Sinkang Industries Co., Ltd. was founded in 1971 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

2034.TW.summary: YC Inox Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells stainless steel products in Taiwan. It offers stainless steel coils, sheets, plates, pipes, tubes, angles, flat bars, and U channel products. The company was formerly known as Yeun Chyang Industrial Co., Ltd. and changed its name to YC Inox Co., Ltd. in July 2012. YC Inox Co., Ltd. was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Changhua City, Taiwan.

2038.TW.summary: Hai Kwang Enterprise Corporation manufactures and sells steel and billets in Taiwan and internationally. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

2049.TW.summary: Hiwin Technologies Corp. manufactures and sells motion control and systematic technology products worldwide. The company operates through Linear Guideways, Ballscrews, and Others segments. It offers ballscrews, linear guideways, end effectors, datorker robot reducers, bearings, and torque motor rotary tables, as well as single and multi-axis robots; and medical robots and equipment; and aerospace automation equipment parts, as well as computer numerical control milling machines. The company provides components, industrial robots, special machines, and after-sales services for machine tools, industrial machinery, bioscience, medical equipment, equipment of electronics industry, photo-electricity, semiconductor devices and automation, etc. It also engages in the research, development, design, and manufacture of solar cells, electronic components, electric power supplies, and electric transmission and power distribution machinery products, as well as gear cutting tools and machinery; provision of thread forming machinery; and sale of gear cutting tools and machinery. The company offers its products under the HIWIN brand name. Hiwin Technologies Corp. was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

2059.TW.summary: King Slide Works Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, processes, and sells rail kits for cloud computing servers and data devices, furniture accessories, slides, and molds in Taiwan, China, the United States, and internationally. The company offers kitchen/furniture accessories, including metal and wood drawer systems, under mount slides, ball bearing slides, epoxy coating drawer slides, and hinges; consumer electronics, such as mobile phones; and thin server slide rail/cloud computing devices. It also provides products for special applications, such as home appliances, automotive RVs, office equipment, medical, and others. King Slide Works Co., Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung City, Taiwan.

2061.TWO.summary: Feng Ching Metal Corporation produces and sells copper wires and enameled copper wires primarily for use in electronic, electrical appliance, and communication technology industries in Taiwan and internationally. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

2062.TW.summary: Sunspring Metal Corporation manufactures and sells zinc, brass, and plastic parts worldwide. The company offers components for bathroom accessories, door hardware, and communications equipment. It serves hardware, automotive, kitchen and bath plumbing, communications equipment, and other related industries. Sunspring Metal Corporation was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

2063.TWO.summary: Sheh Kai Precision Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells bi metal screws, screw anchors, and screws in Taiwan and internationally. It offers bi-metal window, concrete, self tapping, self drilling, and wing screws, as well as self piercing screws and side lap screws; hammer and diamond drill bits, and dust caps; and bi-metal concrete screw anchors, bi-metal concrete anchor stainless steel internal thread heads, galvanized concrete screw anchors, and galvanized concrete screw anchors internal thread heads. The company also provides wood screws, stainless steel self-tapping screw sharps/blue points, special fasteners, hex lag screws, double end hanger bolts, carriage bolts, and automotive fasteners. Its products are used in various applications, such as roof wall steel fastening, curtain wall window, and concrete anchor systems, as well as concrete anchor products. The company was formerly known as Sheh Kai Industrial Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Sheh Kai Precision Co., Ltd. in 2003. Sheh Kai Precision Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

2064.TWO.summary: Camellia Metal Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells steel bars and wires in Taiwan. It offers low-carbon, middle-carbon, high-carbon, free cutting, spring, alloy, and stainless steel bars and wires. The company's products are used in motor and mechanical axis, as well as axis of business machines; screwdrivers, hex wrenches, and sockets; torsion and balance bars, and automotive coil springs; and medical and aerospace technologies, household appliances, and high-precision and other materials. Its products are also used in cars, bridges, steel, and screws and other building materials; and electronics, telecommunications, and IT industries. The company was founded in 1971 and is based in Changhua County, Taiwan.

2065.TWO.summary: Sheh Fung Screws Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells screws primarily in Taiwan. The company provides various screws, including self-drilling, timber construction, drywall, chipboard, self-tapping, decking, self-piercing screws, and other screws. It also offers hammer drill bits, customized fastener parts, kaitex coatings, and packing boxes. The company was founded in 1973 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

2066.TWO.summary: Sumeeko Industries Co., Ltd. manufactures, repairs, and sells automotive parts, hardware parts, mechanical parts, and screws. It offers power trains, suspensions, transmissions, exhausts, chassis, and interior parts for use in automobiles; appliances; and products for use in mechanism, construction, and other applications. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Kaohsiung City, Taiwan.

2069.TW.short_name: YUEN CHANG STAINLESS STEEL CO L
2069.TW.long_name: Yuen Chang Stainless Steel Co., Ltd.
2069.TW.summary: Yuen Chang Stainless Steel Co., Ltd. processes, manufactures, and supplies stainless steel products in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers stainless steel coils, sheets, plates, and strips. Its products are used in information technology, medical instruments, computer and peripherals, auto parts, home appliances, etc. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

2070.TWO.long_name: Ching Chan Optical Technology Co., Ltd.
2070.TWO.summary: Ching Chan Optical Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures fastener equipment worldwide. The company offers sorter machines for screw/bolt, nut/washer, rod/stud, and eddy current series; second hand machines; and accessories for sorting machines. It also provides screw and bolt making machines, including standard and long stroke bolt, bolt parts, and high performance formers; process monitoring products; automated guided vehicle systems comprising warehouse and transferring robots; and intellectual automation production integration. Ching Chan Optical Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung City, Taiwan.

2101.TW.summary: Nankang Rubber Tire Corp.,Ltd. produces and sells tires in Taiwan and internationally. It offers passenger car, SUV and 4X4 WD, winter, van, motorsport, light truck, and bus and trailer tires. The company was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2102.TW.summary: Federal Corporation produces and sells tires in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers drift, ultra high performance, high performance, passenger car, touring, SUV, commercial, and winter tires. Federal Corporation was founded in 1954 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

2103.TW.summary: TSRC Corporation manufactures and markets synthetic rubber and elastomers, and applied materials in Taiwan and internationally. Its products include ESBR rubber for use in automotive tires, shoe soles, conveyor belts, military caterpillar and tow trucks tracks, sports equipment, and toys; SSBR rubber for use in energy-saving, high performance, and all-season tires; BR rubber that is used in the production of plastic modification for HIPS and high-speed radial tires; and NBR rubber for use in oil hoses, oil seals, rollers, industrial gaskets, belts, shoe soles, rubber plastic foam sheets, and conveyor belts. The company also provides styrene-butadiene-styrene, styrene-isoprene-styrene, and styrene-ethylene/butylene-styrene copolymers, as well as T-BLEND applied materials for use in plastic modification, compounding, adhesive, packaging, medical, elastic film, shoe material, foaming material, labels, hygiene, wire and cable, flexography, gasket material, and soft touch material applications. The company was formerly known as Taiwan Synthetic Rubber Corporation and changed its name to TSRC Corporation in August 1999. TSRC Corporation was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

2104.TW.long_name: International CSRC Investment Holdings Co., Ltd.
2104.TW.summary: International CSRC Investment Holdings Co., Ltd. produces and sells carbon black for tire and other rubber products worldwide. Its products are also used in applications, such as pigments, plastics, chemical fiber products, conductive materials, etc. The company also engages in the biotechnology and pharmaceutical research and development activities. In addition, it produces and sells lithium batteries; and provides investment services, investment consultation services, carbon black transportation services, and technology services. The company was formerly known as China Synthetic Rubber Corporation and changed its name to International CSRC Investment Holdings Co., Ltd. in October 2018. International CSRC Investment Holdings Co., Ltd. was founded in 1973 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2105.TW.long_name: Cheng Shin Rubber Ind. Co., Ltd.
2105.TW.summary: Cheng Shin Rubber Ind. Co., Ltd., together with subsidiaries, processes, manufactures, and trades in bicycle tires, electrical vehicle tires, reclaimed rubbers, rubbers and resins, and other rubber products. It also manufactures and trades in various rubber products and relevant rubber machinery. The company researches, develops, tests, processes, manufactures, exhibits, imports, exports, wholesales, and retails tires for motorcycles, industrial and agricultural mechanical vehicles, passenger cars, trucks, tanks, and bicycles. It also operates a technical center; produces, sells, and maintains models; retails accessories for rubber tires; provides container transportation services; manages racing tracks; and offers warehouse logistic services. In addition, the company provides automobile accessory and related products; rubber-coated bead and belt steel cords; radial tires; and tubes. Further, it is involved in the construction and trading of employees' housings. The company operates in Taiwan, China, the United States, and internationally. Cheng Shin Rubber Ind. Co., Ltd. was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Changhua, Taiwan.

2106.TW.summary: Kenda Rubber Industrial Co. Ltd. designs and sells tires in Taiwan. It offers automotive, bicycle, wheelchair, power sport, and turf/trailer/specialty tires. The company sells its tires through distributors and retailers. Kenda Rubber Industrial Co. Ltd. was founded in 1962 and is based in Yuanlin, Taiwan.

2107.TW.summary: Formosan Rubber Group Inc., together with its subsidiaries, produces and markets rubber, plastic, plastic foam, and PVC resin sheets; and relevant materials in Taiwan and the United States. The company offers rubber, silicone rubber, laminated, PU coating, green plastic, and PVC products. Its products are used in various applications, including functional garments and fabrics, healthcare, industrial and safety products, inflatable products, and optical electronic materials, as well as for use in shoes, and bags and luggage products. The company is also involved in the development of residential and commercial buildings for renting and selling; real estate investment and rental, as well as sale of premises; and warehouse, logistics, and rental and leasing businesses. Formosan Rubber Group Inc. was founded in 1952 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2108.TW.summary: NANTEX Industry Co., Ltd. produces and sells synthetic rubber latex, acrylonitrile-butadiene rubber, carbon masterbatch compounds, and thermoplastic elastomer products worldwide. Its NANTEX synthetic rubber latex products are used in making examination, medical, household, and industrial gloves, as well as in art papers, coated white board, carpet backings, shoe insoles, adhesives, plastic modification agents, construction materials, saturation in non-woven fabrics, and artificial leathers. The company's acrylonitrile-butadiene rubber products are used in industrial and automotive goods, belts, fuel hoses, O-rings, gaskets, shoe soles, insulation equipment, sporting goods, and printing rollers products, as well as electronic parts. Its DYNAPRENE thermal plastic elastomer products are used in automotive parts, construction materials, food industries, sporting goods, industrial products, 3C industries, medical equipment, and plastic modification agents; and carbon masterbatch compounds for use in O-rings, gaskets, fuel hoses, foam products, cables, rollers, shoe soles, and automotive parts. The company was formerly known as President Fine Chemical Industry Co. Ltd. and changed its name to NANTEX Industry Co., Ltd. in October 1991. NANTEX Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1979 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

2109.TW.long_name: Hwa Fong Rubber Ind. Co., Ltd.
2109.TW.summary: Hwa Fong Rubber Ind. Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells rubber and tires in Taiwan and internationally. It offers bicycle, motorcycle, scooter, agricultural, automotive, industrial, truck, bus, and light truck tires and tubes; ATV tires; and special trailer, light truck, and passenger car radial tires. The company was formerly known as Hwa Fong Ind. Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hwa Fong Rubber Ind. Co., Ltd. in 1970. Hwa Fong Rubber Ind. Co., Ltd. was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Changhua, Taiwan.

2114.TW.summary: Hsin Yung Chien Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells rubber conveyor belts, rubber sheets, and hot-pressing cushion pads and composite materials in Taiwan and internationally. The company's product portfolio includes straight warp, light duty, Chevron, Kevlar, and steel cord conveyor belts; specialty conveyor belts include heat, oil, flame, abrasion, cold, and chemical resistant conveyor belts; and pipe, rip stop, side wall, and EP/NN conveyor belts, as well as seal belts and bucket elevator belts under the KING brand. Its conveyor belts are used in a range of applications comprising mining, steel, aviation, agriculture, logistics, and pier automatic production. The company also provides electronic level hot and solar panel pressing cushion pads under the Silieet brand name. In addition, it offers composite materials for car parts, bicycle parts, and customer goods under the NEWsheet brand name. The company was formerly known as Hsin Yung Chien Industrial Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hsin Yung Chien Co., Ltd. in 2003. Hsin Yung Chien Co., Ltd. was founded in 1964 and is based in Nantou City, Taiwan.

2115.TW.summary: Luhai Holding Corp. manufactures and sells tire valves and accessories worldwide. It offers TPMS valves; valves for bicycles, electric bikes, motorcycles, passenger cars/light trucks, trucks/buses, and agricultural/OTR applications; and valve accessories, such as valve core products, valve caps, hexagon nuts, washers, grommets and O-rings, rim nuts, and sleeves. The company also provides valve core and mounting tools; tire pressure detection products, including tire pressure and pen type tire pressure gauges; inflating equipment comprising air chucks, clip-on air chucks, and connectors; and rigid, bent, plastic, and flexible valve extensions, as well as holders. In addition, it offers wheel balance weights and tools; tire repair accessories consisting of skivers, stitchers, scrapers, repair tools, and tire repair units; and tire repair kits. The company serves manufacturers in the tire, automobile, truck, and agriculture vehicle industries. Luhai Holding Corp. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Changhua, Taiwan.

2201.TW.summary: Yulon Motor Company Ltd. manufactures and markets automobiles and related parts in Taiwan, China, and the Philippines. The company operates through Brand, Supporting, Horizontal, Taiwan Retail, China Retail, and Others segments. It also imports, exports, sells, retails, maintains, repairs, leases, and trades in cars and parts; manages basketball team and related services; and provides investment, general advertising, general advertising planning, taxi, temporary labor, product design, towing, publication, property insurance, management consulting, real estate leasing, buildings and greening, construction project contracting, and factory leasing services. In addition, the company engages in the supply and provision of information software; retail trade of spare parts of vehicles; provision of secondhand cars and car related products, and installment financing services for cars and trucks; metal casting and related business; wholesale and retail sale of batteries; construction industry business; brokerage of electric vehicles; and sale, maintenance, and repair of heavy vehicles and related products. Further, it provides installment loans of consumer goods; consulting services on cars, electronics, textiles, and related products; consulting services for advanced technology, products, and equipment import; computer software maintenance and computer system integration services; loans to car dealers for car purchases; secondhand vehicle consultation and vehicle agency services; and sale, brokerage, and auction services. Additionally, the company engages in the financial lease of equipment; and sale of information software and telecommunications equipment. The company was formerly known as Yulon Machinery Manufacturing Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Yulon Motor Company Ltd. in September 1960. Yulon Motor Company Ltd. was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in Miaoli, Taiwan.

2206.TW.summary: Sanyang Motor Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells motorcycles and automobiles in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers its products under the SYM brand. It also exports various self-developed machines, and molds and jigs, as well as provides professional services related to prototype parts processing to auto markets. The company was formerly known as Sanyang Industry Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Sanyang Motor Co., Ltd. in January 2015. Sanyang Motor Co., Ltd. was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Hukou, Taiwan.

2207.TW.summary: Hotai Motor Co., Ltd. primarily engages in assembling, trading, importing, selling, and repairing vehicles, automobile air conditioners, and related parts in Taiwan and Mainland China. The company provides products of various auto brands, including TOYOTA, LEXUS, HINO, and TOYOTA industrial equipment. It is also involved in the installment sales and vehicle leasing, used vehicles selling, and property insurance activities. The company was founded in 1947 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

2208.TW.summary: CSBC Corporation engages in building, manufacturing, and repairing various ships and onshore equipment. The company offers bulk, cement, and product carriers; and container ships, reefer vessels, tankers, tug boats, and naval ships, as well as oil drilling rigs. It also provides marine works; offshore wind turnkey services; and engineering services, such as manufacture, installation, assembly, and shipping of domestic and international ship unloaders, as well as level luffing cranes. In addition, the company manufactures marine hardware comprising rudder and stern frames, and lashing bridges; and offers ship coating, anti-corrosion coating on large steel structures, surface treatment, and professional coating services. It operates in Taiwan, Singapore, Marshall Islands, Hong Kong, Panama, and internationally. The company was formerly known as China Shipbuilding Corporation and changed its name to CSBC Corporation in March 2007. CSBC Corporation was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

2221.TWO.long_name: Tachia Yung Ho Machine Industry Co., Ltd.
2221.TWO.summary: Tachia Yung Ho Machine Industry Co., Ltd. primarily manufactures and sells butt-welding pipe fittings and high purity components in Taiwan. The company offers stainless steel butt-welding pipe fittings, such as elbows, tees, reducers, caps, stub ends, etc.; and UHP components, including high purity pipes and pipe fittings, metal gasket face seal fittings, micro butt-welding fittings, LoK-DJ compression fittings, UHP CGA/DISS fittings, diaphragm and ball valves, valve manifold boxes, and special chemical storage tanks. Its butt-welding pipe fittings are used in the areas of petrochemical, ship building, foods, sugar making, paper production, chemical engineering, agricultural chemical, dyeing, synthetic fibers, liquid chemical, gas, industries piping, construction drainage pipe fitting, etc.; and UHP components have applications in the areas of semiconductor, LCD-TFT, solar energy, LED, food industry, chemical piping, gas, liquid, construction pipe fitting, etc. Tachia Yung Ho Machine Industry Co., Ltd. also exports its products to Japan, Korea, Singapore, Malaysia, France, Germany, Ireland, England, the United States, Australia, New Zealand, China, and the Gulf Region. The company was formerly known as Tachia Yung Ho Machine Industry Limited Company and changed its name to Tachia Yung Ho Machine Industry Co., Ltd. in 1977. Tachia Yung Ho Machine Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1943 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

2227.TW.summary: Yulon Nissan Motor Co., Ltd. engages in the research, design, development, and sale of vehicles in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers sedan, RV vehicles, and commercial vehicles, as well as related components. It is also involved in the investment activities. The company is headquartered in Miaoli, Taiwan.

2228.TW.summary: Iron Force Industrial Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacturing and trading of auto parts, and display and houseware products in Taiwan and internationally. Its auto parts include airbag inflators and precision metal parts for automotive safety systems; steering columns/shafts and diesel engine cooling pipes; high precision metal tubes for seatbelt retractor/pre-tensioner systems; automated machines; and special surface treatments, as well as related components. The company also provides OEM and ODM of customized store display fixtures; display systems design; and retail store design, as well as metal wire related products. In addition, it offers display fixtures, clothes hangers, and mannequins, as well as provides logistic services. The company was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

2230.TWO.summary: C.T.I. Traffic Industries Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells auto engine parts in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers green power products; DLC piston rings comprising black diamond piston rings; gasoline engine oil rings, such as car and auto oil, car piston, engine oil, and piston ring expanders; diesel engine oil rings, including cast iron rings; liner kits; piston kits; and timing kits and components, timing guides, and timing chains, as well as tensioners, and cam and crank gears. It also provides overhaul engine gaskets, which include CYL heads, cylinder head gaskets, automotive and engine oil seals, valve covers, oil pans, and valve stem and engine valve seals, as well as intake, exhaust, and pipe manifolds; engine valves consisting of auto engine valves, engine valve seats, engine bearings, and engine valve guides; and carburetor kits. In addition, the company offers hydraulic brake systems, such as break, master, brake wheel, and brake master cylinders; compression rings, including hook, step, inside cut, under cut, notch, both-side keystone, slip in, and copper plated rings; and jump starters. Its products are used automotive, agriculture, off-highway, and heavy-duty trucks applications. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.

2231.TW.summary: Cub Elecparts Inc. manufactures and supplies automobile electrical and electronic parts in Taiwan. The company offers advanced driver assistance systems; aftermarket service parts comprising sensors and other parts; switches, such as ignition lock, power window, combination, and headlight; OEM products; and tire pressure monitoring sensors. Cub Elecparts Inc. was founded in 1979 and is based in Changhua, Taiwan.

2233.TW.summary: TURVO International Co., Ltd. provides modular solutions in the machining industry in Taiwan and internationally. The company primarily offers precision parts for industrial use. It also provides professional metal processing services, including machining, automation integration, heat treatment, and forging. The company's products have application in auto parts, such as engine common rail parts, variable timing system parts, suspension system parts, and other parts; medical parts comprising insulin syringe parts; bike hubs, shock absorber, etc.; industrial components that include various industrial use sleeves, connecting rings, compressor parts, etc.; and optical lens, which comprise connecting rings and cum to lens applications. TURVO International Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is based in Taichung City, Taiwan.

2241.TW.summary: Amulaire Thermal Technology, Inc. provides cooling fins for green electronic devices in Taiwan, Europe, North America, and Japan. The company offers customized products; metal injection moldings, lower flow resistance, and lighter weight designs; forgings for lower flow resistance and lighter cooling designs; and thermal modules and inverter parts, and heat dissipation systems and high power electronic system parts. Amulaire Thermal Technology, Inc. was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

2246.TWO.long_name: Kaison Green Energy Technology Co., LTD
2246.TWO.summary: Kaison Green Energy Technology Co., LTD researches and develops, produces, assembles, and sells electric vehicles. The company is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

2249.TWO.summary: Young Shine Electric Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells automotive a/c components in Taiwan. The company offers automotive a/c compressors, heat exchangers, and parts. It also exports its products internationally. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

2301.TW.summary: Lite-On Technology Corporation manufactures and markets computer software, hardware, peripherals, and components in Asia and internationally. It also offers monitors, multifunction and all-in-one printers, cameras, and Internet systems and image-processing equipment; information storage and processing equipment, electronic components, and office equipment; electronic coils, transformers, power suppliers, and electronic hardware parts; light-emitting diode products; electronic car products; and optical lens modules and optoelectronic components. In addition, it manufactures and sells medical equipment; photovoltaic devices, electronic components, telecommunications equipment, information technology equipment, semiconductor applications, general lighting, automotive electronics, and renewable energy products and systems; LED optical products; power supplies; image sensors and rectifiers; keyboards, display devices, printers, scanners, and computer cases; system products; mobile terminal equipment; mobile phone molds and assembly lines; power control and energy management products; plastic and computer peripheral products; optical disc drives; modules of automotive recorders; touch panels and rubber assembly products; maintenance equipment and precision instruments; and other electronic components. Further, the company engages in the wholesale, import and export, and installation of street and signal lights, scenery lights, and electronic components; and provision of technology consulting, market research and after-sales, energy technology, ODM, and automotive industry maintenance services. Additionally, it is involved in the electronic contract manufacturing; investment; solar energy engineering; and information outsourcing activities, as well as real estate management business. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2302.TW.summary: Rectron Limited manufactures and sells discrete semiconductors in Taiwan and internationally. Its products include bridge rectifiers, ESD diodes, high voltage products, recovery rectifiers, schottky diodes, signal-switching diodes, silicon carbide schottky, standard rectifiers, transistors, TVS and zener diodes, MOSFET, and other products. Rectron Limited was founded in 1976 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

2303.TW.summary: United Microelectronics Corporation operates as a semiconductor wafer foundry in Taiwan, Singapore, China, Hong Kong, Japan, the United States, Europe, and internationally. The company operates through Wafer Fabrication and New Business segments. It provides circuit design, mask tooling, wafer fabrication, and assembly and testing services. The company also researches, develops, and manufactures products in the solar energy and LED industries. It serves fabless design companies and integrated device manufacturers. United Microelectronics Corporation was incorporated in 1980 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

2305.TW.summary: Microtek International, Inc. produces and sells digital imaging solutions for business, medical, NDT, bio and science, and digital archiving applications in Taiwan and internationally. It offers entry-level and hi-speed flat, ADF, professional photo film, object, large-scale image and document, NDT, gel, and medical film scanners, as well as flatbed scanners, including scanners for books and bound materials. The company also provides X-Ray workstations and digitizers, dental workstations and digitizers, image management software, film digitizing systems, and digital cloud systems. In addition, it offers ScanWizrad Graph, a software for capturing images of large-scale; MiBio, a software for analyzing images designed for the bio-tech analysis and research; and ScanPotter, a document imaging software for Mac OS. Microtek International, Inc. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

2312.TW.summary: Kinpo Electronics, Inc. designs, manufactures, assembles, purchases, and sells consumer electronics, communication, computing, and data storage products worldwide. The company offers 3D printer product lines; storage products; network attached storage products; printer modules and fax machines; wireless and broadband products; set-top-boxes; all-in-one PC and motherboards; formatters, color laser MFPs, laser scan units, and laser printer controllers; and calculators, electronic keyboards, e-dictionaries, gaming mouse and BT joysticks, GPS and GPS modules, auto floor cleaners, photo printers, e-books and tablets, and pachinko displays. It also provides home automation, smartwatch and ring, and fingerprint sensor products; PCBAs for cameras and AV products; LED outdoor and indoor lighting products; PC, server, and storage power supplies, as well as AC/DC adapters, and DC/DC and AC/DC converters; smart grid enabling products and smart power meters; controllers for air condition systems and industrial HVAC boards; automotive body control boards and lightings; and bank teller vault protection systems and high voltage power distribution modules. In addition, the company offers surgical detection systems; green oak leaf, butterhead, green leaf, romaine, red oak leaf, coriander, ice plant, arugula, bughatti oak, and veredes oak; chassis for ATM and gaming machines; plastic parts for printers and plotters, automated chip assembly and medical product parts, and ink cartridges; and precision components. Kinpo Electronics, Inc. was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2313.TW.summary: Compeq Manufacturing Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells printed-circuit boards (PCBs) in Taiwan, the United States, Asia, and Europe. It provides regular multi-layered, high density interconnection, high layer count, flexible, and rigid-flex PCBs, as well as surface mount devices; and offers module assembly services. The company was founded in 1973 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
