The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Tainan, Taiwan.

2477.TW.summary: Meiloon Industrial Co., Ltd. operates as an ODM/OEM manufacturer for audio systems and loudspeakers worldwide. It offers studio monitor, wireless and portable, in-wall/in-ceiling, professional audio, car, and garden speakers, as well as home theater systems and other products. The company was founded in 1973 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

2480.TW.summary: Stark Technology, Inc. provides system integration services for information and communication technology products in Taiwan. It offers systems integration services in the areas of infrastructure, peripheral, enterprise network, application software, and telecom, as well as professional, implementation, and consulting and maintenance services. The company also provides information security services, such as network and content security; and services for enterprise, hi-tech, FSI, telecom, and public sector industrial applications. It serves customers in the financial services, education and research, high tech manufacturing, electronics, communications, transportation and automotive, healthcare and hospitality, and other industries, as well as to the government. Stark Technology, Inc. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

2481.TW.summary: Panjit International Inc. designs, manufactures, and sells semiconductors in China, North America, Germany, Korea, and internationally. It offers low/medium/high voltage MOSFETs; Schottky rectifiers and diodes; SiC Schottky barrier diodes; diode rectifiers; protection devices, such as Zener diodes, ESD protection devices, transient voltage suppressors, and load dump transient voltage suppressors; bipolar junction transistors; bridge rectifiers; and packing information solutions. Its products are used in automotive, industrial, and power supply applications. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

2482.TW.summary: Uniform Industrial Corporation provides various payment solutions worldwide. Its product portfolio includes magnetic stripes, smart chips, near field communication products, and decoder integrated circuits. The company provides classic readers, unattended systems, countertop systems, mobile payment solutions, contactless readers, hybrid card readers, peripherals, and POS solutions. It also develops payment platforms; and provides technical services, including product conceptualization, customer shipment (FCS), and post-FCS support. Uniform Industrial Corporation was founded in 1983 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

2484.TW.summary: Siward Crystal Technology Co., Ltd manufactures and sells crystal and oscillator solutions in Taiwan, Mainland China, Japan, Singapore, the United States, and Europe. The company offers tuning fork ceramic SMD products; crystal products, such as metal DIP and SMD, ceramic SMD, and glass weld SMD products; oscillator ceramic SMD products; automotive, TCXO, VCTCXO, and VCXO ceramic SMD products; and RFID PCB tag and inlay/label products. Its products are used in various applications, such as mobile communication, tablet PCs, GPS, computer clocks, DSC, AV machines, etc. Siward Crystal Technology Co., Ltd was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

2485.TW.summary: Zinwell Corporation engages in the manufacture and sale of digital cable/satellite/terrestrial receiving, broadcast and broadband communication, IPTV receiving, and wireless equipment in Taiwan. It offers digital channel stacking switch (dCSS), low-noise block downconverter (LNB), headend system, and SAT>IP products; digital home entertainment products, including wireless video sender, set top box, soundbox, and soundbar; and residential broadband products, such as G.hn, G.fast, Wi-Fi, and MoCA solutions, as well as 5G, 4G LTE, and IoT solutions. The company also provides CATV/MATV transmission products that comprise optoelectronic, CATV outdoor amplifier, CATV outdoor passive, CATV/MATV indoor amplifier, CATV outdoor passive, and satellite TV distribution services. Zinwell Corporation was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

2488.TW.summary: Hanpin Electron Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells electronic consumer products, professional audio products, and professional DJ equipment in Taiwan, China, Hong Kong, and Singapore. Its electronic consumer products include Hi-Fi turntables, 5 disc CD players, and CD players; professional audio products comprise power amplifiers, powered mixers, mixing consoles, equalizers, and public address systems; and professional DJ equipment consists of DJ turntables, CD/MP3 players, DJ mixers, SD/USB players, and MIDI controllers, as well as belt drive turntables, media players, and channel tabletop mixers. The company was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.

2489.TW.summary: AmTRAN Technology Co.,Ltd engages in the production and sale of flat-panel TVs in Taiwan and internationally. It offers OEM/ODM display; MFG LCD monitor; PDs audio device; mouse; and webcam. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

2492.TW.summary: Walsin Technology Corporation manufactures and sells passive components worldwide. The company provides multiple-layer ceramic chip capacitors/arrays, chip-resistors/arrays and networks, RF filters, inductors, disc capacitors, varistors, antennas, chip fuses, thin film products, safety components, modules, etc. Its products are used in mobile device, networking, automotive, industrial, power supply, IoT, green energy, PC and peripherals, and lighting. The company was incorporated in 1992 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

2493.TW.summary: Ampoc Far-East Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells equipment and materials for the electronic industry in Taiwan. Its products have applications in printed circuit boards, FPD and touch panels, IC packaging, light emitting diode and OLED, solar cells, IC wafers and substrates, passive devices and components, MEMS, consumables and others, and inspection tools. The company provides its products in Mainland China and Hong Kong through its service centers and distribution channels. AMPOC Far-East Co., Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

2495.TW.summary: Infortrend Technology, Inc provides enterprise data storage solutions worldwide. The company offers EonStor CS, a shared storage solution to enterprises and businesses; EonStor GSa, a flash unified storage solution; EonStor GSc, a hybrid cloud storage appliance; EonStor GS, a unified storage integrating storage area network (SAN), network attached storage, and cloud services; EonStor GSe, a shared media storage for SMB; EonStor GSe Pro, a single controller storage solution; and M and E, and office shared storage solutions . It also provides EonStor DS, a SAN storage solution; EonServ, an integrated storage server solution; expansion enclosure for rackmount storage systems; and EonOne for GS and CS, a storage management tool. In addition, the company offers data services, including SSD Cache, a component that stores data so that future requests for the data can be served; automated storage tiering solutions; local/remote replication for data protections and backups; and Snapshot, which provides point-in-time copies of data for various applications, including backup, testing or development, information analysis, and data mining. Further, it offers thin provisioning technology to enhance storage utilization; intelligent drive recovery for RAID protections and data recoveries, and media scan; and network video recorders for surveillance deployment in offices. Additionally, the company provides storage solutions for virtualizations, hybrid cloud, artificial intelligence, private cloud, physical securities, backup and disaster recoveries, virtual desktop infrastructures, databases, and dockers, as well as high performance computing solutions. It serves security and surveillance, media and entertainments, education and academics, financial services, and healthcare industries, as well as the government and public sectors. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

2496.TW.summary: Success Prime Corporation primarily engages in the education business in Taiwan. It offers education services, such as face-to-face tutoring and consulting, as well as digital learning services, including the creation of K12 education platform. The company also produces optical fiber products comprising single-mode, multimode, and special fibers, as well as optic fiber cable products, including boxed, outdoor, indoor, and armored optic fiber cables. In addition, it produces communication components, system, and sensors; provides digital informatics consulting services; and manages tutorial academy teachers and curriculum education services. Success Prime Corporation was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Miaoli, Taiwan.

2498.TW.summary: HTC Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, designs, manufactures, assembles, processes, and sells smart mobile and virtual reality devices in Taiwan and internationally. It offers PDA phones, smartphones, and handheld devices. The company also provides marketing, repair, and after sales services; and online/download media services, as well as human resources management services. In addition, it is involved in the general investing activities; design, research, and development of application software and graphics technology; design and management of cloud synchronization technology; and development and sale of digital education platform, as well as development of virtual reality contents. Further, the company provides app stores for virtual reality, where customers can explore, create, connect, and experience the content; and healthcare, 5G connectivity, blockchain, and artificial intelligence technologies. It provides its products through telecom service providers, distributors, and retailers; and retail stores, as well as through online. HTC Corporation was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

2509.TW.summary: Chainqui Construction Development Co.,Ltd engages in the construction business in Taiwan. The company constructs commercial buildings and construction firms; and offers cement. It is also involved in the public housing rental and sales business. The company was formerly known as Chain Qui Development Co. Ltd. Chainqui Construction Development Co.,Ltd was founded in 1972 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2511.TW.summary: Prince Housing & Development Corp. engages in the construction business primarily in Taiwan. The company constructs, leases, and sells public housings, commercial buildings, and parking lots/parking towers, as well as tourism/recreation places, such as children's playgrounds, water parks, etc. It is also involved in the hotels and catering, plywood manufacturing, real estate management, real estate trading and leasing, apartment management, security, electricity and water pipe maintenance, and general investment activities, as well as offers integrate security and guard services. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2520.TW.summary: Kindom Development Co., Ltd. engages in the real estate development business. The company develops residential properties; leases and sells commercial buildings; undertakes construction projects, such as corporate headquarters, civil workshops, medical buildings and residential buildings, as well as civil projects, including land preparation and rezoning, roads and bridges; and operates department stores and supermarkets. It also engages in the installation and engineering of electrical and fire safety equipment; and investment and operation of shopping malls, as well as non-store retailing business. In addition, the company offers business management and consulting; corporate marketing planning; conference; exhibition; parking lot operation and management services. Further, it is involved in the general investment activities. Kindom Development Co., Ltd. was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

2527.TW.long_name: Hung Ching Development & Construction Co. Ltd.
2527.TW.summary: Hung Ching Development & Construction Co. Ltd. constructs residential and commercial buildings for rent and sale in Taiwan. It provides residential buildings, villas, apartments, shops, factories, and offices, as well as parking space. Hung Ching Development & Construction Co. Ltd. is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

2528.TW.summary: Crowell Development Corp. engages in the construction of commercial and residential buildings for rental and sale in Taiwan. It also constructs parking lots and villas; operates children's playgrounds, amusement parks, integrated sports stadiums, supermarkets, storage operations, restaurants, cafes, and hotels; develops industrial zones; purchases and sells building materials; and manufactures electronic components, and data storage and processing equipment. In addition, the company is involved in the land re-allocating, advertising art design, and department store trading businesses. Further, it operates in crop and flower cultivation, and strain industries. Crowell Development Corp. was founded in 1974 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

2530.TW.summary: Delpha Construction Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, constructs commercial buildings. It is also involved in the sale and lease of public housing; development of land; upholstery industry; and real estate agency, rental, and investment activities. The company was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2539.TW.summary: Sakura Development Co.,Ltd engages in the sale and lease of residential properties with focus on the Zhongzhangtou area in Taiwan. The company was founded in 1976 and is based in Taichung City, Taiwan.

2542.TW.summary: Highwealth Construction Corp. engages in the construction of commercial buildings in Taiwan. The company operates through four segments: Developing, Constructing, Department Store, and Ecotechnology. The Developing segment develops new constructing or lease opportunities. The Constructing segment is involved in constructing buildings. The Department Store segment manages various shops within the store, supermarkets, and international import and export trade. The Ecotechnology segment provides services for clearing waste. Its apartment buildings include apartments, suites, and parking spaces; and office buildings comprise offices, storefronts, parking lots, and suites. The company is also involved in the construction, lease, and sale of residential and commercial buildings. In addition, it provides real estate broker agent and real estate commerce services; construction material wholesale services; and investment services. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

2543.TW.long_name: Hwang Chang General Contractor Co., Ltd
2543.TW.summary: Hwang Chang General Contractor Co., Ltd engages in construction activities in Taiwan. It undertakes the construction of public work and government contract turnkey, pumping station, baseball stadium, avenue, boulevard, road, highway, sewage treatment plant, underground station, expressway, sub-mountain diversion, and pipeline projects. The company was founded in 1981 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2545.TW.summary: Huang Hsiang Construction Corporation builds, sells, and rents public housing and commercial building in Taiwan. The company's product portfolio includes home, shops, offices, shopping malls, and parking spaces. It also imports/exports and sells building materials. The company was formerly known as Huang Ming Construction Corporation, LCC and changed its name to Huang Hsiang Construction Corporation in April 1996. Huang Hsiang Construction Corporation was founded in 1991 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

2546.TW.summary: Kedge Construction Co. Ltd. constructs, develops, leases, and sells housing and buildings in Taiwan. It also engages in the electrical equipment and fire safety equipment installation, etc.; and general investment activities. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

2547.TW.summary: Radium Life Technology Co., Ltd. develops real estate projects in Taiwan. It develops and operates T9 BOT project, which consists of a bus terminal, four residential buildings, two office towers, a shopping center, a hotel, and a movie theatre; MEHAS project covering an area of 22,000 square meters; BOND 18 project; and E.A.T project. The company also engages in retail, luxury hotel, bus terminal management, property management, biotech and skin care, sewage treatment, renewable energy, property leasing, and elderly care businesses. Radium Life Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2548.TW.summary: Huaku Development Co., Ltd. constructs, leases, and sells public housings and commercial buildings in Taiwan and China. The company also engages in the leasing and sale of general-purpose plants and warehouses; and contracting of civil and hydraulic engineering projects. The company was formerly known as Huaku Construction Co., Ltd. Huaku Development Co., Ltd. was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2596.TWO.summary: ReaLy Development & Construction Corp. engages in the land development and administration, and construction management businesses in Taiwan. The company is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

2597.TW.summary: Ruentex Engineering & Construction Co., Ltd. engages in the civil and architectural construction contracting business in Taiwan and internationally. The company is involved in the design, planning, and construction and project management of various projects, including housings, villas, office buildings, high-tech plants, etc. It also manufactures and sells precast concrete products. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

2601.TW.summary: First Steamship Company, Ltd. operates as a shipping company in Taiwan. The company engages in dry bulk carrier shipping operations that include the transportation of various bulk commodities comprising iron ores, coal, and agricultural products. It is also involved in vessel management operations; and the provision of crewing services, such as crewmember recruitment, selection, and training. The company owns and operates 10 vessels, including 1 Panamax, 2 Handysize, 3 Kansamax, and 4 Supramax vessels with a capacity of approximately 536,424 dead weight tonnage. First Steamship Company, Ltd. was founded in 1963 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2605.TW.summary: Sincere Navigation Corporation, a shipping transportation company, owns and operates bulk cargo vessels in Taiwan. Its fleet includes dry bulk carriers, tankers, and woodchip carriers. As of December 31, 2019, the company had a fleet of 17 vessels, including 3 very large crude carrier tankers and 14 dry bulk vessels of various tonnages. It serves coal and iron ore miner, steel, energy, and paper industries. The company was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2609.TW.summary: Yang Ming Marine Transport Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, provides shipping, repair, and chartering services in Taiwan, North America, South America, Europe, Asia, and internationally. It also purchases and sells ships, containers, and chassis. In addition, the company acts as a property, shipping, forwarding, and inland forwarding agent; and shipping manager. Further, it is involved in the warehouse and terminal operations, as well as the provision of insurance, cargo consolidation, container transportation, stevedoring, and logistics services. Yang Ming Marine Transport Corporation was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Keelung, Taiwan.

2611.TW.summary: Tze Shin International Co. Ltd. primarily provides transportation services in Taiwan. The company offers cargo freight, container, truck, and oil transportation services, as well as petrochemical and damage goods transportation services; and bulk logistic services. It also engages in the development, planning, and construction of factories, shopping malls, and residential buildings; and provides ticket sales management services. The company was formerly known as Tze Shin Transportation & Terminal Co.Ltd and changed its name to Tze Shin International Co. Ltd. in July 2002. Tze Shin International was founded in 1973 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2613.TW.summary: China Container Terminal Corporation provides cargo handling services in Taiwan. It also operates various container terminals. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

2617.TW.summary: Taiwan Navigation Co., Ltd. provides shipping services in Taiwan. It provides passenger and freight transportation services via water; port warehousing; aquatic sand mining; navigation channel dredging services; and tugboats, as well as acts as a land owner in agreements with construction companies for the use of its land for the construction of residential and commercial buildings for sale and rental. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 34 vessels. Taiwan Navigation Co., Ltd. was founded in 1946 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2618.TW.summary: EVA Airways Corp., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the aviation business in Taiwan, Asia, Europe, North America, and internationally. The company operates through Aviation Transportation, Maintenance, Catering, and Other segments. The Aviation Transportation segment is involved in the aviation transportation of passengers and cargo. The Maintenance segment maintains aircrafts, engines, and aircraft parts. The Catering segment is involved in providing catering services. The Other segment provides ground handling, travel agency, cargo distribution, investment, and flight training activities. The company also manufactures aircraft parts. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 84 aircraft, including 79 passenger jets and 5 freighters. EVA Airways Corp. was founded in 1989 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

2633.TW.summary: Taiwan High Speed Rail Corporation operates and manages high speed rail system in Taiwan. It operates a 350 kilometers length of rail system that links Nangang, Taipei, Banqiao, Taoyuan, Hsinchu, Miaoli, Taichung, Changhua, Yunlin, Chiayi, Tainan, and Zuoying service stations. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

2636.TW.summary: T3EX Global Holdings Corp., an investment holding company, provides integrated logistics services in Taiwan, Hong Kong, China, Eastern Asia, and internationally. The company operates in two segments, Sea Export and Air Export. It offers international freight forwarding services, such as ocean freight and air freight services; and domestic logistics services, including sea and air freight import/export customs clearance, bonded area customs clearance and filing for re-import/re-export, logistics park of export and import transit operations, hazardous goods or tank container customs clearance, remote customs clearance and declaration, customs seal clearance operations, and inspection and quarantine. The company's domestic logistics services also comprise temporary warehousing for import and export goods, label replacement, sorting and repacking, pallet, warehouse space leasing, inventory management reports, and customized delivery services. It also provides warehousing and transportation; supply chain solutions; and e-commerce logistics solutions. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2641.TWO.summary: Franbo Lines Corp. provides ocean transport and shipping agency services through bulk and general cargo vessels in Taiwan and internationally. Its operating and forwarding business focuses on the transportation of steel, logs, chemical products, and mechanic equipment primarily through Asia and Pacific Regions. The company also owns and charters ocean going and Far East vessels to Japanese shipping companies, as well as offers freight forwarding services. In addition, it offers vessel management services, which include safety, international ship security, and manning management services. Further, the company is involved in the long- and short-term vessel chartering, and freight brokering businesses, as well as provision of technical, marine supply, ship inspection, and insurance claim services. Franbo Lines Corp. was founded in 1998 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

2642.TW.summary: Taiwan Pelican Express Co., Ltd. provides trucking and door-to-door home delivery services in Taiwan. It offers C2C, B2C, and C2B home-delivery services. The company also provides warehousing and logistics, and tally and packaging services. It operates a fleet of 1,100 home delivery vehicles. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

2643.TWO.summary: Soonest Express Co., Ltd. provides integrated logistics solutions in Taiwan and internationally. It offers air and ocean freight forwarding services; custom clearance services; transit/warehouse/transportation services; logistics management; international freight forwarding; cross-border e-commerce parcel delivery; and courier services. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

2701.TW.summary: Wanhwa Enterprise Company engages in the rental of commercial buildings, and operation of cinemas and mobile amusement parks in Taiwan. The company provides leasing services for business hotels, offices, supermarkets, restaurants, shopping malls, department stores, and bookstores. It also offers roof playground, including the playgrounds, sports, and educational and other areas; and operates digital cinemas. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

2702.TW.summary: Hotel Holiday Garden engages in hotel operation business in Taiwan and the United States. It operates international tourist hotel rooms rental services with Chinese and western restaurants, nightclubs, and swimming pools. The company also offers approximately 270 guest rooms, lobby, banquet hall, gym, and other facilities; and operates an amusement park located next to Taroko Park Shopping Center. In addition, it is involved in general export; hotel rental and catering; and investment businesses. Hotel Holiday Garden was founded in 1958 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

2704.TW.summary: The Ambassador Hotel,Ltd. operates hotels and restaurants under the Ambassador Hotels and Restaurants, and amba Hotels & Resorts brands in Taiwan. The company was founded in 1962 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

2705.TW.summary: Leofoo Development Co., Ltd. engages in the tourism and travel industry in Taiwan. It operates hotels under the Courtyard by Marriott Taipei and Leofoo Hotel brands; apartment-style boutique hotel under the Leofoo Residences brand; theme park under the Leofoo Village brand; resort hotel under the Leofoo Resort Guanshi brand; water theme park under the Leofoo Water Park brand; and bakeries under the Elite Bakery, and Elite Concept brands. The company was founded in 1968 and is based in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

2707.TW.summary: Formosa International Hotels Corporation operates in the hotel industry in Taiwan and internationally. It owns and manages Regent Hotels & Resorts, an international luxury hotel brand; Silks Place, a lifestyle hotel brand; and Just Sleep, an affordable business hotel chain. The company operates 18 hotels with 3,849 rooms and suites. It also operates restaurants in National Palace Museum and various other renowned attractions in Taiwan, as well as operates Domino's Pizza chain in Taiwan. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2712.TW.summary: FarGlory Hotel Co.,Ltd engages in the operation of Farglory Hotel in Hualien, Taiwan. It offers rooms, dining, weddings and meetings, leisure center, outdoor pool, stores, and spa facilities. The company is based in Hualien, Taiwan.

2718.TWO.summary: Pleasant Hotels International Inc. engages in the operation of a hotel in Taiwan. The company's hotel features 388 guest rooms, as well as wedding and meeting halls; and a business center, swimming pool, fitness center, and restaurant. Pleasant Hotels International Inc. is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

2722.TW.summary: Chateau International Development Co., Ltd. engages in the hotel business. It also provides dining services; and sells commodities. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Pingtung, Taiwan.

2723.TW.summary: Gourmet Master Co. Ltd., an investment holding company, operates and franchises a chain of cafes in China, Taiwan, the United States, and internationally. The company operates its cafes under the 85Â°C name that provide coffee, cake, and bakery goods. As of December 31, 2019, it operated approximately 400 stores in Taiwan, 600 stores in China, 65 stores in the United States, 18 stores in Australia, and 8 stores in Hong Kong. It also provides birthday cakes, delicacy cakes, cake rolls, specialty cakes, toasts, Taiwanese/Japanese/European/Danish bread, sandwiches, donuts, coffee, tea, milk tea, smoothies, shakes, and juices; and others, including pineapple cakes, nougats, egg rolls, and gift boxes. Gourmet Master Co. Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

2727.TW.summary: Wowprime Corp. provides catering services in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers steak dishes, Japanese pot dishes, teppanyaki, Japanese dishes, barbecue dishes, Japanese pork chops, vegetable dishes, fried steak, etc. It operates approximately 20 brands; and 400 restaurants in the United States. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

2729.TWO.summary: TTFB Company Limited operates a chain of restaurants in Taiwan and internationally. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

2730.TWO.summary: Miramar Hospitality Co.,Ltd engages in the hotel business in Taiwan. The company operates Miramar Garden Taipei, a 5-star international business and tourist hotel that provides accommodation services, including deluxe rooms, business rooms, executive deluxe rooms, boss suites, and premier suites; dining services under the Rain Forest, Light CafÃ©, JIU BAR, and Tic-Tac-Toe Bakery names; and conference services, such as conference rooms, and wedding and banquets. It also provides health club, fitness center, outdoor swimming pool, sauna, fitness club membership, and business center facilities. The company is based in Taipei, Taiwan. Miramar Hospitality Co.,Ltd is a subsidiary of Tze Shin International Co. Ltd.

2732.TWO.summary: La Kaffa International Co., Ltd. operates cafes that provides tea, Taiwanese traditional desserts, set meals, coffee and bakery products, and Chinese food products in Taiwan and internationally. Its brand portfolio includes Chatime, ZenQ Dessert, La Kaffa Coffee, Wagokoro Tonkatsu Anzu Ginza, Bake Code, Duan Chun Zhen, Osaka Ohsho Taiwan, ChuNian Shabu Shabu and Chatime Lounge. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Zhubei City, Taiwan.

2733.TWO.summary: Vigor Kobo Co.,Ltd. develops, produces, and sells Chinese cakes and pastries in Taiwan and internationally. It offers pineapple, red-in-green mini, chestnut mini, black stick mini, milk sun, cheese honey, and taro mini cakes, as well as beef jerky. The company provides its products through its stores. Vigor Kobo Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2734.TWO.long_name: Ezfly International Travel Agent Co., Ltd.
2734.TWO.summary: Ezfly International Travel Agent Co., Ltd. operates as an online travel agency in Taiwan. The company offers ticket purchase and booking services; and sells domestic air tickets, foreign individual air tickets, and foreign group air tickets. It also provides domestic and international reservation, group travel, mini tour, group and airline free travel, and themed tickets, as well as foreign dynamic packaging free travel, themed project travel, domestic high-speed rail holiday travel, domestic bus travel, various European and Japanese railway ticket, visa, and other travel products. The company offers its services through its ezfly.com website. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

2736.TWO.summary: Hoya Resort Hotel Group operates hotels, resorts, and spas in Taiwan. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Beinan, Taiwan.

2739.TW.long_name: My Humble House Hospitality Management Consulting Co., Ltd.
2739.TW.summary: My Humble House Hospitality Management Consulting Co., Ltd. operates tourism hotels in Taiwan and internationally. The company also provides hospitality consulting services. Its property portfolio includes the Sheraton Grand Taipei Hotel, Le Meridien Taipei, and Mu Jiao Xi Hotel, as well as My Humble House Art Gallery that presents contemporary works of art. My Humble House Hospitality Management Consulting Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2740.TWO.summary: Mr. Onion International Co., Ltd provides catering services in Taiwan. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

2741.TWO.long_name: Renjie Oldsichuan Catering Management Consultant Co., Ltd.
2741.TWO.summary: Renjie Oldsichuan Catering Management Consultant Co., Ltd. operates a chain of catering facilities in Harbin, Mainland China, and Taiwan. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

2743.TWO.summary: Richmond International Travel & Tours Co.,Ltd provides travel transportation services under the Shan Fu Tourism brand. It offers passenger services, such as passport visa, Wi-fi rental, translator/headset, and tourism encyclopedia; and professional services, such as outbound, inbound, and national tourism, as well as ticket ordering service. The company offers its products through an e-commerce platform. Richmond International Travel & Tours Co.,Ltd was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2745.TWO.long_name: Life Travel & Tourist Service Co., Ltd.
2745.TWO.summary: Life Travel & Tourist Service Co., Ltd. provides group tourism products and services to domestic and foreign tourists in Taiwan. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

2750.TWO.summary: Hotel Orchard Park CO., LTD. operates a hotel in Taiwan. The company operates the Orchard Park Hotel, an international tourist hotel with business, holiday, and transit functionalities in Taoyuan's Aerotropolis. Its hotel includes 187 guestrooms, such as deluxe king, executive rooms, Washitsu suites, executive suites, park view suites, and orchard suites. The company also provides Hee Yuet Lau Chinese restaurant, Orchard CafÃ©, Hanamizuki Japanese cuisine, Atrium Bar, Oasis club, banquet hall, conference room, shopping street, and business center services, as well as ball room, meeting room, pavilion, and spa services. Hotel Orchard Park CO., LTD. was founded in 2009 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

2752.TWO.summary: Tofu Restaurant Co., Ltd engages in the chain restaurant business in Taiwan. It is also involved in the food manufacturing business. Tofu Restaurant Co., Ltd was founded in 1997 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

2753.TWO.summary: Bafang Yunji International Company Limited operates and franchises restaurants under the BAFANG YUNJI name. The company operates approximately 700 stores in Taiwan; and 100 stores in Hong Kong. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

2754.TWO.summary: Kura Sushi Asia Co., Ltd. operates sushi restaurant in Taiwan. Its restaurants offer sushi, warship, hand roll, volume, and side meal products, as well as desserts and drinks. The company was founded in 1977 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2755.TWO.summary: YoungQin International Co., Ltd. operates restaurants under the MWD brand name. It also operates retail stores that offer fried chicken products under the Fried Chicken Master name. The company has operations in Taiwan and internationally. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

2756.TWO.long_name: Lian Fa International Dining Business Corp.
2756.TWO.summary: Lian Fa International Dining Business Corporation operates various restaurants. It operates restaurants under the brands of Sharetea, Mamak, and Kampung. The company is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2801.TW.summary: Chang Hwa Commercial Bank, Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides commercial banking products and services in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers deposits, including checking, demand, time, and savings deposits, as well as negotiable certificates of deposit; and remittances and credit cards. It also provides TWD/foreign currency loans for SMEs projects; personal mortgage loans; syndicated loans; negotiated and discounted, margin, short-term, medium-term, long-term, and overdue loans; and overdrafts. In addition, the company offers foreign exchange, wealth management, and e-banking services. Further, it is involved in trust, international banking, and investment operations; and the provision of life insurance agency and securities brokerage services. The company serves individuals and corporates. It operates through 185 domestic offices; 7 overseas units in New York, Los Angeles, Tokyo, London, Hong Kong, Singapore, and Manila; and 1 representative office in Yangon, as well as 649 ATMs. The company was founded in 1905 and is headquartered in Taichung City, Taiwan.

2812.TW.summary: Taichung Commercial Bank Co., Ltd. provides various banking products and services in Taiwan. The company offers various deposit products, such as savings account and time deposit accounts, foreign currency demand deposits, cash, and travel checks and remittance; corporate finance services, which include corporate loans, letter of credit, collections, and factoring and forfaiting, as well as account information, deposits, payments, accounts receivable financing, hedging strategies, financial instruments, and consultation services; and personal mortgage loans comprising house mortgage, house renovations, children's education funds, business start-up capital, investments, and financial management services. It also provides financial advice, asset allocation, consultation service, and trust planning, as well as family and retirement services; credit cards; and online banking, mobile banking, and mobile payment services. As of December 31, 2020, the company had 81 branches, a Malaysia Labuan branch, and an offshore banking unit. The company was formerly known as Taichung Small and Medium Business Bank Company Limited and changed its name to Taichung Commercial Bank Co., Ltd. in December 1998. Taichung Commercial Bank Co., Ltd. was founded in 1952 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

2820.TW.summary: China Bills Finance Corporation provides various financial services in Taiwan. The company engages in the certification and underwriting of short-term bills, bank debentures, and foreign currency bills; brokerage and trading of short-term bills, bank debentures, government bonds, and foreign bonds; guaranteeing short-term bills; and provision of financial consulting services to enterprises. It is also involved in the proprietary trading of corporate bonds; equity investments; and fixed income securities trading, as well as provision of inter-bank call loans. The company operates through a network of five branches located in Banqiao, Taoyuan, Taichung, Tainan, and Kaohsiung. China Bills Finance Corporation was incorporated in 1978 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2836.TW.summary: Bank of Kaohsiung Co., Ltd. provides commercial banking products and services primarily in Taiwan. The company offers Taiwan dollar and foreign exchange deposits. It also provides personal loans, such as consumer, mortgage, reverse mortgage, and student loans, as well as personal overdrafts; and business loans comprising unsecured and secured overdrafts, short-term unsecured and secured loans, bank discounts, discount notes loans, general export financing, procurement loans, general commercial loans, guarantees and acceptances, and SME and emergency financing services. In addition, the company offers foreign exchange services, including import and export business, remittances and deposits, outright forwards, swaps, and margin trade, as well as structured products; offshore banking services; foreign exchange deposits; investment management services, such as offshore bonds services, funds, and life and non-life insurance services; credit cards; electronic banking services; and trust services. It operates approximately 36 branch offices, including one offshore banking unit and two mini-branches. The company was formerly known as City Bank of Kaohsiung Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Bank of Kaohsiung Co., Ltd. in January 1994. Bank of Kaohsiung Co., Ltd. was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

2836A.TW.summary: Bank of Kaohsiung Co., Ltd. provides commercial banking products and services primarily in Taiwan. The company offers Taiwan dollar and foreign exchange deposits. It also provides personal loans, such as consumer, mortgage, reverse mortgage, and student loans, as well as personal overdrafts; and business loans comprising unsecured and secured overdrafts, short-term unsecured and secured loans, bank discounts, discount notes loans, general export financing, procurement loans, general commercial loans, guarantees and acceptances, and SME and emergency financing services. In addition, the company offers foreign exchange services, including import and export business, remittances and deposits, outright forwards, swaps, and margin trade, as well as structured products; offshore banking services; foreign exchange deposits; investment management services, such as offshore bonds services, funds, and life and non-life insurance services; credit cards; electronic banking services; and trust services. It operates approximately 36 branch offices, including one offshore banking unit and two mini-branches. The company was formerly known as City Bank of Kaohsiung Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Bank of Kaohsiung Co., Ltd. in January 1994. Bank of Kaohsiung Co., Ltd. was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

2849.TW.summary: EnTie Commercial Bank Co., Ltd. provides banking products and services primarily in Taiwan. The company offers accounts and deposits. It also provides loans and overdrafts. In addition, the company offers consumer finance and wealth management products; and engages in the corporate and financial market operations. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

2850.TW.summary: Shinkong Insurance Co., Ltd. engages in the insurance business in Taiwan. Its insurance products include motor, fire, marine, engineering, liability, and accident and health insurance. The company was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2855.TW.summary: President Securities Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the brokerage, proprietary trading, fixed income, reinvestment, wealth management, and shareholder services in the People's Republic of China. It is involved in various activities, including underwriting of securities; dealing or brokerage business of securities at the securities exchange markets and business premises; registration and transfer agency service for securities; margin loans and short sales business of securities; securities lending and borrowing business; futures introducing brokerage services; futures dealing; issuance of call warrants; new financial instrument transactions; and trust business. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2867.TW.summary: Mercuries Life Insurance Co., Ltd. provides life insurance products primarily in Taiwan. The company also offers term life, health, accident, annuities, group, travel safety, and investment insurance products, as well as pension, group, and bank channel goods insurance products. It operates through six branch offices located in Taipei, Taichung, Chiayi, Tainan, and Kaohsiung. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

2881.TW.summary: Fubon Financial Holding Co., Ltd. provides various financial services in Taiwan, rest of Asia, the United States, and internationally. It operates through Bank Business, Insurance Business, Life Insurance Business, Securities Business, and Others segments. The company primarily offers insurance products, including property, casualty, life, accident, health, fire, marine cargo, motor, liability, engineering and nuclear, surety and credit, and personal and commercial multiple peril insurance, as well as typhoon, flood, and earthquake insurance products. It also provides retail and consumer, corporate, and investment banking services; brokerage services; margin lending; securities financing and refinancing, trading, underwriting, and transfer services; and investment and financial management, futures, and foreign currency and CNY services, as well as operates insurance agency. In addition, the company offers venture capital, marketing management, creditor's rights management, IT software, asset management, stadium management, and sports services, as well as trust, financial bill, and credit card services; and invests in and manages real estate properties. Fubon Financial Holding Co., Ltd. was founded in 1961 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2881A.TW.summary: Fubon Financial Holding Co., Ltd. provides various financial services in Taiwan, rest of Asia, the United States, and internationally. It operates through Bank Business, Insurance Business, Life Insurance Business, Securities Business, and Others segments. The company primarily offers insurance products, including property, casualty, life, accident, health, fire, marine cargo, motor, liability, engineering and nuclear, surety and credit, and personal and commercial multiple peril insurance, as well as typhoon, flood, and earthquake insurance products. It also provides retail and consumer, corporate, and investment banking services; brokerage services; margin lending; securities financing and refinancing, trading, underwriting, and transfer services; and investment and financial management, futures, and foreign currency and CNY services, as well as operates insurance agency. In addition, the company offers venture capital, marketing management, creditor's rights management, IT software, asset management, stadium management, and sports services, as well as trust, financial bill, and credit card services; and invests in and manages real estate properties. Fubon Financial Holding Co., Ltd. was founded in 1961 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2882.TW.summary: Cathay Financial Holding Co., Ltd., through its subsidiaries, provides various financial services in Taiwan. The company operates through five segments: Banking, Life Insurance, Property Insurance, Securities, and Other. It provides foreign exchange and guarantee, foreign currency investment advisory, trust, offshore banking, and other financial services. The company also offers traditional, investment-linked, and annuity insurance products; fire insurance, marine insurance, land and air insurance, liability insurance, financial guarantee insurance, reinsurance, and other insurance products; and financial planning services and policy loan services. In addition, it provides securities brokerage, discretionary and underwriting, and security financial services, as well as other financial products. Further, the company also provides real estate investment and management, wealth management, venture capital, asset management, fund management, banking, futures, risk management software, and securities investment consulting services. Cathay Financial Holding Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2884.TW.summary: E.SUN Financial Holding Company, Ltd., through its subsidiaries, provides various financial products and services in Taiwan and internationally. The company operates through Corporate Banking Unit, Individual Banking Unit, Overseas Branches and Subsidiaries, and Others segments. It offers corporate and unsecured personal loans, and residential mortgages; foreign exchange, financial banking, and wealth management services; and credit cards and payment services. The company also deals in, underwrites, and brokers securities; and futures brokerage, venture capital investment, trust, insurance agency, security consultancy, real estate leasing and management, and remittance services. In addition, it is involved in the retail sale of computer software; and provision of software design, data processing, digital information supply, and business consultancy services. As of December 31, 2019, it operated a business department, an international banking department, a trust department, a credit card and payment division, an offshore banking unit, an insurance agent department, 8 overseas branches, and 138 domestic branches. E.SUN Financial Holding Company, Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

2887.TW.summary: Taishin Financial Holding Co., Ltd., through its subsidiaries, provides various financial products and services in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers wealth management services to individuals, households, and business owners; consumer loans, micro corporate loans, and credit cards to individuals, as well as payment processing services for merchants; digital banking services; wholesale banking services for multinationals, corporations, small and medium sized enterprises, government agencies, and financial institutions; and financial market and trust services. It also provides securities underwriting, brokerage, margin lending, and security transfer services, as well as deals in futures; and property and life insurance brokerage services. In addition, the company engages in the acquisition, evaluation, auction, and management of delinquent loans; audit and consultation of construction plans, contract witness, and assessment and trade of real estate, etc.; lease, wholesale, and retail sale of machinery, precision machinery, motor vehicles, aircrafts, and vessels and components; and financial leasing and investment start-up activities. Further, it accepts mandates from customers, provides analytical opinions or recommendations on securities investment, acts as an agent for investment consultancy of offshore funds, and issues publications or holds lectures about securities investment and other related business. Additionally, the company offers securities investment trust funds; issues beneficial interest certificates; and invests and trades in securities, securities-related products, and other items. Taishin Financial Holding Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2887E.TW.summary: Taishin Financial Holding Co., Ltd., through its subsidiaries, provides various financial products and services in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers wealth management services to individuals, households, and business owners; consumer loans, micro corporate loans, and credit cards to individuals, as well as payment processing services for merchants; digital banking services; wholesale banking services for multinationals, corporations, small and medium sized enterprises, government agencies, and financial institutions; and financial market and trust services. It also provides securities underwriting, brokerage, margin lending, and security transfer services, as well as deals in futures; and property and life insurance brokerage services. In addition, the company engages in the acquisition, evaluation, auction, and management of delinquent loans; audit and consultation of construction plans, contract witness, and assessment and trade of real estate, etc.; lease, wholesale, and retail sale of machinery, precision machinery, motor vehicles, aircrafts, and vessels and components; and financial leasing and investment start-up activities. Further, it accepts mandates from customers, provides analytical opinions or recommendations on securities investment, acts as an agent for investment consultancy of offshore funds, and issues publications or holds lectures about securities investment and other related business. Additionally, the company offers securities investment trust funds; issues beneficial interest certificates; and invests and trades in securities, securities-related products, and other items. Taishin Financial Holding Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2889.TW.summary: IBF Financial Holdings Co., Ltd., through its subsidiaries, provides various financial products and services for individual and corporate clients. The company is involved in the certification and underwriting of short-term bills, financial debentures, and securities; brokerage and proprietary trading of short-term bills, as well as futures and securities brokerage transactions; guarantee and endorsement of short-term bills; and proprietary trading of government bonds, financial debentures, corporate and foreign currency bonds, securities, and equity-related futures. It also provides corporate finance, equity, securities investment, and futures investment advisory services; financial derivatives; investment trust services; convertible bond asset services; margin lending and short sales financing; stock affairs and interbank call loans agent services; wealth management services; capital, management expertise and consultative services to investees; and general investment and financial leasing services. In addition, the company engages in the procurement of leased property, as well as leased property residual value disposal and maintenance activities; offers leasing transactions counseling, and non-financing guarantee services; and invests in equity related commodities. IBF Financial Holdings Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2890.TW.summary: SinoPac Financial Holdings Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, provides banking, securities, investment trust, leasing, and venture capital services worldwide. It operates through Banking, Securities, and Other Business segments. The company offers commercial banking services, such as corporate finance, personal finance, wealth management, money and finance products, electronic banking, etc. It also provides broking, proprietary trading, underwriting, international business, fixed income, financial products, etc.; installment sale and purchase, lease, real estate lease, and other financing services; and products and services in the areas of mutual funds, discretionary accounts, and private equity. In addition, the company assists in deal sourcing, business cooperation, establishing strategic partnerships, and creating value in its portfolio companies; and provides factoring, fund management, asset management, insurance brokerage, and corporation management services. It operates 125 branches, including 83 branches in the greater Taipei area, with service locations in major metropolitan areas in the central and south, Hualien, and Kinmen. The company was founded in 1948 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2891.TW.summary: CTBC Financial Holding Co., Ltd. engages in the banking, bills financing, credit card, trust, securities, futures, asset management, and other financial related business investment activities. The company offers loans, guarantees, foreign exchange, bonds, proprietary trading, safe deposit boxes, derivatives, factoring, online banking, and lottery services; installment, leasing, and account receivable services; and transaction financing, cash management, fiduciary and agent, international trade financing, syndication lending, structured finance, and financial advisory services. It also provides life, health, annuity, group, and investment insurance products; and property insurance products, including fire, marine, miscellaneous casualty, voluntary auto, and personal accident insurances. In addition, the company offers securities and futures related services, as well as publicly-traded securities and investment opportunities in emerging stocks and futures trading; and asset-backed security services. Further, it is involved in the venture capital business investing in information technology, communications, biotechnology, health care, cultural, creative, and alternative energy industries, as well as companies in traditional industries; debt and mortgage management business; and overseas, international, and payment business. Additionally, the company provides securities investment trust, consulting, foreign financial institutions, discretionary investment, and offshore fund master agent services, as well as security services to corporate entities. It operates approximately 152 branches in Taiwan; and 116 overseas branches in the United States, Japan, Canada, the Philippines, Indonesia, Vietnam, India, and Singapore. The company was formerly known as ChinaTrust Financial Holding Co., Ltd. and changed its name to CTBC Financial Holding Co., Ltd. in June 2013. CTBC Financial Holding Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2891C.TW.summary: CTBC Financial Holding Co., Ltd. engages in the banking, bills financing, credit card, trust, securities, futures, asset management, and other financial related business investment activities. The company offers loans, guarantees, foreign exchange, bonds, proprietary trading, safe deposit boxes, derivatives, factoring, online banking, and lottery services; installment, leasing, and account receivable services; and transaction financing, cash management, fiduciary and agent, international trade financing, syndication lending, structured finance, and financial advisory services. It also provides life, health, annuity, group, and investment insurance products; and property insurance products, including fire, marine, miscellaneous casualty, voluntary auto, and personal accident insurances. In addition, the company offers securities and futures related services, as well as publicly-traded securities and investment opportunities in emerging stocks and futures trading; and asset-backed security services. Further, it is involved in the venture capital business investing in information technology, communications, biotechnology, health care, cultural, creative, and alternative energy industries, as well as companies in traditional industries; debt and mortgage management business; and overseas, international, and payment business. Additionally, the company provides securities investment trust, consulting, foreign financial institutions, discretionary investment, and offshore fund master agent services, as well as security services to corporate entities. It operates approximately 152 branches in Taiwan; and 116 overseas branches in the United States, Japan, Canada, the Philippines, Indonesia, Vietnam, India, and Singapore. The company was formerly known as ChinaTrust Financial Holding Co., Ltd. and changed its name to CTBC Financial Holding Co., Ltd. in June 2013. CTBC Financial Holding Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2903.TW.summary: Far Eastern Department Stores, Ltd., togethwer with its subsidiaries, operates department stores, supermarkets, and hypermarkets in Taiwan and Mainland China. The company's products portfolio includes, candies, cookies, cans, entertainment appliances, hardware, furniture, decoration items, hand-made products, stationery, library appliances, CD/DVD, camera appliances, children toys, shoes/hats/raining garments, medicine/medical equipment, cigarettes/wines, rice/corns, salts, clocks/watches/glasses, fresh foods, frozen vegetables, frozen meats/fishes, dry foods, and various flavouring soures; and gold and jewelries, tape recorders, and radar CD players, as well as silk, nylon, and cotton clothes. It also imports, exports, deals, and sells beverages; vendor machines and measurement devices; and vehicles and vehicles parts, as well as repairs vehicles, and wire and wireless telecom appliances. In addition, the company engages in the product distribution and classification, and storage business; construction, leasing, and sale of commercial and residential buildings; parking lots management activities; art gallery, works, and antiques business; and advertisement activities, as well as electronic and children's entertainment playground/facility businesses. Further, it operates restaurants, food courts, and beverage stores; film developer shops; gas stations; and hair salons and beauty services, as well as offers computer and telecom instrument services. The company operates with 10 branch stores. Far Eastern Department Stores, Ltd. was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

2905.TW.summary: Mercuries & Associates Holding, Ltd., an investment holding company, engages in the life insurance, daily commodities and food retail, pharmaceuticals, and information services businesses. The company offers lifetime and whole life insurance; hospitalization and medical care, cancer, and whole life medical and healthcare insurance; personal accident, travel, and online accident insurance; immediate and deferred annuity insurance, and pension insurance with floating interest rates; variable annuity and variable life insurance; 1 year term group life and group health insurance; group accident insurance; and long-term care lifetime, and disability care lifetime health insurance, as well as insurance in foreign currencies. It also purchases and sells daily commodities and food, alcohols, beverages, tobacco, daily necessities, cooked food, fresh foods, medical supplies, infant products, cosmetics, and beauty products; and branded footwear, apparel, and accessories, as well as serves fast food, including noodles, rice, fried pork chops, Japanese bento sets, and pizzas. In addition, the company engages in the sale and decoration of furniture, cabinets, kitchen utensils, and mattresses. Further, it manufactures active pharmaceutical ingredients (API), such as valporic acid and allopurinol; API intermediates comprising diethyl dipropyl malonate and PENT-2 ethyl 2-allyl-2-cyano-3-methylhexanoate; and specialty chemicals that include diethyl ketone. Additionally, the company offers software and hardware planning, development, and establishment services for financial information systems and public utilities; and software and hardware maintenance services. The company was formerly known as Mercuries & Associates, Ltd. and changed its name to Mercuries & Associates Holding, Ltd. in January 2015. Mercuries & Associates Holding, Ltd. was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2906.TW.summary: Collins Co., Ltd. exports sundry goods and garments to department stores, warehouse clubs, supermarkets, discounted stores, home centers, drug stores and importers, etc. worldwide. The company's products include tool sets and boxes/auto accessories, garden tools/accessories, houseware/kitchenware, X'mas decorations and lightings, sporting equipment/travel goods, small appliances/lightings, digital products/computer accessories, garments, and indoor and outdoor furniture, as well as BBQ grills, firepits, and accessories. It is also involved in the apparel retail business; biotechnology and medical care businesses; and provision of surface and storage products. The company was founded in 1969 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

2910.TW.summary: Tonlin Department Store Co., Ltd. operates department stores in Taiwan. The company offers fashion, beauty, and lifestyle products. It also operates cafes and restaurants. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2911.TW.summary: Les Enphants Co., Ltd. operates as a retailer of children's wear and accessories. It offers babies and toddlers' apparel, footwear, personal care items, and other child-related accessories. The company also engages in leasing, property management, warehousing, and transportation businesses; and distributing children's toys. It sells products under the owned, licensed, and distributed brands through retail shops, including multiple chain stores, department store outlets, and franchises in Taiwan, China, and Thailand. As of December 31, 2019, it operates 574 physical channels, which include 247 in Taiwan and 327 in China.The company also sells its products through e-commerce and mobile commerce platforms. Les Enphants Co., Ltd. was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2912.TW.summary: President Chain Store Corporation invests in and manages convenience stores, restaurants, drugstores, department stores, supermarkets, and online shopping stores in Taiwan and internationally. It operates through Convenience Stores, Retail Business Group, Logistics Business Group, and Other segments. The company is involved in the investment activities; publishing of magazines and books; sale of cosmetics and daily items; art and cultural exhibition activities; enterprise information management and consultancy business; network technology development business; and sports and entertainment business. It also offers life and property insurance; collection agency; electronic ticketing; gas station; elevator installation, repair, and maintenance; room and low-temperature food logistics and warehousing; and information software services, as well as manufactures food products. In addition, the company engages in the trucking, and bread and pastry retail businesses; wholesale of merchandise; sale of health care products and pharmaceuticals; sale and rental of cleaning instruments; trading of food and commodities; logistics and warehousing business; and sale of ice cream, as well as operates coffee chain stores and hypermarkets. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 9,900 stores under the 7-ELEVEN name. President Chain Store Corporation was founded in 1978 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

2915.TW.summary: Ruentex Industries Limited engages in textile manufacturing, retailing, marketing, and trading activities. The company offers home decorative and filament fabrics, as well as finished products; cotton dobby, cotton jacquard, yarn dye, and piece dye products; and functional fabrics, including outlast cotton, bamboo, bamboo charcoal, and soybean fabrics. It also retails men's and women's wear, underwear, and bags under the NAUTICA, NAUTICA JEANS, Jeep, KOOKAI lingerie, MORGAN LINGERIE, HECHTER STUDIO, KENNETH COLE, KENNETH COLE REACTION, DANIEL CREMIEUX, and CHARLES RIVER brands. In addition, the company offers planning and design services for elderly homes, mass merchandisers, hypermarkets, parking lots, office buildings, science and technology plants, general housing, etc.; and construction drawing services. Ruentex Industries Limited is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

2916.TWO.summary: Munsin Garment Corporation manufactures and trades in various knitwear garments in Taiwan. The company offers golf apparel, lightweight sportswear, professional bicycles, equestrian sports products, casual wear, cue bags, handbags, protective accessories, special clothing, sneakers, shirts, trousers, and sporting products, as well as jogging, tennis, and football series products. It is also involved in the product distribution, import, and export businesses. Munsin Garment Corporation provides its products under the Munsingwear, Le coq sportif, Felix Buhler, McGREGOR, HAZZYS, ACUPUNCTURE, NARA CAMICIE, Eminento, As know as de base, POU DOU DOU, and Danskin brands. The company was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

2924.TWO.summary: Cayman Tung Ling Co., Limited researches, develops, manufactures, and sells various baby apparel and supplies in Taiwan and internationally. It operates through General Merchandise Retailing and Restaurant Entertainment segments. The company offers children's clothing, and baby and children's products, including maternity products, breastfeeding supplies, weaning products, cleaning and care products, cotton-fiber products, inner wear, etc. under the Piyopiyo, Abby Bear, and Kaeru brand names. It also provides catering services; franchises Piyo CASA family restaurant; and leases plant. Cayman Tung Ling Co., Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

2926.TWO.summary: The Eslite Spectrum Corporation operates department stores and shopping malls in Taiwan. It also provides real estate analysis, investment planning, and operation management services. The company engages in the engineering service, catering supplies, retail store and equipment businesses; operation of retail outlets; and supply of professional kitchen/laundry equipment, hotel supplies, exquisite cuisine, wine cellars, and catering stores. Further, it operates a hotel under the Songyan ÂEslite Travel' name. The company operates 43 stores. It provides its planning, design, sales, installation, and after sales services to international tourist hotels and fast food chain stores, coffee chain stores, Chinese and Western restaurants, clubs, sky kitchens, hospitals, and staff restaurants. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan. The Eslite Spectrum Corporation is a subsidiary of The Eslite Co., Ltd.

2929.TW.summary: TOPBI International Holdings Limited designs and sells children's clothing from 1 to 16 years old. The company offers shorts, trousers, shirts, t-shirts, cotton-padded jacket, wind-coat, etc. It has sales points in 16 provinces and 3 municipalities in China. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

2937.TWO.summary: Gseven Co., Ltd. sells consumer electronic products in Taiwan. The company offers audio, TV projection, health and beauty, digital, and life style products, as well as horn and air conditioning systems, Home theaters, and household and kitchen appliances. It also sells its products through department store counters and outlets. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

2938.TWO.summary: Bedding World Co., Ltd. engages in the wholesale and retail of furniture, bedding, kitchen utensils, and decorative products in Taiwan. It primarily offers mattresses and beddings. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2942.TWO.summary: Jing-Jan Retail Business Co., Ltd. owns and operates a shopping mall. The company is based in Taipei, Taiwan. Jing-Jan Retail Business Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Radium Life Technology Co., Ltd.

2948.TWO.summary: Bausen Inc. provides home improvement materials in Taiwan and internationally. It offers hardwood flooring, engineered flooring, laminate flooring, and WPC composite flooring products; and floor coverings, moldings, cabinet systems, marble and stone countertops, and home improvement materials and accessories. The company is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

3002.TW.summary: AHOKU Electronic Company provides smart home solutions. The company offers travel adapters and converters, USB chargers, power sockets, cabinet power strips, outlets surge protectors, wireless IP cameras, wireless chargers, Wi-Fi travel routers, car inverters, AC plugs, battery backups, alarm sensors, passive infrared sensors, smart sockets, moisture sensors, and night vision cameras, as well as wireless security cameras, door and window sensors, and Bluetooth smart sockets. AHOKU Electronic Company was founded in 1983 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

3003.TW.summary: K.S. Terminals Inc. manufactures and sells electrical terminals, wire accessories, lighting systems, electric vehicle charging connectors, automotive connectors, nylon cable ties, and green energy connectors in Taiwan and internationally. Its electrical terminal products include insulated and non-insulated copper terminals, insulated quick disconnectors, din terminals, cord end terminals, water proof heat shrinkable terminals with adhesive tubing, butt splice and other connectors, stainless steel ties, JIS terminals, battery modular connectors, and tools, as well as copper tubular lugs. The company also offers continual type terminals, and white goods terminals and housings. The company was formerly known as Ken Shing Industrial shop and changed its name to K.S. Terminals Inc. in 1978. K.S. Terminals Inc. was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Changhua City, Taiwan.

3004.TW.summary: National Aerospace Fasteners Corporation manufactures and sells fastener products for the aerospace, electronics, and high-end industrial sectors in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers aero products, including bolts; nuts, such as hex nuts, 10 PT nuts, double hex nuts, spline nuts kits, shank nuts, gang channels, and anchor nuts; and CNC products comprising tubes, stampings, links, latches, and fittings, as well as other products consisting of adapters, brackets, bushings, clamps, flanges, guides, housings, inertial dampers, pins, fixing plates, retainers, seals, sleeves, spacers, weights, etc. that are used in aircraft engines and airframes. It also provides industrial products, such as blind rivet nuts, rivet studs, brass inserts, machining and customized parts, and high temperature resistant self-locking nuts used in automobiles, ships, public transportation vehicles, and various other industrial products. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

3005.TW.summary: Getac Technology Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of various information products in China, the United States, Europe, and internationally. The company provides notebooks, printer and its components, DVDs, mobile phones, digital cameras, PCBs, personal computers, communication equipment, automobile electronic devices, precision dies, casting/forging raw parts for automobiles and motorcycles, and magnesium alloy castings, as well as engages in the wholesale and retail of data management, software, electronic equipment, and mold related and e-communication products. It also offers various mechanical solutions, such as engineering design, prototyping and pilot run, tooling, and mass production and assembly services of plastic and metal stamping parts and modules; aluminum alloy and magnesium alloy automotive die-cast parts; and fasteners for aerospace and high-end industrial applications. In addition, the company provides repair and maintenance, and technical services for computers and related products; and sells smart mobile monitoring solutions. Further, it operates as an agency of domestic/foreign freight transport and import/export declaration, and import/export trade. Its products are used in military and industrial computer system applications. The company was formerly known as MiTAC Technology Corporation and changed its name to Getac Technology Corporation in 2009. Getac Technology Corporation was incorporated in 1989 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan. Getac Technology Corporation operates as a subsidiary of MiTAC-SYNNEX Group.

3006.TW.summary: Elite Semiconductor Memory Technology Inc. designs, manufactures, and sells IC products in Taiwan. It provides memory IC products, including DRAM, flash, MCP, industrial grade, automotive grade, known good die, eMMC, and eMCP IC products; audio and power management mixed signal IC products; and wireless ASIC IC products. The company offers its products for use in various application, including industrial, automotive, consumer, PC peripherals, networking, wireless communications, audio, power, and IoT. Elite Semiconductor Memory Technology Inc. was founded in 1998 and is based in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

3008.TW.summary: LARGAN Precision Co.,Ltd, together with its subsidiary, designs, manufactures, and sells photographic and optical equipment. The company offers optical lenses, which are used in perspective mirror, single and double binoculars, fax machines, microscope, scanners, multifunction printers, mobile phone lenses, drone camera lenses, mobile 3D structured light lenses, tablets, motion-controlled gaming systems, laptop computer lenses, smart TV lenses, IP camera lenses, and automobile lenses. It also engages in the die manufacturing; wholesale of precision instruments; and medical materials and equipment manufacturing. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

3013.TW.summary: Chenming Electronic Technology Corporation, an OEM/ODM manufacturer, engages in the production and sale of computer and server chassis, mobile device components, and related components. The company also produces desktop, server, and notebook subsystems; and metal injection molding products. Its products are used for the assembly and protection of desktop PCs, handheld devices, and servers. The company was formerly known as Chenming Mold Ind. Corp. and changed its name to Chenming Electronic Technology Corporation in January 2020. Chenming Electronic Technology Corporation was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

3016.TW.summary: Episil-Precision Inc. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of epitaxial Si/SiC/GaN wafers in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers epitaxial wafers, such as silicon epitaxial, SiC on SiC epitaxial, and GaN on Si epitaxial wafers for use in power discretes, power ICs, image sensors, graded Epis, buried layer Epis, and multi-layer Epis. It also provides buried layer epitaxial services. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan. Episil-Precision Inc. is a subsidiary of Episil Holding Inc.

3021.TW.summary: Welltend Technology Corporation produces and sells electronic components and wire connectors in Taiwan and internationally. Its products are used in automotive electronics, automation equipment, computers and servers, consumer electronics, and smart appliances. The company also offers information system integration and consulting services. In addition, it provides life science and technology products, and life style shaping products. The company was founded in 1973 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

3022.TW.summary: IEI Integration Corp. provides industrial computer products worldwide. It provides AIoT and edge computing products, DevCloud solutions, PUZZLE Dev. Kits, FLEX AIoT developer kits, TANK AIoT developer kits, AIoT edge insights solutions, embedded systems, AI training server systems, VPU, FPGA, and CPU accelerators, backplanes, and assistant robots; networking products comprising network appliances, including routers, VPN, switches, firewalls, UTMs, etc.; and storage servers, network modules, and industrial network switches. The company also offers embedded computers consisting of full size and half size single board computers; industrial motherboards and embedded boards; ETX/COM EXPRESS/Q7; PEMUX series backplanes; rackmount, embedded, and compact chassis; LCD converter boards; PCI/PCIe expansion cards; and wireless, mini-PCIe, and TPM modules.
