In addition, it provides embedded systems, including AI-powered box PCs, DIN-rail embedded systems, rugged box PCs, compact size embedded systems, medical box PCs, transportation embedded systems, digital signage embedded systems, and QTS gateways, as well as rackmount, embedded, and compact chassis; panel PC and monitor products, such as heavy and light industrial, RISC-based, healthcare, and transportation PCs; industrial monitors; and handheld devices. Further, the company offers power supply products, adapters, DC UPS modules, DC to DC modules, and peripherals, such as industrial compact flash cards, CPU coolers, cables and connectors, mounting kits and stands, drive bays, and e-window tool kits. Its products are used in computer-based applications, such as factory automation, computer telephony integration, networking appliances, security, and systems, as well as in various fields comprising the Internet of Things, national defense, police administration, transportation, communication base stations, and medical instruments. IEI Integration Corp. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3023.TW.summary: SINBON Electronics Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells computer peripherals, connectors, wires, and other parts in Mainland China, the United States, Taiwan, and internationally. The company operates through Cable, Electronic, and Management operation segments. It offers PCMIA signal cables, computers and peripherals I/O cables, USB link cables, flat cables, barcode scanner I/O interface modules, LCD flex boards, and LCD ultra-thin co-axial signal cables; various types of connectors used in network communications, computer peripherals, and consumer electronic products; and sweep receivers, USB pen drives, and consumer electronic products. The company also provides power rectifiers; mobile phone link cables, mobile phone connectors, and wireless antennas; RFID; fiber optic connectors, as well as LED, LCM, and high-frequency co-axial cables; and parts of automotive, medical health, and industrial products. It serves medical health, automotive and aviation, green energy, and communication industries, as well as industrial applications. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3026.TW.summary: Holy Stone Enterprise Co.,Ltd. engages in the production and sale of multilayer ceramic capacitors (MLCCs) under the IHHEC brand name in Taiwan. The company offers MLCC solutions for PoE circuits, switching power supplies, battery management systems, automotive touchscreen LCD modules, LED lightings, termination MLCCs, trackpads, SAR P-sensors, RF filters, e-compasses, ambient lights/proximity sensors, and crystals and oscillators. It also distributes IC component and memory products, active components, peripheral components, electronics components, and power components. Holy Stone Enterprise Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3027.TW.summary: Billion Electric Co., Ltd. designs, produces, and distributes power transformers, power supplies, and other power-related products in Australia, South Africa, Southeast Asia, Middle East, the United States, the United Kingdom, Turkey, Europe, Central and South America, and internationally. It offers machine to machine and Internet of Things products for the telecommunication industry; xDSL, xDSL wireless AP, xDSL wireless AP VoIP, and active Ethernet fiber series products; indoor and outdoor LED drivers, AC/DC power adaptors, and POE injectors; network/telecom products comprising in-home broadband, enterprise networking, and outdoor 4G/LTE routers; and green energy and storage products. The company also provides OBD and an on-line GPS tracking system; dual LTE modules; and fleet management tracking solutions. In addition, it offers network communication solutions for electronic transactions in retail stores, chain stores, POS systems, ATMs, multi-purpose kiosks and vending machines. The company provides its products under the BILLION brand. Billion Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3028.TW.summary: Zenitron Corporation distributes semiconductor components in Taiwan and Greater China. The company offers supplier line cards; and IT, handheld, telecom and networking, IoT, industrial electronics, consumer, automotive, and power supply products, as well as digital products. It also provides application design solutions, such as power management, home appliance, IoT, peripheral/human machine interface, telecommunications and networking, and video display. In addition, the company offers turnkey solutions and design consultations services. Zenitron Corporation was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

3032.TW.summary: Compucase Enterprise Co., Ltd. designs and manufactures LED drivers, PC cases, power supplies, rackmount chassis, cabinets, LED luminaire, and LED panels worldwide. The company offers its products under the HEC brand to OEM customers, system integrators, industrial users, and retail customers. Compucase Enterprise Co., Ltd. was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.

3033.TW.summary: Weikeng Industrial Co., Ltd. distributes electronic components and peripherals for computing, communications, consumer, automotive, and industrial applications in Taiwan. The company offers storage, micro controller, embedded processor, power discrete IC, sensing and display, discrete and passive components, programmable logic and display systems, ESD protection, connectors, digital audio/video, and USB products. It also offers technical support services; and data center, IoT application, data and communications, automotive, networking, industrial electronics, and consumer solutions. Weikeng Industrial Co., Ltd. was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3034.TW.summary: Novatek Microelectronics Corp., together with its subsidiaries, research, develop, manufacture, and sell integrated circuit chips for speech, communication, computer peripheral, LCD driver IC system, embedded MCU, DSP, and system applications. The company offers display driver ICs for LCD displays, televisions (TVs), notebook computers, desktop monitors, cameras, tablet PCs, automotive display screens, smart phones, and mobile phones; and system on chips products for digital and smart TVs, notebook computers, desktop monitors, set-top boxes, mobile phones, tablet PCs, camera modules, dashcam recording, IP cams, car backup camera modules, automotive safety assistance systems, and multimedia and mobile phone camera module applications. It is also involved in the trading and consulting of electronic spare parts; and provision of design, development, amendment, testing, and related consulting services for multimedia VLSI software. The company has operations in Taiwan, Asia, and internationally. Novatek Microelectronics Corp. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

3035.TW.summary: Faraday Technology Corporation operates as a fabless ASIC/SoC and silicon intellectual property (IP) provider worldwide. The company offers SoC design services and evaluation platforms; and ASIC services. It also provides IP products, including library and memory compilers, processor cores, analog IPs, peripheral IPs, and interface IPs. The company offers design solutions for a range of applications comprising consumer electronics, multimedia, display, communication, networking, and PC peripheral/storage. Faraday Technology Corporation was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3036.TW.summary: WT Microelectronics Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, develops and sells electronic and communication components. Its products are used in various fields, including communication, computing, consumer electronics, industry and instrument, IOT, and automotive. The company is also involved in the investment, trading, and software services businesses. WT Microelectronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3037.TW.summary: Unimicron Technology Corp. engages in the development, manufacturing, processing, and sale of printed circuit boards, electrical equipment, electronic products, and testing and burn-in systems for integrated circuit products worldwide. It also provides IC testing and pre-burning, conducting IC testing and burn-in processes, screening out defective ICs, and backend services for packaging and testing processes; and HDIs, FPCs, RFs, and IC carriers, as well as connectors, and TP and ECRM. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

3042.TW.summary: TXC Corporation engages in the research, design, development, production, and sale of crystal and oscillators products in Taiwan and internationally. The company's products include crystals, oscillators, and sensors, as well as automotive crystals. Its products are used in various applications, including mobile communication, wearable devices, Internet of Things, server, storage, automotive, telecommunication, and medical devices. TXC Corporation was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3043.TW.summary: Powercom Co., Ltd provides power management products in Taiwan and internationally. It offers online and offline uninterruptible power supply (UPS), three phase UPS, line-interactive UPS, functional UPS, accessories, auto voltage regulator, inverter, and other products. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3044.TW.summary: Tripod Technology Corporation processes, manufactures and sells printed circuit boards (PCBs) boards and other related components in Taiwan, China, Vietnam, Thailand, South Korea, Malaysia, and internationally. The company offers various PCBs for memory modules, TFT-LCDs, hard disk drives, notebook computers, and server/work stations, as well as handsets and automotive products; and other services. It also engages in the manufacture and wholesale of chemical materials and electronic parts; trading of PCBs and raw materials of electronic parts; manufacture of electronic cash registers; and wholesale, import, and export of electronic products. In addition, the company is also involved in the development, sale, and rental of commercial housing and own-built commercial housing; and investment activities. Further, it provides management services. Tripod Technology Corporation was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

3046.TW.summary: Aopen Inc. provides digital signage technologies in Taiwan. It offers embedded PCs, digital signage commercial PCs, medical PCs, digital signage media players, video wall controllers, chrome boxes, AOPEN intelligent control unit (AiCU), and panel computers; antimicrobial PCs; conference cameras; and mobile, palm-sized, capsule, and smart projectors. The company also provides gaming, consumer, and commercial monitors; gaming gadgets, such as gaming keyboard, mouse, RGB light stick, and display stand; and accessories, including wall mount, floor and table stand, card reader and scanner, screen protector, and WiFi/USB display solution. It serves retail, enterprises, industrial environments, healthcare, government, hospitality and leisure, QSR, finance/ banking, transportation, education, gaming, and entertainment industries. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3047.TW.summary: EDIMAX Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the design, development, manufacture, and marketing of networking solutions to SOHO and SME markets, and businesses in Europe, the United States, Asia, and internationally. It operates through Enterprise, Retail Products and Services; Telecommunication Products and Services; and Others segments. The company's products include whole home Wi-Fi systems, air quality monitoring systems, wireless routers, Wi-Fi range extenders, access points, Wi-Fi bridges, wireless adapters, powerline, home automation systems, network cameras, switches, ADSL modem routers, network adapters, print servers, KVM switches, Wi-Fi antennas, and legacy products. Its products also comprise EDIMAX pro, AP controllers, and SFP/Mini GBICs, as well as accessories; and indoor and semi-outdoor detection solutions, monitors, cable and cableless transmission equipment, xDSL routers, Ethernet switches, PoE solutions, powerline solutions, network access controllers, load balancer solutions, professional surveillance cameras, VoIP solutions, home entertainment integration solutions, and other customer-oriented networking applications. The company offers its products primarily through retail and online channels, resellers, and distributors. EDIMAX Technology Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1986 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

3048.TW.summary: EDOM Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the distribution of electronic parts, computer hardware, software, and equipment in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers analog ICs, batteries, connectors, digital logic ICs, discrete products, embedded modules, memory products, micro components, non-optical sensors, optoelectronics, passive components, test and measurement products, and other products. It has strategic partnership with PollenTech to enable the delivery of integrated HW & SW system solutions. The company serves Internet of things, mobile, consumer electronics, industrial, and automotive sectors. EDOM Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3049.TW.summary: HannsTouch Solution Incorporated engages in the production and sale of touch panels in Taiwan. It offers touching solutions for AMOLED and LCD monitors, wearable devices, cellphones, tablets, laptops, one-piece forming PC and industrial monitors, etc.; and TFT backplane solutions for RFID, e-book, e-board, etc. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Tainan City, Taiwan.

3051.TW.summary: Optimax Technology Corporation manufactures and sells polarizers for liquid crystal display (LCD) manufacturers. It offers polarizers for LCD TV, laptops, mobiles, PCs, automotive LCD displays, and sunglasses. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

3054.TW.summary: LIWANLI Innovation Co., Ltd. operates in the biomedical science industry. The company provides products in the areas of nutrition and healthcare. It offers Vigoway and powder collection products for male, female, elderly, and children audience. The company was formerly known as Carry Technology International Co., Ltd. and changed its name to LIWANLI Innovation Co., Ltd. in 2015. LIWANLI Innovation Co., Ltd. was founded in 1991 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3055.TW.summary: Spirox Corporation provides integrated solutions to the semiconductor, electronics manufacturing, telecom, and automobile markets worldwide. The company offers wafer level test handlers, analog/mixed signal and logic options, thermal chuck systems, memory testers, thermal and inverted emission microscopes, semiconductor test systems, mass production test handlers, automatic probers, power device test systems, fluxless reflow systems, wafer inspection systems, probe cards, docking interfaces, LCD driver IC test systems, and memory test systems. It has partnerships with AFORE Oy; ERS electronic GmbH; EXICON Co., Ltd.; Hamamatsu Corporation; HANWA Electronic Ind. Co., Ltd.; INTEKPLUS CO., Ltd.; Osai A.S.; SEMICS Inc.; ShibaSoku Corporation; STI Co. Ltd.; Toray Engineering Co., Ltd.; Translarity Inc.; Turbodynamics GmbH; Wintest Corp.; and YIK Corporation. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3056.TW.long_name: ZongTai Real Estate Development Co., Ltd.
3056.TW.summary: ZongTai Real Estate Development Co., Ltd. engages in the real estate development business in Taiwan. It is involved in the development of building, leisure, energy, government, and other projects. The company is based in Taichung City, Taiwan.

3057.TW.summary: Promise Technology, Inc. develops storage solutions for the data center, surveillance, cloud, and rich media markets worldwide. The company offers VTrak storage appliances for multi-user collaboration to ingest, edit, stream, and process rich media; Vess storage appliances for IP video surveillance installations; and Apollo Cloud, a cloud to store and share photos and videos through phones, tablets, or laptops. It also provides Pegasus, a Thunderbolt 3 RAID storage solution for creative enthusiasts and professionals; and SANLink, a Thunderbolt bridge adapter, which eliminates bottlenecks through the introduction of fiber channel or 10 Gb Ethernet connectivity. In addition, the company offers solutions, including consumer/IoT, rich media, surveillance, and IT and ODM solutions, as well as professional services comprising warranties, onsite hardware replacement, technical training, and installation services. Promise Technology, Inc. was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3059.TW.summary: Altek Corporation engages in the development, manufacture, and sale of digital image technology application products. The company provides AI cameras and edge boxes, and PI cameras for home, banking and finance, hotel, retail, and industrial applications; imaging chips for image quality enhancement, face detection, etc.; and 3D sensing modules and solutions for robots, augmented reality/virtual reality devices, surveillance devices, and face payment systems. It offers automobile camera systems, including image assistance system/ mega pixel HD camera, IR camera, AVM, and ADAS for driver monitoring system; and medical imaging solutions, such as glucose meter, intelligent insulin delivery system, and disposable endoscope camera system. In addition, the company offers optical components; manufactures and sells digital still cameras and its accessories; research, development, manufacture, and sale of medical electronic equipment; wholesale, import, and export of digital cameras, digital video cameras, and related accessories; and research, design, and sales of imaging technologies, and electronic software and hardware. It operates in Asia, Europe, the United States, and Taiwan. The company was formerly known as Asia Imagination Corporation and changed its name to Altek Corporation in February 1997. Altek Corporation was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

3060.TW.summary: Min Aik Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells ultra-clean and precision components for the hard disk drive industry in Taiwan and internationally. The company provides clean room assembly, tooling design fabrication, sheet metal precision stamping tumbling plating, plastic injection molding, and in-house automation design and fabrication solutions, as well as chemical lab facilities and QA system. It also offers OEM/ODM; contract design; measurement and analysis; and strategic integration services to companies in the computer, networking, communications, consumer, and medical industries. The company was incorporated in 1979 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

3062.TW.summary: CyberTAN Technology, Inc. manufactures and sells broadband and wireless networking equipment for the small-office and home-office markets in Taiwan, China, and the United States. The company offers fixed broadband products, including broadband/DSL routers, cable gateways, and Wi-Fi AP bridges; mobile broadband products, such as 4G/LTE routers and satellite routers; voice over IP products comprising wired/wireless VoIP gateways, ADSL 2/2+ IAD, and VDSL2 IAD products; and wireless/SiP products consisting of wireless embedded modules, SiP modules, and IoT modules. It also provides digital home products, including DTA/IP/cable/satellite set-top-boxes and IoT gateways; and professional OEM/ODM services for the home networking and communications markets. CyberTAN Technology, Inc. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

3064.TWO.summary: Astro Corporation develops, produces, and operates digital games, systems, and software and hardware for gaming and lottery products in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers various self-service betting halls, monitor centers, and lottery games; casino and multi player games; cabinets; and lottery, VLT, and casino management systems. It also provides digital entertainment and casual software machine rental and point of sales customization, as well as product outsourcing services. The company is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3066.TWO.summary: Taiwan Oasis Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, and produces light emitting diode (LED) and related components worldwide. The company offers digit LED, surface mount device (SMD) LED, dot matrix, and light bar display products; chip and PLCC type SMD LED products; LED lamps; and indoor lighting products, including light tubes. It also provides commercial lighting products, including spot lights, downlights, track lights, cabinet lights, and street lights; high power LED products; printed circuit board (PCB) products; and plastic molds and injections, and PCB and LED packaging products. The company sells is product under the Oasistek brand name. Taiwan Oasis Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3067.TWO.summary: Phonic Corporation manufactures and sells professional audio products in the United States, Hong Kong, Guatemala, Turkey, Chile, and internationally. It offers speakers, including intelligent audio systems, mobile PA systems, studio monitors, line arrays, and PA speakers; analog, digital, and contractor amplifiers; analog, digital, and powered mixers; wireless/conference systems, microphones, and antenna AMP systems; test instruments; signal processors; and automatic audio and video equipment. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3071.TWO.summary: Adda Corporation designs, manufactures, and sells electronic thermal management products primarily for the information technology industry worldwide. The company offers CPU cooler modules, blower fans, DC axial-flow/blower fans, AC axial-flow fans, and waterproof fans; thermal modules; and accessories, such as metal finger guards and plastic filters. Adda Corporation was incorporated in 1978 and is based in Pingtung, Taiwan.

3073.TWO.summary: Teamphon Energy Co., Ltd. operates as a professional consumer electronic IC application design company in Taiwan. It offers Wi-Fi cam solutions, baby monitors, and products for consumer applications, as well as supplies electronic components. The company also provides various products for game applications consisting of fit life, TV game, and gogo TV; and multimedia applications comprising car black box, mobile media player, MP3 player, TV box, PMP/learning aids, and boombox. It also markets its products in the United States, Japan, Europe, Mainland China, etc. Teamphon Energy Co., Ltd. was founded in 1991 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

3078.TWO.summary: Channel Well Technology Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells power supply products worldwide. It offers PC and IPC power supply, industrial power supply, wireless charging transmitter and receiver, LED lighting driver/power, enclosed switching power, and open frame power products, as well as telecom power systems, wireless chargers/power banks, adapters, USB chargers, power cables/electronic wires, magnetic components, heat sinks, and electric vehicle chargers. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

3081.TWO.summary: LandMark Optoelectronics Corporation produces and supplies gallium arsenide (GaAS) and indium phosphide (InP) based epitaxial wafers for optical communication, industrial application, and special-purpose usages in Taiwan, the United States, Mainland China, and internationally. It offers InP laser diode (LD) epi wafers for use in LDs used for optics communications; photo-detector epi wafers for use in photo detectors, avalanched detectors, and laser efficiency monitoring for optics communications; and GaAs LD epi wafers for use in high-efficiency laser manufacturing, bar code scanners, GPS systems, 3D sensors, detectors for Lidar autonomous cars, aesthetic medicine machines, and information center communication equipment, as well as provides optical semi-conductors, LDs, and InAlGaP/AlGalnAs. In addition, the company provides Zn-diffusion services for photo detectors; and grating forming and regrowth services for distributed feedback, as well as selected area growth services. LandMark Optoelectronics Corporation was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.

3083.TWO.summary: Chinese Gamer International Corporation operates as an online game research and development company in Taiwan. It provides mobile and online game services. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

3085.TWO.summary: Newretail Co., Ltd operates as an Internet company in Taiwan. The company offers foreign trade e-commerce services; virtual hosting, and other basic services; and search engine and digital marketing services, as well as electronic information supply services to foreign trade manufacturers. It engages in the production and installation of computer web pages, web search optimization login, keyword marketing, and computer advertising design and agency services; and clothes business. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3086.TWO.long_name: Wayi International Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd.
3086.TWO.summary: Wayi International Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, designs and sells computer software and hardware. It also engages in trading activities; and provision of game software and information software programming services. The company was formerly known as Wayi International Co. Ltd. and changed its name to Wayi International Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd. in June 2000. Wayi International Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd. founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3088.TWO.summary: Axiomtek Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells PC-based industrial computer products and peripherals worldwide. The company offers industrial PCs, single board computers, system on modules, fanless and rugged embedded systems, intelligent transportation systems, industrial Internet of Things gateway, industrial EtherCAT master solution, touch panel computers, medical panel computers, digital signage solutions, and network appliances products. It also provides road application platform, digital electronic signage, transportation application platform, industrial Internet of Things gateway, touch tablets, etc. The company's products are used in industrial automation, outdoor information booths, renewable energy, traffic control, shipbuilding, medical care, and other application markets. In addition, it develops software packages for AMS smart remote monitoring programs and data collection used in smart factories, smart energy, green energy, and other industries; and cloud application server and network security application platform products for future big data cloud applications. Axiomtek Co., Ltd. was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3090.TW.summary: Nichidenbo Corporation supplies passive electronic components worldwide. The company offers aluminum electrolytic and solid, multilayer ceramic, electric double layer, and film capacitors; and metal oxide varistors. It also provides resistors, inductors, and switches; and power and RF inductors, power transformers, signal magnetic products, EMC coils, sensors, actuators, power and automatic modules, magnetic material products, ceramic products, and connection products, as well as components for medical equipment. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3092.TWO.summary: Hotron Precision Electronic Industrial Co.,Ltd. manufactures and supplies various wires and cables for signal transmission, telecommunication, IT, power, auto, medical appliances, and other industries in Taiwan. It offers electronic, electric, and other wires and cables. The company also provides copper rods, wires, and fine wires; tooling for metal press/plastic injection; metal pressed work products; insulation composite Mylar Al. foils; and various wire cables and PC board connectors. In addition, it offers terminals, wire assemblies, and molds; PVC plastic formulations and pellets; and plastic extrusion and injection products. Hotron Precision Electronic Industrial Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

3094.TW.summary: Davicom Semiconductor, Inc. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of communication network integrated circuits in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers ethernet, ethernet switch controller, industrial embedded transceiver, ethernet converter, dongle, and video decoder with safety monitoring. It also provides local area network chipsets for use in computer communications application on the network cards, hubs, and switches, as well as for use in local network resources to transfer and share; wide area network chipsets that are used as a remote access for data and video transmission; and video decoder chipsets, which are used for camera image signal decoding in closed-circuit television security monitoring systems, or DVR/NVR systems. In addition, the company offers electronic paper display products for low-power applications and equipment, such as financial smart cards, electronic shelf labels, wearing equipment, etc.; and microcontroller units for use in motor control, analogy digital signal, RFID, financial smart cards, electronic shelf labels, wearable equipment, etc. Further, it also provides wireless communication machinery and equipment. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

3114.TWO.summary: Howteh Technology Co., Ltd. provides active and passive components, and equipment in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers connector, FFC, thunderbolt cable, MEMS, coaxial cable, conversion line, USB type C, audio amplifier, and LED controller products, as well as power management, radio frequency, and touch components. It also provides printed circuit boards and optoelectronic equipment. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3117.TWO.summary: Tecstar Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of inductors in Taiwan. It offers multilayer chip beads and inductors, including multilayer ferrite chip beads, multilayer chip inductors, and multilayer common mode filters; SMD power inductors and EMI beads, such as SMD power inductors, SMD common mode chokes, and wound chip beads and inductors; and Ni-Zn soft ferrite cores that include EMI suppression ferrite cores and SMD power inductor cores. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

3122.TWO.summary: Megawin Technology Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, designs and sells ICs primarily in Taiwan. The company offers 8051 MCU and Cortex-M0 products; and USB products, including full speed MCUs, USB keyboards/mouses/joysticks, USB bridges, and charge ICs. It also provides firmware tool kits, such as ICE, writer, and ISP programmer. The company was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Jhubei City, Taiwan.

3138.TW.summary: Auden Techno Corp. researches, develops, designs, manufactures, and sells various antennas in Taiwan and internationally. It is also involved in equipment marketing, and test and certification businesses. The company offers CB electronic antennas, mobile phone GSM antennas, and wireless local-area network antennas; ultra-wideband and RFID application antennas; and miniature multi-frequency antenna modules, as well as 4G LTE/MIMO technology and biological electromagnetic wave products. Its products are used in mobile communications, automotive electronics, Internet communications, and digital and industrial applications. In addition, the company provides development, testing, mass production, and after-sales services; and antenna simulation, and design and measurement services. Auden Techno Corp. was founded in 1981 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

3141.TWO.summary: UltraChip Inc. operates as a fabless IC company in the mobile multimedia IC industry. It researches and develops, manufactures, and sells LCD display driver ICs. The company offers professional display products for consumers, automotive, and industrial sectors. It also provides bistable display products comprising pure driver and Tcon, segment type driver, and single chip products; and motor products, such as BLDC control, motor driver, and high and low side driver ICs. The company offers its products for factory automation control, medical equipment, automotive devices, mobile devices, etc. It operates in Taiwan, China, the United States, Japan, and internationally. UltraChip Inc. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3144.TWO.summary: ThinFlex Corporation manufactures and sells flexible copper clad laminates (FCCL) and related materials in Asia, Europe, and the Americas. The company offers thin, high heat resistant, high transmittance/transparency, and asymmetric FCCL; black/white/phosphate free coverlays; composite coverlays; high-shield nano materials; composite stiffener films; RCC materials; and polyimide related laminates. It serves IC packaging industry. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan. ThinFlex Corporation is a subsidiary of Arisawa Mfg. Co., Ltd.

3147.TWO.summary: Jetwell Computer Co., Ltd. provides IT infrastructure and integration services in Taiwan. The company offers computer system products, including servers, workstations, notebooks, pads, and printer systems; and storage and big data integration services, as well as designs, builds, integrates, and sells thin client systems. It also provides network products, such as firewall and intrusion detection systems, building green IDC, switch hubs, routers, network interface cards, and wireless network products, as well as international system management and planning and digital surveillance systems. In addition, the company offers security software, file and database audit software, anti-virus, anti-hacker, SPAM, VM ware, and back-up software; building private cloud; and BYOD solutions, as well as integrates and sells encrypting file system and file management software. Further, it provides various professional services comprising maintenance contract, on-site maintenance, IT consultation, project management, and cloud rental and security services. Jetwell Computer Co., Ltd. was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

3149.TW.summary: G-TECH Optoelectronics Corporation engages in the optoelectronic glass processing business in Taiwan. The company offers 3D forming, low-E energy-saving, tempered paint, coated, and cover glass products, as well as easy clean and fog proof smart mirrors. It also provides surface processing services for architectural glass; and processing manufacturing services, such as tempering, shaping, laminating, and insulating. The company's products are used in consumer electronics and non-consumer electronics segments, such as architectures and automobiles. The company was formerly known as Positive Technology Glass Co., Ltd. and changed its name to G-TECH Optoelectronics Corporation in 2001. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Miaoli County, Taiwan.

3150.TWO.summary: Syncomm Technology Corp. operates as a fabless semiconductor company worldwide. It offers portable products, wireless SOC integrating audio and data processors, and wireless digital modules for use in smart TVs, computers, and mobile devices, as well as PC peripheral, console gaming, portable accessory, and home audio applications. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

3152.TWO.summary: Advanced Ceramic X Corporation designs, manufactures, and sells RF front-end devices and modules for wireless communication applications in Taiwan, China, the United States, Hong Kong, and internationally. It offers antenna switch modules; antennas; low pass, high pass, and band pass filters, as well as filter arrays; diplexers, triplexers, and saw-triplexers; baluns and baluns filters; couplers and couplers filters; power dividers; high frequency inductors; Bluetooth modules; and RF chip ceramic devices. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Hsinchu County, Taiwan.

3158.TWO.summary: SysJust Co., Ltd. operates as a financial technology company in Taiwan. It offers various platforms, including XQ Global Winner, XS strategy radar, and XQ mobile platform; WQ new VIP viewing room; MoneyDJ; Lok Fu Finance channel for data analysis and reading on smart phones, tablets, and computers; and database. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3163.TWO.summary: Browave Corporation operates as an original equipment manufacturing/original design manufacturing development, production, and sales company in the optical fiber communication industry in Taiwan and internationally. Its products include compact coarse wavelength division multiplexers and demultiplexers; splitter modules; add/drop filters; amplifier components consisting of isolators and gain flattening filters; fused biconic taper WBC/WDM coupler and planar lightwave circuit splitters; fan-out cabling systems, adapters, and patchcords/pigtails; MPO/MTP cables; and fiber arrays, collimators, and pigtails. The company also provides optical devices and optical module products, such as isolators, couplers, DWDM, IPD, EDFA, ROSA, BOSA, etc. Its products are used in long haul communications network, metropolitan area network, central office fiber-to-the-home, and cloud data center applications. In addition, the company provides contract manufacturing services. Browave Corporation was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3164.TW.summary: GenMont Biotech Incorporation engages in the research, development, production, and sale of functional probiotic products in Taiwan. It also provides probiotics with special functions; and original formula design and manufacturing, and equipment manufacturing services on health care food, as well as cooperates in the research, production, and clinical trial of various products. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.

3167.TW.summary: Taliang Technology Co., Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells semiconductor inspection, resin panel cutters, and CNC engraving and milling machines in Taiwan. It provides optoelectronics, including glass panel processing machinery for touch panel, cover glass, sensor glass, or one glass processing applications; automatic edge coating machines; and PCB routing and drilling machines. The company also offers semiconductor inspection solution comprising FVI for carrier tape inspection; IR reel, semi-auto IR, and IR wafer for sidewall chipping around the die inspection; PRIM HBM for HBM chip type in reel inspection; wafer map that replaces human eye inspection of map; and testing handler for QFN/DFN/SOT/SOP IC inspection and packaging. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

3169.TWO.summary: ASIX Electronics Corporation, an IC Design company, supplies fabless semiconductors with focus on networking, communication, and connectivity applications. The company provides industrial, SuperSpeed USB, and Non-PCI/SPI embedded Ethernet ICs, as well as interface ICs; and RS-232/RS-485 UART transceivers and USB KVM Switch/Wi-Fi/Ethernet SoCs. It offers its products for smart factory, industrial automation, industrial IoT, smart home and office, PC and peripheral, interface connectivity, and USB KVM switch applications. ASIX Electronics Corporation was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3171.TWO.summary: Xin Chio Global Co., Ltd. engages in the sale of packaging materials. It provides tapes, electronic packaging materials, buffer packaging materials, plastic bags, packaging machines, paper packaging products, and others. The company is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3176.TWO.summary: Medigen Biotechnology Corp. focuses on the development of therapies for liver diseases and cancers in Taiwan. It offers cell therapies, such as MAGICELL-NK, which are natural killer cells; and MAGICELL-GDT, which are T cells. The company develops PI-88 (MUPAFOSTAT), which has completed Phase II clinical trial for use as an adjuvant therapy for HCC after curative surgery; and Phase III trial for the adjuvant treatment of patients with hepatitis virus related hepatocellular carcinoma after surgical resection. It also provides OBP-301 that is in a Phase I clinical trials for the treatment of esophageal cancer, and Phase II clinical trials for the treatment of esophageal and gastric cancer. In addition, the company develops human native mAbs for therapeutic applications related to infectious diseases; and molecular diagnostics, vaccine, and generic drugs. Medigen Biotechnology Corp. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3178.TWO.summary: Gongin Precision Ind. Co., Ltd designs, manufactures, and sells IC assembly molds and tools in Taiwan. It offers auto mold chase, and MGP and conventional molds; and wafer fabrication equipment components, such as standard and critical/clean room module components, subsystem assembly and test components, and supply chain and system level assembly and testing components. The company also provides display equipment components, including electros, reactors, ground shields, frames, floating masks, chambers, nozzles, TCP/COF, and test fixtures. In addition, it offers landing gear actuators; engine components comprising combustion and transition liners, compressor vanes and retainer rings, hula seals, and other engine hot section sheet metal parts; motion control components, such as servo valve body/housing, servo valve components, relief valve-hydraulics, and actuators; and machined components for the aerospace industry. Further, the company provides micro turbine and combustion generator components, and micro turbine engines; and servo valves for industrial machinery, vehicles, and aviation applications. Gongin Precision Ind. Co., Ltd was founded in 1978 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

3184.TWO.summary: MicroBase Technology Corp. provides drug delivery systems to patients and healthcare professionals. It specializes in Laser LIGA, a non-silicon-based micromachining technology that is used in the manufacture and development of miniaturized devices and micron-scale parts. The company provides vibrating mesh nebulizers under the Pocket Air name for the home care and hospital sectors; and micro-infusion skin care products under the PharMatrix name. MicroBase Technology Corp. was founded in 1997 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

3189.TW.summary: Kinsus Interconnect Technology Corp. primarily researches, develops, designs, manufactures, and sells electronic products in Taiwan and internationally. The company operates in two segments, IC Substrate and Printed Circuit Board (PCB). It offers plastic ball grid array, multi-chip-module ball grid array (BGA), chip scale package (CSP) mini-BGA, high dissipation cavity down, thermal enhanced BGA, flip chip, flip chip CSP, flip chip film chip on flex, core-less, all layer build up, embedded pattern and passive, high density copper bump, high band width package-on-package, core-less embedded passive, and radio frequency module substrates. The company also provides system in package, a carrier substrate that provides a platform for multiple chips or packages or passive components assembly; and PCBs and related products, and electronic components, as well as after sales services. In addition, the company is involved in the wholesale and retail-sale of electronic materials; sale of medical equipment; provision of consultation services for business operation and management; and investment and trading activities. Its products are used for modules in handset and wearable devices, microprocessors, controllers, graphic and application processors, ASIC, PC chipsets, connectivity, power management, memory, power amplifier, front end and WiFi connectivity modules, and field programmable gate array applications. The company primarily serves IC packaging, design, and system businesses, as well as manufacturers of electronic products. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

3191.TWO.summary: Hold Jinn Electronics Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells electronic parts and materials. It offers SMD transformer wire racks, bakelite transformer wire racks, plastic transformer wire racks, plastic bakelite engineering products, intelligent parking equipment, artificial intelligence algorithms, and smart parking equipment, as well as integrated chip design services. The company also engages in the tourism business. Hold Jinn Electronics Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

3202.TWO.summary: High-Tek Harness Enterprise Co., Ltd. produces and sells various computer parts and communication equipment. The company offers electronic wires, coaxial cables, and wires. It also engages in the steel structure and engineering projects, and paper businesses. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

3205.TWO.summary: Sagittarius Life Science Corporation operates as a biotechnology research company. It engages in the development of Chinese herbal medicine technology platform for the treatment of various diseases. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

3206.TWO.summary: Kingstate Electronics Corp. manufactures and sells acoustic products in Taiwan and internationally. It offers various products, including piezo buzzers, magnetic buzzers, micro speakers, dynamic receivers, Bluetooth speakers, and electret condenser microphones; and audio products, such as earphones, wired and wireless headphones, Bluetooth headphones, sports headphones, gaming headphones, TWS products, wireless speakers, and PSAP products; speaker module/mic module products; and personal sound amplifiers, etc. The company also provides OEM/ODM smart devices, including personal safety and wireless alarms, VoIP systems, anti-lost devices, smart doorbells, and IP speakers. The company offers its products for use in telecommunications, consumer electronics, information technology, home appliances, automotive, security, medical, and industrial equipment related industries. Kingstate Electronics Corp. was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3207.TWO.summary: Yao Sheng Electronic Co., Ltd. designs, produces, and sells transformers and inductors in Taiwan and internationally. It offers low frequency, LLC, flyback, LED, and flat wire transformers; and standard reactors. The company also provides FT, T, UU, and ET series common mode chokes; iron, DR, and R core chokes, as well as PFC and high current chokes. Its products are used in LCD monitors and TVs, cell phones, personal computers, TVs, and information appliances. Yao Sheng Electronic Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3209.TW.summary: Alltek Technology Corporation operates as a communication components distributor and solution provider in Taiwan and internationally. The company provides broadband access devices used in C/O products, computer devices, servers, modems, and network communication products; wireless communication devices for use in PC, NB, servers, auto control products, mobile devices, mobile phones, and portable consumer products; and optical devices for O/E, Internet, and network communication applications. It also offers voice processing devices for use in PC, NB, servers, O/E products, gateways, network communication products, and modems; and protection devices for use in O/E products, gateways, network communication products, and modems. In addition, the company provides self-developed products for ASIC, DAA, SLIC modules, pair gains, switch routers, power management devices, memory products, display drivers, and AIS applications, as well as time-to-market and value-added services. Alltek Technology Corporation was founded in 1991 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

3211.TWO.summary: Dynapack International Technology Corporation designs, manufactures, and supplies portable battery packs in Taiwan. The company offers its products for various applications, including notebook/ultrabook PCs, tablet PCs/e-books, smartphones, handy scanners, 2-way radios, power banks, cable modems, server UPSs, and e-bike batteries. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

3213.TWO.summary: Mildef Crete Inc. develops, manufactures, and sells computer systems worldwide. It provides notebook, tablet, and handheld PCs. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3217.TWO.summary: Argosy Research Inc. produces and sells electronic connectors and system products. The company's products include electronic connectors, such as USB3.1 type-C, DDR3/4/5, M.2(NGFF), mini PCIe, LVDS, RF coaxial, battery, FAKRA, etc.; antenna and nut metal stamping parts; and injection/molding parts. Argosy Research Inc. was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3219.TWO.summary: Aethertek technology co. Ltd designs, manufactures, and sells automation machinery related equipment in Taiwan. The company was formerly known as Service & Quality Group Co., Ltd. Aethertek technology co. Ltd was founded in 1992 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

3224.TWO.summary: MetaTech (AP) Inc. engages in the wholesale and retail of electronic products and equipment in Taiwan, Hong Kong, China, and Southeast Asia. The company offers semiconductor components and consumer products, communication products, and connectors. It also provides genetic testing products for the non-invasive tumors, lung cancer, and familial and colorectal cancer; and regenerative medicines. In addition, the company offers travel and reinvestment services. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3226.TWO.summary: Topower Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells auto parts, power supply and LED products, and auto lamps in Taiwan. It offers auto parts, such as car and truck parts, and auto accessories; ATX and IPC power supply products; and LED products, including bulbs, candle lights, downlights, T bars, mini bulbs, spotlights, and tubes, as well as auto and truck lamps, and LED universal lights. The company was formerly known as Topower Computer Industrial Co., Ltd. Topower Co., Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.

3227.TWO.summary: PixArt Imaging Inc. researches, designs, produces, and sells CMOS image sensors and related ICs in Taiwan, Hong Kong, China, Japan, and internationally. The company offers optical mouse sensor, optical track sensor, and finger navigation products; and multiple object tracking, optical motion tracking, gesture recognition, and ambient light and proximity sensing products, as well as CMOS camera SOC products. It also provides photoplethysmography sensors, computer vision, capacitive touch products, and customized ASIC sensors; wireless audio SOC/true wireless stereo IC products; Bluetooth low energy products; and RF chips. The company's products are used in computers and peripherals, smart homes, offices and classrooms, wearables and hearables, gaming controllers, automotive, surveillance and cameras, commercial and others, automation navigation, and health management. It is also involved in the investment and technical support activities. PixArt Imaging Inc. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

3228.TWO.summary: RDC Semiconductor Co., Ltd. designs and develops IC for high-end and low power bit microprocessors in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers Emkore DE and Emkore DS processor platforms for embedded commercial applications, such as digital electronic signage, automatic teller machines, smart vending machines, human-machine interfaces, thin computers, and terminal sales systems; and RDC IAD processor platform for mobile networking applications in consumer electronics, and embedded markets. It also provides RDC 32-bit microcontrollers for various applications, including industrial control, automation, NAT routers, home gateway and access points, industrial PCs, thin client applications, and others; RDC16-bit microcontrollers for general embedded market applications, such as industrial controls, control automation, terminals, signal generators, and projectors; and RDC NPU to equipment manufacturers. In addition, the company offers RDC ASIC that provides clients with comprehensive services and industrial application solutions; low power system-on-chip for programmable automation controller, embedded board solutions, data concentrator, and industrial automation control system applications; and multi-function I/O peripheral controllers and PCI express/PCI interfaces expansions. Further, it provides 8-bit MCU IP that is used for DSC, CF card, pattern recognition, LCD monitor controller, USB device controller, scanner controller, MP3 controller, modem controller, and voice recognition applications. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3229.TW.summary: Cheer Time Enterprise Co., Ltd manufactures and sells printed circuit boards in Taiwan. The company offers high density interconnect, teflon, ceramics, load board, aluminum single/double layer, and rigid-flex boards, as well as special process products, such as copper plated on board edges, wafer test boards, countersink/counterbore holes, plated castellated holes, and VIA IN/ON PAD. Its products are used in various industries, such as GPSs, LEDs, light bars, load boards (DUT boards), IP cams, industrial PCs, etc. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3230.TWO.summary: Jiin Ming Industry Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells products related to metal/plastic body parts and components. The company primarily offers parts and components of notebook computers, LCD monitors, LCD TVs, and other 3C products. Its products comprise LCD display components, including bezels, back covers, support brackets, and reflectors; notebook components, such as frames, bottoms, and shieldings; flat panel display components comprising bezels, middle frames, panel brackets, and covers; and 3C product components, including MP3 covers/components, heat spreaders, and multimedia products. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

3231.TW.summary: Wistron Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, provides design, manufacturing, testing, and after-sales service for information and communication technology products. The company engages in the research, development, design, manufacture, testing, and sale of desktop computers, notebook computers, motherboards, servers, system platforms, high-speed and multi-function multiple-CPU computer systems, multi-media computers, network computers, consumer-type computers and special computers, microprocessors, CD-ROMs, PDAs, panel PCs, pocket computers and interface cards. The company also offers video and Internet telephones, video conferencing equipment, and telecommunication equipment; digital satellite TV receivers, set-top boxes, digital video decoders, and multi-media appliance products; digital cameras, CD-ROM drives, and DVD-ROM drives; wireless receiver products comprising mobile phones, wireless LAN cards, and Bluetooth communication modules; and LCD TVs and other electronic audio and visual products. In addition, it is designs and merchandises computer software and programs; recycles electronic waste; and offers in vitro diagnostic devices, physiological signal diagnostic devices, and medical date systems. Further, the company is involved in the manufacturing, processing, and selling of electronic products for automobiles; maintenance and cleaning of electronics products; and import and export trade operations. It operates in the United States, China, Europe, and internationally. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

3232.TWO.summary: Sentronic International Corp. provides semiconductor components, liquid crystal displays, optical pickups, light-emitting diodes, micro motors, decentralized components, etc. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3234.TWO.summary: TrueLight Corporation designs, develops, and supplies optical components in Asia. The company offers high-bandwidth semiconductor lasers, photodiode components and submodules, optical engines and cables, vertical cavity surface emitting lasers light source for cloud\data center, 5G mobile internet base station interconnections, and proximity/flood illumination/3D sensing applications in smartphones. It serves optical fiber transceiver, internet equipment, and smartphone module manufacturers. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3252.TWO.summary: Haiwan International Development Co., Ltd engages in the development and leasing of residential buildings. It is also involved in the hotel business; and real estate trading activities. The company was formerly known as Haewan International Development Co., Ltd and changed its name to Haiwan International Development Co., Ltd. in 2014. Haiwan International Development Co., Ltd was founded in 1994 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

3260.TWO.summary: ADATA Technology Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells memory and storage solutions. It offers DRAM modules, solid state drives, USB flash drives, memory cards and readers, power banks, and cables and accessories; external storage products; and wireless, car, and wall chargers, as well as PC system and components, keyboard and mouse, audio products, and accessories. The company also provides industrial SSD cards, and disk on module/USB/embedded products for use in automation, point of sale, digital signage, network video recorder, kiosk, data centers, in-car systems, multifunction printers, casino gaming machines, and aerospace applications. In addition, it offers commercial and industrial lighting products; and powertrain products, such as axial flux motors, air-cooled motors, liquid-cooled motors, and motor controllers. ADATA Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3264.TWO.summary: Ardentec Corporation provides semiconductor testing solutions in memory, logic, and mixed-signal ICs (integrated circuits) to integrated device manufacturers, pure play wafer foundry companies, and fabless design companies. The company offers testing services comprising engineering services before mass production, such as test engineering consultations and recommendations for design, test plan and test program development, test program cross-platform conversion, complete product characterization, and laser program development and analysis; and mass production engineering services consisting of suggestions and services of test time reduction, yield analysis and enhancement, laser repair yield analysis and improvement, timely retrieval of test data on secured Internet, test program management system, test data analysis and periodical report provision, and outlier management services, as well as stable testing services. It also provides probe card design and consultant, outsourced manufacturing, and maintenance and system management for repair record and tracking services; wafer level chip scale packaging backend process services; and wafer probing platforms. In addition, the company offers certification, and quality system and assurance structure services, as well as quality, information security, and hazardous substance free policy services; and IT policy, IT service architecture, and testing information services. Further, it provides testing and assembly services; electronic ICs, diodes, transistors, and semiconductor devices; IC devices testing and trimming services; ICs, module, and component testing services; and manufactures electronic components. Additionally, the company offers burn in testing of wafer types; wafer testing for LCD driver ICs and analog ICs; and wafer and final testing of radio frequency ICs. It operates in the United States, Taiwan, Singapore, Korea, China, and internationally. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

3265.TWO.summary: Winstek Semiconductor Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, and testing of integrated circuits in Taiwan. The company operates through two divisions, Testing and Packaging. It offers wafer sort, final and post test, engineering support, and test platforms services; copper pillar bump, wafer level chip scale package, lead free bump, plating bump / ball drop, and backside metallization services; die processing services, wafer thinning, singulation, and flip chip packaging services; and failure analysis and reliability test services. The company was formerly known as Stats ChipPac Taiwan Semiconductor Corp. and changed its name to Winstek Semiconductor Co., Ltd. in June 2015. Winstek Semiconductor Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan. Winstek Semiconductor Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Singapore Merchants Bloomeria Limited.

3266.TW.summary: Sunty Development Co., LTD builds, rents, and sells residential and commercial building projects in Greater Taipei, Taiwan. It undertakes residential unit, office space, and parking facility projects. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

3276.TWO.summary: T-Flex Techvest PCB Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of FPC and PCB products in worldwide. The company provides original equipment manufacturing services for inner and outer layer printed circuit board lamination; and PCB inner layer optical inspection. Its products are used in portable device, camera module, auto CCD, key pad, cell phone, and LCM module applications, as well as applied in mobile phone, communication, mother, TFT-LCD, high density interconnection boards; and computer peripheral and consumer products, which include note book. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

3285.TWO.summary: Microtips Technology Inc. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells LCD modules, PCB assemblies, and professional audio and video design and assembly products worldwide. The company offers character, graphic, and TFT LCD modules for industrial control, medical devices, telecommunication, and new emerging products. It also provides musical instruments, including sounds effects testing machines; sound amplifiers for professional recording studios and concerts; digital musical instruments for audio studios, pubs, and clubs; and digital audio processors, live sound recorders, multi-channel mixers, sound effects, machine DSP amps, etc. In addition, the company offers finger printer modules and diaper sensors; and wireless chargers and modules, such as wireless transmitters and receivers under the AirFuel, AirON, and WiChargi brands. Further, it provides custom designed resonators, and PRU and PTU modules for power and ID form factor applications comprising wearable devices, smartphones, handheld devices, tablets, laptops, vehicles, home appliances, etc. Additionally, the company offers ODM/OEM services for audio and video products; and engineering services that include product development, electrical and mechanical engineering, tooling design, prototype engineering, manufacturing process engineering, and quality engineering, as well as valued-added design, electronics manufacturing, and logistics services. Microtips Technology Inc. was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3287.TWO.summary: Kworld Computer Co., Ltd provides digital entertainment products in Taiwan and internationally. It offers gaming earphones; and wall and car chargers, as well as TV/video drivers, analog TV tuner cards, and hybrid TV tuner sticks. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3288.TWO.summary: Silicon Touch Technology Inc. designs, develops, produces, and sells analogue and digital ICs. The company offers motor, brushless fan motor, CD/DVD ROM motor, stepping motor, and LED display driving IC, as well as power and power supply monitoring, optoelectronic communication and image processing, and optoelectronic interface ICs. It provides its products in the Americas, Europe, Japan, Korea, South Africa, and China. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3290.TWO.summary: Donpon Precision Inc. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells automotive electronic products and plastic precision components in Taiwan and Mainland China. The company is involved in mold design, manufacturing, plastic molding, painting and printing, and assembly and processing of professional OEM electrical equipment. It provides automotive electronic products, such as rear-view camera and mirror, HUD, steering wheel switches, audio panel, auto parts molds, air filters, chargers, and trim products, as well as safety products. The company offers camera, backlight module, headphones, power chargers, and mobile phone accessories; and touch glass products, including auto monitors, and mobile phone, tablet PC, and laptop application products. Donpon Precision Inc. was founded in 1995 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

3294.TWO.summary: Megaforce Company Limited engages in the research and development of opto-mechatronics and plastic components in Taiwan, China, Mexico, and the United States. The company engages in precise plastic injection molding, micro-precision structure mold development, electronic assembly, and spray printing activities. It also offers dental electromechanical integration products, surgical systems, medical integration products through Internet of Things, and medical machinery products, as well as medical teaching courses. In addition, the company provides surface treatment, post process, and assembly services; and liquid silicone rubber molding and DFM products. The company's products are used in advanced computer gaming, high-end home entertainment equipment, vehicle components, medical appliances, and aerospace equipment, as well as in computer, communication, and consumer electronics products. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3296.TW.summary: Powertech Industrial Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufacture and sell electronic circuit power protection and smart home wireless remote control devices, wired and wireless communication equipment, and electronic modules and parts. It provides for IT surge protectors peripherals, such as computer, information, communication, consumer electronic, and precision electronic equipment products; power noise filters for audio and video devices that include audio, digital TV, home theater, and other related products; and IOT and smart home power safety systems to control the home power and security systems. The company also manufactures and sells power outlets, wires, cables and power cords, plastic covers, circuit board modules, and radios, as well as electrical appliances, power outlets, wires, cables, and computer peripherals; and provides after-sales services. In addition, it engages in the investment, and trading and leasing activities; and provision of management consultancy services. It serves in the United States, Asia, Europe, Australia, and internationally. Powertech Industrial Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3303.TWO.summary: Univacco Technology Inc. manufactures and sells stamping foil products and optoelectronics materials worldwide. The company offers various decorative and functional foils, which include hot stamping, cold, holographic, and digital foils. The company also provides optoelectronics materials, including clean and PET protective films, diffuser, SMD cover tapes, medical films, and OEM for coating. The company provides its products for wine, beer, and spirits label and packaging; food, drink, and confectionery packaging; tobacco/cigarette packaging; greeting cards and printed media; artificial leather book covers; persona care; cosmetics and perfumes; pharmaceuticals; and clothing and textile applications. It markets its products under the UNIVACCO brand. The company was formerly known as Tai Leng Industry Co., Ltd and changed its name to Univacco Technology Inc. in 2002. Univacco Technology Inc. was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.

3305.TW.summary: Shenmao Technology Inc. manufactures and sells solder materials for the electronic industry worldwide. It offers SMT assembly materials, including tin lead, lead-free, water soluble, package on package, low temperature, and halogen free solder pastes, as well as adhesives; and semiconductor packaging materials, such as BGA spheres and bumping solder pastes. The company also provides wave solder assembly products comprising solder bars, cored solder wires, lead free solder wires, and halogens free solder wires; liquid fluxes; solder preforms and ribbons; and PV ribbons. Shenmao Technology Inc. was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

3306.TWO.summary: RoyalTek Company Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells global positioning system (GPS) products worldwide. Its products primarily include audio video navigation systems, portable navigation devices, driving assistance systems, driving video recorders, electronic accessories for automobiles, and engine boards for GPS. The company also offers ODM/OEM services for car electronics and driver assistance systems. It serves automotive, navigation, safety, leisure, sports, multimedia, mountaineering, tourism, and other industries. RoyalTek Company Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

3308.TW.summary: Bestec Power Electronics Co., Ltd. designs, fabricates, markets, and sells switching power supply products worldwide. It provides LED drivers, adapters, open frames, and server/IPC products under the Bestec brand for lighting, medical, ITE, NB and PC, networking, and industrial applications. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

3310.TWO.summary: Chialin Precision Industrial Co., Ltd. designs, processes, manufactures, and sells stamping dies and other related parts, precision terminals, and hardware parts in Taiwan. The company's products include bandolier pins, mobile and computer connectors, lamp and piranha lead frames, SMD lead frames, and antennas, as well as other products, such as EMI spring finger and shielding case. It is also involved in the development and leasing of houses and buildings. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

3311.TW.summary: Silitech Technology Corporation engages in the manufacture and sale of modules and rubber (plastic) products in China, Malaysia, Taiwan, the United States, India, and internationally. It offers various products, including mobile keypads, cover glasses, modules, auto parts, lighting modules, and accessories. The company's products are used in wearable device, automotive component, communication supply, and toy product applications. Silitech Technology Corporation was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3313.TWO.summary: Feei Cherng Enterprise Co., Ltd. manufactures and markets active/passive electronic components in Taiwan and Internationally. The company's products include MOSFETs, LAN transformers, and polymer caps, as well as diodes, NTC thermistors, MLCC, and crystals. It also distributes. The company offers its products for use in N/B, M/B, smart phones, mobiles, and GPS system applications. Feei Cherng Enterprise Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3321.TW.summary: Uniflex Technology Inc. designs, manufactures, and sells flexible printed circuit (FPC) boards in Taiwan. It offers single-sided, double-sided, double access, and multi-layer FPC boards for use in various applications, such as information technology, communication, consumer electronics, automotive, medical equipment, and industrial equipment. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

3322.TWO.summary: Joinsoon Electronics Manufacturing CO., LTD. designs, manufactures, and sells interconnection products worldwide. The company offers precision components, including antennas, cables, and connectors, as well as noninvasive consumable cables, customized cable assemblies, fly-lights, infrared surveillance camera cable assemblies, and CDRW and multimedia cables. It also provides electronics products, such as storage, VoIP and HDMI series, and OEM and ODM products. In addition, the company offers healthcare management products comprising infrared ear and digital thermometers. Further, it provides product consultation and technical support services that include product design and development, procurement and sourcing, and manufacturing and engineering support, as well as design manufacturing services; and electronics manufacturing services. The company was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3323.TWO.summary: Celxpert Energy Corporation produces and sells battery packs in Taiwan. Its products are used in notebook and tablet, network product, smart phone, power tool, E-bike/E-Moto, and energy storage and UPS battery packs. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

3324.TWO.summary: Auras Technology Co., Ltd. engages in manufacturing, processing, and retailing electronic materials, computer heat dissipation modules, and other related products in China, Taiwan, Korea, Ireland, and internationally. The company offers coolers, heat sinks, cooling modules, heat pipes, fans, etc. primarily for applications in notebooks, desktops, servers, pads and workstations, mobiles, graphic cards, etc. It also provides server, motherboard, and graphics card cooling modules; all-in-one workstations and DVD player cooling modules; and cooling products for home appliances, such as DVD and Blu-ray players, as well as LED lighting applications. In addition, the company offers heat flow consulting services. Auras Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3325.TWO.summary: Casing Macron Technology Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, markets, and sells computing products. It offers PC chassis and switching power supply products; peripheral devices, such as card readers, mouse, speakers, and barebone systems; and PC cases, including slim, mini tower, middle tower, mini ITX, server, and gamming PC cases. The company also provides water filter systems and temperature drinking water devices. In addition, it offers OEM and ODM services. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3332.TWO.summary: Cincon Electronics Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, sells switch mode power conversion products to the communications, computer, industrial, medical, consumer, and lighting markets worldwide. Its products include single and multiple output DC-DC converters from 1W to 750W, single and multiple output AC adapters from 5W to 150W, open frame AC-DC power supplies from 5W to 700W, and LED power supplies from 15W to 150W. The company also provides modified standard and custom power conversion products. In addition, it offers accessories; and operates iDALI, an app for digital lighting control solution. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3338.TW.summary: TaiSol Electronics Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells thermal management, connectors, and mobile commerce solutions in Taiwan, China, Japan, and the United States. The company offers passive and active thermal management products, including cold forged, extruded, folded fin, die-cast, brazing, and heat pipe/vapor chamber heat sinks, as well as thermal solutions for PCs, laptops, tablets, smart mobile divides, etc. It also provides semiconductor thermal management solutions, such as DT, AIO, and NB thermal modules, as well as cooling solutions for server and cloud computing applications; light-emitting diode (LED) and laser diode cooling solutions, and LED downlight and stage light cooling solutions; and optical communication and telecom cooling solutions. In addition, the company offers industrial application cooling solutions; power inverter cooling solutions; industrial robots; and control rack heat exchangers, as well as heat pipe products, including multiple heat pipes, embedded heat pipes, high-power heat pipes, vapor chambers, and looped heat pipes. Further, it provides computer electrical and electronic connectors. TaiSol Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

3339.TWO.summary: Tekcore Co., Ltd produces and sells LED wafers and chips in Taiwan. It offers standard LEDs, and power and flip chips. The company provides high brightness chips in green, blue, red, yellow, orange, and ultraviolet wavelengths. Its products are used in various applications, including large scale displays and billboards; optic fiber cables; indicator lights; LCD and projection backlighting; low light environments; miniaturized light sources; cell phones, cameras, and other small electronic displays; TV remotes and infrared mouses; signal lights; interior and exterior solid state lighting and other illuminations; and vehicle lights. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Nantou City, Taiwan.

3346.TW.summary: Laster Tech Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of LED lighting products in Taiwan and internationally. It offers automotive lighting products, including tail lights, brake lights, fog lights, turn signals, side markers, and day time running lamps; industrial, indoor, outdoor, and landscape lighting products; and chip products, such as Lumileds LED chips. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3349.TWO.summary: Dexin Corporation manufactures and sells IT cordless solutions and high-level devices in Taiwan. The company offers audio and entertainment products, including Bluetooth headsets and speakers, gaming headsets, and audiophile headphones; and computer peripherals and consumer electronic devices, such as office and gaming mouse products, keyboards, and game controllers. It also provides industrial design, research and development, product engineering and manufacturing, and other custom and project design services. Dexin Corporation was founded in 1997 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3354.TWO.summary: Microcosm Technology Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and supplies upstream materials for the electronic industry. It offers PSPI-Brina, a high precision photosensitive developing type Polyimide material; liquid and film type colorless polyimide material for OLED display screens, and other colorless and flexible required electronic products; and high frequency series products. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Tainan, Taiwan.
