3356.TW.summary: GeoVision Inc., together with its subsidiaries, operates as a digital and networked video surveillance company worldwide. It offers IP cameras; and surveillance systems, including VMS, NVR, mini, Linux-based standalone, recording server, mobile, storage, control center systems, as well as accessories, such as remote controls, joysticks, keyboards, and touch displays. The company also provides video management software; access control products, which include software, IP control panels and kits, controllers, readers, and accessories; license plate recognition products, such as IP LPR, DSP LPR, and analog LPR cameras, as well as vehicle management software; decoder boxes and HD video encoders; digital signage products, such as signage players and slim-bezel signage displays; PoE switches, extenders, adapters, and accessories, as well as gigabit PoE switches; and capture cards and IO products. In addition, it offers technical support, specs consultation, RMA, and logistics services. The company provides its products for various fields of industries, such as retail, commercial, government, transportation, hospitals, gaming, and residence through distributors, system integrators, and installers. GeoVision Inc. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3360.TWO.summary: Sunnic Technology & Merchandise Inc. provides image processing and optoelectronic products in Taiwan. It offers products ranging from semiconductors, solutions and modules, and systems to factory automation equipment. The company also provides solutions for exterior, mechanism, software, hardware, and firmware designs, as well as one-stop shopping services. Its product research and development covers range of products and applications that include CCD and CMOS analog and digital HD smart cameras for image capture and blue-ray; H.264 IP set top box and IP smart TV box for image storage; HD smart displays and Internet TV for image display; and Wi-Fi, RF, and 3GPP for video conferencing and image transmission. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3362.TWO.summary: Ability Opto-Electronics Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, manufacture, and sale of professional optical lenses in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers various optical lens products, including scanners, projectors, digital cameras, digital video recorders, multi-function printers, cell phone cameras, laptops, tablets, IP-cameras, monitors, automotive lens, etc.; and CCM/NB products, as well as lens for automotive, digital surveillance, special, professional, and other applications. It also provides technical services of precision optical lens. The company was formerly known as SHIAN-JINN Precision Optical Co., Ltd and changed its name to Ability Opto-Electronics Technology Co.,Ltd. in 2001. Ability Opto-Electronics Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Taichung City, Taiwan.

3363.TWO.summary: FOCI Fiber Optic Communications, Inc. designs, manufactures, and markets fiber optic components and integrated modules for communication networks in Taiwan. It offers interconnects, such as connector/adaptor parts, pigtails/patchcords, and patchpanels; couplers/splitters, attenuators, and wavelength division multiplexing (WDM) products; filter WDMs, CWDMs, DWDMs, and filter devices; optical isolators and circulators, including micro optic devices; optical transceivers and active optical cables; and USB 3.0 AOC cables, sub-assemblies, pigtails/receptacles, and detectors. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

3373.TWO.summary: Radiant Innovation Inc. designs and develops infrared technology products. It offers medical infrared thermometers, industrial use infrared thermometers, and CO2 monitors. The company also provides infrared ear and forehead thermometers, multi-function thermometers, disposable probe covers, and TMS products. Radiant Innovation Inc. was founded in 2000 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3374.TWO.summary: Xintec Inc. operates as a three dimensional (3D) wafer level chip scale packaging company in Taiwan, the United States, Europe, and Asia. The company offers optical sensor chip-scale package technology for cellular phones, notebooks, gesture sensors, and laser intensity sensor for blue-ray and pico projectors; PPI and 3D Package technologies for use in integrated passive devices, power management IC and analogue IC, cellular phone RF IC, and capacitive couplers; and Micro-Electro-Mechanical Systems (MEMS) and sensor packaging for ink printer heads, motion sensors, temperature and humidity sensors, pressure sensors, identification sensors, pico-projector heads, silicon microphones, and bio sensors. It also provides design and modeling services for its technologies. Xintec Inc. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

3376.TW.summary: Shin Zu Shing Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells precision springs, stamped parts, and hinge assemblies in Taiwan. It also provides metal injection molding (MIM) and lathe products. The company offers its products for use in notebook and tablet PCs, LCD monitors, and MIM products, as well as communication, computer, and consumer products. The company was formerly known as Zu Shing Spring and Mechanical Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shin Zu Shing Co., Ltd. in 1997. Shin Zu Shing Co., Ltd. was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3388.TWO.summary: Topco Technologies Corp. engages in the import and export of chemical material related commodities in Taiwan, Mainland China, and internationally. It offers silicone related products, including silicone fluid, defoaming and release agent, foam stabilizer, fiber treatment, paint additives, resin, coupling agent, oil, rubber, PSA, powder, and grease, as well as paper release agent, HTV, liquid injection molding system, RTV I, RTV II, sealant, MS-RTV, thermal pad and LED application material, and AF coating agent. The company also provides various adhesives, such as construction structural adhesives; EXELAST; surface treatment equipment; matsumoto microsphere; poreflon membrane; touch panel related materials; poly tetra fluoroethylene films; and other products. In addition, it offers environmental catalysts; micro-capsule foam materials; silicate and anti-static agents; cosmetic raw materials and finished products; gunze fluorine sleeves; UV curing glues; atmospheric plasma; VUV washing machines; and conductive polymers and thermal materials, as well as other trade products. The company was founded in 1981 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

3390.TWO.summary: Sunflex Tech Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells flexible printed circuit boards (FPCB) in Taiwan. The company offers rigid flex, multi-layer, double side, single side double access, and single side FPCBs. Its products are used in touch panels, liquid crystal modules, computer accessories, light bars, and automotive electronics. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

3391.TWO.summary: Remotek Corporation engages in the research, design, production, and sale of radio coverage solutions for 2G, 3G, and 4G mobile radio networks worldwide. The company offers digital repeaters, including PICO ICS, ICS, digital fiber optic, and digital band adjustable repeaters; distributed antenna systems, such as fiber optic repeaters and cable boosters; and off air solutions comprising low and medium power repeaters, high power repeaters, channel selective repeaters, and frequency shifting repeaters. It also provides operation and maintenance system, a management system for controlling and monitoring repeaters remotely; and accessories, such as antennas, couplers, splitters, combiners, dummy loads, coaxial cables, and connectors. In addition, the company offers RF components and related services. It serves providers of mobile communication. Remotek Corporation was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3402.TWO.summary: Wholetech System Hitech Limited provides turnkey and system integration services in Taiwan. It offers bulk gas, specialty gas supply, hookup turnkey and consultant, and gas hook-up systems; clean room, MEP, process exhaust, pure water treatment, fire, and cooling systems; and vacuum piping systems, vacuum piping fittings, vacuum ball valves, and deposit improvement engineering services. The company also provides gas cabinets and racks, and VMP/P systems; monitoring hardware and software, such as GIS, HPM, FMCS, and heating jackets; scrubbers; and automation engineering software, custom application software, and mobile IoT smart facility management system. In addition, it provides wet process equipment and chemical supply systems comprising semiconductor, LED, solar energy, and LCD panels. The company was formerly known as Wholetech Engineering Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Wholetech System Hitech Limited in 2001. Wholetech System Hitech Limited was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3406.TW.summary: Genius Electronic Optical Co.,Ltd, an optical technology company, designs, develops, and sells lenses in Taiwan. It offers mobile lenses; and VR/AR and automotive optics. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

3413.TW.summary: Foxsemicon Integrated Technology Inc. provides design and contract manufacturing services for semiconductor and TFT-LCD equipment manufacturing, and integrated system equipment in Taiwan and internationally. The company's services and products include equipment components, modules, solar energy equipment, and total systems used in the semiconductor and TFT-LCD industries. Foxsemicon Integrated Technology Inc. was founded in 2001 and is based in Chu-Nan, Taiwan.

3416.TW.summary: WinMate Inc. manufactures and sells industrial displays and touch screen devices worldwide. The company offers rugged mobile solutions, including rugged mobile computers and tablets, and ultra-rugged tablets; rugged industrial systems, such as industrial panel PCs and application ready panel PCs, multi-touch HMI and chassis HMI, self-interactive KIOSK, and IP67; and rugged industrial displays, including USB type-C displays, power over ethernet touch monitors, multi touch displays, sunlight readable displays, temperature displays, rack LCD/1Uconsole drawers, healthcare grade 4K and multi touch monitors, and LCD scaler boards. Its rugged embedded computing products comprise IoT gateway, single board computers, EAC PRO, M-series and marine EAC box PC, 2U-rack IPC, and DIN rail, as well as ARM, fan less, standard, and full box PCs; vehicle mounted computers include FM07 series, M101BK, FM08, FM10, and FM10Q; and digital signage and bartype products consist of bartype panel PCs and bartype displays. In addition, the company offers healthcare solutions, such as healthcare grade 4K monitors, multi-touch monitors, and mobile solutions. It serves industrial IIoT and edge computing, healthcare, food, beverage and chemical, retail, oil and gas, automotive, warehouse and logistics, marine, military, field services, heavy duty, factory automation, transportation, smart-grid, and public safety industries. WinMate Inc. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3419.TW.summary: Wha Yu Industrial Co., Ltd. provides antenna products for wireless transmission industry primarily in Taiwan and Hong Kong. It offers telecommunication BTS, in building coverage optimization, outdoor coverage optimization, GPS, automotive, Wi-Fi, LTE, DSRC, walkie talkie, various embedded, military, maritime, telematics, mmWave active, handheld game console, small cell, and dispenser antennas, as well as NFC antennas/modules, alarm devices, RFID products, electronic cable assemblies, and BSD blind spot detection radars. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3426.TWO.summary: Tai Shing Electronics Components Corporation manufactures and sells solenoids and solenoid valves under the Sun-Magnet brand. It offers open, tubular, magnet, push pull, rotary, and flapper solenoids, as well as solenoid water, air, and oil valves. The company also provides pump, sensor, and auxiliary power modules; soap dispenser products and related accessories; modularized mechatronics; and electromagnetic suckers, as well as relays under the TTi brand. In addition, it offers solenoid ODM/OEM services. The company serves customers in the water technology, total solution/module, energy (environment), home application, industrial automation, automotive, healthcare devices, sewing machine, security, and IT industries. Tai Shing Electronics Components Corporation was incorporated in 1984 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3429.TWO.summary: Promaster Technology Corp. distributes general purpose, communication and multimedia products for communication and consumer markets. The company's products are used in desktop and server PCs, notebook PCs, smart phones, LCD TVs, PDA, graphic cards, and audio/video I/O products; networking products, such as LAN, ADSL router and cable modems, and telecom products; and wireless products, including cellular phones, wireless handheld devices, WLAN and Bluetooth, and GPS. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3430.TWO.summary: Chitec Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development of specialty chemicals for applications in electronics, medicine, automotive, construction, and other industries worldwide. It offers UV absorbers and light stabilizers under the Chiguard name; flame retardants under the Zuran name; antioxidants under the Revonox/Deox name; photoinitiators under the Chivacure/R-gen name; and anti-reversion agents, antiozoants, optical brighteners, and auxiliary thermal stabilizers under the Chitex name. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

3432.TW.summary: Tai Twun Enterprise Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells various components and products. The company offers cooler and heat pipe components; single card, IO, FPC, board, and battery connectors; and other components that are used in NB PC, mobile phone, 3.5G HSDPA, MFP printer, DVD, and LCD TV applications. It also provides consumer electronics products, such as AC USB adaptors, car chargers, and USB card readers. Tai Twun Enterprise Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3434.TWO.summary: ACULA Technology Corp. provides video solutions and services in Taiwan and internationally. It offers closed-circuit television (CCTV) monitors; combo DVR/NVR products; medical displays; IP monitors with POE; IP public view monitors with POE; industrial monitors-touch monitors/point of sale (POS); digital signage/public information display products; and high-brightness monitors. The company also provides OEM/ODM display products. It offers CCTV products for use in apartment complexes, airports, bars, casinos, daycares, schools, parks, fast food restaurants, hotels, night clubs, parking lots, office buildings, shopping malls, train/bus stations, and warehouses, as well as for home owners; and POS products for food service, hospitality, retail, and public markets. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

3437.TW.summary: Advanced Optoelectronic Technology Inc. engages in the research and development of opto-semiconductor technologies, and commercialization of solid-state lighting solutions in Taiwan. It provides chip LEDs for use in cellular phone keypad backlights and various indicator lights; top LEDs for backlighting, automobile, camera flash, and other applications; side emitted LEDs for use in small size panels and slim type panels; and lighting fixtures and UV light chips. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3438.TWO.summary: Advanced Analog Technology, Inc. designs, develops, and sells power management ICs in Taiwan. It provides multifunctional PMICs, such as TFT LCDs, AMOLEDs, DSC/DVs, and portable devices; boost, buck, buck-boost, and inverting switching regulators; WLED drivers consisting of backlights and lighting products; and battery management products comprising battery chargers and battery protection products. The company also offers audio amps, GPMs, LDOs, level shifters, motor drivers, OP amps/buffers, RESETs, and photoflash products. Its products are used in DSC/DV/drive recorder, PND, and discrete and integrated LCD panel applications. Advanced Analog Technology, Inc. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Zhubei, Taiwan.

3441.TWO.summary: Unique Optical Industrial Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, processes, and trades in various optical glasses, optical lenses, lens blanks, stubble blanks, and prism blanks in Taiwan and internationally. Its products are used in cameras, camcorders, telescopes, microscopes, condensers, projectors, fax machines, copiers, scanners, monitors, digital cameras, measuring instruments, military observation equipment, medical endoscopes, camera phones, and optical communication products. The company was founded in 1949 and is headquartered in Nantou, Taiwan.

3443.TW.summary: Global Unichip Corp. researches, develops, produces, tests, and sells embedded memory, logic, and analog components for various application ICs in Taiwan, China, Europe, Japan, Korea, and North America. The company offers designing, wafer manufacturing, packaging, and testing services for ASIC and wafer products; circuit design cell library and various intellectual properties (IPs) required in the process of product design; circuit layouts for mask making; and subcontract mask making, wafer manufacturing, dicing, and packaging to vendors, as well as conducts testing. It also integrates multiple design projects of various customers on single mask and by a wafer engineer run; and provides customization, consulting, designing, technical support, and IP licensing services, as well as provides cell libraries; and EDA tools. In addition, the company offers system on a chip (SoC) design services, such as technology design, design methodology, low power solution, and testability design services; SoC manufacturing services consisting of packaging, testing and product engineering, and quality and reliability, as well as supply chain management services; and IP portfolio, including synthesizable implementation IP, and hardened PHYs and verification IP for ASIC, FPGA, and SoC designs. Global Unichip Corp. was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3444.TWO.summary: Niching Industrial Corporation markets and sells semiconductor, flat panel display, light-emitting diode (LED), green energy, and nanotechnology products worldwide. The company provides PCB for solid-state drives and memory modules, substrates for IC packaging, capillary wedges, die collet needles, special gas, dispensing nozzles, and die attach films, as well as reclaim, Al coating, dummy, and daisy chain wafers. It also offers screen printing silver paste, Nano imprint silver paste, gravure off set silver paste, low-temperature sintering Ag paste, and low temp adhesive silver paste, as well as printing paste for laser etching and silver ink; chip trays, ABS reels, sputtering targets, and emboss spacers for the LCD industry; and LED tabs and lead frames for the LED industry. In addition, the company provides adhesives for temporary bonding, metal springs for VCM, CPD dryers, and Nano porous materials, substrate for stretchable and flexible modules, and wireless power charging coils. Further, it manufactures and sells touch Nano silver products. Niching Industrial Corporation was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

3454.TW.summary: Vivotek Inc. provides security surveillance solutions worldwide. The company develops IP surveillance solutions that comprise network cameras, video servers and receivers, network video recorders, video management software, application software, and power over Ethernet switches, as well as offers cloud services. It also provides accessories comprising mounting kits, enclosures, covers, lens, power supply and box products, cables, joysticks, cabinets, cabinet accessories, storage products, water tanks, illuminators, and connectors. The company sells its products and services through distributors. Vivotek Inc. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3455.TWO.summary: Utechzone Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and markets automatic optical inspection products in Taiwan. It offers PCB, FPD, and semiconductor inspection services. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3466.TWO.summary: Skardin Industrial Corporation, a consumer electronics manufacturing company, manufactures, supplies, and exports set top box and broadband industry solutions in Taiwan and internationally. It offers STB platforms, smart home products, WIFI speakers, hybrid soundbase and sound bar audio systems, and software/middleware products. The company also provides electronics manufacturing services. Skardin Industrial Corporation was founded in 1982 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3479.TWO.summary: Avalue Technology Inc. designs, manufactures, and sells embedded computing solutions in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers industrial and embedded motherboards; industrial PC/computers, such as embedded, transportation, rackmount, and ARM based systems; and panel PCs, including industrial, medical, and open frame panel PCs, as well as industrial touch monitors, audio and video extenders, peripherals and accessories, and panel and touch technologies. It also provides computer-on-module products for critical or industrial applications; point of sale (POS) terminals, which includes desktop and compact POS; medical tablets, and semi rugged tablet and accessories; device management software; E ink solutions, such as public display, healthcare IoT, and E ink technologies solutions; ODM services; and intelligent solutions. The company's products are used in healthcare, retail, gaming, manufacturing, and transportation applications. Avalue Technology Inc. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3481.TW.summary: Innolux Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, researches, designs, develops, manufactures, and sells TFT-LCD panels, modules, and monitors of liquid crystal displays (LCD), color filters, and low temperature poly-silicon TFT-LCDs. It offers TFT-LCD panel modules and open cells for LCDs, billboards, desktop monitors, and notebooks, as well as for small and medium size products that are used to manufacture tablet computers, portable audio players, GPS for automobiles, aviation, smart home, and mobile phones. The company also provides various touch panels, including glass/glass capacitive, glass/film/film capacitive, and one glass capacitive touch panels. In addition, it imports and exports LCD display and electronics parts, as well as provides products for medical, industrial, and educational purposes. Further, the company is involved in the research, development, testing, and maintenance activities; and distribution, general investment, and storage businesses. It operates in Taiwan, China, Hong Kong, Europe, the United States, and internationally. Innolux Corporation has a strategic collaboration with E Ink Holdings Inc. to focus on expanding electronic paper products in IoT and smart city applications. The company was formerly known as Chimei Innolux Corporation and changed its name to Innolux Corporation in December 2012. Innolux Corporation was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

3483.TWO.summary: Forcecon Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of thermal management products in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers DC axial and blower fans, thermal module active and passive products, vapor chambers, and heat pipes for use in computers, VGA, LED lightings, servers, automobiles, smart-phones, and bio-technology science fields. It serves ODM and OEM customers. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Zhubei, Taiwan.

3484.TWO.summary: Solteam Electronics Co., Ltd. engages in the design, development, manufacture, and sale of modular parts and components for power tool, home appliance, automotive, medical, and IT industries worldwide. It offers switches, inlets/outlets, adapters, battery holders, controller modules, EV parts, surrounding/other products, aquarium peripherals, optical products, and medical devices. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

3485.TWO.summary: Eclat Forever Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, and production of production equipment for touch panels, liquid crystal displays, plasma display panels, printed circuit boards, and other related equipment in Taiwan and internationally. It offers display production equipment, including touch panel solutions, cleaning equipment, development equipment, and etching and stripping equipment; automated logistics equipment consisting of substrate automated equipment and automated coating solutions; automated glass and film roll-to roll unwinding and rewinding equipment, as well as film-tearing laminating equipment; and exposure equipment, such as UV LED automatic and semi-automatic exposure machines. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

3490.TWO.summary: Single Well Industrial Corporation designs, produces, and sells molds and auto machines in Taiwan, Japan, and internationally. The company offers semi-conductor and LED molding, IC molding, deflashing, trimming, and forming dies, as well as parts of dies, including overhauling on molding dies. It also provides deflash/trim/singulator auto machines, test products, handlers, tapings, auto loaders, solder dippings, epoxy dispensing products, insert tubes, manu press, and parts. In addition, the company offers package molds, such as resistors/diodes and sim/flash drives; and automated machineries, including photo couplers, high powers, semiconductors, LEDs, and IRMs, as well as engages in solar energy business. It serves manufacturers of electronic parts and semi-conductors. Single Well Industrial Corporation was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3491.TWO.summary: Universal Microwave Technology, Inc. designs, develops, and manufactures custom microwave/mm-wave devices, sub-systems, and antennas for broadband wireless communications. The company's products comprise diplexers, filters, couplers, OMT products, Eband/millimeter-wave products, distributed antenna systems, hanger clamp sets, Ku/Ka band OMT and filter assemblies, waveguide components, circulators/isolators, cable assemblies, flexible waveguides, antennas, die-casting and machined parts, and remote mount kits. Its products are used in point-to-point, cellular, VSAT, WiMAX, and LTE applications. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Keelung City, Taiwan.

3494.TW.summary: HiTi Digital, Inc. manufactures and supplies digital photo products and services in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers industrial, commercial, and consumer photo printers; card printers; order station/operation console products; print kit/consumables; and printer accessories. It also provides professional image software designed for passport/ID photo format. The company was formerly known as Hi-Touch Imaging Technologies Co., Ltd. and changed its name to HiTi Digital, Inc. in 2007. HiTi Digital, Inc. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3498.TWO.summary: Usun Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the flat panel display, customization equipment, intelligent manufacturing system integration, and PCB/FPC industrial automation businesses in Taiwan. It provides dense unpackers; automated handling systems; tap cleaners; polarizers/E papers/OCA/LOCA laminators; PR/OC/PI slit coaters; and LCM+B/L module auto assembly lines. The company also offers mask production equipment, timber industry equipment, de-mura+gamma turing automatic detection equipment, laser scanning system, AVI materials loading and unloading machine, goods retrieval equipment, open cap and remove film machine, auto laminators, automatic sole edge grinding machines, lithium battery production equipment, and LENS mounts. In addition, it provides pallet based automatic storage systems, bin storage systems, warehousing management systems, and sorting systems; and PCB and CCL auto assembly systems, laminated steel auto cleaners, and CCL auto testing and cutting systems, as well as article holders. Usun Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

3499.TWO.summary: GlobalSat WorldCom Corporation manufactures and sells GPS receivers and module makers worldwide. It offers sports and outdoor products, such as Bike Computer, GPS Watch, Heart Rate Monitor, Triathlon Watch, and Wrist Band GPS cycling; and tracking devices, including asset tracker, AVL tracker, personal tracker, animal tracker. The company also provides IoT/M2M products comprising LoRaWAN devices, NB-loT Sigfox, LoRa M.O.S.T; accessories, which include GPS modules, GPS engine boards, GPS data loggers, wireless locators, and GPS active antennas. In addition, it provides customization services of electronic designs, system integration, and software development to meet the project requirements. The company's products are bundled into the clients' system products, such as tablet PCs, notebooks, and smartphones. It primarily exports its products to Europe and North America, as well as sells its products in other regions through channel distributors. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3504.TW.summary: Young Optics Inc. engages in the research, design, manufacture, and sale of optical components, engines, and modules in Taiwan. The company offers plastic injection molds; machining parts, including metal barrel, spacer, retainer, cam ring, and flange products; components, such as plastic lens, glass molding lens, glass grinding lens, color wheels, glass light tunnels, reflection prisms, color filters, x-plates, mirrors, UVIR, and waveguide products; DLP evaluation modules, and DLP LED and UV engines; machine vision, projection, logo, smart head, ADAS, lidar, endoscope, fixed, and varifocal lens; and monocular HMD products. Young Optics Inc. was founded in 2002 and is based in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

3508.TWO.summary: Ways Technical Corp., Ltd. engages in the various processing services and professional material development. It offers plastic, metal, and assembly center injection equipment and other products; tooling equipment; surface treatment injection molding; SMT products; and organic photovoltaics products. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Dayuan, Taiwan.

3511.TWO.summary: Simula Technology Inc. designs, manufactures, and sells connectors, cables, and accessories in Taiwan, China, Europe, the United States, Asia, and Europe. It offers audio and DC jacks; solutions for wearable devices, such as pogo pin and pad, magnetic pogo connections, and wireless charging magnets and coil modules; USB products; plugs, receptacles, and cable assemblies; fleet asset management interconnect solutions; and customized solutions. Its product applications include consumer electronics, fleet telematics, medical and healthcare, and industrial and outdoor applications. Simula Technology Inc. was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

3512.TWO.summary: Huang Long Development Co.,Ltd. manufactures electronic components in Taiwan. It is also involved in the development, leasing, and sale of residential buildings; and real estate trading business. The company was formerly known as Neng Tyi Precision Industries Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Huang Long Development Co.,Ltd. in June 2018. Huang Long Development Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1981 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

3515.TW.summary: ASROCK Incorporation primarily manufactures and sells motherboards in Taiwan and internationally. It also offers graphics cards, networking products, mini and industrial PCs, and server/WS products. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3516.TWO.summary: ADO Optronics Corporation provides lighting products in Taiwan. It offers commercial lighting, indoor and outdoor LED lighting, and plastic injection products. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

3520.TWO.summary: Jhen Vei Electronic Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of a range of wires and cables. The company offers USB, DC, DP, DVI, VGA, audio, and RCA cables; and wire harness and internet safety products. Its products are used for transmitting power or signals on PC, notebook computers, tablets, smart phones, portable navigation devices, smart home devices, household appliances, vehicular equipment, industrial instrument, camcorders, TVs or stereos, speakers, and USB and other electronic devices. The company also provides network security services to communications, corporations, education, and gaming industries. Jhen Vei Electronic Co., Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3521.TWO.summary: DataVan International Corporation provides POS solutions worldwide. The company offers POS terminals, embedded box PCs, touch monitors, touch systems, kiosks, and POS peripherals comprise cash drawers, thermal printers, and system attachments. It offers solutions for the retail and foodservice industries. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3522.TWO.summary: Toplus Global Co., Ltd. engages in the food and beverage business in Taiwan. It operates 3 seafood restaurants under the DingXian brand; and 8 wedding halls and 1 marine manor under the AmazingHall brand. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3523.TWO.summary: EFUN Technology Co.,Ltd develops, manufactures, and sells various optical products in Taiwan and internationally. The company's products include quantum- dot films, high-brightness 2D/3D home projection screens, ITO transparent conductive films, surface structure diffusion films, anti-fog films, anti-blue light films, anti- electromagnetic interference films, anti-reflective films, water blocking films, non-conductive vacuum metallization coatings, screen protectors, and nano silver antibacterial films, as well as anti-bacterial, anti-splash, and anti-epidemic protective gears. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.

3526.TWO.summary: As of February 26, 2021,  operates as a subsidiary of Pan Jit International Inc.

3527.TWO.summary: Macroblock, Inc. supplies LED drivers for display, backlighting, and lighting applications worldwide. The company's products include display, local dimming backlight, RGB lighting, automotive lighting and display, DC/DC controller and DC/DC convertor, isolated and non-isolated AC/DC controller, and linear regulator LED driver ICs. It also provides Hawkeye solution platform, a LED display solution; and micro-LED solutions. In addition, the company offers IOT technology solutions, including facial recognition, business intelligence analytics, and content management system solutions for the shopping mall, retail, and supermarket sectors. Macroblock, Inc. was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3528.TW.summary: Answer Technology Co., Ltd. provides analog, mixed-signal, and digital signal processing integrated circuits (IC) in Taiwan. It also provides USB3.0/3.1, PCIe bridge, and switch ICs; and fabless IC design services, as well as various reference design and technology background for supporting services. In addition, the company designs, manufactures, and ships discrete and embedded magnetoresistive RAM (MRAM) and spin-torque MRAM; and offers circuit protection components and antenna products for computing, communication, consumer electronics, and automotive electronics. Further, it provides optical communications product; broadcast test and measurement equipment; design and consultancy services to broadcast, professional A/V, and image processing companies; packaged infrared sensors used for gas detection, flame detection, and gensture/motion/presence detection; and FPGAs, SoCs, MPSoCs, and 3D ICs, as well as develops various silicon intellectual properties and integrated technologies of system software/hardware. Additionally, the company offers sensor solutions for applications in various industries; Valens HDBaseT technology that provides plug-and-play digital connectivity between HD video sources and remote displays; and design services, and original IP core and application specific solutions, as well as develops ASSPs for motion control of fractional horse power stepper motors and brushless DC motors. Answer Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3529.TWO.summary: eMemory Technology Inc. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells flash memory integrated circuits. It offers NeoBit, a programmable logic device that embeds into various CMOS processes, including logic, mixed-mode, bipolar-CMOS-DMOS (BCD), analog, radio frequency (RF), and high-voltage (HV); and NeoFuse, a small-form-factor logic non-volatile memory technology for use in IDs, production record, encryption code, and ROM replacement, as well as analog trimming, function selection, and parameter setting applications. It also used in set-top boxes, digital TV, CMOS imaging sensors, application processors, baseband processors, LCD drivers, and power management ICs. The company also provides NeoEE, a single-poly embedded memory device for application in users preference setting in IC cards, code storage in MCUs and RFICs, configuration settings in NFC controllers, fuse devices in memory redundancy designs, and parameter trimming for analog/RF/HV/BCD circuits; and NeoMTP, a single-poly embedded memory technology for USB type-C, wireless charger, touch panels, P-Gamma, MCUs, etc. In addition, it offers NeoPUF, a hardware security technology device for Internet of Things (IoT) applications; EcoBit, an embedded logic multiple-time programmable solution for passive RFID tags, lower power sensors, battery-saving mobile ICs, and other IoT chips; Green platform for code storage in microcontrollers or speech ICs; and MagnaChip EEPROM, an IP block device for code storage in microcontrollers, and RFICs, parameter trimming for analog/RF/HV circuits. It serves semiconductor foundries, integrated devices manufacturers, and fabless design houses in Taiwan and internationally. eMemory Technology Inc. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Zhubei, Taiwan.

3530.TW.summary: Silicon Optronics, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, operates as a complementary metal-oxide-semiconductor image sensor design company in Taiwan, Hong Kong, the United States, India, Korea, and the Philippines. The company offers area sensors, including raw or SOC sensors for applications in smart phones and tablets, PC cams and Webcams, digital still cameras, and security and surveillance systems; and linear sensors for use in document scanners, multifunction printers, barcode scanners, fax machines, counterfeit money scanners, and portable scanners. It also engages in the investment business. Silicon Optronics, Inc. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

3531.TWO.summary: Shian Yih Electronic Industry Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells light emitting diode (LED) back light modules. It provides small to medium size LED back light modules, motorcycle and vehicle LED headlight modules, light guide films, and plastic injection molding products, as well as LED packaging, design, and fabrication services. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

3532.TW.summary: Formosa Sumco Technology Corporation manufactures, sells, and trades in primarily in Taiwan. It offers polished, annealed, epitaxial, and test wafers. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Yunlin, Taiwan. Formosa Sumco Technology Corporation is a subsidiary of Sumco Techxiv Corporation.

3533.TW.summary: Lotes Co., Ltd designs, manufactures, and sells connectors and CPU sockets for notebook and personal computers, mobile electronic devices, etc. under the LOTES brand in Taiwan, Mainland China, and internationally. The company's products include slot/edge card connectors; I/O series connectors, such as SlimSAS, OcuLink, optical fiber connectors, audio jack, RJ45, display port, HDMI, SATA/SAS, USB, Gen Z connectors, and sim card connectors; USB, fan, wire harness, DC and other cables; and battery connectors and holders. It also offers automotive connectors; and other products comprising of RF, BTB, FPC, and power connectors, as well as SPI sockets. In addition, the company researches and develops, and manages electronic components and assemblies, calculator parts, molds, plastic raw materials, industrial robots, intelligent floor sweeping robots and components, and industrial cameras, as well as import and export of goods and technologies; provides electrical and audio -visual electronic products; and develops and produces optical communication measuring instruments and optical transceivers, and related technical services. Further, it engages in property development, home rental, landscaping, and interior decoration activities; reinvestment activities; and offers surface treatment for various hardware and plastic products. Lotes Co., Ltd was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Keelung, Taiwan.

3535.TW.summary: Favite Inc. engages in the research, development, and manufacture of automatic optical detection and testing equipment. It offers panel display detection devices, semiconductor inspection equipment, PCB detection devices, automatic defect classification determination systems, and rate management systems for OLED displays, touch panels, cameras, and chromicity/film thickness/OD products, as well as automatic optical CD measurement equipment. Favite Inc. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Zhubei, Taiwan.

3536.TW.summary: Sintronic Technology Inc. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of precision ceramics and UVC sterilization products worldwide. The company offers life medical products, such as medical face masks; UVC products, including sterilization tumblers, UVC LED water sterilizers, and UVC mini sterilizers; and precision ceramics for material applications. It serves customers in opto-electronics industry. The company was formerly known as MIT Advanced Technology Inc. and changed its name to Sintronic Technology Inc. in November 2004. Sintronic Technology Inc. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3537.TWO.summary: Podak Co., LTD. operates as a sales agent in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers active and passive components, such as polymer solid, aluminum electrolytic, plastic, and gold capacitors, as well as variable resistors, inductors, power choke coils, diodes, transistors, chip fuses, integrated circuits, batteries, remote controls, motors, and other products. It also provides car electronic components, Blu-ray storage, power capacitor, smart energy saving, automatic equipment, and CO2 heat pumps, as well as high-definition closed-circuit television, consumer monitoring, and camera module solutions. Podak Co., LTD. was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3540.TWO.summary: Thermaltake Technology Co., Ltd. provides entertainment, e-sports, technology, and lifestyle products worldwide. In addition, it offers communication cables, such as RG type, AISG, coaxial communication, and LAN cables. The company was formerly known as Cablex Wire & Cable Mfg. Corp. and changed its name to Copartner Technology Corporation in August 2004. Copartner Technology Corporation was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

The company was founded in 1979 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

It serves the industrial, commercial, gaming, medical, banking, military, transportation, and consumer electronic sectors. eGalax_eMPIA Technology Inc. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

3558.TWO.summary: Senao Networks, Inc. researches, develops, designs, manufactures, and sells wireless communication products in the United States, Europe, Taiwan, and internationally. It also provides wired network system switches, such as large enterprises network security servers, small and medium-sized enterprises network security servers, medium and large-sized enterprises network security servers, managed network switches, managed network controllers, easy/smart network switches, layer2/3 managed network switches, PoE network cable power supplies, and electrical equipment for smart power supply. In addition, the company offers cloud management service and cloud device management platforms, cloud management service wireless network base stations, and cloud management service switches; enterprise radio system products comprising single-wire, high-speed, frequency-hopping, digital, and long-range enterprise cordless communication devices; and four-wire, multi-master, high-speed, frequency-hopping, digital, and long-range enterprise cordless communication systems, as well as AP CAMs, PoE/Ethernet power supply parts, antennas, and power supply products. Further, it is involved in the development of new generation of 6GHz wireless management base stations; cloud gateways; enterprise-grade video surveillance solution; Internet of Things/Industrial Internet of Things; outdoor wireless LTE bridge APs; IP-base long-range cordless phones; and integrated 900MHz digital cordless interphones. The company offers products under the Senao and EnGenius names. Senao Networks, Inc. was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3563.TW.summary: Machvision Inc. develops and sells machine vision systems for semiconductor and printed circuit board (PCB) industry in Taiwan. It also offers IC substrate, HDI, and FPCB inspection and measuring series products, such as 3D AOI systems, solid measuring viewers, and LaserVia AOIM inspection systems; AFI, FPCB AVI, and Wafer AVI inspecting systems; and CSPAFI integrating AOI+AVI algorithm and fast-capturing-multi-illumination optical systems. In addition, the company provides wiring inspection series, which includes circuit AOI system for PCB/FPC, verification, and repair; ArtWork AOI products; and LineGauge systems for use in optical measurements and QC reporting applications. Machvision Inc. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3564.TWO.summary: AEWIN Technologies Co.,Ltd. provides network platform products and solutions in Taiwan and internationally. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3570.TWO.summary: Otsuka Information Technology Corp. agency sales of 3D computer engineering drawing CAID/CAD/CAM/CAE/PDM design software, system application consulting, online guidance, talent training, and other services in Taiwan and China. Otsuka Information Technology Corp. is a subsidiary of Otsuka Corporation.

3580.TWO.summary: UVAT Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the design and development of physical vapor deposition equipment and coating machines in Taiwan and internationally. In addition, it provides coating services for touch screen industry consisting of indium-tin-oxide and touch module circuits; and biotechnology industry, including bio sensors, as well as offers other anti-finger print film coating services. UVAT Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

3581.TWO.summary: Zen Voce Corporation manufactures and sells optoelectronic and semiconductor dicing saws, and assembly and testing products. The company also designs and manufactures test products, such as wafer test probe card PCBs; IC test HIFIX and CHANG kits; SOCKET IC test products; IC handlers; and SOCKET IC burn-in test products, as well as offers dicing and jig saws, tapes, and ball mount tooling products. It serves semiconductors, optoelectronics, microelectronics, and LCD equipment industries. The company was formerly known as Trutek Cooperation. Zen Voce Corporation was founded in 1999 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

It also provides wafer reclaiming services; repair, overhaul, and calibration services; and used tools, such as refurbished metrology, Nikon stepper/scanner, TEL track, and ion implanter tools. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3587.TWO.summary: Materials Analysis Technology Inc. provides laboratory services in the areas of materials analysis, failure analysis, and reliability testing in Taiwan, China, Japan, Singapore, Malaysia, and internationally. The company provides its solutions to telecom operators, ISPs, retailers, consumer electronic companies, and OEMs/ODMs. Arcadyan Technology Corporation was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

In addition, the company provides SST temperature and automobile sensors, as well as electricity breaker for the robotics industry and Internet of Things. The company was formerly known as Unitel Rubber Corporation and changed its name to Unitel High Technology Corporation in June 2006. Inc. was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

It serves its customers in the fields of retail, field services, governments, healthcare, hospitality, logistics and transportation, warehousing, and manufacturing. Its products are used in medical, consumer electronics, semiconductor, automotive, appliance, microelectronic, and other industries. It also offers flat panel display rotary sputtering targets; alloy metal powders for vacuum induction gas atomization; nickel alloy c-hook for coil wire pickling; sputtering target bonding services; precious metal refining and sales services; analytical services; and metal powder for 3D printing, as well as acid and alkali-resistance alloy, and titanium for cooking/tableware. In addition, the company provides cables for automation and semiconductor equipment, and subway projects, as well as wire harnesses for oil and gas equipment, and passenger aviation; and solar energy connectivity solutions, including junction boxes, DC branch cables, connectors, and PV cables. Additionally, it engages in the wholesale and retail of cable assemblies, power cords, and connectors, as well as computer peripheral products, electronic materials, fiber optical passive components, and fiber optical cables; and produces and sells fiberfill moldings, smart instrumentational sensors, connectors, and functional materials. It also provides touch panel (TP) solutions for other product domains, including gambling systems, industrial control systems, medical products, handheld game consoles, and touch remote controls. The company's products are used in various businesses, such as retailing, service, banking, airport service, game consoles, display systems, and auto industries. It also provides soldering pads; and manufacturing services for various products using different manufacturing modes. In addition, the company wholesales electronic components. The company offers its products primarily to original equipment companies. Eris Technology Corporation was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan. Eris Technology Corporation is a subsidiary of Diodes Incorporated.

3678.TWO.summary: Ushine Photonics Corporation produces and supplies indium tin oxide (ITO) film products. Its products are used in touch panels, flexible displays, flexible solar cells, and other products. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Zhubei City, Taiwan.

It also provides double injection molding products, including wireless Bluetooth speakers, function key, control console, and phone keypad. In addition, the company offers tooling products and electronic parts. It serves consumer, computer, auto, and communication sectors. Nishoku Technology Inc. was founded in 1980 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3680.TWO.summary: Gudeng Precision Industrial Co., Ltd provides technology services worldwide. It also provides equipment comprising mask cleaners and purge stations; and cleaning services, mask management and tracking systems, and mask accessories. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3685.TWO.summary: Tradetool Auto Co., Ltd. develops and sells automotive optics, metal stamping, and welding parts in Taiwan. The company offers automotive metal parts, such as metal parts stamping, metal component welding, and stamping die products. It also provides automotive optics parts, including display optical injection component; LED headlight lens and lens core; and head up displays (HUD) comprising HUD freeform mirror injection and coating, HUD freeform mirrors, HUD combiners, and VR lens. Tradetool Auto Co., Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Taichung City, Taiwan.

The company provides multi-crystalline solar wafers, ingots, and bricks; and customized OEM services. It serves solar cell companies. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

3687.TWO.long_name: MacroWell OMG Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd.
3687.TWO.summary: MacroWell OMG Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd. provides online games and community space. The company was formerly known as Macrowell Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to MacroWell OMG Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd. in August 2009. MacroWell OMG Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

3688.TWO.summary: HLJ Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells photoelectric semiconductors. The company offers epitaxial wafer, optical communication, light-sensor, and lighting products for proximity sensor, high-speed optical fiber communication, gesture recognition, optical sensor, laser monitor, time of flight, long distance night vision surveillance system, and optical communication applications. It also provides foundry and design services. The company was incorporated in 2001 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3689.TWO.summary: U.D. Electronic Corp. manufactures and sells electronic components worldwide. Its products include RJ45 ICM connectors, pure connectors, LAN filters, and I/O connectors, consumer cables, surge protection devices, audio modules and dongles, and USB to RJ45 dongles, as well as automotive electronics, such as common mode filters and USB connectors. The company offers its products under the UDEJack trademark for the telecommunications, data communications, computer, industrial, and medical markets. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

3694.TW.summary: AzureWave Technologies, Inc. manufactures and sells wireless connectivity and image processing solutions worldwide. The company offers wireless modules, including M.2 socket type, M.2 solder own, solder down stamp, wireless IOT module, and system in package products. It also provides camera modules, such as USB interface, MIPI interface, ultra slim and narrow NB, ultra slim and narrow MIPI, and biological identification/depth detection camera modules. In addition, the company offers design, manufacturing, and software services. Its products have applications in personal and industrial computers, mobile and internet devices, consumer electronics, home appliances, automotive components, manufacturing facilities, and others. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3702.TW.summary: WPG Holdings Limited distributes semiconductor, electronic, and electrical components in Taiwan, Mainland China, and internationally. The company provides core components, such as chipsets, graphics/audio/video controllers, smartphone chips, network/modem chipsets, CPU/MPU, RISC CPU, etc.; analog IC and mixed signal components, including bipolar, CMOS operational amplifiers, comparators, digital/analog converters, power supply controllers, audio and video amplifiers or controllers, etc.; and discrete logic IC components comprising of diodes, rectifiers, transistors, thyristors, insulated-gate bipolar transistors, optical transistors, logic ICs, etc. It also offers memory components, such as DRAM, SRAM, EPROM, EEPROM, flash, MCP, etc.; optical components, which includes LCD, sensor, LED, etc.; and passive components, connectors, and magnetic components, including resistors, capacitors, inductors, magnetic components, cables, connectors, mechanics, electro mechanics, circuit protection, materials, batteries, filters, oscillators, etc., as well as non-electronic components. In addition, the company operates children theme parks; and engages in the investment activities and general trading business. Further, it offers various value-added services, such as special delivery, market information, technical support and tools, financial support, turnkey solution, warehousing, logistics, and e-commerce services; and computer software, computer and its peripherals, and information products. WPG Holdings Limited was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

3702A.TW.summary: WPG Holdings Limited distributes semiconductor, electronic, and electrical components in Taiwan, Mainland China, and internationally. The company provides core components, such as chipsets, graphics/audio/video controllers, smartphone chips, network/modem chipsets, CPU/MPU, RISC CPU, etc.; analog IC and mixed signal components, including bipolar, CMOS operational amplifiers, comparators, digital/analog converters, power supply controllers, audio and video amplifiers or controllers, etc.; and discrete logic IC components comprising of diodes, rectifiers, transistors, thyristors, insulated-gate bipolar transistors, optical transistors, logic ICs, etc. It also offers memory components, such as DRAM, SRAM, EPROM, EEPROM, flash, MCP, etc.; optical components, which includes LCD, sensor, LED, etc.; and passive components, connectors, and magnetic components, including resistors, capacitors, inductors, magnetic components, cables, connectors, mechanics, electro mechanics, circuit protection, materials, batteries, filters, oscillators, etc., as well as non-electronic components. In addition, the company operates children theme parks; and engages in the investment activities and general trading business. Further, it offers various value-added services, such as special delivery, market information, technical support and tools, financial support, turnkey solution, warehousing, logistics, and e-commerce services; and computer software, computer and its peripherals, and information products. WPG Holdings Limited was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

3704.TW.summary: Unizyx Holding Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, provides networking solutions for telecom operators, corporates, and home users worldwide. It offers consumer devices, remote central office equipment, wired and wireless equipment, and home and cloud equipment under the Zyxel brand and MitraStar names. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3705.TW.summary: YungShin Global Holding Corporation, through its subsidiaries, produces and sells pharmaceutical products. The company offers medicines and feed additives for swine, ruminants, poultry, pets, and aquatics; APIs, API intermediates, and specialty chemicals, as well as CRO and CMO services; herbal products; health foods; and beauty care products. It also operates EYES testing laboratories for food safety testing; and offers western medicines, agricultural products, chemical intermediates, and over-the-counter medicines. In addition, the company imports and exports pharmaceuticals, APIs, bio-products, and functional food materials; exports medicine-manufacturing machines and components, and medicine/food ingredients, as well as related materials, such as ampoules and vials; imports tablet-analysis equipment; and operates a nursing home for senior care. It operates in Taiwan, China, the United States, Japan, Malaysia, Hong Kong, Singapore, Thailand, Indonesia, Cambodia, and South Africa. The company was founded in 1952 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

3706.TW.summary: MiTAC Holdings Corporation, through its subsidiaries, designs, manufactures, and sells computers and ancillary equipment, and communication related products. The company offers computer frames, motherboards, interface cards, displays, power supplies, keyboards, and related metal stamping and plastic parts, as well as provides maintenance services for motherboards. It is also involved in the research, development, and manufacture of computer software, and provision of related technical advisory services; and research and development of calculators, servers, mobile phones, and PDA and GPS products, as well as provision of technical transfer and advisory services. In addition, the company sells electronic telecommunication products, and communication and software products, as well as offers related after-sale services; and assembles and sells computer peripherals, hardware/software, and related products. Further, it engages in the testing, maintenance, and display of computers, computer components, communication products, and consumer electronic products, as well as provision of related technical advisory and after-sale services; and general investment activities. Additionally, the company offers freight transport agency, export and import trading, and warehousing services; customer data processing, analysis, and integrated services; and business administration services. It operates in Taiwan, the United States, Europe, and internationally. MiTAC Holdings Corporation was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

3707.TWO.summary: Episil Holding Inc. engages in the epitaxial wafer foundry, power semiconductor, and analog integrated circuit businesses in Taiwan. The company was formerly known as Episil Technologies Inc. Episil Holding Inc. was founded in 1985 and is based in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

3708.TW.summary: Swancor Holding Co., LTD. produces and sells chemical products in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers vinyl ester and UP resins, including epoxy vinyl ester and unsaturated polyester resins, and epoxy adhesives; vinyl ester resins and epoxy systems for wind turbine blades; and epoxy composite resins, such as hand lay-up, filament winding, RTM/infusion, pultrusion, and solvent type epoxy resins, as well as carbon fiber and epoxy resins for prepreg. It also provides vinyl ester resins for marine applications; electrical insulating materials for use in large-scale casting application in the electronics and heavy electrical industries; and SMC/BMC resins and low profile additives. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Nantou City, Taiwan.

3709.TWO.summary: Trigold Holdings Limited, through its subsidiaries, sells computers and its peripherals in Taiwan and Mainland China. It also operates B2C and O2O businesses, and amusement parks. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan. Trigold Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of WPG Holdings Limited.

3710.TWO.summary: ACON Holding Inc. designs, manufactures, and sells electronic components for IT, digital home applications, handheld devices, etc. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3714.TW.summary: ENNOSTAR Inc. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of compound semiconductors in Taiwan. The company's products include epitaxial and chip, package and modules, and special compound semiconductors. Its products are used in displays, professional lighting, automotive, and sensing applications. The company was formerly known as EPISTAR Corporation. ENNOSTAR Inc. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

4102.TWO.short_name: YUNG ZIP CHEMICAL IND CO LTD
4102.TWO.long_name: Yung Zip Chemical Ind. Co., Ltd.
4102.TWO.summary: Yung Zip Chemical Ind. Co., Ltd., a bulk drug manufacturing company, supplies active pharmaceutical ingredients (APIs), API intermediates, and specialty chemicals worldwide. It offers antihypertensive, antiviral, iron chelator, anti-inflammatory, analgesic, antipyretic, anti-fungal, schizophrenia, genital herpes outbreak, hypnotic, and sedative products. The company also offers excipients, such as sodium starch glycolate; and custom research and manufacturing services. The company was founded in 1978 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

4104.TW.summary: Excelsior Medical Co., Ltd. distributes medical related systems in Taiwan, China, Japan, Korea, Malaysia, and the Philippines. The company offers equipment for hemodialysis, regular drug used in the medical institution, surgical equipment, and medical assistant electronics; and cosmetic equipment. It also provides medical administration services for single department. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

4105.TWO.summary: TTY Biopharm Company Limited, a pharmaceutical company, develops and markets branded generics in Taiwan and internationally. It offers oncology drugs, such as Lipo-Dox, Lonsurf, UFUR, TS-1, Pexeda, Gemmis, Oxalip, Irino, Epicin, Tynen, Anazo, Folina, Folina inj, Thado, Andason, Ivic, Asadin, Leavdo, Painkyl, Megest, Episil, Otril, and Zobonic for anti-cancer therapies. The company also provides anti-infection drugs, including Brosym, Colimycin, Cubicin, Lipo-AB, Metacin, Cepiro, and FlucelvaxQuad. In addition, it offers healthcare related drugs, such as Algitab, Alginos, Bio-Cal Plus, and Sulfin for gastrointestinal, bone, and metabolic healthcare. The company also holds a license to develop and commercialize Remimazolam, an ultra-short-acting intravenous benzodiazepine sedative/anesthetic. The company was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

4107.TWO.summary: Bioteque Corporation manufactures and sells medical devices in Asia, South America, North America, and internationally. The company provides medical disposables for use in hemodialysis access, endovascular treatment, and other fields. It also offers dialysis products, including hemodialysis bloodlines, A.V.F. needles, and hemodialysis catheters; interventional radiology products, such as pigtail drainage catheter sets, introducer sets, connecting tubes, drainage bags, and radiopaque dilators; urology products comprising ureteral stent sets and urine collection bags; and IV administration products, such as PVC IV infusion bags, PVC bags, and twist-off ports. In addition, the company provides respiratory care products, such as closed suction catheters, and endotracheal tubes; vascular access products comprising angiographic catheters, PTA balloon dilatation catheters, sheath introducers, guidewires, high pressure connecting tubes, PTCA balloon dilatation catheter-rapid exchange products, manifolds, and Y connectors; and medical components, including dialyzer connectors and caps, recirculating connectors with cap, rotating luer lock connectors, pump and T connectors, injection sites, female luers, and luer lock and chamber caps. Bioteque Corporation was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

4108.TW.summary: PhytoHealth Corporation researches and develops, manufactures, and sells pharmaceutical drugs, cosmetics, Class B drugs, and dietary supplements in Asia. Its products include PG2 Lyophilized injection for the treatment of cancer related fatigue; EnerCharge, which is used in enhancing physical strength, maintaining good spirits, and enhancing health maintenance activities; NatoCleanse capsules, which helps to reduce the risk of cardiovascular diseases; ReyeasCleanse health food capsules; and EnerCharge, an energy drink. The company also offers precision medical equipment and instruments; and computer-aided diagnosis development and authorization services. PhytoHealth Corporation was founded in 1998 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

4114.TWO.summary: Synmosa Biopharma Corporation, a specialty pharmaceutical company, researches and develops, manufactures, markets, and distributes pharmaceutical and healthcare products under the Synmosa brand in Taiwan. It offers its products in various therapeutic areas, including cardiovascular, respiratory, urology, sex hormone, and oncology. The company provides its products in various forms, such as effervescent tablets, granules, nasal sprays, metered dosed inhalers, and other forms. It also offers contract manufacturing services. The company also exports its products to South Africa, China, Hong Kong, Thailand, Singapore, Malaysia, Vietnam, Myanmar, Cambodia, Peru, Costa Rica, and Nicaragua. Synmosa Biopharma Corporation was incorporated in 1980 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

4116.TWO.summary: BenQ Medical Technology Corporation provides medical equipment, consumables, and solutions for various medical institutions and professionals worldwide. It offers operating tables, surgical lights, ultrasound systems, medical and protective masks, medical display monitors, and IQOR integrated systems. The company was formerly known as Trident Medical Corp. and changed its name to BenQ Medical Technology Corporation in June 2011. BenQ Medical Technology Corporation was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

4117.TWO.summary: General Biologicals Corporation engages in manufacturing and selling in-vitro diagnostic devices and pharmaceuticals in Taiwan and internationally. It offers real-time PCR products, including IVD kits and genesis products for breast cancer; ELISA Products comprising KIWI products; RIA products for gastrin, hepatitis, and thyroid, as well as vitamin products; rapid tests consisting of blood glucose monitoring systems, and cardiac and tumor markers, as well as products related to drug abuse, fertility hormones, and infectious diseases; lab ware products; and raw materials that comprise antibodies and antigens. The company also provides protein drugs for oral candidiasis; and point of care products for liver fibrosis and breast cancer indications. In addition, it offers products for use in clinics and laboratories for preventives and cancer diagnosis, including skin and oral care, breast cancer and liver related, and advanced cancer diagnosis products, as well as healthcare and education services. General Biologicals Corporation was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

4119.TW.summary: SCI Pharmtech, Inc. develops, produces, and sells active pharmaceutical ingredients, intermediates, and custom products worldwide. Its active pharmaceutical ingredients include Articaine HCl, Atomoxetine HCl, Bisoprolol Fumarate, Brinzolamide, Clindamycin Palmitate HCl, Divalproex Sodium, Duloxetine HCl, Hydroxychloroquine sulfate, Loxoprofen Sodium, Methylphenidate HCl, Pentobarbital Sodium, Probucol, Propafenone HCl, Sodium Valproate, Thiopental, Valproic Acid, Adenine, Cannabidiol, and Dexmethylphenidate HCl. The company's intermediate products comprise Azetidin-3-ol hydrogenchloride, Diethyl Isobutyl Malonate, Diethyl dipropylmalonate, Diethyl ethyl(1-methylbutyl)malonate, Pyrogallolaldehyde, Benzhydrylamine, 1-Benzhydrylazetidin-3-ol, 1-(2-Hydroxyphenyl)-3-phenylpropan-1-one, N-Methyl-4-piperidinol, Ritalinic acid, d-Ritalinic acid HCl, (1R, 2S)-1 Phenyl-2-(pyrrolldin-1-yl)propan-1-ol HCl, and (1R, 2S)-1 Phenyl-2-(pyrrolldin-1-yl)propan-1-ol. Its intermediate products also consists of (S)-3-(methylmino)-1-(2-thi-enyl)propan-1-ol, (R)-3-(Methylamino)-1-phenylpropanol, (1S,4R)-1-methyl-4-(prop-1-en-2-yl)cyclohex-2-enol, Menthadienol, 5-pentylbenzene-1,3-diol Olivetol, Methyl 2,4-dihydroxy-6-pentylbenzoate, and Ethyl 2,4-dihydroxy-6-pentylbenzoate Ethyl Olivetolate. The company also provides custom manufacturing services. SCI Pharmtech, Inc. was founded in 1987 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

4121.TWO.summary: Rossmax International Ltd. develops and supplies healthcare products and solutions in Taiwan. The company offers activity monitor, a device for monitoring and tracking fitness-related metrics, such as distance walked or run, counting steps, and calories burned; body fat monitors that are used to measure body fat, body mass index, lean mass, muscle mass, and water ratio along with body weight; blood pressure monitors; sphygmomanometer, a device that measures blood pressure; stethoscope, an acoustic medical device for auscultation, or listening to the internal sounds; handheld pulse oximeter monitors to measure the amount of oxygen carried in the body; non-contact telephoto thermometers; and blood glucose monitoring system, a medical device for determining the approximate concentration of glucose in the blood. It also provides nebulizer, a drug delivery device used to administer medication; suction unit, a machine used to remove mucus and other bodily fluids; aero spacer, a device used to increase the ease of administering aerosolized medication; peak flow meter, a device used to monitor a person's ability to breathe out air; heating pad for therapy; and anti-decubitus mattresses. In addition, the company operates rossmax healthstyle app, which offers distributors the possibility to manage their store locations, product promotions, and local events; and health station for pharmacies, doctors, and public places. It provides healthcare products in the fields of cardiovascular, diabetes, respiratory, fever, and wound healing diseases. The company also exports its products. Rossmax International Ltd. was incorporated in 1988 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

4126.TWO.summary: Pacific Hospital Supply Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, processes, and sells medical disposable products and equipment in Taiwan. The company's disposable medical devices include tubings, bags, bottles, closed wound drainage systems, surgical suction instruments, respiratory therapy products, and other products. It also provides medical gas systems, such as medical gas outlets, secondary equipment, accessories, and pipeline equipment, as well as pipeline system design and maintenance services. Pacific Hospital Supply Co., Ltd. offers its products for health care industry clients. The company also exports its products to approximately 80 countries and regions. Pacific Hospital Supply Co., Ltd. was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Miaoli, Taiwan.

4127.TWO.summary: Tien Liang BioTech Co., Ltd. produces and sells pharmaceutical products in Taiwan and internationally. The company pills for cough, lumbar bone soreness cloth, and stool and gastric problems, as well as liver, bladder, bone pain. It also provides hair removal and skin cream; pain coagulation gel and spray; alcohol, cranberry, and deep-sea oil capsules; pumpkin seed oil; soaps; and liqueur amine-based acid. Tien Liang BioTech Co., Ltd. was founded in 1960 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

4128.TWO.summary: Microbio Co., Ltd. develops and sells various therapeutics in Taiwan. It offers nutritional supplements, skin care products, and organic agricultural products. The company also provides MS-20 for ameliorating fatigue and appetite loss associated with cancer chemotherapy; and Herbiron, which reveals symptoms of iron deficiency anemia and menstrual discomfort. Its pre-clinical stage products include SNS01, SNA02, and SNA-03 to treat various types of cancers, as well as SNA-07 for cancer immune therapy; and SNP-630 to treat non-alcoholic steatohepatitis. The company's Phase I clinical trial products consist of OB-318, an anti-cancer drug; MB-110 for the treatment of hepatitis C; SNP-810, an acetaminophen; FB317 to treat moderate-to-severe allergic asthma and chronic idiopathic urticaria; and FB704A for the treatment of rheumatoid arthritis, cancer, and cytokine storms. In addition, it offers FB825, which is in Phase II clinical trial for the treatment of atopic dermatitis, allergic asthma, hyper IgE syndrome, and food allergy. Additionally, the company's Phase III clinical trial products comprise ON101 to treat diabetic foot ulcer; and MB-6 that acts as an adjuvant for metastatic colorectal cancer. Further, the company's discovery stage pipeline includes FB121 for AIDS; SNA01 to treat PD-1 related cancer; SNA02 for cancer immune therapy; and SNS01 for recurrent metastatic non-small cell lung cancer. Microbio Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

4129.TWO.summary: United Orthopedic Corporation engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of orthopedic implants and orthopedic surgical instruments. It offers orthopedic surgical equipment and its manufacturing equipment; and special metal and plastics materials, as well as education, service, and support for surgeons and hospital. The company's products portfolio includes artificial hip joints, including partial hip joints, joints for large trochanteric fracture, Moore hip prosthesis, and customized artificial hip joints for individual tumor patients; artificial knee joint, such as artificial knee replacement joint, revision knee replacement system, restricted artificial knee joints, and customized artificial knee joints for individual tumor patients; and spine products consisting of vertebral fixation devices. It Corporation also provides injury and other orthopedic products comprise orthopedic internal fixation, bone plates, bone nails, bone pins, and bone screws; and OEM products, such as orthopedic internal fixation. In addition, the imports and exports its products. It serves in Taiwan, Asia, the United States, Europe, Africa, and Australia. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan. United Orthopedic Corporation is a subsidiary of Chi-Yi Investment Co. Ltd.

4129A.TWO.summary: United Orthopedic Corporation engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of orthopedic implants and orthopedic surgical instruments. It offers orthopedic surgical equipment and its manufacturing equipment; and special metal and plastics materials, as well as education, service, and support for surgeons and hospital. The company's products portfolio includes artificial hip joints, including partial hip joints, joints for large trochanteric fracture, Moore hip prosthesis, and customized artificial hip joints for individual tumor patients; artificial knee joint, such as artificial knee replacement joint, revision knee replacement system, restricted artificial knee joints, and customized artificial knee joints for individual tumor patients; and spine products consisting of vertebral fixation devices. It Corporation also provides injury and other orthopedic products comprise orthopedic internal fixation, bone plates, bone nails, bone pins, and bone screws; and OEM products, such as orthopedic internal fixation. In addition, the imports and exports its products. It serves in Taiwan, Asia, the United States, Europe, Africa, and Australia. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan. United Orthopedic Corporation is a subsidiary of Chi-Yi Investment Co. Ltd.

4130.TWO.summary: Genovate Biotechnology Co., Ltd. operates as a specialty pharmaceutical company in Taiwan.
