It offers central nervous system drugs, cardiovascular system drugs, musculoskeletal system drugs, immune preparation drugs, anti-infective agents, anticancer drugs, anti-viral drugs, respiratory drugs, genitourinary system drugs, and gastrointestinal drugs. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

4131.TWO.summary: DR. Chip Biotechnology Incorporation designs, manufactures, and sells biochips and other related products. The company's products include food safety examination systems, human diagnosis arrays systems, agriculture examination systems, food examination arrays systems, and laboratory instruments, as well as DNA kits. It also offers laboratory planning, design, and other services. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

4133.TW.summary: Abnova (Taiwan) Corporation manufactures and sells various recombinant proteins and antibodies. It offers DNA and RNA, proteins/peptides, SARS-CoV/CoV-2,beads/dyes, lysates/slides, antibody pairs/kits, antibody and tissue arrays, in situ hybridization products, circulating rare cells, systems and automations, GMP and analyte specific reagents, and in vitro diagnostics. The company also provides MaxPab, monoclonal, polyclonal, recombinant, conjugate, secondary/tag, and IHC/pathology antibodies. In addition, the company's integrated solutions and services include gene synthesis and cytogenetics; peptide, protein expression, and conjugations; antibody production; and assay development services. Abnova (Taiwan) Corporation is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

4142.TW.summary: Adimmune Corporation manufactures and sells human vaccines in Taiwan. It offers AdimFlu-S, an influenza vaccine; tetanus toxoid alum precipitated products used for prevention of tetanus after injury; Japanese encephalitis vaccines; Trivalent and Tetravalent influenza vaccines; Influenza A (H1N1) virus monovalent vaccines; and Tuberculin, as well as contract manufacturing services. The company was formerly known as Kuo Kwang Serum and Vaccine Manufacture Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Adimmune Corporation in 2001. Adimmune Corporation was founded in 1965 and is based in Taichung City, Taiwan.

4147.TWO.summary: TaiMed Biologics Inc., a biotechnology company, develops health-care products. The company develops and markets TMB-355, a humanized monoclonal antibody intravenous infusion for the treatment of HIV-1 infection. It is also developing TMB-355, a humanized monoclonal antibody intramuscular injection, which is in Phase II clinical trial for treating HIV-1; TMB-355, humanized monoclonal antibody intravenous push that is in Phase II clinical trial for the treatment of HIV-1 infection; TMB-365, an anti-CD4 recombinant humanized monoclonal antibody, which is in Phase I clinical trial for treating HIV infections; TMB-Bispecific, a bispecific neutralizing antibody that is in Phase I clinical trial to treat HIV infections; and TMB-ADC, an antibodyÂdrug conjugate for treating HIV infection, as well as VRC07-523LS, a neutralizing HIV-1 antibody. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

4150.TWO.summary: Unicon Optical Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells contact lenses primarily for ODM/OEM market in Taiwan. The company offers disposable contact, coating design color, aspheric, and silicone lenses. It also exports its products to Japan, China, Germany, the Netherlands, Italy, Poland, Russia, Canada, India, South Africa, and Singapore. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

4151.TWO.summary: Strength Master Fitness Tech Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells fitness equipment in Taiwan. The company offers treadmills, exercise and recumbent bikes, and elliptical trainers. It also provides Interactive Health Partner, a medically-based system; and Fit Plus(Fit +) App and FitPlus(BLE) App, which moves various functions on treadmills and bike consoles to phones or tablets. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Changhua, Taiwan.

4152.TWO.summary: Taiwan Liposome Company, Ltd., a clinical-stage specialty pharmaceutical company, engages in the development and commercialization of nanomedicines that combine its proprietary lipid-assembled drug delivery platform with approved active pharmaceutical ingredients (APIs). The BioSeizer lipid formulation technology is designed to enable local sustained release and fast onset of APIs at the site of disease or injury with enhanced pharmacokinetic (PK) control by customization of lipid layers; and NanoX active drug loading technology enables the potential for reduced dosing frequency and enhanced distribution of liposome-encapsulated APIs to the desired site. Its lead product candidate is TLC599, an intraarticular injectable BioSeizer formulation of the API steroid dexamethasone sodium phosphate (DSP), which is in Phase III clinical trial for the treatment of knee osteoarthritis pain. The company's product candidates also comprise TLC590, a non-opioid BioSeizer formulation of the API ropivacaine that has completed Phase II clinical trial to treat post-surgical pain; TLC399, a multilamellar and multivesicular BioSeizer formulation of DSP, which is in Phase II clinical trial for ophthalmology indications; TLC178, an API that is in Phase I/II dose escalation trial to treat rhabdomyosarcoma; and TLC19 that is in Phase I clinical trial to treat COVID-19.Taiwan Liposome Company, Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

4157.TWO.summary: TaiGen Biopharmaceuticals Holdings Limited, a pharmaceutical company, develops novel therapeutics for infectious diseases and other indications worldwide. The company develops Taigexyn (Nemonoxacin), a non-fluorinated quinolone antibiotic for the treatment of bacterial infections. It is also developing Taigexyn for treating community-acquired pneumonia and diabetic foot infection; Burixafor, a stem cell mobilizer for stem cell transplantation and chemosenzitization; TG-1000, an influenza antiviral drug for treating influenza A, B; and Furaprevir, a hepatitis C virus protease inhibitor for the treatment of chronic hepatitis C. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

4160.TWO.summary: Genetics Generation Advancement Corp. provides genetic testing and informatics services in Taiwan, Asia, Europe, and the Americas. The company offers pre-implantation stage, prenatal stage, newborn medical examination, health management, reproductive medicine, obstetrics and gynecology, neonatology and pediatrics, allergy/immunology/rheumatology, gastroenterology and hepatology, oncology, cardiology, and medical research testing services, as well as counseling services for clinicians and patients to identify genetic risks, genetic testing options, interpret the implications of the test results, and help patients make informed healthcare decisions. It also provides bioinformatics and computational life sciences, materials sciences, laboratory informatics, and enterprise quality management system services. The company was formerly known as Genesis Genetics Asia Corp. and changed its name to Genetics Generation Advancement Corp. in February 2016. Genetics Generation Advancement Corp. was founded in 2008 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

4161.TWO.summary: Bioptik Technology Incorporation researches, develops, produces, and sells medical devices and reagents in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers EasyMate blood glucose monitoring systems; blood glucose/cholesterol/uric acid monitoring systems and its strips; and hyaluronic acid skin care products. It also provides skin care products and dietary supplements, as well as biodiesel products. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Zhunan, Taiwan.

4162.TWO.summary: PharmaEngine, Inc., a biopharmaceutical company, engages in the development of drugs and therapeutic drugs for treating cancer diseases in Taiwan and Europe. It is developing ONIVYDE for patients with gemcitabine-treated metastatic pancreatic cancer; PEP06, which is in Phase I stage for the treatment of cancer; and PEP07, an oral small molecule drug, which is in preclinical development stage to regulate DNA damage response. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

4163.TWO.summary: INTAI Technology Corporation manufactures and sells precision hardware products for the automotive, aerospace, precision hardware, medical device, and electronic communication industries in Taiwan and internationally. The company provides standard and customized precision fasteners. It also offers medical components for endoscopic minimally invasive surgery, breast biopsy device, and disposable and reusable device applications; and orthopedic implants, such as thoracolumbar sets, cervical sets, pedical screws, peek and titanium cages, trauma screws and plates, and surgical instruments. In addition, the company provides RF and microwave products. INTAI Technology Corporation was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

4167.TWO.summary: Savior Lifetec Corporation, a specialty injectable company, produces and supplies sterile APIs and finished dosage formulations. The company offers imipenem and cilastatin sodium, an antibacterial agent for intravenous infusion; and meropenem, a beta-lactamase resistant carbapenem antibiotic for parenteral administration. It also provides ertapenem, a form of carbapenem for use on gram-negative and gram-positive anaerobes and aerobic. The company's pipeline products include SLC-006 for prostate cancer endometriosis uterine leiomyoma; and sterile paliperidone palmitate API for the treatment of schizophrenia. Savior Lifetec Corporation was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Miaoli County, Taiwan.

4168.TWO.summary: GlycoNex Incorporation develops cancer drugs using glycosphingolipid antigen and human monoclonal antibody technologies in Taiwan. Its technology platform enables glycosphingolipid antigen production and identification; monoclonal antibody production; cancer drug screening; stable cell line production for monoclonal antibody; and pharmacology/pharmacokinetics assessment. The company offers GNX102, a humanized antibody for cancer-specific glycan prevalent on several types of cancer cells, such as gastric, colon, and pancreatic cancer, as well as develops bi-specific antibody generate armed T-cells targeting glycan antigens on cancer cells. GlycoNex Incorporation was founded in 2001 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

4171.TWO.summary: GeneReach Biotechnology Corp. develops, manufactures, and markets products for applied nucleic acid detection technology primarily in Taiwan. The company offers pathogen detection platforms, including equipment and reagents; and animal use medicines, biotechnology services, medical materials and equipment, and precision instruments. Its products are used in aquaculture, agriculture, food, companion animal, livestock, and human health industries. The company also provides polymerase chain reaction training programs, molecular diagnostic technical solutions, laboratory installation services, OEM/ODM contract manufacturing services, and research collaboration services. GeneReach Biotechnology Corp. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

4172.TWO.summary: InnoPharmax Inc., a specialty pharmaceutical company, develops and commercializes products for the treatment of infectious diseases, immunology, oncology, and other specialties in Taiwan. The company offers anti-infection agents, including Bestnem, an imipenem and cilastatin sodium solution that is used intravenous in the treatment of various infections caused by susceptible organisms, such as lower respiratory tract, skin and skin structure, intra-abdominal, gynecologic, or bone and joint infections; and various complicated or uncomplicated urinary tract infections, septicemia, or endocarditis caused by susceptible organisms. It also provides gadopentetate dimeglumine, a contrast medium for magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) of the body after intravenous administration; and gadodiamide, a contrast medium for cranial and spinal MRI, as well as for general MRI of the body after intravenous administration. In addition, the company offers oncology agents comprising Innomustine for the treatment of hodgkin's disease, non-hodgkin's lymphoma, and plasmocytoma, as well as chronic lymphocytic leukemia and breast cancer; and immunological agents that include Cyclosporine A, an immuno-suppresant with a low aqueous solubility used for the inhibition of graft rejection in organ transplant recipients, as well as inpheno tablets. Further, it is developing oncology, cardiovascular, CNS, urology, and contrast agents, as well as agents for metabolic disorders and drugs for rare diseases. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan. InnoPharmax Inc. is a subsidiary of Synmosa Biopharma Corporation.

4173.TWO.summary: Arich Enterprise Co., Ltd. provides medical sales and promotion, and logistics services in Taiwan. It promotes prescription drugs and over the counter products in drug stores; and medicines to specific specialties in hospitals, clinics, and drug stores. The company also conducts public seminars, promotional activities, long-term educational program, RTD meetings, in-store displays, anti-counterfeit activities, and medical seminars; and offers channel coverage, inventory control system, order follow-up techniques, and market research analysis. Further, the company offers various supply chain services, including international bond, registration, hospital pricing service, warehouse management, transportation and distribution, account receivable management, information linkage, and drug price submission; logistics services consisting of inventory control, quality control procedure, GMP, and bonded warehouse storage; and value-added services, such as re-labeling, temperature-controlled delivery, handling of returned goods/disposable items, batch-tracking management, customer complaints handling, and delivery systems. The company serves medical centers, area hospitals, district hospitals, and general practitioners, as well as chain stores and hyper markets, drug stores, and wholesalers. Arich Enterprise Co., Ltd. was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

4174.TWO.summary: OBI Pharma, Inc., a bio-pharma company, develops and licenses therapeutic agents for unmet medical needs against cancer in Taiwan. It offers Adagloxad Simolenin (OBI-822), a breast cancer active immunity anti-cancer drug, which is in Phase III for generating antibody against tumor carbohydrate antigen Globo H; OBI-833, an immunity anti-cancer drug, which completed Phase I clinical trial for treating and tracking lung cancer; OBI-866 SSEA-4, an active immuno-oncology drug; OBI-888, a passive immunotherapy monoclonal antibody, which is under Phase I/II human clinical trial targeting Globo H; OBI-999, an antibody drug conjugate that is in Phase II human clinical trial; OBI-898 SSEA4, a passive immunity monoclonal antibody that is in preclinical stage; OBI-998 SSEA4,an antibody small molecule drug complex, which targets toxic drugs to malignant tumors; OBI-3424, a micromolecule chemotherapy prodrug that is in Phase I clinical trial; and OBI-858, a clostridium botulinum toxin. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

4175.TWO.summary: MedFirst Healthcare Services, Inc. engages in the sale of medical supplies in Taiwan and China. It offers diabetes care, respiratory care, incontinence care, wound dressing, stoma care, pain care, protective gear, home healthcare, and special nutrition products, as well as medical instruments. The company also offers healthcare products consist of beauty care, makeup, and food products, as well as daily supplies and medical books; biomedical products, including health food and drugs; and management consultancy services. In addition, it operates as a contractor for medical supply sales department of hospitals; and agent for foreign medical supplies brand. Further, the company is involved in the management of hospital shopping malls. It sells products through its retail stores and online. MedFirst Healthcare Services, Inc. was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

4188.TWO.summary: AmCad BioMed Corporation develops computer-assisted detection and diagnosis (CAD) software devices primarily in Taiwan. Its products include AmCAD-UT Detection, a CAD device for ultrasound images of thyroid nodules; and AmCAD-UO, a solution for obstructive sleep apnea detection. The company is also developing AmCAD-CA, a software designed for analyzing digital cytological images; AmCAD-US, a software device for visualizing and quantifying statistical distributions of backscattered signals echoed by tissue compositions in the body from FDA-cleared ultrasound systems; and AmCAD-UV, a software device that is used for quantifying and classifying the ultrasonic color intensity data acquired from FDA-cleared ultrasound systems and displaying the noise-reduced color-coded pulsatile signals. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

4191.TWO.summary: Pharmadax Inc. engages in the pharmaceutical research and development business in Taiwan, the Unites States, China, and internationally. It primarily focuses on the development of oral solid controlled-release technology pellets. The company offers Glyburide, Quetiapine Fumarate ER, and Metoprolol Succinate ER tablets, as well as contract development and/or contract manufacturing services for solid orals. It provides its products for a range of therapeutic areas, including schizophrenia, hypertension, diabetes, cold, Parkinson's disease, ADHD, chronic hepatitis, overactive bladder, and muscle relaxant. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

4192.TWO.summary: SynCore Biotechnology Co.,Ltd, a biopharmaceutical company, engages in the research and development, manufacture, and marketing of drugs in the areas of oncology, ophthalmology, dermatology, and infectious diseases in Taiwan and China. The company offers SB03-Veregen, an ointment for the treatment of patients with external genital and perianal warts; and distributes cameras under the epiCam name that is used in recording the progress of ophthalmology diseases. It is also involved in the development of SB01, an injectable anti-cancer new ingredient (NCE) that is in Phase II clinical trial for the treatment of head and neck cancer; SB02, an anti-cancer NCE, which is in Phase I clinical trial for use in the treatment of stomach cancer; SB04 that is in Phase II/III clinical trials for the treatment of patients with dry age-related macular degeneration; and SB05, a composition of cytostatic drug paclitaxel combined with neutral and positive lipids, which is in Phase III clinical trial for the treatment of patients with triple negative breast cancer and pancreatic cancer. The company has partnerships with Medigene AG; MacuCLEAR Inc.; Y-YBAR; Epipole Ltd.; Sinphar Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd.; and The National Health Research Institutes. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Yilan, Taiwan. SynCore Biotechnology Co.,Ltd is a subsidiary of Sinphar Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd.

4194.TWO.summary: Holy Stone Healthcare Co., Ltd. engages in the development of therapeutics in Taiwan. The company offers RenehaVis, a product designed to relive pain and stiffness of the knee joint; SportVis, a treatment to relive the pain and optimize the recovery of tendon and ligament injuries; TRUD, a treatment that allows mucosal tissue to heal naturally and reduces the symptoms of ulcerative colitis; and GAF, a treatment for anal mucosal lesions. It is also developing IBD98-M, which is in Phase IIa clinical trials for the treatment of inflammatory bowel diseases; and CA102N, which is in Phase I clinical trials for the treatment of colorectal cancer. In addition, it also develops ND108E for the treatment of alzheimer's disease; and CA102L, a novel and small molecule conjugated therapeutic agent to treat lymphoma and multiple myeloma. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan. Holy Stone Healthcare Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Holy Stone Enterprise.

4197.TWO.summary: Visgeneer Inc., a biotech company, develops and produces biomedical products in the fields of medical device, cosmetics/skin care, bacterial fermentation, and cancer gene identification. The company offers blood glucose and ketone, and uric acid monitoring systems. It also provides multi-active cream gels, wrinkle reducing eye creams, hydro complete emulsions, revitalizing essences, toning lotions, amino acid cleansing creams, multi-perfection firming gel creams, aqua emulsions, herbal gel lotions, anti- aging creams, brightening serums, revitalizing lotions, masks, UV shield creams, dark spot corrector pearl whitening cream, anti-acne complexes, glucosamine creams, essences, hyaluronic acid and intensive whitening essences, rejuvenating essence creams, and anti-aging time complex capsules under Coresence name. Visgeneer Inc. is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

4205.TWO.short_name: CHUNG HWA FOOD INDUSTRIAL CO LT
4205.TWO.long_name: Chung Hwa Food Industrial Co., Ltd.
4205.TWO.summary: Chung Hwa Food Industrial Co., Ltd. produces and sells soybean processed foods in Taiwan. It offers tofu products, desserts, and hot pot ingredients. The company sells its products through a network of dealers. It also exports its products to Hong Kong. The company was formerly known as Herng Yih Food Industrial Co Ltd and changed its name to Chung Hwa Food Industrial Co., Ltd. in July 2013. Chung Hwa Food Industrial Co., Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

4207.TWO.summary: Taiwan Fructose Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells syrup products in Taiwan. The company's products comprise fructose, maltose, isomalto-oligo saccharides, and maltodextrin syrups, as well as non-dairy creamers, vegetable oil powder, dextrose, and sorbitol. Its products are used in a range of applications, including beverages, dairy products, iced products, desserts, bakery food, soy sauces, health foods, candy, jams and jellies, sachima, bean fillings, chewing gums, candied fruits, biscuits, coffee, milk tea, instant drinks, toothpaste, cleaning and makeup products, and interface activators. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

4304.TWO.summary: SunVic Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of EMI shielding laminate and flexible laminated packaging materials in Taiwan. It offers wire and cable materials, including shielding tapes; foil free edge tapes; and polyester, cotton paper, non-woven, and foam polypropylene strips. The company also provides specialized composite films, such as zipper patches; and other films, as well as vacuum-sealed and thermo-forming, and medical packaging bags. In addition, it offers EMI shielding and ESD packaging materials; industrial composite films; and other tapes. The company was formerly known as Taipei Lamination Industries Inc. and changed its name to SunVic Technology Co., Ltd. in April 2007. SunVic Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

4305.TWO.summary: Shih-Kuen Plastics Co., Ltd. produces and supplies plastic sheets. The company offers double polished PVC sheets, including super clear, normal clear, and transparent colored; textured embossing PVC sheet, such as textured embossing, translucent textured, and semi-transparent textured; super clear laminated and colored laminated PVC sheets; and UV stabilized outdoor PVC sheets; cold crack resistant PVC sheeting; and fire flame retardant PVC sheets. Its products are used in home and office supplies, construction and industrial, outdoor PVC waterproof covers, and medical applications. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Tainan City, Taiwan.

4306.TW.summary: Yem Chio Co., Ltd. engages in the BOPP film, adhesive tape, packaging material, construction, and hotel businesses worldwide. The company offers anti fog, heat sealable, matt, pearlized cavitated, and plain BOPP films; adhesive tapes, such as OPP packaging, super clear packaging, colored packing, and printing tapes, as well as double-sided, stationery, PVC, masking, cloth, aluminum foil, floral, kraft paper tapes; and packaging materials under the Master Package brand. It is also involved in the land development, building construction, real estate, and hotel management businesses, as well as operates hotels. The company was founded in 1977 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

4401.TWO.long_name: Toung Loong Textile MFG. Co., LTD.
4401.TWO.summary: Toung Loong Textile MFG. Co., LTD. operates as a textile manufacturing company in Taiwan. It develops and produces air and draw textured, shape control twist, alpha yarn, and air textured covered yarns, as well as functional synthetic yarn dyes and sewing threads. The company was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

4416.TWO.summary: Shanyuan Co., Ltd. engages in the construction of residential buildings in Taiwan. It also engages in the rental of office buildings and storefronts, and other properties. The company was formerly known as Fu Chan Industrial Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shanyuan Co., Ltd. in January 2008. The company was founded in 1979 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

4417.TWO.long_name: King Chou Marine Technology Co., Ltd.
4417.TWO.summary: King Chou Marine Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells netting products for the marine industries under the King Net brand name worldwide. The company offers purse seine, trawl, Danish seine, gill and trammel, trap, and set nets; long line, twine, and rope products; marine hardware products, such as cable clamps, purse rings, snap rings, steel triangles, choker hooks, alloy galv. connecting links, strong C-rings, ring scoopers, splice needles, Samson splicing kits, chains, floats, swivels, and hooks; fish farming and cage nets; and other nets, such as safety, flower, camouflage, and melon nets. It also provides a range of sports nets for soccer, volleyball, baseball, and tennis. The company was formerly known as King Chou Fish Net Mfg. Co., Ltd. and changed its name to King Chou Marine Technology Co., Ltd. in 2002. King Chou Marine Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

4419.TWO.summary: Ensure Global Corp., Ltd. manufactures and sells spun-like fabrics and yarns in Taiwan. The company offers air and draw textured yarns; knitted fabrics; and mirror surface wiping clothes. It also provides cotton-like fabric and microfiber products. In addition, the company offers grating, twill, and interweaving products. Further, it provides wind breakers, shirts, knitting sports wears, casual pants, and durable towels. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Changhua, Taiwan.

4420.TWO.long_name: Kwang Ming Silk Mill Co., Ltd.
4420.TWO.summary: Kwang Ming Silk Mill Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of polyester processing yarn. The company offers composite fabrics, special functionality fabrics, synthetic fiber fabrics, and general garments materials, as well as man-made fiber products. It is also involved in real estate leasing and trading business. The company's products are used for fashion clothing, environmental protection functional fabrics, outdoor leisure fabrics, and home decoration, as well as cloth for shoe materials. The company is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

4426.TW.summary: Li Cheng Enterprise Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells 3D spacer fabrics worldwide. Its products are used in shoe materials, such as bags, hats, underwear bras, general garments, mattresses, sports Equipment, medical, and automotive materials, etc. The company also provides polyester and nylon monofilaments; and other materials, such as PP and others. Li Cheng Enterprise Co., Ltd. founded 1992 and is based in Douliu, Taiwan.

4429.TWO.summary: GFun Industrial Corporation manufactures and sells coated and laminated functional fabrics in Taiwan. It offers various functional membranes and fabrics; and develops various types of wick, windproof, water-repellent, anti-UV, anti-bacterial, and abrasion-resistant functional fabrics. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

4430.TWO.summary: Yao I Fabric Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells filament and spun products in Taiwan and internationally. Its products include various kinds of fishing, tennis, badminton racket, and cutting lines; industrial wires, mesh cloth chairs, pet mats, breathable beds, knitted cotton car seats, car seats with blankets, and automotive sound-absorbing cotton materials; and environmentally friendly stretch cotton, firewood, stretch cotton, and electronic supplies blankets, as well as shoes with cotton insulation class, and bedding and sofa with a stretch cotton. The company was founded in 1973 and is based in Changhua, Taiwan.

4431.TWO.summary: Mytrex Health Technologies, Inc. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells non-woven materials and special medical supplies in Taiwan and internationally. It provides electrostatic filtration materials for medical and industrial mask media, and other filtration applications; and composite nonwoven products for coolant and air filter, vacuum filter bag, HEPA and cabin filter, water filtration compound material applications. The company also offers thermal insulation products for glove, sock, shoe, hat, clothing material, and mask insulation material applications; and linen laundry and leasing, logistic, and medical supplies for hospitals. Mytrex Health Technologies, Inc. was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

4432.TWO.summary: Hakers Enterprise Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and markets garments and other related textile products in Taiwan and internationally. It offers sportswear products, including swim trunks, shorts, jackets, and trousers. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

4433.TWO.summary: Singtex Industrial Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, and sale of eco-friendly functional textile products in Taiwan. It offers functional fabrics; and functional, specialty, and comfort yarns. The company was founded in 1989 is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

4438.TW.summary: Quang Viet Enterprise Co., Ltd. manufactures and supplies garments for outdoor sports in Taiwan and internationally. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

4506.TWO.summary: Golden Friends Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells elevators, escalators, and generators in Taiwan. It operates in three segments: Sales, Maintenance, and GFC Shanghai. The company offers passenger, high speed, and home elevators, as well as escalators/moving walks and pneumatic vacuum elevators. It is also involved in sale and manufacture of elevators and parts; sale of vacuum pneumatic shuttle; and sale and installation of diesel generators. The company's products are used in offices and factories, shopping malls, hotels, mansions, hospitals, public constructions, and institutes projects. Golden Friends Corporation was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan. Golden Friends Corporation is a subsidiary of Changjiang Property Co., Ltd.

4510.TWO.summary: Kao Fong Machinery Co., Ltd operates in the mold processing industry in Taiwan and internationally. It offers double column, vertical, horizontal, high speed double column, moving cross rail double column, and gantry machining centers, as well as drilling and tapping machining centers. The company was formerly known as Kao Fong Iron Factory and changed its name to Kao Fong Machinery Co., Ltd. in 1972. Kao Fong Machinery Co., Ltd was founded in 1968 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan. Kao Fong Machinery Co., Ltd is a subsidiary of Hota Industrial Mfg. Co., Ltd.

4523.TWO.summary: Taiwan Calsonic Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells car air conditioning products, electronics, and other products in Taiwan. The company offers car air conditioning systems, such as unified central panels, air conditioning controllers, driver alert systems, night vision systems, body control modules, condensers, evaporators, blowers, motors, inter coolers, water cooled radiators, and chip coolers; and engineering products, including vacuum, air, and no fuse breakers, as well as electromagnetic contractors, inverters, programmable controllers, energy saving systems, robots, control devices, and thin film extension products. It also provides power distribution equipment and industry automatic control products, as well as industrial robot/electronic process equipment. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

4526.TW.summary: Tongtai Machine & Tool Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells machines worldwide. The company offers machine tools, such as vertical machining, 5-axis machining, tapping, horizontal machining, 5-axis horizontal machining, multi-tasking turning, and ultrasonic assisted machining centers, as well as boring and milling machines, horizontal and vertical CNC lathes, and wheel machines; and PCB machines, including drilling and routing machines. It also provides laser drilling and marking machines; and additive manufacturing machines consisting of metal powder direct energy deposition and subtractive manufacturing, metal powder bed fusion, and sand binder jetting machines. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

4527.TWO.long_name: Kuen Ling Machinery Refrigerating Co., Ltd.
4527.TWO.summary: Kuen Ling Machinery Refrigerating Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells ice water mainframes and air-conditioning equipment in Taiwan and internationally. Its products include water cooled and air-cooled ice water, computer room box, hot and cold water, and condenser automatic cleaning machines; ice storage tanks; vacuum dryers; refrigeration and open screw compressor units; cooling fans and direct expansion air conditioners; and direct expansion inverter air conditioning units; and ice water cooler and condensers. The company also offers OEM and ODM services for air-conditioning equipment manufacturers. Its products are used in office buildings, commercial buildings, hospitals, and schools. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

4528.TWO.long_name: Chian Hsing Forging Industrial Co., Ltd.
4528.TWO.summary: Chian Hsing Forging Industrial Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells various forged products in Taiwan. Its forged products include hardware, bicycle, motorbike, automobile, and track vehicle parts, as well as industrial engineering vehicle components and other products. The company offers auto parts comprising C.V. joints and driving elements of front wheel; inner races; inner race crosses; bearing cups, pistons, and housings; transmission parts; transmission bearing spang products; transmission joint gears; mandrils, rear axis, and core axis of the generator; air conditioning belt pulleys; bevel gears; magnetic poles and driving gears; motor brake parts; aluminum alloy forging parts that include ammonia cans for auto air-conditioners; flange bases; and pipes, excavator teethes, and tubes. It also provides assorted hardware parts, including impactors, saddles, pneumatic toolings, tone hole parts, and rod couplings, as well as parts of sports goods, which include cranks, high-pressure joints, high-tension bolts/nuts, alloy bearing forgings, and delivering tube forgings. In addition, the company offers motorcycle parts, such as gear shafts, gear blanks, start gears, transmission shafts, and ammonia cans for auto air-conditioners; starting gear and clutch gear forged work products; shaft and axle parts; and clutches, tube yokes, and chain gears. Further, it provides rail parts, which comprise tie plates. The company was formerly known as Hsieh Hsing Iron Factory and changed its name to Chian Hsing Forging Industrial Co., Ltd. in 1980. Chian Hsing Forging Industrial Co., Ltd. was founded in 1971 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

4530.TWO.summary: Honyi International Company Limited manufactures and sells plastic injection molds. The company offers precision thermoplastic injection molds for use in various applications, including automotive, home appliances, computer, consumers, communication, electronics, etc. It also provides various enclosure manufacturing services, such as tooling fabrication, injection molding, sheet metal stamping, secondary post-molding process, and final assembly services in automotive, home appliance, and information tech. applications. Honyi International Company Limited was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

4532.TW.summary: Rechi Precision Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and sells compressors in Taiwan and internationally. It offers inverter and constant-speed rotary compressors; BLDC motors; inverter controllers; and heat pump water heaters. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

4533.TWO.long_name: Shieh Yih Machinery Industry Co., Ltd.
4533.TWO.summary: Shieh Yih Machinery Industry Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells mechanical press equipment. The company offers automation press production line solutions; servo presses; straight side mechanical presses; link mechanical presses; special application presses; and C frame and solid frame mechanical presses. It serves clients in Europe, the United States, Thailand, and Mexico. The company was formerly known as Shieh Yih Chuang Ironworks Co. and changed its name to Shieh Yih Machinery Industry Co., Ltd. in 1982. Shieh Yih Machinery Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

4535.TWO.summary: Fine Blanking & Tool Co., Ltd. produces and sells car and motorcycle parts in Taiwan. The company's primary products include precision stamping products, motorcycle and bicycle disc brakes, motorcycle start gears, car seat recliners, car brake parts, automotive safety shackles, and steam locomotive seats. It also provides tubes, seat belt reels, tongues, tappet and shims, frames for airbag, hand brakes, blanking gears, sectors and latches, slide stand, foot support and rest, saddles, handle bar and clamps, triple clamps, ABS phonic wheels, slope plates, bicycle parts, and engine gears and other high precision metal components. In addition, the company offers clutch and gas brake pedal, RAEV, push and pull mechanism, steering assembly, and rack and pinion, as well as medical equipment, sporting goods, and computer parts. Fine Blanking & Tool Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is based in Changhua, Taiwan.

4536.TW.summary: Topkey Corporation designs, develops, and manufactures medical components, aviation seatbacks, and bike components in Taiwan. The company offers bicycle frame sets and other accessories; safety products, including helmets; and carbon composite rackets and tennis rackets. It also provides manufacture aircraft composite parts; and medical parts, such It as composite CT tables and accessories, as well as thermoplastic resin and fiber reinforced thermoplastic products. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in Taichung City, Taiwan.

4537.TWO.long_name: Shuz Tung Machinery Industrial Co., Ltd.
4537.TWO.summary: Shuz Tung Machinery Industrial Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells machinery and automation equipment in Taiwan and China. The company provides pipe/tube benders, such as auto, semi-auto, and special customer pipe benders; bicycle manufacture equipment, which include pre-preparations, fork preparations, front fork processes, frame assembling's, wheel/rim makings, bike assembling's, EN testers, handlebar processes, and fixtures; and end forming machinery, such as pipe shape forming, pipe end forming, and pipe end processing machines. It also offers auto integration that include intelligent welding robots, ATV welding robot sets, intelligent handling robots, auto saddle products, and laser cuttings; hydroforming OEM for application in bicycle, gardening, lighting, transportation, and bath industries; laser welding solution; and 3D laser cutting machine. Shuz Tung Machinery Industrial Co., Ltd. was founded in 1978 and is based in Taichung City, Taiwan.

4538.TWO.summary: WINSON Machinery Co., LTD. manufactures and sells machine tool, wind power, ductile iron, and grey iron castings in Taiwan. Its products include beds for grinding M/C, heads for vertical milling M/C, beds for milling M/C, beams for vertical milling M/C, tables for double-column milling M/C, beds for slant lathe, beds for lathe M/C, beds for vertical lathe, and beds for CNC lathe, as well as beams, columns, tables, and beds. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in Changhua, Taiwan.

4541.TWO.summary: Magnate Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells aerospace components and assemblies in Taiwan. The company offers landing gears, aerospace comprehensives, engine casings, and heat exchangers. It also provides other precision machinery components and assemblies, and food industry machinery. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Kaohsiung City, Taiwan.

4543.TWO.summary: Man Zai Industrial Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells air-conditioner components for vehicles worldwide. The company offers auto air-con modules, including condenser units, evaporator units, and heater cores; automobile and motorcycle aluminum radiators for cooling systems, such as radiator units and oil coolers; and thermal-electric cooling modules comprising thermal modules for CPU, thermal syphon modules, and liquid cooling modules, as well as water-cooled modules for use in CPU, VGA, LED, and auto-electric cooling modules. It also provides aluminum extrusion products that include fittings/brackets/pipes, racket frames, OPC drums, computer heat sinks, and bicycle frames; and air-con and refrigeration products. Man Zai Industrial Co., Ltd. was founded in 1984 and is based in Tainan, Taiwan.

4546.TWO.summary: Chaheng Precision Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells aero-engine components in Taiwan. The company offers aero-engine fan blades, compressor and combustor assemblies, and OGV diffusers; and toles, oil collectors, flow dividers, rings, thermy off plates, cones, inner barrels, fans, and dome combustion chamber baffles. It also provides aero-engine assemblies and other products, including bracket, compressor actuation linkage assy, fan bootstrap bracket, seal, manifold-low pressure turbine and machining bracket, probe, and retaining seal, as well as stationary-AIR, AFT, BRG, and 4B pressure seal. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

4549.TWO.summary: FineTek Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells process automation, flow metering, wireless communication technology, and tank gauging systems in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers liquid and solid point switches; liquid and solid level transmitters; flow measurement switches and transmitters; pressure level transmitters and switches; temperature transmitters and thermocouples; and grain monitoring systems, including temperature and level monitoring transmitters, multi-point temperature sensors, materials management systems, and remote control units. It also provides wireless products, such as hublinks, coordinators, routers, and end devices; pneumatic products comprising air hammers, pneumatic vibrators, diaphragm valves, dust collector systems, and air pads; safety products, such as isolated safety barriers, speed monitors, conveyer belt misalignment switches, and safety cable pull switches. In addition, the company offers digital controllers/digital meters consisting of digital display panel meters and temperature controllers. Its products and solutions are used in various industries, including cement, hydraulic, petrochemical, food and beverage, chemical, water and wastewater treatment, electronics, power generation, construction, maritime, and steel industries. FineTek Co., Ltd. was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

4551.TW.summary: Global PMX Co., Ltd. manufactures, processes, and sells precision metal components for automotive products, hard disk drives, medical equipment, and various industrial products primarily in the United States, Mainland China, and Japan It offers automotive brake safety systems and precision parts, fuel injection systems, steering systems, thermos regulator systems, medical devices and precision parts, semiconductor equipment flow controller systems, cloud and hard disk precision parts, industrial and optical products, precision metal parts, etc. The company provides precision die, mold standard parts, construction hardware, plumbing products, heating products, hardware components, electronic components, digital cameras, precision dies, and mold standard parts. In addition, it offers computer hardware and software products; and engages in various activities, including industrial plastic products manufacturing, other non-metal products manufacturing, iron and steel casting, iron and steel forging, steel reworks, aluminum reworks, etc. Global PMX Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

4553.TWO.summary: ALFOT Technologies Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells OEM aluminum forging products primarily in Taiwan. The company offers automotive aluminum forging parts, including brackets, control arms, suspension arms, pistons, etc. for use in suspension and cushion systems in car chassis, as well as in engine systems; and motorcycle aluminum forging parts, such as connectors, handgrips, driving arms, pistons, etc. that are used in the body structure of motorcycles, steering systems, and engine systems. It also provides other aluminum forging parts comprising storz, check handgrip, bundle, spray gun, etc. for use in fire-fighting equipment, industrial equipment, machinery industry, hand tool industry, and bicycle industry. ALFOT Technologies Co., Ltd. was founded in 1983 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

4555.TW.summary: TAIWAN CHELIC Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells pneumatic and electric actuator automation components in Taiwan and internationally. The company provides air source units; control valves; miniature, standard, stopper, dual rod, compact, slide table, guide, rod less, clamp, and rotary cylinders; grippers; vacuum equipment; and fitting/auxiliary equipment. It also offers accessories for pressure switches and sensing components. The company's products are used in production facilities, inspection machines, packing machines, forming machines, repairmen equipment, and factory automation applications. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

4556.TWO.summary: Bright Sheland International Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, markets, and sells industrial filtration and separation systems under the Filtrafine brand in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers melt-blown, wound-fine, activated carbon, membrane, high flow, and glass fiber filter cartridges, as well as pleated cartridges; and plastic-type, single round, single-bag, multi-bag, sanitary, high flow, and multi-round filter housings. It also provides filter bags and bag filter housings; modular bag housing skids; and UV disinfection and TOC reduction units, and spare parts, as well as technical support and after-sales services. The company serves chemical processing, microelectronics industry, oil and gas filtration, water treatment, food and beverage industry, and pharmaceutical industry sectors. Bright Sheland International Co., Ltd. was founded in 1985 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

4557.TW.summary: Yusin Holding Corp. develops, manufactures, processes, trades, and sells vehicle's brake systems in Asia, North America, Central and South America, Europe, and internationally. Its products include brake master cylinders, brake cylinders, clutch master cylinders, clutch cylinders, brake calipers, boosters, brake pads, and other related components for the automobile's brake system. The company also manufactures and sells various vehicles parts, as well as involved in the general investment activities. Yusin Holding Corp. was founded in 1992 and is based in Chiayi, Taiwan.

4558.TWO.summary: ALFORMER Industrial Co., Ltd. produces and processes aluminum products in Taiwan. Its products include aluminum and industrial extrusions, aluminum electrolysis (anode treatment), aluminum doors and windows, airtight windows, aluminum curtain walls, solar panels, frames and brackets, building materials, greenhouse project, CNC milling, and forging, as well as solar energy engineering products. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Changhua City, Taiwan.

4561.TWO.summary: Kenturn Nano. Tec. Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, fabricates, and markets machine tool spindles in Taiwan. It offers CNC machining center, tapping center, and direct and gear drive spindles; turning center spindles, which includes belt drive-horizontal and vertical spindles; and CNC internal and external spindles. The company also provides square, ball nose, and corner radius end mills; special cutting tools; and spindle repair service. Its products are used in aerospace, automotive, locomotive, biotechnology, woodworking machines, shipbuilding, medical equipment, electronic semiconductor manufacturing, and IT industries under the KENTURN brand name. The company also exports its products. Kenturn Nano. Tec. Co., Ltd. was founded in 1983 and is based in Changhua, Taiwan.

4563.TWO.summary: Quaser Machine Tools, Inc. manufactures and sells machine tools in Europe, Asia, North America, South America, Africa, and Oceania. It offers vertical, 5-axis mill-turn, pallet, horizontal, and multi face 5 axes M/C machine tools, as well as FMC series products. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Taichung City, Taiwan.

4566.TW.summary: GLOBAL TEK FABRICATION CO., Ltd. manufactures and sells precision parts and subassemblies. It offers products for manufacturers of airbag inflators, steering systems, engines renovation systems, EGRs, turbochargers, DCTs, belt tension systems, assembly cam shaft systems, AEBs, ELSDs, transmission system components, etc., as well as jack heads, oil servers, and heat exchange systems. The company also provides products for use in various industrial applications, including industrial instrumentation, wafer fab equipment, bicycles, and aviation industry. It operates in Asia, the United States, Europe, Canada, Mexico, South America, Brazil, and internationally. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

4568.TWO.summary: Koge Micro Tech Co., Ltd. designs, produces, and sells various precision pumps and valves worldwide. The company offers air, vacuum, water, gear, and electromagnetic pumps; and one, two, and three-way, as well as combined and linearÂtype solenoid valves. It also provides rotary diaphragm, diaphragm, air linear, piezoelectric, and centrifugal pumps. In addition, the company offers OEM/ODM services. Its products are used in fuel cell, energy and environment, environmental monitoring, detection analysis, medical devices, automotive products, healthcare equipment, beauty care apparatus, and household appliance fields. Koge Micro Tech Co., Ltd. was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

4572.TW.summary: Drewloong Precision, Inc. produces and sells aero structural and engine parts, landing gear parts, and special tools to aircraft manufacturers. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung City, Taiwan.

4575.TWO.summary: Chumpower Machinery Corp. manufactures PET blow molding molding machines in Taiwan and internationally. The company's products are used in various application, such as mineral water, carbonated beverages, seasonings, tea, fruit juice, distilled water, alcoholic beverages, cooking oil, cleaning agents, cosmetics, fizzy drinks, cosmetic cleanser, detergents, tennis ball cans, medicine bottles, heat-resisting bottles etc. The company was founded in 1981 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

4576.TW.summary: Hiwin Mikrosystem Corp. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells components, systems, and equipment for linear motion and control system in Taiwan. The company offers controllers and drives, servo and linear actuators, positioning measurement systems, stepping/servo linear motors, linear motor stages, torque motors and rotary tables, direct drive motors, rotary motors, and robots. It provides its products for use in semiconductor, optical component manufacturing, automation, medicare and healthcare, and rehabilitation equipment, as well as transportation applications. The company also sells its products in Germany, Japan, the United States, Italy, Switzerland, the Czech Republic, France, and Israel. Hiwin Mikrosystem Corp. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

4577.TWO.summary: Ofuna Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and distributes industrial machinery and equipment in Taiwan. It produces drilling machines, routing machines, and spindles. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

4578.TWO.summary: Sogotec Precision Co., Ltd. develops and manufactures CNC machines in Taiwan. It offers printed circuit board (PCB) routing machines, PCB drilling machines, laser application machines, and automation machines. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

4580.TWO.summary: Value Valves Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, design, manufacture, inspection, and marketing of valves in Taiwan. The company offers butterfly, check, damper, ball, globe, gate, and customized valves. Its products are used in petroleum and petrochemical products, steel, shipbuilding, energy, water treatment, paper, air-conditioning, electronic, and other industrial fields. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

4582.TWO.summary: Hengs Technology Co., Ltd. provides solar monitoring system integration and related products in Taiwan. The company's design products include solar pumps, RSK systems, off-grid solar power system kits, solar outdoor lightings, and solar mounting racks; and distributed products comprise PV modules, charge controllers, inverters, batteries, solar surge arresters, and wind turbines. It also markets related solar power products, as well as markets and services industry and precision instruments; and offers warranty services. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Tainan City, Taiwan.

4609.TWO.summary: Airlux Electrical Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells electrical appliances in China and internationally. The company offers stand mixers, table blenders, hand blenders, cooking machines, and juice extractors, as well as electric blankets and food processors. Airlux Electrical Co., Ltd. was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

4706.TWO.summary: Tah Kong Chemical Industrial Corporation manufactures, processes, and sells paints, pigments and intermediates in Taiwan, Southeast Asia, Japan, China, the United States, and Australia. The company offers PVC, PU, and polyolefin processed pigments. It also provides aqueous pigment dispersions and UV curable products; and organic pigments, which are used in ink, plastic, rubber, fiber, paint, stationery, etc. In addition, the company offers functional masterbatch that includes non-halogen flame retardant TPU compound, TPU anti-blocking and lubricant masterbatch, TPU fogging agent masterbatch, black electric conductive PE masterbatch, TPA weather resistant PE functional masterbatch, and anti-microbial PE masterbatch. Tah Kong Chemical Industrial Corporation was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

4712.TWO.summary: Nan Tsan Co., Ltd, a technology company, develops intelligent robots and artificial intelligence in Taiwan. It is also involved in the production of pigments. The company focuses on the development of 5G and IoT smart home solutions. Nan Tsan Co., Ltd was founded in 1974 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

4716.TWO.summary: Daily Polymer Corp. manufactures and sells synthetic resins in Taiwan. It offers polymer materials, including solvent and water based resins for paints, unsaturated polyester resins, and paint additives; and UV curing pressure sensitive adhesives. The company also provides photo-electronic materials, such as liquid crystals and alignment materials; and conductive polymers. It also exports its products to Southeast and Middle Asia, India, Japan, Africa, and Hong Kong. Daily Polymer Corp. was founded in 1970 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

4721.TWO.summary: Mechema Chemicals International Corp. supplies oxidation catalysts worldwide. The company supplies magnetic material cobalt lithium secondary batteries and materials; and specialty chemicals. It also provides PTA oxidation catalyst, CTA pretreatment, PTA M.L. recovery, and electromagnetic industry services. The company was founded in 1930 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

4722.TW.summary: Qualipoly Chemical Corporation manufactures and supplies polyurethane resins, wire enamels, and insulating varnish. The company offers UV curable materials used in various applications, such as wood coatings, plastics and metal coatings, adhesives and lacquers for CD/DVD, over print varnishes, optical films, and additives for electronic/optical parts; and unsaturated polyester resins for use in FRPs, color pastes and gelcoats, fire retardants, castings, synthetic marbles, buttons, decorative panels, coatings and putties, SMC/BMCs, and ISO-type FRPs. It also provides coating resins comprising alkyd resins used in various applications, which include tinting colors, ink, white ready mixed paints, air-drying paints, baking paints, 2K and NC matted primers, acid-curing, marine primer, wrinkle finishes, paints on wood, plastic and glass, etc.; acrylic resins for use in baking paints on metal, acid-curing amino-alkyd paints on wood applications, etc.; and amino resins used in various applications consisting of paints on concrete, pints for road marking, printing inks, and coil pints, as well as varnishes/paints on paper, wood, plastic, and metal. In addition, the company offers foundry resins that are used as cement and adhesive, casting resin, coating, and impregnant; insulating varnishes used in the manufacture of transformers, and coil and enamel-insulated wires for insulating system in the electronic devices; and polyurethane rigid foam resins used to manufacture wood-imitation materials, soft floor, and fillers. Further, it provides PVAC and acrylic emulsion resins to manufacture tapes of general purpose, pressure sensitive adhesive, glues, and others; and fiber glass. The company markets its products in approximately 40 countries under the Qualipoly and QualiCure brand names. Qualipoly Chemical Corporation was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

4726.TWO.summary: Mycenax Biotech Inc. develops and manufactures biopharmaceutical products from mammalian cells and microbials in Taiwan, European, and the United States markets. The company develops monoclonal antibodies, bi-specific antibodies, fc-fusion proteins, recombinant proteins, peptides, protein conjugates (non-toxin), antibody-cell conjugates, enzymes, antigen-binding fragments (Fab), single-chain variable fragments (ScFv), plasmids, DNA vaccines, and glycoproteins. It also provides process development and scale-up, GMP manufacturing, and analytical services, as well as manufacturing technologies and in-house services. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Miaoli, Taiwan.

4728.TWO.summary: Sunmax Biotechnology Co., Ltd., a biomedical company, develops, manufactures, and markets medical-grade collagen-based medical devices in Asia. The company offers Porcogen, a sterile purified collagen solution for medical device, tissue engineering, and research purposes; and dermal fillers, such as Sunmax collagen implant I-Plus and Sumax collagen implant I for the correction of facial defects, such as the fill up of wrinkles. It also provides Sunmax collagen dental bone graft, Sunmax collagen dental membrane, and Sunmax dental bone graft granules, which are used in the augmentation or reconstructive treatment of the alveolar ridge. In addition, the company offers Sunmax collagen bone graft matrix that provides a bone void filler that is resorbed and replaced with bone during the healing process; and skincare products comprising Sunmax 6 collagen facial cleanser, Sunmax 7 collagen essence, Sunmax 8 active collagen essence mask, Sunmax 9 collagen refining cream, Sunmax 10 collagen eye renewal cream, Sunmax 11 collagen moisturizing cream, Sunmax 15 Collagen MesoRepair, and Sunmax Collagen Peptide that are used as aftercare of dermal filler treatment. Sunmax Biotechnology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Tainan City, Taiwan.

4732.TWO.summary: NatureWise Biotech & Medicals Corporation engages in the development of therapeutic drugs in Taiwan. It offers LipoCol Forte, a capsule for hypercholesterolemia and hypertriglyceridemia; PPL products comprise Taiwanese Green Propolis; and NBM-BMX an oral Softgel capsule to treat cancer. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

4735.TWO.summary: AViTA Corporation manufactures and sells home healthcare products for clinical and personal use. It offers various OEM/ODM solutions. The company's products include non-contact thermometers, infrared/forehead thermometers, arm and wrist type blood pressure monitors, and electronic lice combs. AViTA Corporation was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

4736.TWO.summary: TaiDoc Technology Corporation manufactures and markets medical devices worldwide. It offers diagnostics products, including blood glucose and multiple parameters monitoring systems, point of care testing devices, lancet and lancing devices, and vet health care products comprise blood glucose and calcium meters, non-contact forehead thermometers, and blood ketone meters; and medical devices, such as nebulizers, thermometers, blood pressure monitors, vital sign monitors, medical kiosk, pulse oximeters, and weight scale. The company also provides telehealth remote monitoring devices and smartphone applications; and Covid-19 antigen rapid test kits. In addition, it offers services for regulatory professionals, as well as in the areas of clinical suggestions, engineering resources, and manufacturing systems. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

4737.TW.summary: Bionime Corporation manufactures and sells medical instruments in Algeria, the United States, Switzerland, China, and internationally. It offers medical testing blood glucose management products for self-monitor and hospital/clinic use, as well as accessories, such as test strips and lancing devices. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

4738.TWO.summary: Tatung Fine Chemicals Co. develops, manufactures, and sells nano-products in Taiwan. The company offers aqueous concentrated pigment dispersions for ink-jet inks and photo-catalyst paints. It also provides lithium iron phosphate, a cathode material for high power lithium ion batteries, as well as vanish, ink, TiO, and acrylic CED products. The company was formerly known as Tatung Coatings Company and changed its name to Tatung Fine Chemicals Co. in 2003. Tatung Fine Chemicals Co. was founded in 1970 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

4739.TW.summary: Coremax Corporation researches, develops, produces, manufactures, and sells metal-based specialty chemicals and electronic materials in Taiwan, China, and Thailand. It offers oxidation catalysts in liquid and crystalline forms; specialty chemicals for use in tires, pigments, paints, electronic, and traditional industries; battery materials that are used in the manufacturing of rechargeable lithium-ion batteries; and chemical and organic compound fertilizers. The company was formerly known as Coremax Taiwan Corporation and changed its name to Coremax Corporation in 2000. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

4741.TWO.summary: Jetbest Corporation researches and develops, manufactures, and sells inkjet printing products in Taiwan. The company offers various inks, such as UV inks; and wide format inks, including eco solvent pigments, mild solvent pigments, water dyes and pigments, oil-based dyes and pigments. It also provides textile inks comprising dye sublimation and disperse inks, resin pigments, and reactive dyes; magic inks; desktop inks; nano and resin-free colorants; and bulk systems consisting of refilled cartridges. The company also distributes its products approximately in 80 countries. Jetbest Corporation was founded in 2004 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

4743.TWO.summary: Oneness Biotech Co., Ltd. operates as a biopharmaceutical company in Taiwan. The company develops ON101, which is in Phase III clinical trials for treating chronic diabetic foot ulcers; and OB318, an anti- liver cancer drug that completed Phase I clinical trials. It is also developing SNS01, SNA02, and SNA03 that are in pre-clinical stage for the treatment of cancer; FB704A that is in Phase I clinical trial for the treatment of rheumatoid arthritis, cancer, and cytokine storms; and FB825, which is in Phase II clinical trial for treating allergic diseases and asthma. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan. Oneness Biotech Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Microbio Co., Ltd.

4746.TW.summary: Formosa Laboratories, Inc. produces and sells active pharmaceutical ingredients (APIs) worldwide. The company offers APIs in the areas of anticancers, anti-inflammatory and analgesic agents, MRI enhancing agents, polymeric drugs, CNS agents, immunomodulators, respiratory agents, steroids, vitamin D derivatives, and antibiotics. It also provides contract development and manufacturing services; solutions for manufacturing antibody-drug conjugates; and injectable manufacturing services. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

4754.TWO.summary: INternational CArbide Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells firestop products in Taiwan. The company offers firestop system, such as fire barrier caulks, fire barrier silicone sealants, moldable firestop and firestop putty products, intumescent strips, fire barrier foams, firestop bricks, firestop sheets, mortar, fireproof blankets, and coated firestop boards/coatings. It also provides elastomeric fire caulks, putty pads, fireproof paints for wood, intumescent coating, high intumescent lamination, firestop tapes, smoke and acoustic sealants, and spray products, as well as fireproof protections for cable/electrical systems. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

4760.TWO.summary: Ample Electronic Technology Co.,Ltd. produces and sells thick-film conductors in Taiwan. It offers pastes for terminal and internal electrodes of passive components, copper and silver paste products, and solar cells; and conductive silver pastes for touch panels, membrane switches, and LED and IC packages. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

4765.TWO.summary: Pancolour Ink Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells UV curable inks, coatings, and adhesives in Taiwan. It offers UV curable printing inks for IC chips, optical discs, plastics, and paper products; UV curable adhesives for bonding needs of metal, glass, and other materials that are applied in handicraft and electronic industries; and UV curable coatings for use in plastic flexible tubes and paper spot varnish for screen print, etc. The company provides its products under the PANOVA, PANCURE, PANOLEN, and RADITHO names. Pancolour Ink Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

4766.TW.short_name: NAN PAO RESINS CHEMICAL CO LTD
4766.TW.long_name: Nan Pao Resins Chemical Co., Ltd.
4766.TW.summary: Nan Pao Resins Chemical Co., Ltd. manufactures, wholesales, and retails synthetic resins and plastics, adhesives, resin coatings, dyes, and pigments in Taiwan, Mainland China, and Southeast Asia. It offers footwear adhesives, including cleaners, primers, hardeners, and shoe adhesives. The company also provides adhesives and specialties, such as textile, woodworking and furniture, construction, graphic arts, tape and label, paper converting, rigid packaging, leather coating, specialty, flexible package, construction and decoration, nonwoven, pressure sensitive, and other adhesives, as well as product assemblies. In addition, it offers hot melt adhesives; building and construction, flooring and concrete, heavy duty anti rust, industrial, eco green, functional, and indoor and outdoor powder coatings, as well as coatings for special applications; and construction materials comprising grouts, waterproof products, sealants, deadeners, and bituminous products. The company was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.

4767.TWO.summary: Cherng Tay Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells adhesives in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers hot melt adhesive products for packaging, bookbinding, assembly, and footwear applications; waterproofing materials, including waterproofing membranes and glues; and reactive hot melt adhesives. Cherng Tay Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1983 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

4768.TWO.summary: Ingentec Corporation manufactures and supplies fine chemicals and high pressure gas containers to semiconductor front end, semiconductor package, and flat panel display processes. The company offers laser gas; silicon wafer related products, such as quartz crucibles, and polished and reclaim wafers; and specialty gas and wet chemical related products, including PSA argon gas recovery and purification systems, specialty gas, and texturing chemical. It also offers special materials and tools comprising chillers, LED metal clad substrates, mass flow meters and controllers, pigment, sputtering target materials, and thermal spray coatings powder; and solar cell related products, such as platelet calcined alumina, laser machine for PERC and boron dope, SiC powder, slurry recycle systems, solar quartz crucibles, and tungsten seed cables. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Zhunan, Taiwan.

4803.TWO.summary: VHQ Media Holdings Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the multimedia innovation and creativity, post production, visual effects, and related services for TV advertising, TV drama, online drama, movies, and animation in Taiwan and internationally. The company operates in four segment: Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, and Beijing. It is involved in the content development and performance optimization business; provision of post production services for commercials and feature films; and multimedia shooting and planning for dramas and movies. VHQ Media Holdings Ltd was founded in 1987 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

4806.TWO.summary: ShengHua Entertainment Communication co.,Ltd. engages in the television program production and screenwriting, film production and distribution, and art performing activities in Taiwan and China. It also provides drama series, as well as engages in the literary and artistic creation, corporate image planning, actor brokerage, and graphic system businesses. In addition, it is involved in the investment consulting, business management consulting, and business information consulting activities. The company was formerly known as Shenghua Entertainment Production Co., Ltd. and changed its name to ShengHua Entertainment Communication co.,Ltd. in June 2012. ShengHua Entertainment Communication co.,Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

4904.TW.summary: Far EasTone Telecommunications Co., Ltd. provides wireless communications, leased circuit, Internet, and international simple resale services in the People's Republic of China. It operates through Mobile Service Business, Fixed-Line Services Business, and Sales Business segments. The Mobile Service Business segment offers mobile telecommunications services. The Fixed-line Service Business segment provides international direct dial, local network, long-distance network, and broadband access services. The Sales Business segment sells cellular phones, computers, and accessories. The company also provides electronic information services; call center services; security and monitoring services through Internet; and computer software, data processing, and network information services. In addition, it is involved in the design and research, install, and maintenance of computer software and systems; and investment activities. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

4905.TWO.summary: Tainet Communication System Corp. provides carrier class access equipment to telecom carriers, service operators, and business users worldwide. The company offers Ethernet access devices, VoIP gateway products, xDSL and analog modems, PON, optical transceivers, and interface converters. It also provides copper over fiber connectivity, VoIP gateway communication, xDSL Ethernet, and TDM over IP communication solutions. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

4906.TW.summary: Gemtek Technology Co., Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells wireless communications technologies and solutions in Taiwan and internationally. It offers wireless broadband products, including LTE portable routing products, indoor and outdoor routers, and micro base stations for individuals and families, as well as enterprises, factories, and other applications; and fixed broadband products, such as PON, xDSL/G.fast broadband, and DPU broadband hybrid fiber/copper wire distribution point unit products. The company also provides connected smart home products comprising full coverage seamless connection systems, ViTA smart controllers, and smart sensors; LoRa Internet of Things technologies and communication protocols; and joint design and manufacturing, as well as contract manufacturing services. In addition, it offers intelligent wireless system and vertical integration, smart vertical integration, LTE micro base station, and Internet of Things connection protocol solutions. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

4911.TWO.summary: G&E Herbal Biotechnology Co., Ltd., a biotechnology company, focuses on the development and commercialization of novel botanical extraction technology and products in Taiwan. It offers hepato protective agent capsules for the treatment of chronic liver inflammation, cirrhosis, hepatitis, and other liver diseases; botanical anti-aging cosmetic products; and SR-100 skin repair gel. The company also provides botanical healthcare products, such as Astragali Radix for physical strength; Goji for eyes; and Prosta capsule for regulating physiological functions and boosting metabolism, as well as offers adult products. In addition, it is developing Solarise injection for the treatment of gynecological, head, and neck cancer; Apocin capsule for the treatment of lung/breast cancer; and SR-T100 Gel. Further, the company manufactures technology development for various dietary supplements, as well as provides technical advisory services to other biotechnology organizations. G&E Herbal Biotechnology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Tainan City, Taiwan.

4912.TW.summary: Lemtech Holdings Co., Limited manufactures and sells precision metal dies and metal stampings in Asia, Americas, and Europe. The company provides electronic product thermal modules, electronic product components, automotive components and building material components made by stamping and forming, as well as stamping die support for automotive and electronic product manufacturers; and stamping tools, heatsinks and thermal modules, slide rails, precision metal hinges, and mechanical assemblies. It serves automotive, cloud computing, smartphone, medical device, and industrial, as well as computing, consumer, and communication markets. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

4915.TW.summary: Primax Electronics Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells mobile device components, computer peripherals, business equipment, and digital home products in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers mobile device components, such as camera and fingerprint modules, solutions for wireless charging, ultra-thin keyboard modules, and mobile camera systems; Bluetooth communications devices, such as Bluetooth headphones, audio transmitters, hands-free car headsets, identification card headphones, image viewers, digital pens, GPS receivers, etc.; and mobile device accessories comprising charging cradles, data cables, car chargers, hands-free car accessories, etc. It also provides PC peripherals, including computer input devices, gaming peripherals, ultra-thin Bluetooth tablet keyboards, and digital writing tablets/stylus; and business equipment consisting of scanners, printers/multifunction printers, shredders, and laminators. In addition, the company offers digital home products, such as smart TV remote controls, wireless portable storage devices, and Internet music boxes; audio products; and product development services comprising usability test and industrial design. Primax Electronics Ltd. was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

4916.TW.summary: Parpro Corporation provides design and manufacturing services for processor based embedded solutions to original equipment manufacturers in Europe and the United States. It offers switching platforms, multi-core processor cards and blades; embedded hardware system design services; schematic capture and PCB layout design services for hardware development solutions; mechanical design services; and firmware design services. The company also provides wire harness and cable assembly; sheet metal fabrication and finishing; precision machining; subsystem assembly and integration; and box build, kiosk, and rack services. It serves customers in the aerospace, gaming, telecommunication, and industrial markets. The company was formerly known as Pilot Electronics Corporation. Parpro Corporation was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

4919.TW.summary: Nuvoton Technology Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a digital/analog/mixed signal semiconductor company in the United States, Europe, Asia, and internationally. It operates through General Integrated Circuit (IC) Product and Foundry Service segments. The company engages in the research, design, development, manufacture, and sale of logic ICs; and manufacture, testing, and OEM of 6-inch wafers. It also researches, designs, develops, manufactures, and sells microcontrollers; microprocessors; application specific SoCs devices; audio amplifiers, CODECs, converters, and enhancements; and ISD voice ICs, including ISD ChipCorder products and Voiceband CODECs.
