In addition, the company provides cloud computing products comprising embedded controllers, hardware monitors, I/O and security devices, iBMC products, and voltage level shifters; power management products, which consist of power switches and voltage regulators; and Internet of things (IoT) solutions. Further, it operates IoT for various IoT solutions; operates emWin platform for graphical user interface solution to create graphics for the embedded system; and offers professional semiconductor foundry services. Additionally, the company engages in the wholesale of computers, supplements, and software; and provides computer software services. Its products are used in automotive, computing, medical, portable devices, audio/video products, and consumer and industrial electronics, as well IoT security and smart home appliances. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan. Nuvoton Technology Corporation is a subsidiary of Winbond Electronics Corporation.

4923.TWO.summary: Force MOS Technology Co., LTD. engages in the design, development, and sale of MOSFETs and analog ICs in Taiwan. It offers bipolar transistors; diodes and rectifiers; and power management products for light electric vehicles technology and brushless DC motor control applications. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

4924.TWO.summary: HTM International Holding Ltd. engages in the production and sale of precision molds, computer notebook accessories, hi-fi systems accessories, office automation products, and home audio products and related parts. It offers PC components, including gas injection products; PC peripherals, such as portable hard disk covers and CD boxes; and speakers. The company also provides biomass energy products. It operates in Taiwan, Europe, the United States, Japan, and China. HTM International Holding Ltd. was founded in 1989 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

4925.TWO.summary: JMicron Technology Corp. operates as an IC design company in Taiwan and internationally. The company designs high-speed data and signal interfaces, such as 3.1 5Gbps, USB 3.2 10Gbps and USB 3.2 20Gbps to connect them to SATA/PCIe/UFS; PCIe interface to SATA interface; and SATA 1.5Gbps/SATA 3Gbps/SATA 6Gbps, and SATA port multiplier/port selector, as well as bridge controllers for SATA to PATA interface. It also provides external data storage products, such as single bay controllers for USB 2.0/USB 3.0/USB 3.1/USB 3.2 host interfaces; dual-/multi-bay bridge controllers for external multiple-bay HDDs, RAID, and SATA port multipliers and port selectors; storage device controllers; and universal flash storage products. In addition, the company offers hard disk drive duplicators and surveillance storage systems, and NAS devices with RAID functionality. JMicron Technology Corp. is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

4930.TW.summary: Star Comgistic Capital Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells household appliances in Taiwan and internationally. It offers green energy products; grills, including table top grills, Panini makers, baking centers, hot pots, steak grills, multi cookers, foldable griddles, and healthy grills; food preparation products, such as blenders, mixers, food processors, and juice extractors; and home comfort products comprising dehumudifiers, heaters, fans, and vacuum cleaners. The company also provides outdoor grills; microwave and oven products; beverage products consisting of pump espresso makers, coffee makers, kettles, steam mixers, and automatic espresso makers; and garment care products, including steam irons, boil station irons, garment steamers, and LCD electronic irons, as well as frying pans and skip toasters. In addition, it designs and manufactures molds, feed and process non-ferrous metal composite materials, and new alloy materials; sells raw materials, molds, machinery equipment, and components, as well as semi-finished products; and is involved in the import, export, and wholesale of various small household electrical appliances. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

4933.TWO.summary: Ubright Optronics Corporation manufactures and sells optoelectronics LCD backlight module components for the display industry in Taiwan. It offers prism, multi function, and quantum dot films for backlight displays; polarizer protection and anti-glare films for LCD displays; 3D curve display protection films for OLED displays; anti-static protection, in process panel protection, hard coat, masking protection, and optical clear adhesive films for touch panels; anti-glare films for E paper products; and ceramic window films for windows. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan. Ubright Optronics Corporation is a subsidiary of Shinkong Synthetic Fibers Corporation.

4934.TW.summary: Tainergy Tech Co., Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, and markets solar cells in Taiwan. It offers solar energy application systems, including solar refrigerator, pumping, air conditioner, and deionized water systems; multi-crystalline and mono-crystalline silicon solar cells; solar modules with build in Li-NMC batteries; solar modules for briefcase, folding, flexible, and light weight solar panel applications; solar power storage systems; domestic back-up power systems, such as power unit, energy storage system, power walker, and portable power station; and solar power bricks. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

4938.TW.summary: Pegatron Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in designing, manufacturing, and selling computer, communication, and consumer electronic products worldwide. It offers computing products, such as notebooks, desktops, PCs, motherboards, rugged computers, and servers; consumer electronics, including tablets and game consoles, wearable devices, smart home devices, and automotive electronics; and communication products, which include cable modems, set-top boxes, smartphones, switches, and routers. The company also provides car electronics, such as car entertainment products, vehicle telematics, and advanced driver assistance systems; and smart electronics, including Internet of Things products, drones, robots, and virtual reality products. In addition, it offers computer peripherals, digital cameras, plastic and electronic components, precision equipment, LED and relevant lighting products, circuit boards and relevant products, spare parts for notebook computers, computers and application systems, office machinery, hardware, GPS, computer electronic devices, disk drives, calculators, power supply units, computer cases, digital automatic data processors, data storage and processing equipment, wires, cables, computer digital signal process systems and cards, computer data projectors, projection screens, and other related components. Further, the company provides management consulting services; trading electronic parts; and tooling molds for stainless steel computer cases, as well as installs and repairs electronic products. Additionally, it engages in office building leasing activities; investing activities; manufacturing and selling medical appliances; selling iron and aluminum products; travel agency activities; and the provision of logistics, surface processing, and after-sales services. Pegatron Corporation was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

4944.TWO.summary: Crystalwise Technology Inc. manufactures and sells hard substrates in Taiwan. The company offers CMOS, GaAs, and CZ wafers, as well as various types of substrates. Its products include sapphire substrate used for blue-light/green-light LED; substrates used for surface acoustic wave filter devices; sapphire cover glasses for smart phones and smart watches, as well as sapphire camera lens and sapphire finger sensor lens; sapphire function, power, volume, etc. keys for phone; sapphire window and heat spread substrates for LED products; and other type of substrate used in optronic and semiconductor industries. The company serves semiconductor, optoelectronics, optical fiber communications, wireless communications, and other industries. Crystalwise Technology Inc. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Miaoli, Taiwan.

4945.TWO.summary: Sentelic Corporation operates as an IC design company in Taiwan, China, and Japan. The company offers mixed-signal, ASIC, firmware/software, and multi-media processing services; fan motor drive control IC's for servers, communication equipment, cloud data centers, and 5G base stations; and cooling fans for servers, telecommunication switching equipment, gaming graphics cards, and mining hardware. Sentelic Corporation was founded in 2000 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

4946.TWO.summary: Cayenne Entertainment Technology Co., Ltd. provides various casual gaming services to online entertainment community in Taiwan. It also provides information software, data processing, and advertising services. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

4950.TWO.summary: Mutto Optronics Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells stainless steel kitchen utensils and refined cutlery sets in the United States, China, Taiwan, and internationally. It is also involved in OEM/ODM knife manufacturing businesses; and investment activities. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

4951.TWO.summary: Feature Integration Technology Inc. designs, markets, and commercializes ICs and controllers. It offers I/O controllers and I/F management products, such as eSPI/LPC/USB/PCIE I/F controllers; super hardware monitors + SIOs; hardware keyboard controllers; USB consumer IR receiver ICs for Windows Vista/Windows 7; power saving (EUP) SIOs and controllers; transceivers and buffers; SIOs with microcontrollers (uSIO); and bus controllers and transceivers. The company also provides environment sensors and glue logic ICs, including environment sensors and fan controllers, pure logic ICs, performance controllers, and real time clocks; power management and ACPI controllers, such as ACPI, switching, and multi-phase linear controllers; micro-processors; LED driver ICs; interface and connectivity products; and USB type-C and power delivery products, as well as USB fast charging products. It offers its IC products for various applications in personal computers, computer peripherals, digital consumer electronic products, and information appliance products. The company sells its products through professional IC distributors. Feature Integration Technology Inc. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Zhubei, Taiwan.

4952.TW.summary: Generalplus Technology Inc. researches, develops, and sells integrated circuits (ICs) worldwide. It offers speech/tone synthesizers, sound processors, controllers, and one battery speech synthesizers; LCD controllers and driver; multimedia processors; automobile video recorders; remote, motor, gTouch, and charger controls, as well as controllers for home applications; flash products; and motor drivers, audio amplifiers, linear regulators, ADC and microphone pre-amplifiers, I/O bus extenders, USB bridge and socket servers, touch applications, USB headset solutions, and three-axis accelerometers. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

4953.TWO.summary: Wistron Information Technology & Services Corporation operates as an information technology (IT) service provider to Fortune 500 companies worldwide. It provides R&D as a service, which include talents outsourcing consultancy, research and production service, and team building service; software development, testing, and operation and maintenance services; and business process outsourcing services. The company also offers product globalization services; and software localization, localization testing, translation, and desktop publishing services. In addition, it provides cloud service, mobile, mobile payment, enterprise resource planning, and SmartRobot solutions; data warehousing/big data implementation and consulting, and Internet advertising data analysis services; application management services. The company serves banking, insurance, telecom, automobile, healthcare, retail, and manufacturing industries. Wistron Information Technology & Services Corporation was founded in 1992 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

4956.TW.summary: Epileds Technologies, Inc. researches and develops, designs, manufactures, and sells blue, green, red, and white light LED wafers and chips in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers AlGalnP LED Chips with wavelength ranging from 580 to 860nm; and InGaN LED chips with wavelength from 380 to 550nm. Its LED wafers and chips are used in various applications, including landscape lighting, plant lighting, white light illumination, CCTV, and vehicle lighting; indicators of consumer electronics, light source of fax machines and scanners, backlight source of LCD monitors, indoor or outdoor display boards, automotive lightings, traffic signals, and illuminators; and high voltage LED chip, UV, and other applications. Epileds Technologies, Inc. was founded in 2006 and is based in Tainan City, Taiwan.

4961.TW.summary: Fitipower Integrated Technology Inc. research, design, and development of LCD driver ICs and analogs, and digital and mixed-signal power management ICs in Taiwan. Its power management products comprise buck DC-DC, boost DC-DC, linear regulator, LCD power, power switch, WLED driver, reset IC, and motor driver, as well as other products, such as PMUs, ASICs, etc.; and display driver products include AV/tablet, DSC, NBMNT, TV, and gate products. The company's products are used for various applications consisting of LCD-TVs, notebooks, networking, portable devices, set-top boxes, CCTV/security, desktops, LED lighting, and TFT-LCD driver products. Fitipower Integrated Technology Inc. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

4968.TW.summary: RichWave Technology Corporation designs, develops, and sells radio frequency (RF) integrated circuits in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers a portfolio of RF front-end components for Wi-Fi, such as power amplifiers, low noise amplifiers, switches, and front-end modules; mobility switches, mobility and GPS LNA products, and power amplifiers; RF components, and Internet of Things (IoT) low noise amplifiers and switches; automotive front-end modules and switches; cable network switches; motion detection sensors; and GPS/WiFi SAW filters, cellular SAW filters, IoT SAW filters, and WiFi diplexers. It also provides single-chip broadcast IC tuners, as well as a line of wireless video/audio transmission chipsets for different ISM bands. The company's products are used in various applications, including networking, mobile, smart home, internet of things, wireless media, broadcasting, and automotive. RichWave Technology Corporation was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

4972.TWO.summary: Tons Lightology Inc., together with its subsidiaries, designs and manufactures commercial lighting products in Taiwan, rest of Asia, Europe, Oceania, and internationally. The company offers light-emitting diode, high-intensity discharge, fluorescent, and halogen lighting products. Its indoor lighting products include tracks and structures, luminaires for tracks, recessed downlights, frameless and adjustable downlights, assemblies, surface-mounted ceiling lights, pendant lights, wall lights, display spotlights, linear lights, task lights, and micro track lights. The company's outdoor lighting products comprise outdoor downlights, outdoor ceiling lights, outdoor wall lights, in-ground lights, projectors, flood lights, bollards, and outdoor accessories. Its products are used for architectural, retail display, residential, entertainment, outdoor area and commercial/industrial lighting applications. Tons Lightology Inc. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

4976.TW.summary: Calin Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells high-precision optical lens and components. Its products include automotive camera, security camera, projector lens, digital camera lens, DSLR, industrial lenses, and medical endoscopy lens. The company also offers aspherical glass molding lens, glass grinding, and injection-optical lenses. In addition, it provides customized development and assembly services. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

4979.TWO.summary: LuxNet Corporation designs, develops, and manufactures optical semiconductor devices and packaged optical components in Taiwan. The company provides laser and photo diode chips, transmitters, receivers, and optical sub-assemblies. Its products are used in high speed voice video and data communications for networking, storage, and cable TV, as well as optical communication applications. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

4980.TWO.summary: Jorjin Technologies Inc. provides modular processing, sensing, and wireless connectivity solutions worldwide. It also offers wireless system in package, application processor, imaging, and audio visual modules, as well as modules for the Internet of things; and driver software, as well as design-in support services. In addition, the company distributes a range of components, such as barcode scanning modules, filters, TCXOs, chip antennas, and EMI shielding components, as well as 2, 3, and 4G modems. It serves wearable consumer electronics, automotive infotainment, cloud connected devices, and industrial mobile computing markets. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

4987.TWO.summary: Godex International Co., Ltd, an engineering company, designs, manufactures, and sells barcode printing products worldwide. The company offers desktop, industrial, and mobile printers; scanners; label stands; and wax, wax/resin, resin, and near edge ribbons. It also provides label design and printing software under the GoRibbon, GoLabel, GoLabel PDF, and QLabel, GoAPP, and GoUtility names. The company's products are used in healthcare, retail, logistics and transportation, manufacturing, government, travel and leisure, and special material applications. It distributes its products through a network of value add resellers. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

4989.TW.summary: LCY Technology Corp. produces and sells copper foil products for the printed circuit board and copper clad laminate manufacturers in Taiwan and internationally. It offers 4oz, 3oz, 2oz, 1oz, 1/2oz, 1/3oz, and 9Âµm copper foils, as well as thin, very low profile, double treatment, and reverse treatment copper foils. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

4995.TWO.summary: Litemax Electronics Inc., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of LCD panels and monitors in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers industrial computing products, such as embedded box, rugged panel, modular panel transportation PCs, as well as boards and modules; industrial displays, including Spanpixel resizing and square LCDs, Durapixel sunlight readable LCDs, and Navpixel marine displays, as well as custom LCD displays; accessories comprising AD, power, HDMI daisy chain, intelligent thermal control, expansion, and AMIO boards; and AIoT solutions, such as smart display and kiosk module, and AI edge computing products. It serves the transportation, digital signage, industrial, point of sale/kiosk, rugged portable, gaming, marine, and healthcare industries. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

4999.TW.summary: Sinher Technology Inc. researches and develops, manufactures, and sells various hinge products in Taiwan. The company offers NB hinges, including auto locks, springs, band type hinges, centrals, shafts, and Zn with plate pipe and bend type hinges. It also provides detachable, NB module, and tablet module hinges; AIO and LCD hinges, such as base design type, picture frame type, and multi rotation type hinges; and 3C hinges comprising projector and POS hinges, as well as car hinge and projector products. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

5007.TW.summary: San Shing Fastech Corp. manufactures and sells steel nuts worldwide. The company offers nut products, including weld, flange, clinch, slotted, locking, wheel, nylon insert, hot forming square and hot forming, and GEOMET coating, as well as auto parts, torque converter parts, customized fasteners, collar, sleeve and spacer, and nut with washer; and bolt products, such as knurled, weld, external 6-lobe, GEOMET coating, shoulder, clinch, special alloy, customized, internal serrated, internal 6-lobe, and double end bolts. It also provides washers, stamping washers and fasteners, and stamping parts and assembly parts; tooling products, which include segmented dies for nut and bolt, carbide six-lobe punch and dies, carbide hex punch, and hot forging and customized tooling; and machinery, such as nut and bolt formers, spindles an round nut tapping machines, optical nut and bolt sorting machines, bolt measurement systems, and nylon insert assembly machines. The company was formerly known as San Shing Hardware Works Co., Ltd. and changed its name to San Shing Fastech Corp. in July 2002. San Shing Fastech Corp. was founded in 1965 and is based in Tainan, Taiwan.

5009.TWO.summary: Gloria Material Technology Corp. manufactures and sells alloy steel and valve-parts in Taiwan and internationally. The company's products include super and titanium alloys; and high cleaning steel, alloy tool steel, high speed steel, stainless steel, quenched-tempered steel, and mold material supply products. It also provides machined parts, such as actuators, blocks, boss products, load caps, and actuator blanks; compressor spacers, seals for gas turbine, turbine blades, and transmission shafts; and copper rod rollers, dummy bar heads, guide rolls, sendzimir rolls, and rolls for slab continuous cast. In addition, the company offers air compressor rotors, bolts, couplings, cryogenic BV shafts, HPBV shafts, locking pins, parts for vacuum equipment, pump shafts, pipe fittings, plugs, turbo charger parts, wheel rings, stems, and taper pins. It serves aerospace, energy, oil and gas, water, medical, and machinery and mold industries. Gloria Material Technology Corp. was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.

5011.TWO.summary: OFCO Industrial Corporation engages in the manufacture and sale of fastener products in Taiwan. Its products include screws, nuts, bolts, and structural assemblies. The company was formerly known as Oriental Fastener Industry LTD. and changed its name to OFCO Industrial Corporation in 2004. OFCO Industrial Corporation was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

5015.TWO.summary: Rodex Fasteners Corp. manufactures and sells stainless steel wires and precision made screws worldwide. The company offers stainless steel wires, tapping screws, chipboard screws, machine screws, self-drilling screws, socket cap screws, socket set screws, stainless steel blind rivets, stainless steel thread cutting screws, triangular thread screws, wood screws, high-low thread screws, coarse thread screws, drywall screws, security screws, washer assembly of sems, screws for automatic line, electronic screws, JIS screws, special screws, hexagon nuts, and hexagon nylon lock nuts. Rodex Fasteners Corp. was founded in 1984 and is based in Chungli, Taiwan.

5102.TWO.summary: Fu Chian Tire Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells retread tires in Taiwan. The company also offers high and low temperature tread rubber products, gums, backing products, rubber flooring products, silicone products, rubber compounds, and other rubber products. It is also involved in the provision of rubber manufacturing machines, as well as in the import and export activities. Fu Chian Tire Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1949 and is based in Yuanlin City, Taiwan.

5202.TWO.summary: NewSoft Technology Corporation provides personal, enterprise Web, and digital signage solutions worldwide. The company offers personal solutions, including digital document, digital recognition, digital images, and mobile application solutions; and enterprise Web solutions, such as customer and salary management, electronic authorization, project management, attendance, resource management, performance management, document management, and digital signage systems. It also provides custom development services, which include optical character recognition software development kits (OCR SDK); identity card recognition software development kits (IDR SDK); driver and network, and document imaging cloud applications; mobile and cloud application customization; and digital image editing and management services. The company sells its products through store outlets, online channels, hardware distributors, and enterprise and government contact windows. NewSoft Technology Corporation was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

5203.TW.summary: CyberLink Corp. operates as a multimedia software and AI facial recognition technology company in Taiwan and internationally. It offers software for video and photo editing, multimedia playback, file conversion, online chat, and mobile; video editing software and plug-ins for creative control; movie and media players for home theaters, online streaming, and VR; and software solutions for desktop recording, webcam capture, and livestreaming. The company also provides multimedia software for the whole family; solutions for burning, backup, and media conversion needs; online meetings, presentations, and business chat tools for communication; and apps for video and photo editing, business, and chat. CyberLink Corp. was incorporated in 1990 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

5206.TWO.summary: Kunyue Development Co., Ltd. provides real estate development and maintenance services. The company is involved in the land development, building construction, residential development, home sales, and customer service activities. It also offers structural, hydropower, waterproof, and intimate engineering services. The company was founded in 1975 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

5209.TWO.summary: CTCI Advanced Systems Inc. provides system integration services to the hydrocarbon, power, industry, transportation, and high technology markets in Taiwan and internationally. The company provides main automation contractor services in the areas of project planning, design, procurement, installation, test, commissioning, start up, and running or turnkey projects. It also offers railway electrical and mechanical (E&M) solutions, such as signaling, telecommunications, SCADA, and related information system solutions; airport and satellite E&M services for airport terminal, airfield runway, and satellite industries; and hi-tech plant E&M services for wafer, electro-optical, display glass, or bio-tech plants. In addition, the company provides process simulation and IT systems, including process optimization, energy saving and waste reduction, facility reliability, and plant safety and emergency planning products and services, as well as distributes and maintains SmartPlant P&ID intelligent solutions, plant EPC projects engineering information management solutions, and visualize plant's engineering information management solutions. Further, it offers smart water network platform integrated with GIS to manage and monitor water network; cyber security software for detecting the abnormal signs caused by equipment malfunction, operational mistake, and cyber-attack; construction safety management platform; and rotary machine predictive maintenance platform to collect sound and vibration data of rotary machines, and build baseline models to analyze machine condition. Additionally, the company distributes NovaTech D/3 DCS and batch control management systems; Intergraph Process, Power & Marine - PP&M products and solutions; AspenTech process optimization software; and Mr. Energy 50001, an energy information management system platform. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

5211.TWO.summary: Penpower Technology LTD., engages in research and development of devices with built-in intelligent human-machine interface technologies in Taiwan and internationally. The company provides handheld pen scanners and translators, pen scanners and translators for computers, and multilingual dictionary pens; wireless writing pads; embedded memory and digital memo writing pads; touch screen stylus; and business card management, voice, graphic design, and document management solutions. It also offers electronic signature solutions, as well as software services. Penpower Technology LTD. was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

5212.TWO.summary: Hyweb Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development of electronic government, book education, and electronic payment related software technology in China and internationally. Its products include HyCMS, a website management platform; Greeting, a paperless conference system; HyEIP, an administrative information portal; HyCase, an application review process engine; and eServices, a customer service system. The company's products also comprise HyRead, an e-book solution and mobile library-reading display machine; HyLib, a library automation system; Jumper, a library resource exploration service system; and SpaceMe, a space management solution. In addition, its products consist of HyLoyal, a bonus points management system; HyPro, a credit card/debit card system; and HyPstar, a card data preparation system. Further, the company offers UHF RFID chip tags, security detection doors, self-checking machines, automatic book borrowing and returning station systems, librarian work systems, and book searching/counting machines; and various consumer finance, retail banking, and payment solutions. Hyweb Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Zhubei, Taiwan.

5213.TWO.summary: YeaShin International Development Co., Ltd. engages in the business of residential and building development in Taiwan. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

5220.TWO.summary: Higgstec Inc. engages in the research and development, design, manufacture, sale, and service of various touch solutions. The company offers standard and custom 5-wire resistive, and projected capacitive touch solutions, as well as PCAP touch controllers, and 5-wire resistive touch controllers and panels. Its products and solutions are used in various fields, including aviation, marine, education, medical, military, gaming arcade, IPC, vehicle, POS, ATM, cash register, house appliances, office automation, smart home appliances, security monitoring systems, etc. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

5222.TWO.summary: Transcom, Inc. operates as a microwave device and subsystem company in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers wideband and narrowband solid-state power amplifiers; MIC and transceiver modules; FET chips; packaged FETs; monolithic microwave integrated circuits (MMIC); hybrid ICs; directional couplers; power dividers; fixed attenuators and termination; and MIS chip capacitors. It also provides MMIC foundry services. Transcom, Inc. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.

5227.TWO.summary: Advanced Lithium Electrochemistry (Cayman) Co., Ltd. researches, manufactures, and sells lithium iron phosphate Nano co-crystalline olivine materials (LFP-NCO) in China, other Asia countries, Italy, Taiwan, and internationally. The company also offers olivine-type structure lithium battery materials; and manufactures and distributes batteries, and cars and its peripherals. In addition, it manufactures and installs electricity generation, transmission, and distribution machinery. Advanced Lithium Electrochemistry (Cayman) Co., Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

5230.TWO.summary: Ledlink Optics, Inc. designs, manufactures, and sells optics for lighting companies and other LED manufacturers in Taiwan and internationally. The company's products include multi-lens modules, single street lenses, multi street lenses, silicone lenses, wall washer lighting lenses, color mixing lenses, waterproof lenses, elliptical beam lenses, narrow beam lenses, high-bay lighting lenses, automotive optics, V-cut lenses, ultra-thin hybrid lenses, hybrid lenses, fresnel lenses, reflectors, stage lighting lenses, and indoor lighting lenses. Its products are used in residential, commercial, street, and architectural lighting applications. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

5233.TWO.summary: Amita Technologies Inc. manufactures and sells lithium-ion polymer batteries in Taiwan. The company offers cells, soft packs, hard packs, energy storage systems, E bank products, camcorder series products, and accessories. Its batteries are used in data center UPS units, power banks, power tools, battery-powered vehicles, and energy storage systems for household appliances, commercial or industrial facilities, and smart grid. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan. Amita Technologies Inc. is a subsidiary of Energy Absolute Public Company Limited.

5234.TW.summary: Daxin Materials Corporation provides display and green energy related fine chemicals in Taiwan. It offers semiconductor materials comprising laser release layers, temporary bonding adhesives, and photosensitive dielectrics; display materials, such as LCD, touch panel, and OLED materials; green materials consisting of battery materials; and anhydride monomers. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Taichung City, Taiwan.

5236.TWO.summary: Sunplus Innovation Technology Inc. researches, develops, manufactures, and markets microcontrollers and system-on-chips with embedded software solutions in Taiwan. It offers wired optical mice, wireless desktops, and MCU for HID and toy devices; and Web, NB, and IOT camera controllers. The company's products are used in human interface devices, PC external HDD/ODD drives, and PC/NB camera and industry control market segments. It also provides image data services for AI datasets, including data collection, labeling and tagging, verification, model training, 2D bounding box, line and polygonal annotation, semantic segmentation, landmark/key point annotation, other annotation services, product features tagging, queue monitoring, data transcription, emotion analysis, feedback entry, data entry-data capture, de-identification service, training, and system integration. The company is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan. Sunplus Innovation Technology Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Sunplus Technology Company Limited.

5244.TWO.summary: Brightek Optoelectronic Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells semiconductor package solutions. The company offers automotive application products, such as signal and lighting, and electronics; lighting products; and solutions for security monitoring and disinfection systems. The company was formerly known as Taiwan Brightek Optoelectronic Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Brightek Optoelectronic Co., Ltd. in 2009. Brightek Optoelectronic Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

5245.TWO.summary: WiseChip Semiconductor Inc. researches, designs, develops, manufactures, and markets organic light emitting diodes (OLEDs) in Taiwan. Its principal products include OLED displays, full color displays, and monochrome displays; and bendable OLEDs, transparent OLEDs, matrix OLEDs, etc. used in consumer, PC peripheral, industrial, medical, automotive, and communication applications. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Chu-Nan, Taiwan.

5248.TWO.summary: Pixon Technologies Corporation manufactures and sells imaging and optical components for makers in communications, computers, and consumer electronics field in the United States, Taiwan, Asia, and internationally. The company develops optical, electronic circuit design and application software programming of linear micro lens array, linear light source, light pipe, and contact image sensor modules (CISM) products. It offers linear light guide, CIS modules, linear micro lens array, COB chip on board, and 3-in-1 modules. The company's products application includes document scanning and printing, fax, photocopiers, MFP multifunction printers, banknote counterfeit machines, lottery, electronic whiteboard, large format textile and paper printing and scanning, and other visual inspection. Pixon Technologies Corporation was founded in 1999 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

5251.TWO.summary: JSW Pacific Corporation manufactures and sells wireless connectivity products in Taiwan. The company offers IP cameras, video doorbells, security lighting cameras, security home control products, and smart locks. It also provides hardware and software development services. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

5258.TW.summary: Castles Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells payment solutions for the financial, retail, hospitality, and transportation sectors. Its products include Android, mobile, and EFT POS solutions; and unattended terminals, PIN pads, and other products. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

5262.TWO.summary: Gigastone Corporation manufactures and sells memory modules, wireless/networking modules and control ICs, and display modules in Taiwan and internationally. Its products include memory cards; card readers; power banks; cables; flash drives and readers; adapters, wireless charging pads, headsets, and travel routers; and WiFi smart batteries. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

5263.TWO.summary: Brogent Technologies Inc., a technology company, provides digital content creation services in Taiwan. Its business primarily includes software and hardware research and development, manufacturing and system integration, theater design, and planning, and construction capabilities. The company's products include i-Ride, a flying theater built on six degrees of freedom motion platform; m-Ride, a flying theater built on the design of 180-degree rotating gondolas; d-Ride, a media based interactive dark ride solution for gaming; and GestureMagic that offers effect-driven 4D experience in gaming. It also provides v-Ride 360, a cylinder screen that provides 360-degree panorama balloon ride; t-Ride, a Jurassic age ride; and Q-Ride, an ultrarealistic ocean VR adventure. Brogent Technologies Inc. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

5269.TW.summary: ASMedia Technology Inc. operates as a fabless IC design company. The company offers USB host and device controllers, including USB3.2 Gen1, USB 3.2 Gen2x1, USB 3.2 Gen2x2, and USB4 controllers; PCIe bridge and SATA controllers; and high speed signal switches. It serves motherboard vendors and branded OEMs worldwide. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

5271.TWO.summary: Horng Tong Enterprise Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, manufacture, and sale of electronic connectors in Taiwan. The company offers connectors for mother boards, notebooks, and networks/antennas/RJs; AMOLED materials, sublimation machines, and cameras; and car electronics, including DVRs and AVMs, car chargers, wireless chargers, AVN and ADAS products, dash cam-mirrors, head-up displays, portable car chargers, ATL system products, and 8 in 1 control boxes. It also provides Internet of Things products, such as police devices and equipment, modems, wireless modules, emergency phones, smart crutches, and LTE Mifi products; and communication products. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

5272.TWO.summary: AMICCOM Electronics Corporation, a semiconductor company, provides RF ICs in Taiwan. The company offers 2.4 GHz, sub 1GHz, and 5.8/5.2 GHz short range devices, as well as wireless audio, Bluetooth LE/Zigbee, and satellite/LNB/DBS products. Its products are used in thermometer and voice remote control applications. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Zhubei, Taiwan.

5274.TWO.summary: ASPEED Technology Inc. operates as a fabless integrated circuit design company in Taiwan, China, the United States, and internationally. It offers server management product lines; PC and AV extensions; desktop virtualization infrastructures; and Cupola360, a spherical image processor for 360-degree/180-degree cameras. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

5277.TWO.summary: ProLight Opto Technology Corporation engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of LED packaging products in Taiwan. The company offers LED products for use in entertainment, architecture, general, automotive, UV, IR, and plant growing lighting applications. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

5278.TWO.summary: Sunfun Info Co., Ltd. operates online dating and social networking services in Taiwan, the United States, Mexico, India, and the Southeast Asia. The company offers iPair, weTouch, and SweetRing websites that are dating applications; information software services; and other online platform services. It also engages in the biotechnology and healthcare business. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

5283.TW.summary: Heran Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells home appliances in Taiwan. The company offers air conditioning products; audio-visual appliances, such as UHD LED products, full HD LED products, and LCD peripherals; refrigerators; and kitchen appliances, including dish washers, electric baking pans, microwave ovens, electric ovens, electric ceramic heaters, electric steamers, pressure cookers, quick cook pots, gourmet pots, gas fryer, and fruit and coffee machines. It also provides electric blankets, electric heaters, kerosene stoves, toilet seats, floor washing machines, electric fans, water-cooling fans, air cleaners, dehumidifiers, vacuum cleaners, mite removal machines, sweeping robots, automatic induction dryers, and LED table lamps; washing machines; freezers; commercial air conditioning products; and commercial LED display products. The company offers its products under the HERAN brand name. Heran Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

5287.TWO.summary: ADDCN Technology Co., Ltd operates online trading platforms in Taiwan and internationally. It operates 8591.com.tw, which offers a virtual treasure trading platform; 591.com.tw and 591.com.hk, a real estate information network platforms; 8891.com.tw, a second-hand car trading platform; and 518.com.tw, a job search and recruitment platform. The company also operates 100.com.tw that offers design case pictures of interior design companies; marry.com.tw, a wedding service platform for wedding-related services, such as wedding photography, records, and bride secretaries; chickpt.com.tw, a part-time job finding APP; and tasker.com.tw for home task function that includes water, electricity, maintenance, and cleaning activities. ADDCN Technology Co., Ltd was incorporated in 1997 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

5289.TWO.summary: Innodisk Corporation provides industrial embedded flash and DRAM storage products and technologies in Taiwan. The company offers flash storage products, such as solid state drives (SSDs); SATA Slim for hand-held devices, thin clients, and industrial applications; ServerDOM for server use; CFast, a small form factor for industrial and embedded applications; and mSATA, a compliant module for space-constricted applications. Its flash storage products also include Mini PCIeDOM for server boot applications; M.2 for ultra-thin or compact systems; SATADOM compact form factor suitable for 1U server applications; nanoSSDs; compact flash cards; embedded disk cards; SD and MicroSD cards; USB and EDC; and server boot cards. The company also provides embedded DRAM modules; server memory modules; wide temperature DRAM modules; and special customized DRAM modules. In addition, it offers embedded peripherals comprising AI accelerator cards, storage expansion cards, disk arrays, display cards, and communication modules, as well as flash storage products with various interfaces and form factors. The company's products are used in the aerospace and defense embedded systems, server applications, casino gaming, and in-vehicles, as well as automation, surveillance, networking, healthcare, and retail markets. Innodisk Corporation was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

5291.TWO.summary: EISO Enterprise Co., Ltd. develops and sells PCB products. Its products are used in industrial computers, Internet communication products, cars, computer equipment, electron products, power boards, and others. The company also provides LED products for use in professional cycles; and renewable energy products. EISO Enterprise Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

5292.TWO.summary: Desiccant Technology Corporation, through its subsidiary, Shanghai Huajing Environmental Protection and Energy Saving Equipment Limited Company, produces and sells air purification and treatment equipment, plastic processing peripherals equipment, energy-saving equipment, and spare parts. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Zhongli, Taiwan.

5299.TWO.summary: Excelliance MOS Corporation operates as a power device and IC design company in Taiwan. The company is involved in the power semiconductor process development, as well as power device, IC, and system design activities. Its products include power MOSFETs, Schottky rectifiers, AC/DC and DC/DC power ICs, and LED drivers. The company's products are primarily used to the power system of electronic products, including personal computers, notebooks, pads, monitors, TVs, LED lighting, switching power, and other consumer electronics. Excelliance MOS Corporation was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Zhubei, Taiwan.

5301.TWO.summary: CJW International Co., Ltd. designs and sells jewelry products, and tobacco and alcohol in Taiwan. The company offers diamond, jade, and coral jewelry products. It is also involved in the wholesale and retail of beauty products. The company was founded in 1967 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

5302.TWO.summary: Syntek Semiconductor Co., Ltd. operates as a fabless IC design company in Asia. It offers car DVRs/miniDVs, PC/NB camera controllers, and microcontrollers, as well as wireless solutions. The company also develops products for photo capturing and video recording applications. In addition, it offers wireless IP connected multimedia recording solutions; and system-on-chip solutions. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

5306.TWO.summary: KMC (Kuei Meng) International Inc. manufactures and sells various types of chains, motorcycle components, and vehicle components in Asia, Europe, and the United States. The company offers bicycle chains, such as road bike, mountain bike, BMX, E-bike, and rust buster chain series products, as well as EcoProTech chains. It also provides motorcycle chain and gears, including standard driving, heavy duty, cam, and silent chain series products, as well as standard driving sprockets, and chain and sprocket kits. In addition, the company offers automobile timing systems and garage door openers. Further, it is involved in investing activities. The company was formerly known as CNet Technology Inc. and changed its name to KMC (Kuei Meng) International Inc. in July 2012. KMC (Kuei Meng) International Inc. was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan. KMC (Kuei Meng) International Inc. is a subsidiary of KMC Transton Industries Limited.

5309.TWO.summary: Sysgration Ltd. provides industrial IoT, automotive electronics, energy management, and redundant power supply solutions in Taiwan. It offers integration and mobile apps to control various vehicle on-board devices; real-time and wireless location tracking technology products for animals and assets; and smart retail services to connect vending machines for real-time telemetry and user behavior analytics services. The company also provides internal and external BLE TPMS products; and commercial solar and container based solar energy storage systems. In addition, it offers battery pack products, such as power stations, EV battery packs, and UPS LIB packs; rackmount solutions comprising slim type, CRPS, flex ATX, flex RPS, narrow type, battery backup PSU, and PSII mini RPS products; and power supply and battery backup centralized solutions. The company was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

5314.TWO.summary: Myson Century, Inc. provides micro-controllers (MCU), automobile IT solutions, fiber solutions, and motor control solutions in Taiwan. The company also offers dual CMOS operational amplifiers, as well as ASIC design services. Its products are used in automobile, motor control and drive, embedded networking, and optical network applications. Myson Century, Inc. was incorporated in 1990 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

5315.TWO.summary: United Radiant Technology Corporation manufactures and sells liquid crystal display panels and modules. The company's panels and modules include TN, WTN, STN, WSTN, FSTN, WFSTN, and TFT. It also offers LCM products, capacitive and resistive touch panels, heat dissipations, LED lighting products, electronic shelf labels, and automotive products. The company offers its products through a network of approximately 20 distributors worldwide. United Radiant Technology Corporation was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

5321.TWO.summary: Best Friend Technology Co., Ltd manufactures and sells printed circuit boards (PCBs). It offers flex PCBs; and rigid PCBs, such as wireless WIFI, projector, light, and power system drive boards, as well as solar panels. The company was formerly known as Yeti Electronics Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Best Friend Technology Co., Ltd in June 2008. Best Friend Technology Co., Ltd was founded in 1983 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

5324.TWO.summary: Shihlin Development Company Limited operates in real estate development business in Taiwan. It offers land development, building planning, engineering construction, and after sales services. The company is also involved in catering, hotel, leisure, and recreation business. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

5340.TWO.summary: Baotek Industrial Materials Ltd. manufactures and sells fiberglass fabrics in primarily Taiwan, China, and internationally. It offers aerospace fiberglass fabric, a reinforcement material for airplanes' internal structure; high temperature filter bag used in power and steel plants, incinerators, and cement factories; fiberglass sun shade that are use in buildings, interior designs, construction, and furniture; PTFE fabrics for use in PTFE coating areas; and electronic fiberglass fabrics. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

5344.TWO.summary: Vate Technology Co., Ltd. provides integrated circuit (IC) testing services in Taiwan and China. The company offers IC testing services related to the service of wafer probing and final testing; BURN IN, a test service on electrical components and final products; and LED products. It also provides chip probing test, final test, SLT system module test, CMOS image sensor testing, and back end services, as well as sells LED panel light products. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

5348.TWO.summary: TranSystem, Inc. designs and develops wireless communications products for the RF communications and GPS markets in Taiwan. The company offers wireless products, such as sDAS HEU, sDAS RAU, and digital MSB repeaters; DAS accessories, such as power dividers, antennas, and power over Ethernet; Wi-Fi products; MMDS downconverters, transceivers, and antennas; switching power supply with DC inserters; and WiMAX outdoor base station and outdoor CPE products. It also provides GPS products, including Bluetooth GPS products, software solutions for GPS data loggers, GPS data loggers, wired GPS products, active antennas, and engine boards, as well as tracking devices, and modules for embedded GPS applications. TranSystem, Inc. was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Miaoli, Taiwan.

5351.TWO.summary: Etron Technology, Inc. develops buffer memory and system-on-chips in the United States, Europe, Japan, and Asian countries. The company offers known-good-die-memory integrated circuits (ICs), specialty dynamic random access memories (DRAMs), automotive DRAMs, consumer electronic DRAMs, and industrial DRAMs; and system ICs, including USB 3.0 host and flash drive controllers, Webcam controllers, and depth map controllers. It also provides eDRAM-by-dies, DRAM design-and-dies, and DRAM design-and-die foundry services, as well as boot device solutions. The company offers its products for use in AIOT, display panel, VR/AR, robot, automobile, communication, and computer applications. Etron Technology, Inc. was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

5353.TWO.summary: Tailyn Technologies, Inc. engages in the design and manufacture of turnkey solutions for communication and applications sectors in Taiwan. The company offers industrial Ethernet switches comprising unmanaged, lite managed, and managed Ethernet switches; carrier Ethernet products; wireless LAN products; and telecom products. It also provides design, joint-development, manufacturing, associated engineering, and logistic support services. The company was formerly known as Tailyn Communication Company, Ltd. and changed its name to Tailyn Technologies, Inc. in July 2013. Tailyn Technologies, Inc. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

5356.TWO.summary: Sirtec International Co.,Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells electronic product assemblies, and plastic injection and molding products in Taiwan. It offers communication products, including GPS receivers, broadband routers, and VO IPhones; computer peripheral products, such as laser toner cartridges, POS machines, and platform NAS; consumer products comprising LED TVs, HHDs, and Bluetooths; optoelectronic products, such as TFT-LCD drive cards, and LED light bars and lightings; automotive electronic products comprising head up displays, car video recorders, GPS models, and tire pressure detectors; and OEM products consisting of FPC processing, dispensers, blood glucose meters, and smart meters. The company also provides plastics products comprising cartridges, barcode scanners, car audio driver panels, modems, electronic assembly products, game controllers, health care and medical equipment, and electronic piano panels. In addition, it offers electronic plating, spray painting, printing, supersonic welding, and mold design and manufacturing services; and PCB assembly services. The company was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

5364.TWO.summary: Lealea Hotels & Resorts Co., Ltd. operates hotel under the LEALEA GARDEN HOTEL in Taiwan. The company was formerly known as I-Future Co., Ltd. Lealea Hotels & Resorts Co., Ltd. is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

5371.TWO.summary: Coretronic Corporation engages in the research, development, production, and marketing of projectors, backlights, and flat panel display related products in Taiwan and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Energy-Saving Products, Image Products and Brand, and Optical Components. It provides automobile displays, tablets, notebooks, laptops, and liquid crystal displays (LCDs) and LCD TV backlight modules; panel modules, electronic whiteboard modules, and semi-systems; and system solutions for medical, educational, ATM, point of sales, and public digital splicing displays. The company also offers digital projectors and video image signals for large-screen image projections, as well as interactive modules, smart connectors, edge blending and image warping processors, and image signal processing boxes; and imaging product solutions for computer data and projection, digital signage, screen blending, interactive experience, and smart connection for video image signals. In addition, it provides electronic components; batteries; computers and its peripheral devices; electronic materials and appliances; lighting applications; optical devices; data storage and processing equipment; and wireless communications equipment. Further, the company engages in the intelligent cloud, IT information, intelligent applications, and platform development related businesses of new media, as well as offers intelligent exercise and medical care related software and hardware products. Additionally, it provides intelligent display products and system integration solutions; image processing products; near-infrared spectrum solutions; unmanned aerial vehicle and intelligent robotics; MEMS sensors and modules; and augmented reality and mixed reality wearable display solutions. The company was formerly known as Optoma Corporation and changed its name to Coretronic Corporation in December 2001. The company was incorporated in 1992 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

5381.TWO.summary: Uniplus Electronics Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, processing, and trade of various printed circuit boards. The company offers laminated multilayer printed circuit boards, basic circuit boards, and copper foil base boards, as well as aluminum substrates and lubricated aluminum covers. Uniplus Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1991 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

5383.TWO.summary: Kenly Precision Industrial Co., LTD. manufactures and sells precision machine tools in Taiwan. The company offers molding products, including stamping molds and insert molding molds, as well as machining of jigs, tools, and parts; and photoelectric components, such as LED open tooling product. It also provides semiconductor components comprising IC heat sinks, transistor frames, diode frames, and CU clips; and electronic components consisting of connector terminals, contacts of relays and switches, and slide of variable resistors. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

5386.TWO.summary: Albatron Technology Co., Ltd provides IT solutions and technology equipment for industrial and application PCs in Taiwan. It offers motherboards, graphic cards, minicomputers, and laptops; micron products, including SSD, SSD M.2, RDIMM, UDIMM, SODIMM products; and peripherals and PC components. The company also provides embedded platform products, including embedded systems, ARM boards, and android panel kits; industrial MB products, such as mini-ITX, nano-ITX, and micro ATX products, as well as industrial barebones; gaming peripherals, including headsets; and WPS Office, an office software. In addition, it offers design-in, FAE technical support, manufacturing, and repairing services. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

5388.TW.summary: Sercomm Corporation researches, develops, manufactures, and sells networking communication software and equipment worldwide. The company offers LTE/5G mobility solutions, including small cells, CBRS, private LTE, NB-IoT/LTE-M modules, and LTE/5G terminals; broadband access solutions, such as DOCSIS, FTTx, xDSL, broadband routers, and residential LTE/5G gateways; and IoT (Internet of Things) solutions comprising IP cameras, IoT gateways, mobile IoT devices, low power IoT sensors, and IoT cloud. It also provides enterprise equipment that include WiFi access points, business routers, switches, and IP phones; and home connectivity and entertainment products that include WiFi mesh repeaters, G.hn adapters, over-the-top set-top boxes, and smart speakers. In addition, the company offers consultation and customer services for computer information products; and sells IT products, communication products, and software. Further, it manufactures, servers, routers, OS, and related software. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

5392.TWO.summary: AVY Precision Technology INC. designs, produces, and sells camera parts in Taiwan. The company offers metal parts for cameras and mobile phones; inner structure parts, including LCD frames and laser welding assemblies; and nameplate and appearance parts, such as decorative parts, stamping plates, and flash reflector covers. It also provides multi-function printers and mechanical parts of medical equipment; electronic and auto parts comprising power cord chucks, battery plugs, metal shrapnels for relay, and gold plated shrapnels; and metal stamping parts and plastic parts. In addition, the company engages in stamping, producing, and supplying micro-motors; and designing and manufacturing molds and stamping products. AVY Precision Technology INC. was founded in 1975 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

5398.TWO.summary: Inalways Corporation engages in the electronic and power supply components manufacturing, and medical biotechnology businesses in Taiwan and internationally. The company provides IEC connectors, receptacles, power entry modules, wire assemblies, and AC ducks and DC jacks. It also offers prescription and OTC drugs, medical devices, and health supplements. The company was formerly known as Liwei Industrial Co., Ltd and changed its name to Inalways Corporation in July 2017. Inalways Corporation was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

5403.TWO.summary: Dimerco Data System Corporation operates as a system integrator and service provider in Taiwan. It engages in the planning and integration of software systems, and installation and maintenance of hardware equipment. The company also provides software services for financial, securities, commercial, general, banking, asset management, trust, and bond applications. In addition, it offers co-location, backup rehearsal, and Dimerco data system's cloud services; and cross-platform solutions for operating platform, virtualization, heterogeneous platform, information security, monitoring and control, database services, and data backup to fulfill enterprises' service requirements of application systems. Dimerco Data System Corporation is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

5434.TW.summary: Topco Scientific Co., Ltd. provides precision materials, processing equipment, and components for semiconductor and opto-electronic industries in Taiwan, China, and internationally. It also offers semiconductor related products, such as wafer and wafer processing materials; wafer carriers; thin films; photolithography materials; etching and furnace products, including quartz glass products, chemical, and special gases; CMP slurry products; package and testing related materials and equipment; and semiconductor equipment. In addition, the company offers LCD related equipment and materials; LED related photoelectric related products; solar materials comprising conductive paste for solar cells, quartz crucibles, SiC powder, coolants, diamond wires, chemicals, and special gases; and electronic materials. Further, it undertakes water treatment, clean room and electromechanical, and public construction projects; and solar power plant projects, as well as provides IC foundry services. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

5438.TWO.summary: Teco Image Systems Co., Ltd. provides OEM and ODM services to imaging and communication products industries worldwide. The company is involved in the design, development, and manufacture of multi-function printing devices, plain paper facsimiles, digital copiers, and color scanners. It also offers mechanical subsystems comprising control panels and automatic document feeders; optical subsystems, such as scan units; and electronic sub-systems, including printer controller cards, printer network cards, Internet fax cards, fax controllers, and copier controllers. The company was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

5443.TWO.summary: Gallant Precision Machining Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, manufacture, and sale of FPD, semiconductor, intelligent automatic, and biomedical equipment in Taiwan, China, and internationally. The company provides molds and machinery, metal and mold parts, stamping and die-cast parts, and automated manufacturing systems, as well as unit equipment. Its products comprise FT-LCD / OLED / flexible OLED display process equipment, including TEG probers, and array testers, cleaners, and wet etchings; edge grinding and polarizer attachment machines, cell and in-process tester, and thinned glass surface defect inspection equipment; edge /plasma and excimer UV cleaners; panel surface inspection and burr checker system; cassette station, loader / unloader and automation, and dense packer / unpacker C/V, buffer etc.; semiconductor failure analysis testing equipment; and trim/form, auto molding, IC substrate punch, die set/kit for trim/form, fully auto panel molding systems, and auto sealing machine molds, as well as FC bump coin lamination equipment. The company also offers grain pick/place, IC bonding, IC die multi-face inspection and sorting, and heat sink covering machines; laser marking machines; substrate, strip, and panel grinders; batch etchers, stripers, developers, and cleaners; wafer surface defect inspection machine and white light interference measurement system; intelligent logistics and factory integration, solar cell automation handling, intelligent diagnosis and preventive maintenance, and robot handling and machining systems, as well as process automation equipment and lithium ion battery core seal welding and lamination device products. In addition, it engages in wholesale and retail of contact lenses and related care products. Gallant Precision Machining Co., Ltd. was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

546.SI.summary: Medtecs International Corporation Limited, an integrated healthcare products and services provider, manufactures and distributes medical consumables for healthcare distributors, pharmaceutical companies, and hospital groups worldwide. It operates through Manufacturing, Hospital Services, and Distribution segments. The Manufacturing segment produces and sub-contracts a range of medical consumables, including patients' apparels, disposable surgical masks, boot covers and surgical gowns, underpads, adult diapers, crochet blankets, bed linens, and medical bandages. The Hospital Services segment provides laundry and leasing services, including hospital linen rental and laundry, management of hospital laundry facilities, hospital automation, and other non-core hospital functions for hospitals in Taiwan and the Philippines. The Distribution segment markets Medtecs-branded medical consumables to hospitals, pharmacies, and other end users in the Asia Pacific. This segment also supplies other branded medical supplies and equipment comprising wheel chairs, syringes, nebulizers, and blood pressure monitors. Medtecs International Corporation Limited also manufactures, leases, trades in, and sells woven and knitted fabrics, and other made-up articles of textile products; trades in hospital textiles and garments, pillow cases, bed sheets, gowns, and other apparel products; and provides garters and other garment products. It also engages in the subleasing activities; and manufacture and supply personal protective equipment. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

5460.TWO.summary: Mustang Industrial Corp. manufactures and sells progressive die molds and stamping products in Taiwan. The company provides shielding frame and cover assemblies for tuners; metal stamped frames and covers for signal shielding; and large size metal stamping products, including cover and chassis of set top box and satellite receivers, as well as heat spreaders for IC/chipsets and drawn parts in various shapes. It also offers middle size stamping parts, such as metal frames, brackets, and plates for LCD panels; small size stamping parts comprising springs and contacting fingers for EMC solution; and high precision stamping parts, including micro punching/blanking technology to replace chemical etching, as well as terminals, jumpers, contact springs, etc. Mustang Industrial Corp. was founded in 1972 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

5469.TW.summary: HannStar Board Corp. manufactures, fabricates, and sells print circuit boards in Taiwan. The company offers telecom, server, back plane, card, and NB products. Its products are used in computer and peripheral; cellular phones, networking equipment, and telecom systems; game consoles, set top boxes, televisions, and printers; and car control panels, automotive navigation systems, and digital products for official or entertaining services applications. The company was formerly known as Pacific Science and Technology Industrial Co., Ltd. and changed its name to HannStar Board Corp. in December 1998. HannStar Board Corp. was founded in 1989 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

5471.TW.summary: Sonix Technology Co.,Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells integrated circuits (ICs) in Taiwan and internationally. The company provides microcontrollers for use in computer peripherals, communication products, remote controllers, intelligent charging, home appliances, car alarm systems, security systems, electronic scales, thermometers, blood pressure monitors, tire gauges, and health equipment. It also offers voice controllers for interactive and educational electronic toys, handheld games, educational learning appliances, and other devices; and a range of video/image controllers. In addition, the company provides wireless video and audio solutions for remote control toys, baby monitors, and wireless home security systems; optical identification device chipsets for education, entertainment, and digital home appliances; multimedia network platforms for consumer Wi-Fi IP cameras makers; and USB controllers for audio. Sonix Technology Co.,Ltd. as founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Zhubei City, Taiwan.

5475.TWO.summary: Glotech Industrial Corp. produces and sells e-glass fiber fabrics in Taiwan and internationally. It offers fiber glass fabrics and yarns that are used as composite materials. The company was formerly known as A Johnson Composite Inc. and changed its name to Glotech Industrial Corp. in May 2011. Glotech Industrial Corp. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Yangmei, Taiwan.

5481.TWO.summary: Sino Tactful Co., Ltd. engages in the education business in Taiwan. It operates early childhood English education platform, K-12 English learning platform and plus cloud digital learning, and travel (study) consultant system, as well as offers AI American listening and speaking textbook. The company was founded in 1979 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

5483.TWO.summary: Sino-American Silicon Products Inc. researches, develops, designs, manufactures, trades, and sells semiconductor ingots and wafers, varistors, optoelectronics, and communication wafer materials. It provides CZ/FZ/NTD silicon ingots, Epi wafers, polished wafers, antimony-doped wafers, etched wafers, TVS wafers, arsenic-doped wafers, ultra-thin wafers, deep diffusion wafers, solar ingot and wafers, cells, modules, and sapphire wafers. The company also investment activities; and solar power generation business. It operates in Taiwan, Japan, Korea, rest of Asia, the United States, Europe, and internationally. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

5484.TW.summary: EverFocus Electronics Corporation engages in the research and development, manufacture, marketing, and service of CCTV surveillance systems, CCD cameras, and digital image processing equipment worldwide. The company offers Edge Computer, a smart surveillance system that provide real-time surveillance footage and access to traffic and road conditions; and multiple interface camera for industrial computers, including USB, RJ-45, etc. It also offers server systems; mobile app and management software that cover transportation, education, surveillance, retail, and medical health care; vehicle surveillance products; and accessories. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

5487.TWO.summary: Tontek Design Technology Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells consumer electronics IC design products. The company offers multimedia series products, including TV game systems; 3C appliances series products, such as AD MCUs, LCD and LED drivers, infrared IR emissions, calculators, and energy-saving appliances; and health care series comprising R2F MCUs, indoor-outdoor thermometer, sports car meter, heart rate detection, and thermometer series. It also provides touch series, including capacitive touch MCUs and capacitive touch standard products; and green energy series, such as LED driver, PIR energy saving, PIC MICU, and PIR peripheral components. Tontek Design Technology Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

5489.TWO.summary: DynaColor, Inc. provides video surveillance products and automatic optical inspection systems in Taiwan. The company offers speed dome cameras, DVR products, NVR products, IP cameras, intelligent IP cameras, FA cameras and systems, and AI based surveillance systems. DynaColor, Inc. was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

5493.TWO.summary: San Lien Technology Corp. provides environment monitoring and micro vibration detection products, and system integration services in Taiwan and internationally. It offers sensor and recorder products, such as acceleration transducers, amplifiers, angle sensors, annular load cells, crackmeters, displacement transducers, inclinometer casings, load cells, network accelerometers, pressure transducers, cube visual and voice terminals, main control units, rebar strain gauges, solid load cells, spot-weldable strain gauges, strain gauges, switch boxes, tilt plates, tilt casts, tilt views, torque transducers, vibration sensors, vibration monitoring systems, weldable strain gauges, data loggers, and VW piezometers. The company was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

5508.TWO.summary: Yungshin Construction & Development Co., Ltd. engages in the construction and sale of residential and commercial buildings in Taiwan. It is also involved in the sale of building materials; and rental business. In addition, the company offers interior design services. Yungshin Construction & Development Co., Ltd. is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

5514.TWO.summary: Sunfon Construction Co., Ltd. engages in the construction of national residences. It also leases and sells commercial buildings. The company was founded in 1977 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

5515.TW.summary: Chien Kuo Construction Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the construction business in Taiwan and China. The company offers construction services for residential buildings, factory and office buildings, public facilities, and commercial buildings; undertakes the related electrical and mechanical engineering of air-conditioning, water and electricity, fire-fighting, intelligent building, etc.; and manages electromechanical projects. It also manufactures and sells commercial concrete; and participates in concrete supply and pumping for construction of roads, bridges, and residential projects. The company is also involved in the procurement, planning, installation, and consultation activities; and provision of cargo handling, international trade, and computer software technology development and consultation services. Chien Kuo Construction Co., Ltd. was founded in 1931 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

5519.TW.summary: LongDa Construction & Development Corporation engages in the provision of construction services primarily in Taiwan. It also involves in the real estate development and leasing, and hotel business. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

5521.TW.summary: Kung Sing Engineering Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the construction business in Taiwan. Its projects include roads, bridges, tunnels, residential buildings, airports, and railways, as well as marine works. The company was founded in 1941 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

5522.TW.summary: Farglory Land Development Co., Ltd. operates as a construction company in Taiwan. The company builds residential buildings and commercial buildings for sale and investment; undertakes public construction projects; and develops professional areas. The company was formerly known as Metropolitan Construction Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Farglory Land Development Co., Ltd. in December 2005. Farglory Land Development Co., Ltd. was founded in 1969 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

5523.TWO.summary: Fong-Chien Construction Co.,LTD. engages in construction business. The company was formerly known as Hongdu Construction Co., Ltd. Fong-Chien Construction Co.,LTD. was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

5525.TW.summary: Sweeten Real Estate Development Co.,Ltd. constructs and develops residential, commercial, and industrial projects. It is also involved in urban renewal development and land development activities. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

5530.TWO.summary: Lungyen Life Service Corporation provides funeral services in Taiwan. It is also involved in the development and lease of interment premises; sale and rental of residence and business buildings; invests in securities; provision of architecture and civil engineering services; and sale of cremated remains storage facilities. The company was formerly known as Dahan Development Corp. Lungyen Life Service Corporation was founded in 1987 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

5531.TW.summary: Shining Building Business Co., Ltd. engages in the subcontract construction, leasing, and sale of commercial buildings and residential buildings in Taiwan. It also offers hotel management services. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

5533.TW.summary: Founding Construction & Development Co., Ltd. engages in the construction of housings and factory buildings in Taiwan. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

5536.TWO.summary: Acter Group Corporation Limited provides engineering services in Taiwan, Mainland China, and internationally. It offers construction, design, and maintenance services related to air conditioning, environmental control, clean room set-up, ventilation engineering, and energy technology services. The company also trades in ice water machines and energy storing equipment, as well as offers turnkey services.
