In addition, it is involved in the wholesale of electronic and chemical equipment; construction and set-up of freezing and electronic equipment, and air conditioners; construction business; design and manufacture of air and liquid containers; and trade of clean rooms and air conditioners. Further, the company provides machinery trading services, as well as acts as an agent for electronic equipment importing and exporting. Additionally, it engages in the design and construction of cleanrooms, electromechanical equipment, and process pipelines for high-tech electronics and biomedical industries. Acter Group Corporation Limited was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

5547.TWO.summary: Jioushun Construction Co., Ltd. engages in the construction of luxury houses. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

5601.TWO.summary: Taiwan Allied Container Terminal Corp. engages in the container storage and warehouse rental activities. The company is involved in the concentration and decentralization of containers; container cargo unpacking, loading, and unloading; container maintenance and renovation; interlocking warehouses; and other businesses related to container terminals. It also constructs residential and commercial buildings, as well as offers tally packaging products and services. The company was founded in 1973 and is based in Keelung, Taiwan.

5604.TWO.summary: Chung Lien Transportation Co., Ltd engages in the real estate rental business. Chung Lien Transportation Co., Ltd was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

5607.TW.long_name: Farglory Free Trade Zone Investment Holding Co., Ltd
5607.TW.summary: Farglory Free Trade Zone Investment Holding Co., Ltd operates free trade zone in Taiwan. The park provides enterprises various commercial services and facilities, including automated warehousing facilities; an economic and trading special operation zone which encompasses land, sea, and air transport; and an air cargo terminal, a forwarders building, an international logistics center, and an enterprise business center. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

5608.TW.summary: Shih Wei Navigation Co., Ltd. operates as a dry cargo shipping company in Taiwan. It engages in the shipping transportation, shipping agency, and ship management and chartering, as well as ship sale and purchase activities. The company trades in various types of bulk cargo, such as steel products, ores, etc., as well as equipment, wooden cargos, wood pulps, general cargos, and logs. The company was founded in 1985 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

5609.TWO.summary: Dimerco Express Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the international transportation and logistics business. The company offers air freight services, including scheduled consolidation, direct air carrier, airport-to-airport, and door-to-door delivery; ocean freight services; and sea/air and air/sea freight services. It also provides customs brokerage services, such as customs clearance services and professional solutions; and logistics and warehousing services comprising vendor managed inventory, raw materials distribution, finished goods distribution, reverse logistics, after sales logistics, distribution assortment, cross-docking, just-in-time, sequenced supply synchronized delivery management, and in-transit mixing product support services. In addition, the company offers cross-border trucking, domestic transportation, cargo insurance brokerage, and logistics supply chain management consultancy services. Further, it provides integrated value added services that include domestic and cross-border air and road freight, as well as logistics warehousing services, and regular and bonded logistics parks/centers under the China Plus name. The company serves the aerospace, auto components, cabling, communication equipment, computer and peripherals, electrical equipment, electronic equipment and instruments, machinery parts, metals and mining, paper and forest goods, construction materials, telecom parts, plastic products, semiconductors and semiconductor equipment, and tooling industries. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

5701.TWO.summary: Janfusun Fancyworld Corp. operates theme parks and holiday hotels in Taiwan. It also operates department stores, as well as an online store for ticket and reservation services. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Yunlin, Taiwan.

5703.TWO.short_name: THE LANDIS TAIPEI HOTEL CO. LTD
5703.TWO.long_name: The Landis Taipei Hotel Co., Ltd
5703.TWO.summary: The Landis Taipei Hotel Co., Ltd operates a hotel in Taipei City, Taiwan. The company operates The Landis Taipei Hotel, which offers superior and deluxe rooms, disable rooms, executive and corner suites, dining and meeting rooms, banquet halls, and wedding and travel packages, as well as fitness center, business center, and lounge facilities. It also engages in restaurant, cafe, and bar businesses. The company was founded in 1977 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

5704.TWO.summary: Hotel Royal Chihpen operates a resort hotel in Taiwan. Its resort hotel comprises 183 guest accommodations, as well as offers recreational facilities and amenities. The company is based in Taitung, Taiwan.

5706.TW.summary: Phoenix Tours International, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, provides travel agency services in Taiwan. The company offers foreign group travel, mini and free tour, cruise vacation, international tickets, domestic and international reservations, Taiwan tourism, rail service, online consultation, domestic and international group travel, as well as free travel, passport, and visas for various countries. It also provides Phoenix Portable Cloud App. The company was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

5820.TWO.summary: JihSun Financial Holding Co.,Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, operates as a financial holding company in Taiwan. It engages in securities brokerage, trading, underwriting, and margin purchases and short sales; and stock transaction agency and futures trading activities, as well as provides auxiliary services for futures trading and stock warrant issuance. The company also offers general deposits, loans and discounts, stocks, short term securities, financial bonds, and others, as well as government bond investment and collection, fund trust transaction, and employee investment trust services. In addition, it operates as a property and life insurance agent, as well as provides venture capital, securities investment research, and proprietary trading services. Further, the company is involved in the securities research and analysis, corporate and personal financial planning, and financing activities, as well as sale of mutual funds and other financial products. JihSun Financial Holding Co.,Ltd. was incorporated in 2002 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

5859.TWO.summary: Farglory Life Insurance Co., Ltd. provides insurance products and services in Taiwan. It offers life, health, injury, travel, savings, and annuity insurance products, as well as investment products. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan. Farglory Life Insurance Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Farglory Group.

5863.TWO.summary: Taipei Star Bank provides various banking products and services in Taiwan. The company accepts check deposits, demand deposits, and time deposits; and domestic foreign exchange and commercial bills. It also provides short-term, medium-term, and long-term loans; bill discounts; letters of credit; treasury bills; safe deposit box; and guarantees. In addition, the company also invests in financial, public, short-term, and corporate bonds, as well as stocks; collects and pays against agents; and purchases and sells foreign currencies cash and traveler cheque. Further, it provides warehousing, and storage and agency services. The company was formerly known as Bank of Taipei, Ltd. Taipei Star Bank is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

5871.TW.summary: Chailease Holding Company Limited, an investment holding company, provides various leasing and financing services in Taiwan, China, ASEAN countries, and internationally. It offers leasing services for a range of assets, including transportation, industrial, medical, and information and office-related equipment, as well as aircraft; and installment sales service to corporate customers in various industries, such as transportation, storage and communications, wholesale and retail, and construction, as well as to individual consumers. The company also provides import/export factoring services; direct financing services, such as corporate loans to SMEs, and micro and large size enterprises; and debt collection and management, debt and collateral appraisal, auctioning, and past-due accounts receivable management services to financial institutions. In addition, it is involved in the life and property insurance brokerage; engineering, procurement, construction, operations, and maintenance of solar power plants; and real estate development businesses. Further, the company provides house property leasing and management services; financial consulting and investment activities; mortgage services; and cloud products software. Chailease Holding Company Limited was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

5871A.TW.summary: Chailease Holding Company Limited, an investment holding company, provides various leasing and financing services in Taiwan, China, ASEAN countries, and internationally. It offers leasing services for a range of assets, including transportation, industrial, medical, and information and office-related equipment, as well as aircraft; and installment sales service to corporate customers in various industries, such as transportation, storage and communications, wholesale and retail, and construction, as well as to individual consumers. The company also provides import/export factoring services; direct financing services, such as corporate loans to SMEs, and micro and large size enterprises; and debt collection and management, debt and collateral appraisal, auctioning, and past-due accounts receivable management services to financial institutions. In addition, it is involved in the life and property insurance brokerage; engineering, procurement, construction, operations, and maintenance of solar power plants; and real estate development businesses. Further, the company provides house property leasing and management services; financial consulting and investment activities; mortgage services; and cloud products software. Chailease Holding Company Limited was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

5878.TWO.summary: Taiming Assurance Broker Co., Ltd. engages in the life and property insurance brokerage business in Taiwan. It offers personal life, injury, health, annuity, group, and investment insurance products. The company also provides fire, automobile, liability, and other property insurance. Taiming Assurance Broker Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

5880.TW.long_name: Taiwan Cooperative Financial Holding Co., Ltd.
5880.TW.summary: Taiwan Cooperative Financial Holding Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides commercial banking, insurance, securities, bills finance, asset management, and investment trust services in Taiwan. It offers general deposits and loans. The company is also involved in the planning, management, and operation of the trust business; and custodianship of nondiscretionary trust funds in domestic and overseas securities and mutual funds. In addition, it engages in securities brokerage, dealing, and underwriting activities; provision of pecuniary and securities financing facilities for the trading of listed securities; and trading of futures and futures proprietary trading business. Further, the company brokers and deals in short-term bills, government bonds, and bank debentures; underwrites commercial papers; acts as a registrar of commercial papers; provides guarantees on or endorsements of commercial paper and bank acceptance, as well as consulting services on corporate financial matters; brokers call loans between financial institutions; deals in corporate bonds; and offers investment related equity instruments. Additionally, it is involved in the purchase, appraisal, auction, and management of financial institutions' creditors' rights, as well as the purchase of accounts receivable and management of overdue receivables; and life and property insurance brokering business. As of December 31, 2020, the company operated 269 branches in Taiwan, as well as 1 offshore banking unit, 13 overseas branches, 8 overseas sub-branches, and 2 representative offices. Taiwan Cooperative Financial Holding Co., Ltd. was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

5902.TWO.summary: Tait Marketing & Distribution Co., Ltd. imports and trades in consumer goods in Taiwan. It offers tea, coffee, mineral water, beer, wine, liquor, and other beverages; desserts; and sugar cake/snack food products. The company also exports its products. Tait Marketing & Distribution Co., Ltd. was founded in 1845 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

5903.TWO.summary: Taiwan FamilyMart Co., Ltd. operates various convenience stores in Taiwan and internationally. The company engages in the provision of warehouse tally services; electronic information services; system integrated services; sales and services of computer software and related equipment; logistics activities; manufacturing of food; and trucking, staffing, and packaging services. In addition, it wholesales and retails books and magazines, and household merchandise. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 3,548 stores in Taiwan; and 2,801 stores in China. Taiwan FamilyMart Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

5904.TWO.summary: POYA International Co., Ltd. operates personal beauty and daily merchandise stores in Taiwan. The company's stores offer makeup products and cosmetics, jewelries, daily goods, snacks, fashion hosieries, hardware products, underwear and pajamas, etc. As of April 30, 2020, it has operated 239 stores. The company was formerly known as POYA Department Store Co., Ltd. and changed its name to POYA International Co., Ltd. in June 2000. POYA International Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Tainan, Taiwan.

5905.TWO.long_name: Nan Ren Lake Leisure Amusement Co., Ltd.
5905.TWO.summary: Nan Ren Lake Leisure Amusement Co., Ltd. provides leisure and recreation facilities in Taiwan. It operates the National Museum of Marine Biology and Aquarium, an underwater tunnel, a resort and sleepover, dining service area, and underground food shopping mall, as well as Nargo electronic mall, an online shopping platform. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Kaohsiung City, Taiwan.

6020.TWO.summary: TaChan Securities Co.,Ltd. provides brokerage services in Taiwan. The company operates through three segments: Brokerage Department, Investment Banking Department, and Proprietary Trading Department. It offers securities lending/borrowing services, such as margin trading and short sale for the trading of securities, securities-backed lending, and unrestricted purpose loans; stock-related custody settlement, IPO subscription, bid auction, and securities borrowing and lending services; futures introducing brokerage services; and other securities investment consulting services, as well as undertakes the trading of securities, including online, mobile, and telephone order placements. The company also trades in securities comprising listed stocks, funds, and bonds for own account; manages derivatives consisting of call warrants, and securities-related futures and options; plans and counsels IPO process; guides and plans listing process of shares; plans and evaluates raising of capital and corporate financing strategy; invests and trades in emerging stocks; and promotes investment and venture capital business. In addition, it engages in the convertible bond asset swap business; trading of corporate and financial bonds, and bond transactions, and electronic bond trading systems; and reverse auction of government bonds on primary market. Further, the company provides securities investment consulting services, including accepting consignment to offer research and analysis opinions or suggestions on securities investment related matters; accepting discretionary investment; issuing securities-related products; and organizing securities-related seminars. The company was incorporated in 1988 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6021.TWO.summary: Ta Ching Securities Co., Ltd. provides securities services in Taiwan. The company engages in the general brokerage of market securities and self-financing securities, stock index futures, options, and foreign securities; and securities trading business. It is also involved in the provision of securities underwriting and issuing, and financial advisory services; and futures business. In addition, the company offers bond buyout and selling services; and bond investment advisory services. Ta Ching Securities Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6088.HK.summary: FIT Hon Teng Limited engages in the design, development, production, and sale of interconnect solutions and related products in Taiwan, People's Republic of China, the United States, Hong Kong, Malaysia, Singapore, and internationally. The company offers cable components, including array of IO cables assemblies, as well as wire harness and power cords. It also provides connector components comprising backplane, high speed, input/output, and power connectors, as well as memory/edge cards, sockets, terminal blocks, and wire to board/board to board connectors; and active optical cables, embedded optical modules, transceiver modules, and acoustic products. In addition, the company offers radio frequency antenna cable and module assemblies; wireless charging products and components; and accessories, such as headsets, speaker systems, and power and cable accessories. It also engages in research, development, and manufacture of batteries; manufacturing of metal processing machinery and equipment; and sale of smart home products. The company offers its products under the e Belkin, Linksys, Wemo, and Phyn brand names. It serves communications infrastructure, computers and consumer electronics, mobile and wireless devices, automotive, and industrial and medical industries. The company was formerly known as New Wing International Holdings Limited and changed its name to FIT Hon Teng Limited in June 2013. The company was incorporated in 2013 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan. Foxconn FIT Hon Teng Limited is a subsidiary of Foxconn (Far East) Limited.

6103.TWO.summary: Avid Electronics Corp. researches, develops, produces, and markets IC chip series products. The company offers audio-visual related IC products; analog IC products, such as power supply and lighting driver products; and wireless transmission system chips. It also provides external hard disk boxes, driving recorders, Bluetooth speakers, SD memory cards and flash drives, solid state hard disks, wireless charging equipment, air purification intelligent sweeping robots, LCD displays, and WIFI connection products. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

6104.TWO.summary: Genesys Logic, Inc., a fabless IC design house, provides high-speed interface technologies. The company offers USB hub controllers; storage products, such as card reader controllers; repeater products comprising USB, PCI express, and DP redrivers; image and video products consisting of scanner controllers, fisheye image processors, and PC-cameras; silicon intellectual properties; and USB host charger controllers and other products, as well as provides support services. Its products are used in computing and display applications. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6108.TW.summary: APCB Inc. produces and sells multi-layer PCB products for application in consumer electronic sector in Taiwan and internationally. The company provides camera module boards for use in security controls, notebooks, monitors, mobile phones, and tablets; TFT-LCD boards for LCDs, TVs, mobile phones, and backlight modules; and consumer electronic boards for use in projectors, type c modules, smart meters, mobile phones, notebooks, and games. It also offers RF module boards used in mobile phones, PCs, notebooks, and tablets; industrial control boards for PLC control panels, variable electrical appliances, electric control doors, servers, and power supply units; automotive boards for use in body control systems, dashboards, sensors boards, and head lamp; MCPCBs for LED thermal modules, LED packaging, and lighting; and memory module boards for use in SSD, USB, and moduleul. The company was founded in 1981 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

6109.TWO.summary: Atech OEM Inc. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells magnetic components, power supply solutions, and wireless devices in Taiwan. It offers magnetic components, including signal and communication transformers, power transformers, and EMC components; power supply solutions, such as power supply units (PSUs), which includes wall-mounts, desktops, interchangeable AC pins, car chargers, PSR, high surge, AC-DC and DC-DC converters, POE power, and ODM products; open frames, telecom power products, and LED drivers; and medical and industrial PSUs; and wireless devices comprising Bluetooth modules, Bluetooth dongles/adapters, and WiFi modules. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6111.TWO.summary: Softstar Entertainment Inc. develops, licenses, and sells mobile, online, and single player games in Mainland China, Taiwan, Hong Kong, and internationally. It also produces and sells peripherals and guides of computer software; and researches and develops network technologies. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6112.TW.summary: SYSAGE Technology Co., Ltd. provides ICT solutions in Taiwan. The company offers planning and system integration services for corporate network establishment, network system security, network management, and data processing analysis and backup system; and provides related technical consultation, and education and training courses, as well as professional services, such as corporate networks solutions, as well as develops professional application software solutions. It also provides network and system software and hardware products from Cisco, Oracle, and IBM; develops solutions for agent products; and plans the network hardware architecture, host system, network security mechanism, database, and related enterprise application software for customers. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6113.TWO.summary: ASEC International Corporation distributes semiconductor components in the Asia Pacific. Its products are used in PC; Internet; telecommunication; MCU; electronic products; multimedia software/hardware; and energy saving and carbon reduction products, including mobile TV, LCD TV, mobile phone, wireless broadband, internet, MP3, networking and telecom appliances, MPEG encoder/decoder, set-top box, CMOS sensor, adapter, HDTV, IP phone and various multimedia software, LED lighting, and green energy products. The company was formerly known as ASEC Company and changed its name to ASEC International Corporation in 1998. ASEC International Corporation was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6116.TW.summary: HannStar Display Corporation researches, develops, designs, manufactures, sells, and repairs thin film transistor (TFT)-liquid crystal display (LCD) products and touch panels under the HannsG and Hannspree brands. The company also offers flat-panel displays, and CCTV and related components. Its TFT-LCD products are used in notebook computer displays, desktop computer monitors, tablets, portable DVDs, digital photo frames, PND/car displays, mobiles, and wearable products. The company operates in Mainland China, Europe, Taiwan, and internationally. HannStar Display Corporation was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6118.TWO.summary: Xander International Corp. sells information and commercial products in Taiwan. It offers audio and video multimedia products, DIY components, computer peripherals, computer systems, network/monitoring/software products, storage devices, transaction equipment, car/outdoor products, living appliances, and combination goods. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6120.TW.summary: Darwin Precisions Corporation manufactures and sells backlight module technology in Taiwan. It provides optoelectronic products, including backlight and panel modules, NB display modules, touch module bounding, and SET machines; lighting application products, such as LED panel light, LED kitchen light, light guide plates, and application development products; and acrylic sheets, including optical grade acrylic boards, cover lens, Pika Pika, and PMMA. The company also offers precision metal stamping parts, such as backplane, frames, and covering cover; optical components consisting of LGP light guides; precision injection products, such as TV appearance, plastic front frame/back cover, and plastic frame; precision molds; and electronic paper applications. Its products are used in LCD TVs, personal monitors, notebook computers, and automotive displays. The company was formerly known as Forhouse Corporation and changed its name to Darwin Precisions Corporation in 2015. Darwin Precisions Corporation was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

6121.TWO.summary: Simplo Technology Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and sells battery packs worldwide. Its products include LEV power tool battery, handheld tool battery, and electric vehicle battery modules; household energy storage systems; smartphone, tablet, and laptop battery modules; power banks; wearable devices; and power banks, BT speaker, cleaning robots, wearable devices, and vacuum cleaner Li-ion battery modules. The company also provides machine parts, such as plastic moldings, injections/fixtures/films, metal stampings/trays, and die cut/busbar products; AGV products and automation equipment; and lab testing services, as well as power equipment, industrial robot controllers, machine arms, and industrial cameras. It offers its products for household appliances; and mobile devices, LEV, and EV applications, as well as for fit accessories. The company was formerly known as Simplo Company, Ltd. and changed its name to Simplo Technology Co., Ltd. in September 1998. Simplo Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

6122.TWO.summary: King Polytechnic Engineering Co., Ltd. operates as an integrated engineering and construction company in Taiwan and internationally. Its services include project planning, design, procurement, construction, commissioning, project management, and turnkey services. The company offers process, civil and structure, piping, equipment, electrical, mechanical, instrument and control, fire protection, and environmental protection work solutions for petrochemical and chemical industries. It also plans, designs, and constructs HVAC systems, cleanrooms, biological cleanrooms, air abatement systems, purified water systems, gas systems, and chemical systems, as well as provides electrical, automatic control, monitoring, fire protection, water supply and drainage, pipeline, air conditioning system, purified water system, gas system, chemical system, and hook-up services for high-tech, microelectronics, electronics, flat panel, semiconductors, optoelectronics, biotechnology, and pharmaceutical industries. In addition, the company offers planning, design, and construction services for various types of infrastructure and public work projects; and constructs green buildings, as well as constructs commercial high-rise buildings, deluxe residential buildings, five-star hotels, luxury recreation villas, and public construction projects. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6123.TWO.summary: GrandTech C.G. Systems Inc. operates as a distributor of graphics, imaging, and multimedia design software. The company distributes 2D and 3D professional software products; digital printing equipment and solutions; and IT software and hardware products for enterprises, as well as IT integration and cloud services. It operates in Taiwan, Hong Kong, China, Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, and internationally. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6124.TWO.summary: Yeh-Chiang Technology Corp. produces and sells electronic components and materials worldwide. It operates through Heat Pipe, Lighting, and Semiconductor segments. The company's thermal components include heat pipes, vapor chambers, and loop heat pipes. Its electronic materials comprise BGA solder sphere, solder paste, and SMT and semiconductor flux products. The company also engages in the production and sale of raw alcohol, lighting equipment, semiconductor packaging wires, and solder balls; manufacture and sale of bioethanol; international trade activities; and environmental protection related business, as well as offers LED products. It serves original equipment manufacturers of computing systems and electronic devices; semiconductor companies; manufacturers using SMT processes; manufacturers requiring thermal solutions; thermal module design and manufacturing companies; and system houses that require cooling technologies. Yeh-Chiang Technology Corp. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6125.TWO.summary: Kenmec Mechanical Engineering Co., Ltd. engages in the planning, design, manufacturing, and sale of logistics centers and intelligent automation integration services in Taiwan. It offers storage equipment, automated packaging equipment, logistic center, material handling equipment systems, automated agriculture/farming equipment, lithium batteries, and heat conduction/heat dissipation equipment. The company was formerly known as Guang Yun Machinery Engineering Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Kenmec Mechanical Engineering Co., Ltd. in March 1987. Kenmec Mechanical Engineering Co., Ltd. was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6126.TWO.summary: Singatron Enterprise Co.,Ltd develops, manufactures, and supplies electrical connectors for laptop industries in Taiwan and internationally. It offers waterproof connectors, such as circular, quick lock, M5/M8, M12, USB, USB charger, RJ45, cable gland, NMEA 2000, and LEV connectors; and consumer connectors, including DC power jack, audio jack, USB2.0/USB3.0, USB3.1 Type-C, RJ/transformer, HDMI, battery, and other connectors. The company also provides professional support services. Its products are used in consumer electronics, portable devices, networking, marine electronics, outdoor displays, outdoor lighting, and communications for outdoor solutions, as well as industrial automation and light electronic vehicles. Singatron Enterprise Co.,Ltd was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

6127.TWO.summary: LEATEC Fine Ceramics Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells chip alumina fine ceramic substrates in Taiwan. It develops high-voltage resistor, variable resistor, array, and chip resistor substrates, as well as chip array substrates. The company also offers fine ceramics, such as alumina, LED, aluminum nitride, laser machining ceramic, and lapping and polishing substrates, as well as ceramic cores and Zirconia toughened alumina; and green energy products, including junction boxes, compact combiner boxes, and tools and other products, as well as PV connectors, cables, and cable assemblies. In addition, it provides car-used electronic substrates comprising LED package, hybrid IC, and sensor substrates. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

6129.TWO.summary: Princeton Technology Corporation operates as a fabless IC design company in Taiwan. It provides IC technology for energy-saving solutions, including a series of energy-saving ballast driver ICs, LED lighting/backlight driver ICs, and brushless DC motor ICs for use in various indoor/outdoor lighting and motor control products. The company also offers display driver, multimedia audio controller, LED driver, motor driver, RF, encoder/decoder, remote control, GPS, I/O expander, power, and PFC controller ICs, as well as ASICs, microcontrollers, and automotive solutions. Its products are used in automotive dash-board and multimedia devices, portable audio players, digital TVs, home audio/video appliances, DSCs, DSLRs, monitoring cameras, and car security systems. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6130.TWO.summary: Singbao International Co. Ltd engages in the wholesale of Chinese medicines, western medicines, medical equipment, slimming products, and cosmetics in Taiwan and Asia. It is also involved in the research, development, production, and sale of wireless communication integrated circuits; and the operation of various beauty salons, as well as offers other services. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6133.TW.summary: Golden Bridge Electech Inc. designs, manufactures, assembles, and sells various cable products in Taiwan. The company offers interconnect solutions for automotive electronics, including electrical harness, interior and car body equipment, and interior lighting; and sensors and electronics, such as plugs and inlet to recharge batteries for electric and plug-in hybrid vehicles. It also provides microphones, speakers, headsets, two-way radios, handheld devices, and intercom systems, as well as programming, cloning, and GPS cables. In addition, the company offers cables, cable assemblies, and integrated system solutions for a range of industrial sectors, including factory automation, drive technology, instrumentation, measurement and sensor technology, audio and video, and high temperature. Further, it provides high bandwidth data and termination cables for datacom and telecom markets; Thunderbolt cable, which connects to host systems or devices; various signal/control cables for power systems; and ultrasound transducer probe cables for medical device applications. Golden Bridge Electech Inc. was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6134.TWO.summary: Wanshih Electronic Co., Ltd. operates as an OEM/ODM manufacturer of mini coaxial cable assembly for tier-one notebook computer and mobile phone companies worldwide. The company primarily provides NB and mini-coaxial cables, LCD TV cables/wire harnesses, mobile phone cables, wire harness cables, electronic components, and smart antennas/modules. Its products include external cables comprising HDMI, USB 2.0/3.0/3.1, SATA, LAN, D-SUB/DVI, RCA, VGA, BNC, automobile, lightning, and medical cables, as well as power cords; antennas, such as external Wi-Fi and LTE, built-in PCB and metal, built-in MIMO, satellite positioning, small base station, and fiberglass tube; and internal cables consisting of LVDS/eDP, consumer device, industrial, medical, and robotic cables. It also provides SMT products and assembly, such as SMT equipment comprising multi-f production, solder paste printing, 3D online solder paste, and AOI optical inspection; and various applications in automobile, consumer electronic, and 3C/AI. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6136.TW.summary: Fullerton Technology Co., Ltd. provides activity management services; and operates an online booking service platform in Taiwan. It also operates an Ez Booking, a cross-cinema ticket booking platform that offers movie booking and online e-ticketing services; and Niceday Play Experience, a reservation platform for a few hours of activity experience, or a small day trip. In addition, the company provides a digital imaging service platform; and prepaid card communication services, as well as operates telecom communications exchange platform. Further, it engages in combining software and hardware applications to create a convenient and smart life. Fullerton Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6138.TWO.summary: Anpec Electronics Corporation designs power ICs, mixed signal ICs, and power discrete devices in Taiwan. Its primary products include power management ICs, audio amplifier ICs, LCD controller/driver ICs, hall effect ICs, and power MOSFETs. The company also provides switching regulators, lighting and display products, linear regulators, switches, LCD bias convertors, battery powered systems, DVR powered systems, audio products, analog to digital converters, battery management solutions, voltage supervisors, and motor drivers. Its products are used in various applications, including motherboards, VGA cards, notebooks, mobiles, PND systems, LCD TVs, LCD panels, fans, inverters, WLAN cards, and ATX power supply products, as well as in communication IC and micro-controller applications. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

6141.TW.summary: Plotech Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells printed circuit boards (PCB's) in Taiwan and China. It offers PCB's of various layers for applications, such as automotive, telecommunication, Bluetooth, LCD displays, storage, connectors, scanners, industrial PC's, medical equipment, computers, wireless, power supply, dram modules, probe cards, load boards, burn-in board power supply, GPS, wireless, research and development prototypes, digital cameras and video, IA products, PDAs, cellular phones, etc. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

6142.TW.summary: Cameo Communications, Inc. manufactures and assembles computer network communication equipment and communication products. The company offers layer 2 management Ethernet switches, wireless client adapters, wireless LAN AP/routers, SOHO routers, Ethernet switches, media converters, USB to Ethernet converters, Web-smart switches and Ethernet NIC products, network cards and hubs, network routers, and network residential gateway products, as well as broadband products. Its products also comprise consumer and SMB/enterprise Wi-Fi products; unmanaged, PoE, Web-smart managed, and data center switches; and cable and xDSL modem products. The company markets its products for network integrators, distributors, VARs, and other resellers in the United States, the Pacific Rim, and Europe. Cameo Communications, Inc. was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6143.TWO.summary: Netronix, Inc. designs and manufactures network and e-Reader products in Taiwan and internationally. It also designs and sells ID, hardware, and software products, as well as provides electronic shelf label and electron baggage tag. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

6144.TWO.summary: Deltamac(Taiwan) Co.,Ltd. produces, distributes, and franchises audio and video products in Taiwan. The company engages in production, recording, publication, rental, distribution, and export/import of TV and film program DVD, BD and 4K UHD discs, and music CDs. It is also involved in the agency and sale of physical and digital copyrights of movies; operation of TSUTAYA bookstores and Wired Tokyo cafÃ©s; and provision of catering services. In addition, the company sells stationery products and delicatessen. Deltamac(Taiwan) Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6146.TWO.summary: Sporton International Inc. provides product testing and certification services in Taiwan and internationally. It offers mobile device services, including design consultation, training, testing, and certification that allow its customers to acquire certificates and promote products. The company also provides EMC compatibility, safety, radio device, cellphone handset, and NCC testing and certification services, as well as customization services; and sells anti magnetic components. Sporton International Inc. was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6147.TWO.summary: Chipbond Technology Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, provides services for backend assembly processing of LCD driver integrated circuits (ICs) in Taiwan, the United States, and internationally. The company offers turnkey services, which comprise bumping manufacturing services, including gold, solder, and copper bumping services; redistribution layer services; wafer surface processing services, such as back side metal and dielectric layer coating process services; wafer grinding, dicing, and picking and placing services; package and testing services comprising driver and non-driver IC testing, driver IC package, and wafer level chip scale packaging services; final inspection and failure analysis services; and chip tray design and manufacturing services. It also invests in, develops, manufactures, and sells electronic components, as well as tape automated bonding, tape carrier, and others. Chipbond Technology Corporation was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

6148.TWO.summary: Azion Corporation provides information, communication, network, telecommunications, broadband, traffic control engineering, and cloud applications services in Taiwan. The company's products include DataPilot 10, a handheld digital evidence acquisition instrument; big data platforms; Cisco data center and virtualization, Cisco cloud collaboration, and Cisco enterprise network services; information security solutions; search and exploration engine systems; storage systems; and data protection solutions. Its solutions include information and communication system integration, big data analysis and knowledge exploration, information security, digital banking and financial, and smart police solutions. It serves finance, manufacturing, retail, telecommunications, and government agencies. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6150.TWO.summary: TUL Corporation develops and markets hardware solutions in IT industry worldwide. The company offers gaming and embedded graphics cards, SoC based mainboards and systems, FPGA products, thunderbolt adopters, and SSD storage solutions. It serves OEMs, distributors, VARs, and system integrators. The company was formerly known as C.P. Technologies and changed its name to TUL Corporation in March 2004. TUL Corporation was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6151.TWO.summary: Ginar Technology Co., Ltd. produces and sells performance materials in the field of engineering thermoplastics in Asia, the Americas, Europe, and internationally. It offers MAPEX polyamide engineering plastics, such as impact modified, mineral reinforced, glass fiber reinforced, and flame retardant polyamide 6, polyamide 66, and high temperature nylon compounds for automotive, electrical/electronic, and other industries; and mineral fiber, glass fiber, and impact modifier or flame retardant APLAX polypropylene engineering plastics. The company also provides impact modification and glass fiber reinforcement or flammability KAPEX polycarbonate engineering plastics; KAPEX PC/ABS alloys for cars instrument panels and dashboards, notebook covers, and cell phones; and KAPEX green products that contain r-PET and/or r-PC, which are from post-consumer recycled products for notebook PC, desktop PC, LED TV, monitor, and OA products. In addition, it offers flame retardant high performance nylon composite engineering plastics. The company's products are used for automotive and consumer electronics applications. Ginar Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

6152.TW.summary: Prime Electronics & Satellitics Inc. develops, manufactures, and sells digital satellite communication products worldwide. The company provides headend systems; home networking products; low noise block-converters; multi-switches; set-top boxes; and satellite products for satellite TV, CATV, and IPTV markets. It serves TV operators, telcos, and distributors. Prime Electronics & Satellitics Inc. was founded in 1995 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

6153.TW.summary: Career Technology (Mfg.) Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells flexible printed circuits in Taiwan and internationally. The company provides single-sided, double-sided, double access, and multilayer flex circuits; air gap structures; and rigid-flex boards, as well as component assemblies. Its products are used in various applications, such as mobile phones, touch panels, tablet PCs, cameras, flat displays, notebooks, GPS, autotronics, ultrabooks, wearable devices, and virtual reality, as well as in medical instrument market segments. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6154.TWO.summary: Sunfar Computer Co., Ltd sells various goods for consumers in Taiwan. It offers home appliances, personal computer hardware and peripheral equipment, computer supplies and consumables, computer software and books, consumer electronics and communications, etc., as well as OA merchandise and maintenance services. The company provides its products through 64 stores and online shopping platform. Sunfar Computer Co., Ltd was founded in 1982 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

6156.TWO.summary: Song Shang Electronics Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells magnetic components, printed circuit boards, and wire products. Its magnetic components include coils, line filters, power chokes, and transformers primarily used in the production of transformers, filters, and inductors, as well as in adapter, LED TV, LCD TV, charger, game console, desktop, monitor, printer, lighting, and communication applications. The company's printed circuit boards are used in consumable electronic products, power supplies, machinery, instruments, and automobile industries, as well as other industries. It also offers wire products for LED TV and display, car audio, battery, power supply equipment, and home appliances. The company was formerly known as K-Bridge Electronics Co. Ltd. and changed its name to Song Shang Electronics Co., Ltd. in March 2011. Song Shang Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6160.TWO.summary: Cipherlab Co.,Ltd. designs, manufactures, markets, and sells automatic identification and data capture products under the CipherLab brand worldwide. The company offers windows/android and proprietary mobile computers; general purpose, business durable, and pocket sized barcode scanners; HF and UHF radio frequency identification readers; and software solutions comprising deployment and development tools, device management, browser and emulation, programming, and scanner software. It serves warehouse, transportation and logistics, field mobility, retail, manufacturing, and healthcare industries, as well as the government. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6161.TWO.summary: Jetway Information Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells motherboards and other IT products worldwide. It also provides AIO products, graphic cards, IPC boards, barebones, and chassis products. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6163.TWO.summary: Hwacom Systems Inc., a broadband system integrator, supplies mobile, fixed, and IP networks related services in Taiwan and internationally. The company also supplies multimedia applications. Its product portfolio includes interactive personalized television (IPTV) set-top boxes, OTT set-top boxes, hybrid set-top boxes, and video gateways, as well as video streaming related consulting and integration services. It also provides broadband infrastructure solutions, value added services, customized network management systems, and integrated video solutions; cloud computing and data center solutions; and IPTV solutions. In addition, the company offers smart city solutions comprising video and traffic surveillance systems; intelligent transportation services; information security management services; multi-channel acquiring and network management solutions; and 3D radar reimage solution. It serves payTV operators, telecoms, and MSOs. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6164.TW.summary: Ledtech Electronics Corp. produces and sells LED lamps and displays in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers PLCC and high power lighting class components; light modules/engines; flexible and rigid light strips; and standard, super bright, super flux, and bi-color lamps, as well as IR/PT lamps and light sensors. It also provides single digit, dual digit, three digit, four digit, alphanumeric, dot matrix, intelligent, light bar, bar array, and SMT displays; top view, chip LED, right angle, and UVA/UVC SMD products, as well as axial LED products with plastic holders; and backlights. The company was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6166.TW.summary: ADLINK Technology, Inc. manufactures and sells hardware, software, and peripheral devices for industrial computers in Asia Pacific, Mainland China, America, and Europe. The company offers processor blades, switch blades, and platforms; AI training platforms; CompactPCI blades, switches, backplanes, enclosures and systems, peripherals and accessories, rear transition modules, power supplies, and intelligent railway platforms; computer-on-modules; multi-function DAQ, USB DAQ, digital I/O, digitizer, dynamic signal analyzer, GPIB, timer/counter, and test and measurement software and utility products; deep learning accelerators, edge AI platforms and servers, and AI machine vision devices; and embedded flash storage solutions. It also provides embedded graphics, EtherCAT solutions, extreme outdoor servers, industrial fieldbuses, industrial motherboards and SBCs, industrial PCs, fanless embedded PCs, and infotainment internet of things (IoT) devices; and medical panel computers and tablets, network security appliances, panel PCs and monitors, single board computers, and PXI/PXIe platforms, as well as motion control and machine vision products. In addition, the company offers railway systems, ROS2 solutions, rugged VITA 75 COTS computers, and video processing servers, as well as VPX and smart manufacturing solutions. Further, it provides graphics processing unit, IoT, and artificial intelligence and robotics solutions. The company serves intelligent systems, defense and aviation, industrial automation, infotainment, power/energy, healthcare, test and measurement, transportation, telecommunication, network security, smart manufacturing, retail, cities and environmental, and buildings industries. ADLINK Technology, Inc. was incorporated in 1995 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6167.TWO.summary: Powertip Technology Corporation manufactures and sells small to mid-size full color TFT and monochrome displays, and touch panels worldwide. The company's offers embedded solutions, full viewing angle displays, EM touch products, TFT displays, TFT with projected capacitive touch panels, graphic and chip-on-glass LCD modules, character LCD modules, FS-LCDs, VATN/PBT LCD modules, resistive and capacitive touch panels, and evaluation boards; and surface mount technology, chip-on-board, chip-on-flex, tape automated bonding, and screen printing products. Its products are used in white goods and gas pumps/parking meters, as well as for industrial, medical, consumer, automotive, communications, and test and measurement applications. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

6168.TW.summary: Harvatek Corporation designs, manufactures, tests, exports, and sells semiconductor chips and LEDs in Taiwan and internationally. The company provides visible LED products, such as PCB, lead frame, COX, lamp, and PLCC, as well as digital displays; infrared LED products, which include emitters, photo transistors, photo diodes, and interrupters; UVC LED products comprising water tank types, water flow types, and air puri products; and OD CSP modules/self-made equipment. Its products are used in home appliances, gaming accessories, optical touch screens, mobile devices, wearables, and security measures. The company serves OEM manufacturers, trade retailers, and design houses. Harvatek Corporation was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

6169.TWO.summary: InterServ International Inc. develops games worldwide. The company is involved in edutainment related activities; and the research, development, and operation of TV/PC/online/Web/mobile games. It also develops PC MMORPG, casual games, console games, and mobile games, as well as app, online, social, PC console, and Xbox360 games. InterServ International Inc. was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6170.TWO.summary: Welldone Company engages in telecommunication, mobile game publishing, and digital entertainment businesses primarily in Taiwan. It sells prepaid SIM cards and telecommunication value-added services. The company also represents and conducts various online and Web games through its itsfun.com.tw platform. In addition, it provides QUICKPAY, an online cash-flow service mobile phone micro payment platform; I-MONEY, a universal card for cash flow platform; and game point card services. Further, the company acts as an agent for consumer batteries. Welldone Company was founded in 1977 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6171.TWO.summary: Taiwan Aries Co.,Ltd. manufactures, processes, and trades in various electronic parts in Taiwan. It is also involved in residential and building development, rental, and sales; building materials wholesale and retail, landscape and interior design, import and export trading, real estate trading and leasing, and other businesses. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

6172.TW.summary: Billionton Systems Inc. manufactures and sells wireless and communication products. It offers smart film/PET products; RFID products; USB hub and network cards; memory cards; wireless LAN and Ethernet products; USB hub Ethernet adapters, cables, and rechargers; and multimedia products, such as Bluetooth headphones, speakers, and modules. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

6173.TWO.summary: Prosperity Dielectrics Co., Ltd. manufactures and exports ceramic dielectric powders and multilayer ceramic chip capacitors in Taiwan, the United States, Europe, and the Asia-Pacific. Its products include ceramic dielectric powders, disc type semi-conductive capacitor elements, multilayer ceramic chip capacitors, chip resistors, diodes, inductors, and coils. The company also provides SBL elements. Its products are used in power, communications, and consumer applications; and medical, military, and measurement equipment, as well as the automotive sector. Prosperity Dielectrics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1990 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

6175.TWO.summary: Liton Technology Corp. manufactures and sells etched and formed aluminum foils in Taiwan, Mainland China, Europe, the Americas, Japan, Korea, India, and Southeast Asia. The company offers middle and high voltage formed aluminum foils; low voltage formed aluminum foils; and middle and high voltage etched aluminum foils. Its products are used in industries and products, such as aerospace, high-speed rail, MRT systems, solar and wind power, computers, mobile phones, automobiles, home appliances, and industrial products. The company was formerly known as Liton Electrics Corp. and changed its name to Liton Technology Corp. in April 1998. Liton Technology Corp. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Miaoli, Taiwan.

6176.TW.summary: Radiant Opto-Electronics Corporation designs, manufactures, assembles, and markets backlight modules and light guide plates for liquid crystal display (LCD) panels in Asia, Europe, and the United States. The company's backlight modules are used in various applications, including smartphones, DSC, smart speakers, vehicle panels, tablets, notebooks, dashboards, pocket TVs, DVD players, car navigations, monitors, all in one PCs, and TFT LCD TVs. Radiant Opto-Electronics Corporation was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

6180.TWO.summary: Gamania Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, publishes online and mobile games in Taiwan, Hong Kong, Japan, and Korea. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6182.TWO.summary: Wafer Works Corporation engages in the manufacture and supply of silicon wafers worldwide. It offers polished silicon and epitaxial wafers, as well as single crystal ingots and doped silicon wafers used in semiconductor devices for power and digital applications. The company supplies its products through sales representatives. Wafer Works Corporation was founded in 1997 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

6184.TW.summary: Dafeng TV Ltd. provides digital cable TV services. It also offers CATV cable services. The company was formerly known as Dah Fung CATV Co. Ltd. and changed its name to Dafeng TV Ltd. in December 2009. Dafeng TV Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6185.TWO.summary: Plastron Precision Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and market of connectors in Taiwan and internationally. It offers board to board, header/socket, USB, memory card connectors, etc.; and serial ATA products, I/O connectors, and edge card connectors. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6186.TWO.summary: Shin Ruenn development Co., LTD. engages in the development and rental of housing and buildings. It is also involved in the sale, leasing, and purchase of real estate properties. The company was formerly known as Jinglay, Inc. and changed its name to Shin Ruenn development Co., LTD. in July 2011. Shin Ruenn development Co., LTD. was founded in 1998 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

6188.TWO.summary: Quanta Storage Inc. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells optical storage products to computer manufacturers worldwide. The company offers storage and peripheral products, such as NAS, DAS, USB-C power delivery and mini docks, adapters, and Wi-Fi storage products. It also provides solid state drives and intelligent automation systems; and storage manufacturing services of storage devices and systems, computer peripherals, and IoT related products. In addition, the company offers project planning, product development, technical, design, engineering mechanism, electrical engineering, logistics management, and repair and maintenance services. Quanta Storage Inc. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

6189.TW.summary: Promate Electronic Co.,Ltd. operates as a franchised distributor of semi-conductor products in Taiwan. The company distributes electronic components, such as integrated circuits for analog, communication, computer, consumer, display, and LED solutions; and value added design-in services for IT, industrial, communication, consumer electronic, and automotive industries. It also provides system integration solutions in the areas of software, optical, mechanical, and electrical engineering integration, as well as product development and manufacturing. In addition, the company offers consumer electronics, such as TFT LCD monitors and TVs, and Netbooks, as well as display and embedded solutions. Promate Electronic Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6191.TW.summary: Global Brands Manufacture Ltd. engages in the PCB production and EMS businesses in Taiwan. The Company's printed circuit boards are used in desktop PCs, network and communication products, digital cameras, and other products. It also provides EMS services, including SMT assembly, tooling, and plastic and systems assembly. The company offers EMS for various products, including PCs; storage products, such as USB flash drives and HDDs; consumer electronics comprising TFT-LCDs; wireless communication products; gaming machines, and security and communication products; and automotive electronics. It supplies products to companies in the information, communication, automobile, and consumer electronics industries. The company was formerly known as Cyber Solutions Corporation and changed its name to Global Brands Manufacture Ltd. in 2003. Global Brands Manufacture Ltd. was founded in 1973 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

6192.TW.summary: Lumax International Corp., Ltd. engages in the wholesale of electronic materials in Taiwan and China. It sells and installs process-control devices or systems, as well as provides maintenance services. The company also offers process automation consultancy during plant buildup, hardware/system installation, project management, and control valve maintenance for petrochemical, electronic, steel, and other non-tech enterprises; hardware product portfolio for calibration, inspection, and maintenance of control valves, switch valves, measurement instruments, analyzing instruments, and others; and control valve repair services, Lumax valves, and VOC anti-leakage solutions. In addition, it provides telecommunication materials and electronic components. Further, the company engages in international and transit trade, warehousing, and processing activities; producing insulating materials, power supplies, and computer connectors with thermostat and bearing high pressure; and processing thermal transfer materials, tape materials, LCD, etc., as well as provides installation and maintenance services for valves and calibration instruments. Additionally, it manufactures and designs computer systems and measuring appliance industry automation instruments; installs mechanical and electrical equipment; imports and exports goods and technology products; and provides assembly, repair, and instrument calibration of mechanical/electrical products. Lumax International Corp., Ltd. was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6194.TWO.summary: Yufo Electronics Co., Ltd. primarily manufactures and sells printed circuit boards in Taiwan and internationally. It offers computer motherboards for use in personal computers, industrial computers, and medical equipment; and high frequency impedance control printed circuit boards for use in servers, communication base station, network communication equipment, and high-precision instruments. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

6196.TW.summary: Marketech International Corp., manufactures, sells, imports, and trades in a range of integrated circuits, semiconductors, electrical and computer equipment and materials, chemicals, gas, and components. The company also engages in design and manufacturing of customized equipment; factory affair and mechatronic system, including clean room, automatic supply system of gas and chemicals, monitor system, turn-key, and hook-up project services; contracting for semiconductor automatic supply system and electrical installing construction; design, manufacturing, and installation of automatic production equipment and related parts; trading, installation, and repair of various machinery equipment and peripherals; sales of cosmetics and daily necessities and panels; and production, development, and implementation of software, as well as installation of industrial machine and equipment and consulting and coding services. In addition, it is involved in research, trading, and consulting of information system software and hardware appliances; supply of electronic information; medical consulting services; design and manufacture of RF booster; management of IoT and 5G telecommunication instrument; production of scrubber bins for semiconductor manufacturers; and design, installation, debugging, and technology services of tunnel systems. Marketech International Corp. was incorporated in 1988 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6197.TW.summary: Jess-link Products Co., Ltd. provides various electronic products in Taiwan and internationally. It offers connectors, such as EMI cages, high-speed connectors, I/O connectors, and magnetic and modular jacks and plugs; Cable Assemblies, including direct attach cables, high speed cable assemblies, fiber optic assemblies, FFC jumpers, ethernet LAN cables, I/O cable assemblies, LVDS, and industrial cables; active optical cables; and flexible flat, bulk flat, high speed, high temperature, and high power flat cables. The company also provides robot and controller solutions, machine vision and surveillance solutions, PLC solutions, and IPC solutions; IoT products consisting of IoT modules, homekit products, smart home products, and NBIoT devices; wireless chargers; remote controllers; and programmable IoT buttons, IoT scanners, streaming music players, wireless power, and MFi series products. In addition, it offers accessories, such as lightning hubs/dongles, type-c hubs/ dongles, convertors/adpators, fast chargers, and car chargers; automotive products, energy storage systems, and green energy products; and customized cable assembly services. The company's products are used in smart connection, datacenter/networking/telecom, Internet of Things (IoT), and new energy and vehicle industries. Jess-link Products Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6198.TWO.summary: AverLogic Technologies, Corp., a fabless semiconductor company, provides application specific memory and video processing circuits worldwide. It offers video frame and line FIFOs, video surveillance controller ICs, LCD display controller ICs, video format conversion ICs, video decoder and ADC ICs, and H.264 video streaming SOCs. The company provides H.264 video streaming, video conversion, LCD display, multiple video display, video decoding, and FIFO memory solutions. It offers its products through a network of representatives and distributors. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6199.TWO.summary: TienPin United Enterprise CO., LTD. operates as a flash storage manufacturer in Taiwan. The company designs, manufactures, and sells portable storage products. It offers flash card readers/writers and adapters, digital photo frames, digital signage products, LCD TV player modules, fingerprint devices, and flash drives. The company was formerly known as DataFab Systems Inc. and changed its name to TienPin United Enterprise CO., LTD. in July 2015. TienPin United Enterprise CO., LTD. is headquartered in Pingzhen, Taiwan.

6201.TW.summary: Ya Horng Electronic Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells audio products, household appliances, and healthcare products in Taiwan and internationally. It offers CD/MP3 players, auto mixers, amplifiers, turntables, and media controllers; appliances, such as blenders, juicers, food processors, desiccants, dehumidifiers, air purifiers, coffee makers, and kitchen masters; and health care products comprising blood pressure monitors, wearable ECGs, thermometers, and oral care products. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.

6202.TW.summary: Holtek Semiconductor Inc. researches, develops, produces, manufactures, and sells integrated circuits. The company provides a range of general purpose and specialized types of microcontrollers for use in the areas of voice, communication, computer peripheral, household appliance, medical equipment, automotive, security, etc.; and power management devices, LCD and LED drive/control chips, ultra-high resolution fingerprint identification sensors, various sensor modules, and other peripheral devices. It also offers MCU that are used for general purpose, LCD display, 1.8V~5.5V, USB, motor control, OPA, health and measurement, security and safety, touch, voice and music, battery and power management, and special purpose; and wireless and communication devices, display drivers, modules, EEPROM memory, and analog and video devices. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

6205.TW.summary: Chant Sincere Co., Ltd. engages in the design, manufacture, and sale of connectors and cables in Taiwan and internationally. The company's principal products include I/O connectors, board to board connectors, waterproof connectors, industrial connectors, automotive connectors, memory card connectors and adaptors, high-speed connectors and cables, and audio and video connectors and cables. Its products are used in various industries, such as computing, industrial and automation, telecommunication, automotive, waterproof, consumer, and medical industries. The company was founded in 1985 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6206.TW.summary: Flytech Technology Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells computers and peripherals in Taiwan, Europe, Africa, the Americas, and Asia. It offers all-in-one point-of-sales (POS), panel PC, mobile POS, KIOSK, box PC, and POS monitors. The company also engages in the operating software design and data processing services; and integration of software and hardware services. In addition, it offers customized hardware design and manufacturing services, including product conceptualization, circuit board and mechanical design, BIOS and firmware, validation test, material procurement, manufacturing, shipment, and after sales services for computer based niche products. It serves hospitality, retail, medical, industrial, commercial, and payment industries. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6208.TWO.summary: Highlight Tech Corp. designs, manufactures, and sells integrated vacuum coating chamber solutions for original equipment manufacturers worldwide. It offers cylindrical, box, D shape, spherical, polygon, bell jar, large, and aluminum vacuum chambers, as well as vacuum modules and systems; vacuum chamber kits; ultra-high vacuum chambers; and vacuum valves, such as vacuum poppet valves, aluminum alloy angle valves, vacuum gate valves, vacuum butterfly valves, rectangular gate valves, pendulum valves, teflon coating vacuum valves, vacuum ball valves, vacuum check valves, vent valves, metal valves, and vacuum valve kits. The company also provides vacuum components, including elbows-tees-crosses, vacuum flanges, teflon bellows, hydroformed vacuum bellows, centering rings, vacuum clamps, adaptor fittings, vacuum viewports, vacuum feedthroughs, and vacuum accessories, as well as KF, ISO, and CF components; and vacuum pumps comprising edwards turbomolecular pumps, scroll and refurbished vacuum pumps, and Ebara dry pump repair kits. In addition, it offers sanitary fittings comprising ferrule blanks, fittings, gaskets, clamps, and adaptors, as well as sanitary valves; perfluoroelastomer O'rings; IC dispensing machines; and centrifugal vacuum mixers. Further, the company provides vacuum pump and valves overhaul services; and refurbished vacuum pump services. Highlight Tech Corp. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.

6209.TW.summary: Kinko Optical Co., Ltd. designs, develops, produces, and sells optical components and lens worldwide. The company offers digital single-lens reflex camera, 3D sensing, mobile phone, projector, NB, surveillance, IP camera, security camera, automotive, panoramic camera, Internet of Things, industrial camera, telescope, and sports camera lenses. It also provides spherical and aspherical glass lens OEM, and lens ODM services. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

6210.TWO.summary: Kintech Electronics Co. Ltd. engages in manufacturing, processing, and trading of single-sided and multi-layer printed circuit boards and electronic components in Taiwan, the United States, Europe, Japan, China, and the Southeast Asia. It offers its products for consumer and other products, communication products, PC and peripheral, industrial equipment, and servers. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

6213.TW.summary: ITEQ Corporation manufactures and sells copper clad laminate materials used for fabrication of printed circuit boards in Taiwan and Asia. It offers mass lamination boards, copper clad laminates, prepreg products, and electronic components. The company's products are used in various application areas, such as computational and communications applications comprising servers, storage, and switches; radio frequency and microwave devices, consisting of 5G and mmWaves; automotive applications, including advanced driver assist systems; and high density interconnect solutions, which include smartphones. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

6214.TW.summary: Systex Corporation provides various IT services for enterprise and government clients in Taiwan and Asia. It operates through Financial Business Integration, Customer Market Integration, Data Technology Integration, China Group, and Investment Department segments. The Financial Business Integration segment provides financial technologies and develops smart finance, centered on FinTech to assist financial customers in digital transformation, including transformation services in mobile applications, integration services for investor, and wealth management upgrade services. The Customer Market Integration segment offers full-channel and full payment services, and assists customers in operating O2O business to realize digital transformation. The Data Technology Integration segment provides comprehensive data technology products and solutions to drive business intelligence growth of customers, acts as the data enabler for customers, and introduces digital technology to provide solutions to customer in digital transformation. The China Group segment offers system integration and value-added services, as well as commercial software and cloud platform tools. The Investment Department segment engages in the investment activities. The company is also involved in the sale and leasing of computer software and related equipment; design of computer system; transmission and security of value-added network; maintenance of database; and consultation and repair services. In addition, it engages in general investment, computer room installation, and communication engineering services; manufacture and sale of wire communication equipment and apparatus, and electronic parts and components; and wholesale and retail of computer and business machinery equipment. Systex Corporation was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6215.TW.summary: Aurotek Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells automation and robotic components under the Aurotek brand in Japan, rest of Asia, Europe, and the United States. Its products include automation and robotics components, such as motors, reducers, sensors, PLC controllers, couplings, ball screws, linear axis actuators, linear bearing systems, motion controllers, motion control ICs, CNC systems, robot control systems, visual identity systems, automatic guided vehicles, self-lube bearings, precision stages, wicking materials, and environmental equipment. The company also offers FA and equipment comprising PCB depaneling systems, robot systems, optical communication machines, DeMeet 3D CNC coordinate measuring machines, and electric screw drivers; and patterning technology and applications, patterned technology and equipment, automatic optical inspection equipment, and laser processing equipment. In addition, it provides isolation and damping devices, natural ventilation systems, and EcoColor external venetian blinds. The company provides solutions to self-lubricated parts; transmissions; power transmissions; drive systems; controllers and robotics for PCB, SMT, LCD, optical, solar, and semiconductor equipment; architectural applications/designs for window operators; seismic isolation systems; and anti-earthquake devices. Aurotek Corporation was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6216.TW.summary: DrayTek Corporation provides networking equipment and management systems in Taiwan. The company offers router products, such as VPN, broadband, xDSL, LTE, load-balancing, DSL modem, and fiber routers, as well as router matrix; access points; managed switches; software/tools; and accessories comprising direct attach passive cooper cables, rack mount brackets, USB thermometers, wireless adapters, and antenna. DrayTek Corporation was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

6217.TWO.summary: C.C.P. Contact Probes Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells spring loaded probes and connectors in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers testing solutions, including high frequency testing, Kelvin contact testing, memory testing, burn-in testing, fine pitch connector testing, IC and ICT test probe, ATE connecting, general final testing, panel testing, wafer level testing, battery probe, and high current IC testing solutions. It also provides pogo pin connectors, such as standard and non-standard, single pogo pin, waterproof, ball point, magnetic, high current and frequency, and ultra-small pin connectors, as well as screw pins; female and industrial connectors; and DAC network cables. The company was formerly known as CCP Contact Probes Enterprise Co., Ltd. and changed its name to C.C.P. Contact Probes Co., Ltd. in 1998. C.C.P. Contact Probes Co., Ltd. was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6218.TWO.summary: Hauman Technologies Corp. develops products and solutions for information technology, semiconductor, optoelectronics, and photovoltaic industries in Taiwan, Mainland China, and the United States. The company offers hardware and software products; and application services, including planning, marketing, sales, installation, training, system maintenance, and integration services to the government agencies, institutions of higher learning, research institutes, financial institutions, and multinational corporations. It also provides materials, equipment, and automatic packaging and testing instruments; and wafer probers, IC test handlers, underfill dispensers, package inspection solutions, ATE testers, LED probers and sorters, X-ray inspection systems, solar cell texturing and manufacturing AOI systems, ESD monitoring systems, cleaning systems, sealing machines, cutters, forming machines, machine vision systems, texturing systems, automatic inspection systems, LED and LCD process, etc. The company was formerly known as Hauman Enterprise and changed its name to Hauman Technologies Corp. in 2000. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6220.TWO.summary: YFC-Boneagle Electric Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells power cord sets, LAN cables, patch cords, and related networking accessories in Taiwan and internationally.
