The company provides power cables, including wires, power supply cords, cord sets, and portable hand lamps; electronic wires and cables comprising UL AWM cables and hook-up wires; and networking accessories, such as patch panels, keystone jacks, outlets, plugs, wiring connectors and blocks, and cable management products, as well as LAN cables and patch cords. It also offers fiber optic products, which comprise FO cables, FO patch cords, FO adapters, FO connectors, and FO enclosures. YFC-Boneagle Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

6222.TWO.summary: Soaring Technology Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells liquid crystal displays and lighting products in Taiwan and internationally. It offers LED bulbs and lamps, LED tubes, and LED indoor and outdoor fixtures, as well as dimmers, switches, and plugs. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6224.TW.summary: Polytronics Technology Corp. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of circuit protection and thermal management devices for high-density electronics systems. It provides EVERFUSE polymeric positive temperature coefficient products, including surface-mount devices for computers, portable electronics, game consoles, telephony and broadband products, mobile phones, industrial controls, batteries, and multimedia products; radial-leaded devices for AC/DC adapters, power supply products, USB hubs and accessories, computer accessories and related applications, medical equipment, industrial controls, and automotive and motor protection products; and battery device products for mobile phones, laptops and netbooks, PDAs, portable multimedia players, MP3s, and game consoles. The company also offers telecom products for xDSL, VoIP, MDF module, Ethernet, and telecom analog and digital line card applications, as well as for modem, telephone, and facsimile machines; thermal conductive boards for automotive lighting, power module, solar cell, IC packing, and LED applications; current limiting modules for note book, cell phone, security system, and automotive applications; surface mount fuses; transient voltage suppressor diodes; thyristor surge suppressor devices; electrostatic discharge protectors; metal oxide varistors and potentiometers; gas discharge tubes; thermal setable pads; thermal dissipation coating materials; thermal conductive inks; heat dispersing materials; and overvoltage protection element and related semi-finished goods, modules, and heat conductive substrates. In addition, it engages in the investments and general business operations; and production and sale of resistors, discrete semiconductor devices, and other resistive elements. The company operates in Taiwan, China, the United States, and internationally. Polytronics Technology Corp. was founded in 1997 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

6225.TW.summary: AIPTEK International Inc. provides digital cameras, driving recorders and micro projectors in Taiwan and internationally. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6227.TWO.summary: Macnica Galaxy Inc. distributes IC products and services in Taiwan and internationally. It offers software, artificial intelligence, and Internet of Things products, as well as semiconductors to customers in the cloud, Internet of Things, communication, industrial electronics, and automotive industries. The company was formerly known as Galaxy Far East Corporation and changed its name to Macnica Galaxy Inc. in July 2017. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan. Macnica Galaxy Inc. is a subsidiary of Macnica Chungju Co., Ltd.

6230.TW.summary: Nidec Chaun-Choung Technology Corporation provides thermal management products worldwide. It offers server/DT, NB/tablet, and LED modules; thermal components, including vapor chambers and heat pipes; heatsinks; and thermal systems. The company was formerly known as Chaun-Choung Technology Corp. and changed its name to Nidec Chaun-Choung Technology Corporation in January 2021. Nidec Chaun-Choung Technology Corporation was incorporated in 1973 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6231.TWO.summary: Insyde Software Corp. provides system firmware and software engineering services for companies in the mobile, desktop, server, and embedded systems industries worldwide. It offers client, server, and Internet of Things (IoT)/embedded solutions; developer tools; Supervyse, a systems management software; BlinkBoot UEFI Boot Loader; and mobile applications. The company also provides engineering services in the areas of project planning, design, implementation and integration, acceptance and deployment, and maintenance and field updates; and UEFI training programs. It serves mobile computing, desktop, servers, and embedded/IoT markets. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6233.TWO.summary: Prolific Technology Inc. operates as an IC design company and ASIC design service provider for USB smart I/O, intelligent green energy saving, and mixed-mode hall sensor solutions. The company offers IC and SOC solutions for USB serial/parallel converters, USB storage products, brushless motor drivers, hall sensors, power meters, and MEMS motion sensing products. It sells its products in Taiwan, Mainland China, Japan, Korea, Canada, and the United States. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6234.TWO.summary: Tera Autotech Corporation manufactures and sells automation equipment in Taiwan. The company offers automatic storage and logistic equipment; whole plant automated logistic equipment; automatic re-grind machines, product inspection machines, RGV machines, and lock screw machines; CNC machines, welding equipment, and chamber processing machines; and measurement equipment. It also offers drill products, including standard, micro, large, UC, and slot drills, as well as router bits. The company was formerly known as Tera Automation Corporation and changed its name to Tera Autotech Corporation in 2001. Tera Autotech Corporation was founded in 1982 and is based in Taichung City, Taiwan.

6235.TW.summary: Waffer Technology Corporation manufactures and sells light metal products. The company primarily engages in the provision of light-metal solution of magnesium and aluminum alloy, mold and tooling research and development, magnesium alloy injection and die-casting, CNC, and painting and assembly of vertical integration OEM/ODM processing. Its products include cosmetic and internal parts for notebooks; handheld scanners and mobile phone parts; camera, video cam, projector, and monitoring optical parts; and auto parts, as well as other products, such as wearable, tool, and sports products. The company also manufactures and processes automotive aluminum alloy die-cast tools, 3C product magnesium injection tools, and other light metal die-casting tools, as well as fixtures and gauges. It serves medical, industrial, telecommunications, construction, automotive, sporting goods, aeronautical, transportation, national defense, and other industries. The company was formerly known as Waffer Industrial Company, Limited and changed its name to Waffer Technology Corporation in 2000. Waffer Technology Corporation was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

6239.TW.summary: Powertech Technology Inc., together with its subsidiaries, researches, designs, develops, assembles, manufactures, packages, tests, and sells various integrated circuit (IC) products worldwide. The company provides IC backend services, which include IC chip probing, packaging, final testing, and burn in to end products. It also offers Quad Flat No Lead package services for electrical interconnection in handheld devices, such as cellular phones, PDAs, MP3s, game consoles, and other portable products; redistribution layer services for au or cu wire bonding; copper pillar and lead-free bumping services; chip scale package and chip on wafer for packaging CMOS image sensors; FBGA (BOC) packages; and FBGA packages for smart phones, tablets, and SSD products. In addition, the company provides thin smaller outline packages for various devices, including ROM, NOR, NAND Flash, SDRAM, and DDR; packaging and testing services for the memory card-micro SD cards; multi-chip packages for various handheld or data storage devices, such as cellular phones, PDAs, mobile game platforms, digital consumer devices, removable memory cards, USB drives, etc.; and system-in-packages for graphics processor, CPU, digital mobile TV, GPS, Wi-Fi, Wimax, Bluetooth, baseband, air bag detector, tire pressure gauge, keyless products, etc. Further, it offers package-on-package/package-in-package services for space savings, enhanced wafer thinning technology, control on warpage, and eliminated die cracks; FCBGA packages for chipsets and microprocessors; and FCCSP packages for graphic memory products and cellular phones. Additionally, the company is involved in the semiconductor testing and assembly; and the investment businesses, as well as provides wafer probing test services. Powertech Technology Inc. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

6240.TWO.summary: Sung Gang Corp.Limited engages in the information software wholesale in Taiwan. The company is also involved in the book publishing; real estate leasing; sale of electronic parts and computer peripherals; parking lot operations; financial debt purchase; and purchase of financial institutions. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6241.TWO.summary: Amigo Technology Inc., an OEM/ODM company, provides various support services related to the design, manufacture, and after-sales service for networking and communication products. It offers Wi-Fi access points, such as enterprise indoor and ruggedized access points; and mesh routers. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.

6244.TWO.summary: Motech Industries Inc. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells solar products and services in Taiwan and internationally. It provides photovoltaic (PV) cells, PV modules, PV power systems, and PV inverters. The company was formerly known as Meter International Corporation. Motech Industries Inc. was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6245.TWO.summary: Lanner Electronics Inc. provides design, engineering, and manufacturing services for advanced network appliances and rugged applied computing platforms for system integrators, service providers, and application developers worldwide. The company offers network appliances, such as modules and acceleration cards, white box hardware solutions, wide temperature network appliances, desktop network appliances, and rackmount network appliances; and telecom datacenter appliances consisting of cloud storage, HybridTCA, vCPE/uCPE, and video transport platforms, as well as modules and blades, and hyper-converged appliances. It also provides intelligent edge appliances, including DIN-Rail industrial gateway, edge AI appliance, embedded platform, intelligent video platform, rackmount industrial computer, rugged wireless gateway, vehicle gateway, and vehicle/rail computer; and extension modules comprising LTE radio modules. The company offers its products for use in various applications, such as network computing, telecommunication, transportation, power and energy, industrial automation, intelligent systems, software-defined wide area network, and edge AI applications. Lanner Electronics Inc. was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6246.TWO.summary: Taiwan Thick-Film Ind. Corp manufactures and sells transformers, backlight modules, light emitting diode (LED) light bars, and light guide plates in Taiwan. It offers back light modules, such as in-vehicle and industrial control, tablet series, NB series, and monitors; LCM assemblies; LED light bars for consumer electronics, industrial control, medical, military, automotive, and other applications; and automotive/new energy automotive electronics that include vehicle charging station main boards, vehicle charging indicator main boards, car door lock main boards, automotive control switches, anti-pinch window lift monitor main boards, and vehicle indicator light switches. The company also provides cultural and creative business unit that provides brand licensing, product image design, cross-industry alliances and strategic alliances, creative products, 3C-related products, daily necessities, and auto supplies. Taiwan Thick-Film Ind. Corp was founded in 1982 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6247.TWO.summary: Jazz Hipster Corporation researches, develops, manufactures, and sells audio speakers worldwide. It offers hi-fi and multi-room speakers; and earphone/mic products. The company markets its products under the JS brand. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6257.TW.summary: Sigurd Microelectronics Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the design, processing, testing, burn-in treatment, manufacture, and trading of integrated circuits in Taiwan, Singapore, China, the United states, and internationally. The company provides testing services for various IC and wafers; TSOT and STO packaging; quad flat no lead packaging; RF module packaging and testing; photosenaor packaging and testing; wafer level chip scale package technology; solder bumping; and Cu-pillar. It also offers assembly services comprise wafer grinding and chip sawing, and MEMS, multi-chip ICs, RF modules, optical device, and analog/power ICs assembly services. In addition, the company provides research and development, and engineering services, including mass production, test engineering, and assembly engineering solutions. Further, it is involved in manufacture and sale of medical equipment; provision of digital information supply services; and commodity broker businesses. The company serves semiconductor design houses, IDMs, and wafer foundries. The company was formerly known as More Power Electronic Co., Ltd. Sigurd Microelectronics Corporation was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Hsin-Chu, Taiwan.

6261.TWO.summary: Youngtek Electronics Corporation provides semiconductor back-end foundry services in Taiwan. The company engages in wafer testing, wafer grinding and cutting and die picking, IC product testing, special substrate cutting, test program development, platform conversion, engineering support, and valet shipping; and AOI automatic optical inspection of LED dies and VCSEL components, die picking inspection, visual inspection, and other post-process OEM activities. It also offers IC sorting and bonding; WLCSP die sorting packaging; label flip-chip binding; and die and LED bonding machines. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

6264.TWO.summary: Kingland Property Corporation Ltd. engages in the construction business. The company was formerly known as DSG Technology Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6265.TWO.summary: Kuen Chaang Uppertech Corp. engages in the electronic component channel business in Taiwan. It is also involved in the semiconductor business. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6269.TW.summary: Flexium Interconnect, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the design, development, manufacture, and sale of flexible printed circuit (FPC) boards in Taiwan, China, rest of Asia, Europe, and America. It provides single-sided, double-sided, multilayer, and rigid-flex FPC boards. The company also manufactures build-up copper clad laminate; researches and develops, manufactures, processes, trades, and repairs build-up printed circuit boards (PCB), flexible PCB, related semi-finished goods and parts, parts for semi-finished goods of polyimide film base copper clad laminate, and molds, tools, and clamping apparatuses; and sells raw materials. Its products are used in computers, LCD screens, consumer-type electronic products and equipment, and items related to the automobile GPS screens. Flexium Interconnect, Inc. was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

6272.TWO.summary: Wieson Technologies Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells interconnect components and wireless components. It offers I/O connectors, board mount connectors, card and socket connecters, connecters and cables, cable assemblies, optical fiber components, wires, wireless modules, automotive electronics, and LED lighting products, as well as antennas. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6277.TW.summary: Aten International Co., Ltd engages in the development, manufacture, and sale of IT infrastructure access management solution, professional audio/video, green energy, and related products. The company's products comprise KVM products, including cable, desktop, cat 5, rack, secure, matrix, and LCD KVM switches; and KVM extenders, KVM modules and accessories, KVM over IP switches, computer sharing devices, management software/control centers, serial console servers, accessories, and remote control and monitoring solutions. It also offers professional audio/video products, such as control systems, presentation switches, networked AVs, video matrix switches, video switches and splitters, video extenders, converters, accessories, and software products, as well as energy intelligence power distribution unit (PDU)/UPS/rack products comprising metered-ready, metered, switched, outlet-metered, outlet-metered-switched, and basic PDU products; PDU accessories; professional online UPS; standing network rack; and energy and DCIM management software products. In addition, the company provides USB and thunderbolt products, which include content creation products, docking stations and switches, peripheral switches, USB converters and extenders, gamepad emulators, USB/FireWire hubs, and host controller cards; data communication products, such as auto switches and industry controls; and cables, including cat 5, daisy chain, DVI, HDMI, KVM, VGA, cat 6, and display port cables. The company was formerly known as HOZN Automation Co. Ltd. and changed its name to Aten International Co., Ltd in 1988. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6278.TW.summary: Taiwan Surface Mounting Technology Corp. provides LCD surface-mount technology production solutions in Mainland China, Taiwan, Europe, the United States, Asia, and internationally. It offers digital camera and cellular phone LCD panel control boards; notebook and television TFT-LCD panel control boards; LED TV power supply control boards; and LCD TV inverter control boards. The company also provides micro projector and touch panel control boards, wireless controllers, DVD R/W control boards, TV set control boards, refrigerator display panels, and lighting application control boards; and digital camera/cellular, automotive dashboard panel, note book, and PC/LCD television backlight bars. Taiwan Surface Mounting Technology Corp. was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

6282.TW.summary: AcBel Polytech Inc. develops, manufactures, and sells power management solutions worldwide. It provides a range of custom design and high quality power supplies ranging from 3W up to 10,000W per power module. The company offers industrial PSUs, adapters, medical PSUs, telecom PSUs, AC DC / DC DC converters, and EV PSU solution. Its products are used in information technology, communication, consumer electronics, networks, and industrial automation applications. The company was formerly known as API Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to AcBel Polytech Inc. in 1998. AcBel Polytech Inc. was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6284.TWO.summary: INPAQ Technology Co., Ltd. provides circuit protection components and antenna products for computing, communication, consumer electronics, and automotive electronics primarily in Taiwan, China, Korea, and North America. It offers RF antennas, such as patch, active, chip, dipole, NFC, RFID, and customized antennas, as well as automotive, wireless power charger, module system, and LTC technology products. The company also provides SMD metal oxide varistor, ESD, transient voltage suppressor, and multilayer varistor; chip ferrite bead and common mode filter; and power, general circuits, and high frequency inductors. Its products are used in phones, tablets, NBs, TVs, and set top boxes, as well as automotive and network applications. INPAQ Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Miaoli, Taiwan.

6285.TW.summary: Wistron NeWeb Corporation researches and develops, manufactures, and sells satellite communication systems and mobile and portable communication equipment in the Americas, Europe, and Asia. The company offers wired communication equipment, wireless communication networking equipment, electronic components, regulated telecommunication radio frequency equipment, satellite communication systems, and mobile and portable communication equipment. It provides satellite communications products, such as DTH TV dish antenna systems, single cable multi-output outdoor receiver systems and derivative products, satellite digital signal convertors, digital satellite radio receiver systems, digital HD radio receiver systems, satellite communications transmitters, 4K/8K high-definition digital satellite radio receivers, and high-frequency satellite two-way communications receivers. The company also offers mobile and home communications products, including wireless broadband access network communications equipment and modules, mobile indoor and outdoor broadband network terminal devices, embedded antennas for mobile devices, fiber-optic connectivity devices, surveillance cameras, V2X communication end devices, automotive cellular 4G/Wi-Fi/BT modules, Wi-Fi mesh routers, BLE modules and sensors, high-speed data center network switches, mobile broadband home gateways, and smart home devices with voice assistant. In addition, it provides other wireless products comprising high-frequency forward collision warning automotive radar devices, automotive cameras, mmWave transmission modules, industrial cellular modem, IoT asset-tracking devices, and RFID readers/antenna product series. Wistron NeWeb Corporation was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

6288.TW.summary: Excellence Optoelectronics Inc. design, development, and testing of automotive LED component packaging in Taiwan, China, United States, Germany, Spain, and internationally. The company offers LED lamps with AlInGaP and InGaN chip materials. It also provides LED street lighting, high/low bay, shoe box, wall pack, and patio light products; LED light modules; LED components for lighting; LED traffic signals, such as ball signals, arrow signals, pedestrian signals, vehicle countdown, bicycle signals, and tram way signals; and automotive light modules for ODM/OEM services. In addition, the company engages in design, manufacturing, construction, and installation of public works and lighting systems. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

6289.TW.summary: Arima Optoelectronics Corp. operates in the optoelectronics market. It offers UHB LED and LD dice, and epitaxial wafer products to LED manufacturers in Taiwan and internationally. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

6290.TWO.summary: Longwell Company, together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells electronic components and cable products in Taiwan, China, the United States, Japan, and internationally. The company offers power cords for various applications, such as computers, telecommunications, consumer electronics, and home appliances; and electronic wires and cables, insulation tubes, and heat-shrinkable tubes for use in computers, home appliances, telecommunications, and other electronics products. It also provides cable assemblies for various market sectors, including computer, communication, and consumer electronic and networking industries; connectors primarily for mobile devices, computers, and GPS; wire, AC, and DC halogen free products; and USB output, desk top, car, and wireless chargers, as well as interchangeable plugs, AC and wall-mount adapters, EV charging units, and mechanical components and plastic parts. In addition, the company offers a range of support services. Longwell Company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6291.TWO.summary: Analog Integrations Corporation, a fabless IC company, designs, manufactures, tests, and markets analog integrated circuits in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers power conversion products, including low and ultra-low dropout linear regulators, DDR regulators, and voltage references; DC/DC converters for high power and portable applications; and LED backlights and lighting solutions. It also provides power management products, such as USB and regulatory USB power switches, and bare-bone USB switches; supervisory products; and NiMH/NiCd battery chargers, Li-ion battery protection products, and high current drivers. Its products are used in 3C applications in the areas of LCD TV, DSC, mobile phone, MP3, PMP, etc. Analog Integrations Corporation was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

6294.TWO.summary: Tekom Technologies, Inc provides tutoring services in Taiwan. It offers national examination, correspondence, double-effect, and travel teaching products and services. The company is based in Tainan, Taiwan.

6403.TWO.summary: AcSiP Technology Corp., an Internet of Things solution company, provides wireless communication services and solutions in Taiwan. The company offers wireless connectivity solutions, including Bluetooth, NFC, Zigbee, GPS, 2G, 4G, and IoT-Wi-Fi and loT-LoRa products, as well as development kits. It also provides system integration and size shrinkage services. AcSiP Technology Corp. was founded in 2009 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6405.TW.summary: Onano Industrial Corp. provides opto-electronic glass slimming solutions in Taiwan. The company provides slimming, polishing, and film coating services for TFT-LCD, OLED, solar cell glass, etc.; PV panel slimming; anti-glare treatment; opto-electronic coating; and OGS strengthening products. Its products are used in various applications, including smart phones, tablets, ultra-thin laptops, consumer electronics, LCD displays, etc. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

6409.TW.summary: Voltronic Power Technology Corp. primarily designs, manufactures, markets, introduces, and sells uninterruptible power systems (UPS) in Taiwan and China. The company provides DC, standby, line interactive, and online UPS products; and solar power products, solar inverters, automatic voltage regulators, chargers, and accessories. It also offers ODM design and manufacturing of inverters. The company primarily serves the power market. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6411.TWO.summary: Amazing Microelectronic Corp. provides electrostatic discharge (ESD) protection related solutions in Taiwan. It offers ESD solutions for use in industrial, automotive, and LCM panel, as well as IPC, and DVR and medical electronics applications; and EMI filters for use in LCD/camera display, multimedia card/secure digital memory card, and keypad products of mobile phones and hand held portable devices. It also provides analog switches for video, LAN, Bus, and USB applications; HDMI re-drivers and switches; and RS485/RS232 interface IC solutions for industrial and medical process control, automobile electronics, monitoring system, and building automation networks. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6412.TW.summary: Chicony Power Technology Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures and sells switching power supplies, electronic components, LED lighting modules, and smart building solutions in Asia, the United States, Europe, and internationally. Its power supply products include adapters and power products used in the area of server, storage, telecom, desk-top, gaming, ATM, open frame, and industry power. The company offers LED lamps, tubes, and indoor and outdoor LED luminaires and drivers. It also manufactures and sells transformers and plastic products. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6414.TW.summary: Ennoconn Corporation designs and develops industrial mother boards in Taiwan and internationally. It offers hardware system solutions to various vertical market applications, including point-of-sales (POS), banking automation, kiosk, lottery, and industrial automation. The company also provides motherboards, POS products, embedded box PCs, HMIs, and kiosk self-service terminal solutions; and design to order and electronic manufacturing services. In addition, it researches, develops, and sells hardware and software products; manufactures, wholesales, imports/exports, and services industrial computer and industrial systems; researches, develops, produces, and sells electronic materials for hardware and software products; and wholesales electronic materials, as well as provides installation, debugging, and technical consultation services. Further, the company is involved in the intelligent technology development and sale of hardware; wholesale and retail of telecommunications control of radio frequency equipment input and information software; research, design, and sale of mobile payment, electronic signature, and information security systems; sale of network storage equipment and maintenance services; and import and export trading activities. Additionally, it offers electronic parts, computer and peripheral devices, multimedia products, molds, servers, communication machinery and equipment, and spare parts, and after-sales services; and software services. The company was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6416.TW.summary: CASwell Inc. engages in the design, engineering, manufacture, and sale of network computing and quality-proved platforms to system integrators, solution providers, and service providers worldwide. It offers network security and management products, such as 2U, 1U, fanless desktop, desktop, and other core appliances; cloud computing and data center products, including data center switches and cloud storage servers; network attached storage products for large business, SMB, SOHO/home, and windows applications; and industrial control and automation products comprising industrial firewall and control systems. The company also provides edge/fog computing products, such as SD-WAN/uCPE/vCPE products, SDN switches, and NFV servers; proprietary, proprietary PoE, network, and POE network adapters; and proprietary acceleration, storage proprietary, and network acceleration modules. CASwell Inc. was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6417.TWO.summary: Securitag Assembly Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells RFID transponders in Taiwan and internationally. It offers cards; keyfobs; tags; and NFC sensor-enabled tag products, as well as metal, non-metal, NFC, tamper proof, and rain RFID labels. The company also provides value-added services, such as thermal transfer printing or encoding on used chips. It serves clients in access control, healthcare, automation, logistic, industrial, entertainment, and NFC markets. Securitag Assembly Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

6419.TWO.summary: NUUO Inc. provides surveillance solutions for recording, monitoring, and third party solution integration for IP and analog cameras in Taiwan and internationally. Its NUUO Crystal Family solutions, such as NUUO NuStation, a Linux enterprise solution; NUUO Titan Pro, a Linux-based VMS solution; NUUO Network Storage solution for surveillance applications; and NUUO Crystal, a VMS solution. The company's NUUO Mainconsole Family solutions include NUUO central management system to manage large scale installations and alarms; NUUO Mainconsole, a NUUO PC based video recording server; NUUO Hybrid Appliance solution to choose a pure DVR, pure NVR, or a hybrid system; NUUO NVRmini 2 and NUUO NVRmini 3 portable NVR solutions; NUUO intelligent video surveillance solution; NUUO IP Appliance solution that provides integration between older and newer types of cameras; NUUO Report Service, which visualizes the people counting data into various graphic types; NUUO NVRSolo_Plus, a Linux embedded standalone solution; and NUUO IVS, a video analytics solution. It also offers NUUO Point of Sale (POS) solution that connects surveillance video with transaction data from POS and ATM; NUUO Facial recognition solution that connects surveillance videos with NUUO Nuface software; NUUO license plate recognition (LPR) solution, which connects surveillance videos with third party LPR solutions; and NUUO Access Control solution that connects surveillance video with access control systems from third party partners. In addition, the company offers NUUO iViewer solution to remotely monitor live video from security cameras; NUUO software development kit; NUUO Temperature Monitoring Panel; NUUO thermal detection solution; IP cameras; VZIII, a retail analytics system; and accessories. It serves retail, transportation, industrial, educational, banking, hospitality, and home markets, as well as government. NUUO Inc. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6426.TW.summary: Apogee Optocom Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells communication components. The company offers active and passive optical filters. It also provides 3D sensors; data center products; OEM and ODM coating services; and coating, polish cut, and check test equipment. Apogee Optocom Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Tainan City, Taiwan.

6428.TWO.summary: Taiwan Taomee Co., Ltd. provides online gaming services in Taiwan. Taiwan Taomee Co., Ltd. was founded in 2009 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6432.TWO.summary: Arlitech Electronic Corp. supplies inductors for LCD panel industry in Taiwan. It offers high current power, SMD power, DIP power, and RF inductors, as well as automotive grade and EMI suppression filters. The company also provides business items; cooling materials, such as graphene papers, thermal conductivity die-casting aluminum alloy, and graphene coating; and thermal solution designs. Its products are used in the display panel, network, industrial, entertainment, storage device, and computer applications. The company was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6434.TWO.summary: TacBright Optronics Corporation researches, develops, manufactures, and sells triacetate cellulose (TAC) films. It offers TAC films for protective film in liquid crystal displays (LCDs), as well as for sunglasses, photographic equipment filters, anti-glare goggles, car navigation, other polarizing microscopes, special medical glasses, and other purposes. The company serves LCD polarizer manufacturers in Taiwan, South Korea, Japan, and Mainland China. TacBright Optronics Corporation was founded in 2006 and is based in Miaoli, Taiwan.

6435.TWO.summary: Sinopower Semiconductor, Inc. operates as a fabless IC design company in Taiwan. The company designs, markets, and sells power discrete devices, including MOSFET and IGBT; and high voltage power ICs. The company's products are used in various applications, such as computers comprising PCs and servers, as well as power suppliers, communication equipment, handheld devices, consumer products, industrials, etc. Sinopower Semiconductor, Inc. was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

6438.TW.summary: Symtek Automation Asia Co., Ltd. designs and manufactures automation system solutions. The company offers automation equipment for printed circuit board, flexible board, IC substrate and packaging, high density interconnect board, and ceramic substrate applications. It is also involved in the design and provision of customized machines for applications in laser technology equipment, TFT-LCD flat panel screens, LEDs, touch panels, and LGP; and wafer, cell, and module manufacturing machines, including inspection systems, as well as intelligent automation integration services. The company was formerly known as SCHMID Automation Asia Co., Ltd. Symtek Automation Asia Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

6441.TWO.summary: Ibase Gaming Inc. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells gaming systems worldwide. It offers gaming solutions for lottery terminals, kiosks, and casino slots. The company also provides OEM and turnkey ODM solutions for terminals, cabinets, class leading PC hardware, and gaming support peripherals. Ibase Gaming Inc. was founded in 2011 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6442.TW.summary: EZconn Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells precision metal and optical fiber components of various electronic products in Taiwan, Asia, the United States, and Europe. The company offers RF coaxial connectors, precision adaptors, jumpers, surge arrestors, filters, amplifiers, and dipolar antennas, as well as CATV connector / components, shielding can for STB/ cable modem, microwave connector / dipole antenna, base station connector / arrester, LAB adaptor, and automotive connection system products for use in lightning protectors, antennas, filters, RF connectors, and POE home terminal AV/data MoCA filters. It also provides equipment distribution products, including OSA, passive, advanced, and other fiber optics products for access, metro-core/long haul, and transceiver applications; and ODM services. EZconn Corporation was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6443.TW.summary: TSEC Corporation engages in the design, manufacture, and sale of solar cells and modules in Taiwan, Japan, the United States, Europe, China, and internationally. It is also involved in power plant construction and operation services; rental of solar power generating equipment; sale of self-generated electricity; and provision of energy technology services. The company was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6446.TWO.summary: PharmaEssentia Corporation engages in the research, development, production, and sale of therapeutic products for the treatment of human diseases. Its products include ropeginterferon alfa-2b that is used for the treatment of polycythemia vera, essential thrombocythemia, and hepatitis B and C; and Anti-PD-1 antibody for the treatment of cancer. The company also licensed to develop Oraxol for the treatment of breast, advanced gastric, and esophageal cancer; KX01 for the treatment of psoriasis and actinic keratosis. It also focuses on the drug research and development programs in the areas of hematology, infectious disease, oncology, and dermatology. The company has a research collaboration agreement with Axis Therapeutics Limite for the development of T Cell Receptor-T therapy based on the T cell receptor affinity enhancing specific T cell therapy technology platform. PharmaEssentia Corporation was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6449.TW.summary: Apaq Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells electronic components in China, Taiwan, and internationally. It offers aluminum solid capacitors, aluminum liquid electrolytic capacitors, and general electronic components; and coiled and chip-type conductive polymer solid state capacitors. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Miaoli, Taiwan.

6457.TWO.summary: Hycon Technology Corporation designs, produces, and sells mixed signal microcontroller units, and battery management and touch panel ICs in Taiwan and China. The company offers battery management ICs, such as single cell and multi-cell, and secondary protectors, as well as balance ICs and gas gauges; mixed signal microcontroller units, including microcontroller units, data converters, digital multi-function meters, AC impedance measurement, sensor signal conditioners, low-dropout voltage regulators, LCD controllers and drivers, and application specific standard parts; and capacitive touch ICs. Its products are used in no-switch electronic scale, blood pressure monitor, PIR detector, digital multi-meter, and touch panel applications. The company provides its products under the HYCON brand name. Hycon Technology Corporation was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6461.TWO.summary: Intech Biopharm Corporation focuses on developing and manufacturing generic drugs to treat respiratory diseases. It owns iLEF (inhaled low ethanol formulation), a metered dose inhaler platform to treat asthma and chronic pulmonary obstructive disease; and dry powder inhaler. The company offers its products under the SYN006, SYN010, SYN007, Synflutide, Duasma, Synvent, and SYN011 names. Intech Biopharm Corporation is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6462.TWO.summary: Egis Technology Inc. engages in the IC design, research, development, testing, and sale of capacitive fingerprint sensors worldwide. It offers universal 2nd factor fingerprint dongle and mobile authentication solutions, and wearable devices. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6464.TW.summary: Taiwan Optical Platform Co., Ltd. operates as a multiple system operator of cable television in Taiwan. It offers cable TV-related services, including broadcasting, installation, advertisements, channel leasing, paid channels, etc. The company also provides telecommunication services, such as broadband Internet, urban networks, and circuit leasing. In addition, it operates television channels; and produces and broadcasts local news and public forum programs. The company was formerly known as Bao Yue Investment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Taiwan Optical Platform Co., Ltd. in January 2013. Taiwan Optical Platform Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is based in Taichung City, Taiwan.

6465.TWO.summary: ATrack Technology Inc. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells GPS telematics hardware in Taiwan and internationally. It offers hardwired fleet tracking devices, plug and play GPS tracking units, and IP rated tracking devices, as well as accessories. The company's products are used in cars, trucks, containers and non-powered assets, trailers, and motorcycles. ATrack Technology Inc. was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6468.TWO.summary: Netmarble Joybomb Inc. develops and publishes mobile, PC, and console games in Taiwan, Hong Kong, and Macau. The company was formerly known as JoyBomb Entertainment Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Netmarble Joybomb Inc. in December 2014. Netmarble Joybomb Inc. was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6472.TWO.summary: Bora Pharmaceuticals Co., LTD. engages in the research, development, production, marketing, sale, and distribution of pharmaceutical products worldwide. It manufactures and sells generic, brand, and over-the-counter (OTC) drugs. The company is involved in contract development and manufacturing; consumer healthcare and OTC; and prescription drugs businesses. It also provides clinical and commercial manufacturing services, including solvent manufacturing; solid and liquid dosage forms; extrusion spheronization; immediate and extended release; core, sugar-coated, and film-coated tablets; fixed-dose combination products; and granules, and liquids sachet/stick pack filling. In addition, the company offers pharmaceutical development services, such as liquid and solid dosage forms, and immediate and modified release, analytical method development and validation; packaging and serialization services, which include bottle and blister packaging, and sachets; and raw materials and finished products testing, and analytical techniques services, as well as method verification, validation, and transfer. Further, it provides OTC medicines, foods and vitamins supplements; and skincare products. Additionally, the company also offers market analysis, drug and regulatory related services, price development, GDP warehousing, distribution, packaging, marketing planning, and sales services. The company's sales and distribution network comprises medical centers, hospitals, clinics, pharmacies, drug stores, CVS, and specialty channels. Bora Pharmaceuticals Co., LTD. was founded in 2007 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

6473.TWO.summary: SNSplus, Inc. operates as a social, Web, and mobile game publisher. The company also provides live streaming service; and content production/licensing services. It operates in Taiwan, Hong Kong, Macao, Japan, Thailand, and the rest of Asia. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6474.TWO.summary: WFE Technology Corp. manufactures and sells electrical products primarily in Taiwan. It offers power integration products; and circuit protection products, CO and outside plant products, connectors, diodes, encoders, LED shunt protectors, magnetic products, microelectronic modules, position sensors, potentiometers, resistive products, switches, transistors and thyristors, trimpot trimming potentiometers, pro audio products, and automotive products. The company also provides quartz oscillators and microchips. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

6475.TWO.summary: Assem Technology Co., Ltd engages in the development, manufacture, and sale of board-to-board and flexible printed circuit board connectors in Taiwan. It also offers board to board battery and USB type C connectors. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6477.TW.summary: ANJI Technology Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells solar modules in Taiwan. The company offers poly and mono crystalline, double glass, and building integrated photovoltaic solar modules, as well as AC modules. Its products are used in power generation systems. The company also provides 3D printing services. ANJI Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in TÃ¡inÃ¡n, Taiwan.

6482.TWO.summary: Fun Yours Technology Co.,Ltd. develops online and PC games. It provides role-playing, real-time strategy, action, and puzzle games. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

6485.TWO.summary: ASolid Technology Co., Ltd. operates as a NAND flash controller provider in Taiwan. It offers SD/microSD controllers, USB flash drive controllers, eMMC controllers, and SSD and UFD controllers. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

6488.TWO.summary: GlobalWafers Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, researches, designs, develops, and manufactures, semiconductor ingots and wafers in Taiwan and internationally. It offers silicon wafer and ingots; and annealed, diffusion, epitaxial, compound, polished, and SOI wafers. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Hsinchu, Taiwan. GlobalWafers Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Sino-American Silicon Products Inc.

6491.TW.summary: Pegavision Corporation manufactures and sells various soft contact lenses and medical optic devices under the Pegavision brand in Taiwan. The company was incorporated in 2009 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan. Pegavision Corporation is a subsidiary of Pegatron Corp.

6492.TWO.summary: Senhwa Biosciences, Inc., a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company, identifies and develops therapies for the treatment of cancer. The company is developing CX-4945 that is in phase I/II clinical trial in combination with gemcitabine plus cisplatin for the treatment of patients with cholangiocarcinoma; CX-5461 AU, a phase I, open-label, dose escalation, safety, pharmacokinetic, and pharmacodynamics study of intravenously administered CX-5461 in patients with advanced hematologic malignancies; and CX-5461 CA, which is in phase I clinical trial in patients with solid tumors and breast cancer. It is also developing CX-4945-07, which is in phase I clinical trial, multi-center, open-label, treatment duration increment, expansion, safety, and pharmacodynamic study of CX-4945 administered orally twice daily to patients with advanced basal cell carcinoma; and CX-4945 PBTC-053, a pediatric brain tumor consortium that is in phase I/II clinical trial and surgical study of CX-4945 in patients with recurrent SHH medulloblastoma. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6493.TWO.summary: Ttbio Corp. manufactures and sells medical instruments under the TTBIO brand name in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers high and low speed hand piece products, dental spare parts, service rotors, maintenance units, and electric hand piece systems. It also provides precision machined parts and components to various industries, including medical, automotive, aerospace, computer components, security, maintenance parts, and custom machining. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

6494.TWO.summary: Nyquest Technology Co., Ltd. researches, designs, and sells integrated circuits (ICs). The company provides voice synthesizer ICs, 4-bit microcontrollers with voice/MIDI products, 8-bit microcontrollers, motor drivers, and other products. It offers LED control and drive, speech, and multi-channel speech/melody ICs; 8-Bit OTP MCU for home appliances; 8-bit MCU with LCD drivers; audio power amplifier ICs, low power LCD driver IC, high power motor driver ICs, 4-bit MCU with touch-keys and LED controllers, and 4-Bit MCU with universal remote controllers; and 32-bit MCUs. In addition, the company provides hardware and software development tools. The company offers its products through agents in Taiwan, Japan, Mainland China, Europe, Hong Kong, and the United States. Nyquest Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

6495.TWO.summary: Nanoplus Ltd. engages in the production, purification, grading, and development of nano diamond powder. The company is also involved in the research and development, and production of thermal materials for thermal dissipation. In addition, it offers environmental wastewater treatment. Further, the company provides laser processing technology solutions. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6496.TWO.summary: Excelsior Biopharma Inc. develops pharmaceutical products in Taiwan. The company offers prescription drugs, over-the-counter drugs, medical devices, healthcare food products, medical supplies, and skin products. It provides its products for the therapeutic areas, such as pediatrics, gastroenterology, neurology, cardiology, dermatology, medical toxicology, dentistry, obstetrics and gynecology, anesthesiology, orthopedics, neonatology, oncology, pulmonary medicine, nephology, and others, etc. The company also offers test kits under the Actim name to detect inflected C-reactive protein, influenza virus, colorectal cancer, acute pancreatitis, preterm birth, and early water-breaking. In addition, it provides oral care products, including oral cleansing toothpaste, mouthwash and gel; and health food and cosmetic products. Excelsior Biopharma Inc. also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Excelsior Enterprise Co., Ltd. Excelsior Biopharma Inc. was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6498.TWO.summary: Powertip Image Corp engages in the manufacture of electronic components and optical instruments Taiwan and China. The company offers cellphone, NB, optical touch panel, LED illumination, and optical fiber lenses. It also provides PC and Web camera lenses. Powertip Image Corp was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

6499.TWO.summary: Medeon Biodesign, Inc. develops and markets medical device solutions in Taiwan. It focuses on developing devices for minimally invasive surgeries, such as Duett, a vascular graft system; ClickClean, a solution to view throughout laparoscopic surgeries; AbClose to prevent port site herniation caused by improper closure; Mercury to widen the narrowed prostatic urethra tissue creating an open urethral lumen for normal urinary flow; PUMA, a solution to treat orthopedic extremity injuries; and Cross-Seal, a large-bore closure device. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6504.TW.summary: Nan Liu Enterprise Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells household goods in Taiwan. The company operates through four segments: Thermal-Bonded Nonwovens Fabrics, Spunlace Nonwovens Fabrics, Biotechnology, and B2 Post-processing segments. It offers PP air through and thermal bond nonwoven fabrics, which includes baby/adult diaper and sanitary napkin surface material; spunlace nonwoven fabrics, which consists medical grade operation protective clothing fabrics, dust free electronic cleaning cloth, clean wipes, medical drape cloth, and ointment cloth; needle rolled nonwoven fabric, which comprises bra liner and shoulder pad cotton material. Further, the company provides biotech products, consisting wet wipes for infant and adult skin, masks, makeup remover cotton, emulsion liquid cosmetics, such as collagen day cream, placenta night cream, lotions, extracts, eye creams, marine creams, and skincare products. Additionally, it offers grinding wheelsÂstainless steel, copper PCB grinding, wood polishing, and electroplating polishing; high-end air filter cloth; and household articles, which includes household cleaning rags, scouring pads, and other cleaning products. The company also exports its products to Japan and the United States. Nan Liu Enterprise Co., Ltd. was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung City, Taiwan.

6505.TW.summary: Formosa Petrochemical Corporation engages in the petrochemical and public utility businesses in Taiwan, the Philippines, Singapore, Malaysia, the People's Republic of China, Korea, and internationally. The company produces and sells petroleum and petrochemical products. Its products include gasoline; diesel; liquefied petroleum gas; jet fuel/kerosene; naphtha; petrochemical raw materials, such as ethylene, propylene, butadiene, and riffinate-1; fuel oil/asphalt/sulfur fuel oil; base oil; and lubricants. The company also explores and produces oil and gas; produces and sells water, electricity, and steam; and leases ships, as well as offers transportation services. Formosa Petrochemical Corporation was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Mailiao, Taiwan.

6508.TWO.summary: Huikwang Corporation manufactures and sells agrochemical in Taiwan and China. It offers insecticides, fungicides, herbicides, miticides, surfactants, and attractants for use in crop protection. The company was founded in 1965 and is based in Tainan, Taiwan.

6509.TWO.summary: Taiwan Hopax Chems.Mfg.Co.,Ltd. produces and sells diversified chemical products in the areas of specialty chemicals, fine chemicals, and repositionable self-adhesive products in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers papermaking chemicals, including dispersants, carbonless paper chemicals, paper coating chemicals, and wet end chemicals; water treatment chemicals, such as wastewater treating compounds, and chemicals for cooling water and boiler water; and combo packs, paper notes, cubes, line/assorted/pop-up notes, markers/index tabs/flags, clear notes, special and designing notes, and re-stick tape info boards/meeting pads. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

6510.TWO.long_name: Chunghwa Precision Test Tech. Co., Ltd.
6510.TWO.summary: Chunghwa Precision Test Tech. Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the testing of semiconductor components in Taiwan, China, and internationally. It also produces printed circuit boards (PCB); and markets electronic products. The company offers interposers that convert signal wiring of probe PCB and allow the probe head to receive the signal; vertical probe cards for use in test interface before wafer dicing and IC packaging; and direct docking products for use in wafer testing. It also provides load board PCBs to test yield rate after dicing, mounting, welding, and wrapped with plastics, ceramics, and metals. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

6512.TWO.summary: GoMax Electronics, Inc. engages in the design, development, manufacture, and sale of audio and video systems in Taiwan. It offers SDI, DVI, converter, audio, HDMI, display port, and wall plate series products; and live streaming, optical extender, A/V over IP, video processor, pattern generator, and tool kit products, as well as legacy products. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Zhubei, Taiwan.

6514.TWO.summary: Radiation Technology, Inc. designs, manufactures, and sells antennas worldwide. The company offers LTE/4G/BTS, IoT/intelligent, automotive, RFID/health care, GPS/transportation, and wireless communication antennas, as well as semi-rigid and flexible RF cable assembly products, RF connectors, wire harness, microwave devices, and other products, as well as medical, computer, and network cables. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

6515.TW.summary: WinWay Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and supplies integrated circuit testing interfaces worldwide. Its products include high performance heat sinks, high performance test sockets, thermal control systems, changeover kits, direct docking probe cards, burn-in sockets, and contact element products. It also provides technical support services. The company serves semiconductor, opto-electronic, and IT industries. WinWay Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

6516.TWO.summary: Kingwaytek Technology Co., Ltd. produces electronic maps and develops GIS systems in Taiwan. It offers telecommunications maps, 3D maps, and high-definition maps for self-driving cars; and Leke navigation wang quan 3D, a mobile navigation software that provides 3D map, traffic lights along the way, road markings, signs, surrounding landmarks, viaducts, and navigation guidelines under the bridge. The company also provides Leke navigation king TM series that offers professional car networking navigation software for vehicle use; and Leker interchange, a transfer and pedestrian route guidance service. In addition, it offers big data services that are used in smart traffic diversion and enhancing public transport services; Leke store; and LE bus owner service. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

6523.TWO.summary: Dr. Wu Skincare Co., Ltd. develops and sells skincare products in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers cleansers, masks, toners, serums, moisturizers, and sunscreen and eye care products, as well as makeup and body products. It also provides products for acne and pores, hydration, lines and wrinkles, brightening, body care, sensitive skin, and radiant health. The company offers its products through a network of approximately 2200 sales points, as well as e-commerce sales channels. Dr. Wu Skincare Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

6527.TWO.summary: Crystalvue Medical Corporation designs, manufactures, and sells medical devices. Its products include OCT devices, fundus cameras, chin rest devices, digital microscope cameras, tonometers, nucleic acid extraction system, polymerase chain reaction system, gastrointestinal endoscopic disposable devices, etc. The company offers automated retina cameras; FundusVue, a diagnosis instrument for ophthalmologists to inspect and record the patients' retina; and TonoVue, a diagnosis instrument to measure IOP of the patient. Crystalvue Medical Corporation was founded in 2009 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

6530.TWO.summary: Axcen Photonics Corporation specializes in photonic integration of optical, mechanical, and electrical design of manufacturing professional-grade optical transceiver modules in Taiwan. It offers 25G SFP28, video small form factor pluggable (SFP), compact SFP, 10G SFP+, 1x9, SFP, copper SFP, bi-directional SFP with single LC receptacle, BIDI 1x9, 2x5 small form factor (SFF), gigabit Ethernet passive optical network SFF, and coarse wavelength division multiplexing SFP transceiver modules. The company was incorporated in 2002 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6531.TW.summary: AP Memory Technology Corporation operates as a fabless IC design and marketing company in Taiwan and internationally. It offers low power DRAM, PSRAM, and IoT RAM used in smart audio and video, waerables, Internet of Things, cellular and connectivity, automotive, AI, and IP service applications. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Zhubei, Taiwan.

6532.TWO.summary: Calitech Co., Ltd. develops technology solutions for semiconductor, III/V, MEMS, LED, and display industries worldwide. The company offers semiconductor critical components for applications in chemical mechanical polishing fabrication equipment, etching, chemical vapor deposition, physical vapor deposition, etc. It also provides systems, such as spray solvent tools, spray acid tools, and spin rinse dryers; and electrostatic chucks for semiconductor and other industries. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

6533.TW.summary: Andes Technology Corporation engages in the research and developing, designing, manufacturing, and marketing of embedded processor intellectual property (IP), related hardware/software developing platform, and toolchains worldwide. The company offers AndeStar Architecture, a patented 32-bit/64-bit RISC-style CPU architecture; AndesCore, a series of 32-bit/64-bit CPUs for use in embedded applications; Andes Custom Extension that allows designers design their own CPU instructions on the already performance optimized AndesCore processors; and AndeShape Platform that contains three categories of products for system development with AndesCore processors. It also provides AndeSight IDE, an eclipse-based IDE that provides solutions to develop embedded applications; and AndeSoft SW Stack, which provides a set of software components, such as real-time operating system, Linux kernel and drivers, libraries, middleware, and application frameworks. The company offers RISC-V Solutions; network security solution; and replacement solutions for embedded applications, as well as licensing CPU IP and provides related services. Andes Technology Corporation was founded in 2005 is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

6535.TWO.summary: Lumosa Therapeutics Co., Ltd. researches and develops drugs for the neurological and inflammatory diseases in Taiwan. The company offers LT - 1001, an analgesic injection that has completed Phase II/III clinical trials for severe pain relief after surgery. It is also developing LT3001, which is in Phase II clinical trial for the treatment of acute ischemic stroke; LT5001 that is in Phase II clinical trial for uremic pruritus; and LT2003, which is in pre-clinical stage for the treatment of oncology. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6546.TWO.summary: AMPAK Technology Inc. operates as an optical communication and wireless multimedia company in Taiwan. The company operates through two business units, Wireless Multi-Media and Optical Communication. The Wireless Multi-Media business unit offers wireless multimedia products, such as Systems in Package and wireless HDMI. The Optical Communication business unit provides Tocan packaging and testing services for optoelectronic components, as well as various solutions for the optoelectronics industry. The company serves the industrial PC, energy efficiency, audio, consumer electronics, VR, UAV, wearable, medical, and automotive markets. AMPAK Technology Inc. was founded in 2000 and is based in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

6547.TWO.summary: Medigen Vaccine Biologics Corporation, a biopharmaceutical company, develops and produces vaccines and biologics for unmet medical needs in Taiwan and internationally. The company is developing A 71 to fight against EV71, a member of genus enterovirus; H5N1 and H7N9 mockup vaccines for pandemic influenza; and dengue vaccines. It is also developing biosimilar Palivizumab to prevent respiratory syncytial virus. The company has a collaboration with Dynavax Technologies Corporation to develop a vaccine candidate to protect against COVID-19; and a partnership with BlueWillow Biologics, Inc. to develop intranasal vaccine for SARS-CoV-2. Medigen Vaccine Biologics Corporation was founded in 2012 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan. Medigen Vaccine Biologics Corporation operates as a subsidiary of Medigen Biotechnology Corp.

6548.TWO.summary: Chang Wah Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells LED lead frame and molding compound materials in Taiwan. It offers LED and IC products, and premolds. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

6549.TWO.summary: TaiwanJ Pharmaceuticals Co., Ltd., a specialty pharmaceutical company, develops and commercializes small molecules for chronic organ inflammation of metabolic, autoimmune, and infectious etiologies in Taiwan. The company also develops JKB-122 and JKB-121; and novel chemical entities for therapy to address chronic liver diseases and allergy/asthma. Its products target diseases that include liver inflammation/liver fibrosis, non-alcoholic steatohepatitis, non-alcoholic fatty liver disease, autoimmune diseases, asthma, and atopic dermatitis. The company was incorporated in 2011 and is based in Zhubei, Taiwan.

6552.TW.summary: JMC Electronics Co., Ltd. produces reel to reel chip on film that is applied to LCD in Taiwan. The company was formerly known as Sumiko Electronics Taiwan Co., Ltd. and changed its name to JMC Electronics Co., Ltd. in 2014. JMC Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1973 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

6556.TWO.summary: Topview Optronics Corporation designs, produces, markets, and sells surveillance cameras and peripherals worldwide. The company offers various IP cameras, as well as accessories, including pendant mount and wall mount brackets, corner mount and pole mount adaptors, parapet wall mounts, pendant and wall mount with junction boxes, and sun shields. It also provides after sales services. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

6558.TW.summary: SYNergy ScienTech Corp. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells rechargeable lithium-ion and lithium-ion polymer batteries in Taiwan and internationally. Its products are used in various portable electronic products, such as Bluetooth headsets, MP3 and DSC products, cellular phones, and notebook computers, as well as other products. SYNergy ScienTech Corp. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

6559.TWO.summary: High Power Lighting Corp designs, manufactures, and sells LED chips and related components. Its products include UVA, UVB/UVC, IR, and color products. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6560.TWO.summary: Appro Photoelectron Inc. operates as a design house for image products to enable customers to develop products in Taiwan. It offers camera module solutions, body worn cameras, and car DVR solutions; and image related products. The company also provides system integration and design, and FAE technical support services. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6561.TWO.summary: Chief Telecom Inc. provides telecommunication services in Taiwan and internationally. It offers POP sites; IDC services, including space/cage and suite, cabinet, inter-connection, customized power, and managed services; IDC value-added services, such as managed CPE, backup, and security services; and online IDC tour comprising L.Y. and T.F. building, cable, power, security, fire alarm, and air conditioning systems, as well as cold/hot aisle arrangement systems, lobbies, network operation centers, and IDC facilities. The company also provides enterprise networking solutions comprising multi-protocol label switching virtual private network, ADSL-VPN, tunnel VPN, SSL VPN application, data managed CPE; leased line, and international private leased circuit /IEPL; and Internet access solutions services. In addition, it offers ISR wholesale voice and voice over IP services; and retail voice services for businesses communications consisting of exchange equipment, circuit connection, and cost analysis data. Further, the company provides cloud services, such as cloud computing, APP cloud, data storage, security, and value-added services; and operates chief cloud exchange, Taipei internet exchange, and submarine exchange and voice exchange centers. Additionally, it offers global carrier, digital content, e-commerce, chain store, hybrid cloud, enterprise voice, data storage integration, greater china, and global communication solutions, as well as ICT integration solutions for traveling industry. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan. Chief Telecom Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Chunghwa Telecom Co., Ltd.

6564.TWO.summary: Enimmune corporation operates as a biopharmaceutical Research and development, and marketing company in Taiwan. Its products include Tuberculin PPD RT23 SSI, an approved drug for tuberculin test to determine whether the patient is infected with tuberculosis. The company is also involved in the development of vaccines to prevent various infectious diseases, such as enterovirus, pneumonia, norovirus, dengue fever virus, Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus, etc. Enimmune corporation was founded in 2014 and is based in Taichung City, Taiwan.

6565.TWO.summary: ThroughTek Co., Ltd. provides solutions for Internet of Things (IoT) cloud services platforms. The company operates Kalay Platform, which provides customized app services to help customers deploy smart products and accelerate its time-to-market, as well as integrates video surveillance equipment, smart consumer products, and various sensors to allow brand name manufacturers, telecoms providers, system integration providers, hardware manufacturers, and other service providers to offer smart solutions. Its Kalay platform offers cloud services, including point-to-point and IoT connection, account and device management, video surveillance and cloud storage, push notifications, over the air, and smart assistant services. The company serves smart home, agriculture, and connected car industries. ThroughTek Co., Ltd. was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6566.TWO.summary: Chuang Yi Biotech Co., ltd. engages in the research, development, and marketing of medicines and health foods in Taiwan. The company offers products in the areas of gastrointestinal, metabolism, and regular health care, as well as allergy reducing products. Chuang Yi Biotech Co., ltd. Swas founded in 2011 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6568.TWO.summary: Rafael Microelectronics, Inc. manufactures and sells radio frequency (RF) integrated circuits. It offers IoT connectivity products, terrestrial/cable/satellite set-top box receivers, satellite broadcast reception and distribution systems, optical communication systems, and TV receivers, as well as provides RF IP and design services. The company offers its products in Taiwan, Europe, North America, China, Korea and Japan. Rafael Microelectronics, Inc. was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Zhubei, Taiwan.

6569.TWO.summary: Onyx Healthcare Inc., a professional medical IT company, provides medical PC solutions for the hospital/clinical IT market worldwide. It offers mobile cart computers, ubiquitous power solutions, remote management software, mobile medical tablets, surgical workstations, operating room solutions, fanless slim PPCs, medical AIO solutions, bedside infotainment, medical display solutions, MedPC box PCs, and medical slim mini-ITX MBs. The company also offers digital operation rooms, AI and robots, power management solutions, smart ward solutions, nurse stations, telecare and telemedicine, remote system management, and emergency medical services. In addition, it provides OEM/ODM services, such as planning, designing, validation, integration, production, after-sale, software, and design capability. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan. Onyx Healthcare Inc. is a subsidiary of ASUS Group.

6570.TWO.summary: Aplex Technology Inc. develops, manufactures, and sells industrial PC products worldwide. The company provides stainless steel panel, industrial panel, embedded box, marine panel, in-vehicle panel, and ATEx panel PC products. It also offers human-machine interfaces, ATEx displays, ATEx box pc products, industrial displays and boards, and machine vision systems, as well as accessories, including storage products, power adapters and modules, converter boards, and product stands. The company provides its products for use in smart factory, surveillance, control and communication, machine vision, food and beverage automation, kiosk and ticketing, ATEX oil and gas, smart warehousing and transportation, and healthcare applications. Aplex Technology Inc. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6572.TWO.summary: PlexBio Co., Ltd. designs, develops, and manufactures multiplexing platforms and assays to enable genetic research and clinical cancer diagnostics. It offers IntelliPlex SARS-CoV-2/Flu Kit, an in vitro diagnostic device; IntelliPlex SARS-CoV-2 Detection Kit, an automated solution for testing during the coronavirus disease; IntelliPlex Lung Cancer Panel-cfDNA, a molecular assay for mutations; IntelliPlex Lung Cancer Panel Â cfRNA, which detects various variants of the ALK, ROS1, RET, NTRK1, and MET genes using cell-free RNA derived from plasma of patients with NSCLC; IntelliPlex Lung Cancer Panel, which detects various DNA mutations; IntelliPlex BRAF V600 Mutation Kit, a single well solution for mutations; IntelliPlex EGFR Mutation Kit, a molecular assay for somatic mutations; IntelliPlex KRAS Mutation Plus Kit, a solution for clinically actionable mutations; IntelliPlex NRAS Mutation Kit, a single well mutation kit; IntelliPlex PIK3CA Mutation Kit, a PCR mutation kit; IntelliPlex ALK Rearrangement Kit, a single well solution for actionable ALK gene rearrangements; IntelliPlex RET/NTRK1 Rearrangement Kit, a single well RET and NTRK1 gene rearrangement kit; IntelliPlex ROS1 Rearrangement Kit, a molecular assay for clinical actionable gene rearrangements; IntelliPlex Food Testing Kit for Dairy, a single well solution for bacteria; and pCode Coupling Buffer Set, a solution for coupling process. The company also offers IntelliPlex 1000 pCode Processor, a hybridization, washing, incubation, and labeling solution; PlexBio 100 Fluorescent Analyzer, an optical imaging system; DigiPlex Thermocycler, an instrument for PCR amplification; pCode MicroDisc, a solution for multiplexing applications; PlexBio Magnetic Stand, a solution for paramagnetic pCode precipitation; pCode Coupling Buffer Set, a solution to-use buffers; and DeXipher software for data analysis and interpretation. PlexBio Co., Ltd. was founded in 2009 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6574.TWO.summary: Mikobeaute International Co., Ltd. researches and develops, and sells beauty and skin care products in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers its products under the EDN, NU+ derma, L'HERBOFLORE, and MIKOBEAUTÃ SPA brand names. It also operates skin care beauty therapy center. Mikobeaute International Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

6575.TWO.summary: SyneuRx International (Taiwan) Corp. develops drugs for the treatment of unmet medical needs in central nervous system disorders in Taiwan. Its pipeline under clinical development includes SND11, which is in Phase IIb/III clinical trial for the treatment of adolescent schizophrenia; SND12 that is in Phase IIb/III clinical trial for therapy on refractory schizophrenia; and SND13, which is in Phase IIb/III clinical trial for the treatment of adult schizophrenia. The company is also developing SND14, which is in Phase IIb/III clinical trial to treat early dementia; SND51 that is in Phase II clinical trial for dementia and psychosis symptoms; SNG12, which is in Phase III clinical trial for the treatment of depression and suicidality; SNA1 that is in Phase II clinical trial to treat refractory depression; and SNB01, which is in Phase II clinical trial for the treatment of COVID-19. SyneuRx International (Taiwan) Corp. was founded in 2013 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6576.TWO.summary: Foresee Pharmaceuticals Co., Ltd., clinical-stage pharmaceutical company, engages in the development and commercialization of drugs in Taiwan and Europe. The company's stabilized injectable formulation pipeline includes FP-001, which completed Phase III clinical study for the treatment of advanced stage prostate cancer; FP-004 that is in preclinical stage to treat opioids use disorder; FP-011 and FP-014, a long-acting sustained release dosage form for the treatment of breast cancer/prostate cancer; FP-015, for the treatment of neurological diseases; and FP-002 for the treatment of acromegaly, as well as FP-008 for the treatment of diabetic retinopathy. Its new chemical entity pipeline products consists of FP-020 to treat alport syndrome; FP-025, a selective matrix metalloproteinase-12 inhibitor, which is in Phase II clinical trial for the treatment of asthama, chronic obstructive pulmonary diseases, and emphysema or sarcoidosis; and FP-045, a small molecule mitochondrial aldehyde dehydrogenase 2 that completed Phase I clinical study for the treatment of peripheral arterial disease, fanconi anemia, and cardiorenal metabolic diseases. The company's strategic partners include Pierre Fabre Medicament Production and ScinoPharm. Foresee Pharmaceuticals Co., Ltd. was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6577.TWO.summary: Promate Solutions Corporation designs, develops, and sells technologies for TFT LCD displays worldwide. The company offers embedded panels, panel PCs, industrial displays, and LCD products. It serves medical, automotive, vending, and marine markets. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6578.TWO.summary: DaBomb Protein Corp. produces and supplies plant peptides in Asia. It offers hydrolyzed soya peptide products, functional peptides, and natural lactobacillus strains under the da bomb brand. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.

6579.TW.summary: AAEON Technology Inc. designs and manufactures advanced industrial and embedded computing platforms worldwide. The company offers embedded boards, such as embedded single board computers, computer-on-modules, industrial motherboards, smart display modules, and RISC and PICMG single board computers; and computing systems, including panel and fanless embedded box PCs, industrial touch displays, machine vision and digital signage systems, turn-key chassis solutions, multi-PoE and fanless appliances, and industrial chassis.
