It also provides rugged tablet computers and accessories; UP boards and systems; artificial intelligence (AI) Edge solutions and modules; and network appliances, such as desktop and rackmount network appliances, networking motherboards, and network interface modules. In addition, the company offers IoT gateway boards and systems. Its products are used in smart city, safety and security, smart retail and manufacturing, AI computing platform, network, software defined wide area network, intelligent vending machine, vision system solution, smart office/wellness sensor, and rugged tablet applications. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6580.TWO.summary: TaiRx, Inc., a pharmaceutical company, focuses on the development and commercialization of therapeutics for the treatment of cancer and other diseases. The company's products under development include CVM-1118, an oral anti-cancer drug that is Phase II clinical trial; and Rexis, an add-on injection therapy that is in Phase III clinical trials to treat patients with sepsis. Its pre-clinical products comprise TRX-711 that is used to treat secondary hyperparathyroidism; TRX-920, an oral delivery formulation; and TRX-105, a molecule developed for treating and alleviating symptoms of various colitis. The company also offers Zelnite, a drug that helps in patient's blood Se level and immune system; and focuses on development of the nodal diagnostic devices and anti-body drugs. TaiRx, Inc. was founded in 2011 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6582.TW.long_name: Shin Foong Specialty and Applied Materials Co., Ltd.
6582.TW.summary: Shin Foong Specialty and Applied Materials Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells synthetic SBR and NBR rubber latex products, and adhesives in Taiwan. Its products are used in various applications, such as paper coating, carpet backing, and paper and textile saturation; non-formaldehyde plywood adhesive, veneer fancy adhesive, middle density fiberboard adhesive, and wood lamination adhesive; emulsion resin for outdoor wall paint; and glove dipping. The company was formerly known as Shin Foong Chemical Industry Co., Ltd and changed its name to Shin Foong Specialty and Applied Materials Co., Ltd. in September 2016. Shin Foong Specialty and Applied Materials Co., Ltd. was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Pingtung, Taiwan.

6583.TWO.summary: Jason's Entertainment Co., Ltd. produces television shows and dramas in Taiwan. The company also distributes and brokerages artists; and offers project marketing services. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6584.TWO.summary: Nan Juen International Co., Ltd. manufactures and trades in steel-ball bearing slides and other products in Taiwan, the Americas, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Nan Juen Industrial Corporation and changed its name to Nan Juen International Co., Ltd. in September 1996. Nan Juen International Co., Ltd. in 1984 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan. Nan Juen International Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Repon Industrial Corporation.

6585.TWO.summary: DingZing Advanced Materials Inc. researches, develops, produces, and sells composite materials and technical films for various industries in Taiwan. Its products include Provecta series of advanced technical films that provide an alternative to rubber and traditional plastic; Advanta technical films for clothing applications; Orkesta series of composite materials with a layer of hot melt film designed to replace conventional materials, such as microfiber or genuine leather; Perfola air hoses and hydration tubes; Aldura transmission and conveyor belts; and DingZing DZ seals. The company's products are used in apparel, automotive, electronic, wearable, footwear, healthcare, optical, outdoor and sport goods, and furniture and bedding applications. DingZing Advanced Materials Inc. is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

6588.TWO.summary: East Tender Optoelectronics Corporation manufactures and sells optical thin film filters in Taiwan and internationally. It offers narrowband filter chips for use in the telecom industry applications, as well as custom narrowband filters for non telecom applications. The company also provides broadband filter chips, including banded skip filter chips, filter components for FTTx, CWDM filter components, and gain flattening filters; and customized products, such as coated WDM on pigtail for hi isolation application, IR-cut filters for digital still cameras and CCM applications, and R/G/B filters for digital lighting processing projectors. East Tender Optoelectronics Corporation was founded in 2000 and is based in Yilan City, Taiwan.

6589.TWO.summary: EirGenix Inc. operates as a contract development and manufacturing company Taiwan and internationally. Its services include cell line development and cell bank manufacturing, process development, analytical sciences and quality control, cGMP manufacturing, and antibody drug conjugate. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6590.TWO.summary: Provision Information Co.,Ltd. provides payment, financial application, security, and outsourcing services to the financial industry. It offers payment solutions, such as ProIBRS, an interbank remittance system; ProATM, an ATM auto-transaction system; ProEPS FEDI, an enterprise payment system/financial EDI; ProEPS FXML, an enterprise payment system/financial XML; ProCMS, a card management system for IC cards and magnetic cards; ProIB/WebATM, an Internet banking/Web ATM; and real-time gross settlement mechanism. Its payment solutions also ProTGW-TSM, a mobile payment TSM gateway; ProTGW-HCE, a mobile payment HCE gateway; ProeACH, an eACH gateway for joined banks; and digital payment solutions consisting of ProePAY, a digital payment system, as well as payment gateways. The company also provides financial application solutions, including ProFEP, a platform for developing financial transactions; ProComm, an integrated communication server; ProFCS, a collection system for financial industry; ProMIPS, an encryption kit for file transmission; ProACS, an ATM controlled system; ProAMS, an ATM management system; and ProJCIC, a joint credit inquiry system. In addition, it offers information security products comprising ProHSM, a hardware security module (HSM); ProHSM KMC, a key management console; ProMonitor, a HSM monitoring system; ProHSM HRM, a HSM resource managers; ProHSM SUIP, a secure user interface program; and ProVA, a validation authority system. Further, the company provides outsourcing services, including on-site human resource services for various industries, platforms, and job roles. Provision Information Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

6592.TW.summary: Hotai Finance Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides vehicle installment sales, and machinery and equipment leasing services in Taiwan and China. It also offers new and used car installment loans; installment loan for motorcycle and scooter; and refinance loans for car, motorcycle, and scooter. In addition, the company provides corporate financing/leasing products, such as medical, freight truck, and CNC machines leasing; installment loans for equipment and semi-finished products or materials; and factoring services. Further, it engages in passenger car leasing activities. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan. Hotai Finance Co., Ltd. Is a subsidiary of Hotai Motor Co.,Ltd.

6593.TWO.summary: Taiwan Name Plate Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells plastic cards, name plates, and membrane switches worldwide. The company offers contactless and sharped, contact only IC, and dual interface IC cards, as well as card personalization services. It also provides embossed metal dome membrane switches, capacitive touch keypads, and printed circuit boards. Taiwan Name Plate Co., Ltd. was founded in 1970 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

6594.TWO.summary: Alcorlink Corp., a fabless IC design company, provides device controller and image application solutions primarily in Taiwan. It offers I/O product/image application/others, which include flash and smart card readers, USB cameras, intelligent storage solutions, hub controllers, and MFi products. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6595.TWO.summary: Julien's International Entertainment Group provides digital multimedia technology solutions worldwide. Its activities include theme park development and project management; digital content development, production, and distribution; floating theater and theme park equipment development; and investment in and development of Xingyu Cinema Park. The company was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6596.TWO.summary: Kuang Hong Arts Management Incorporation engages in the promotion of art and cultural activities in Taiwan and internationally. It provides services in the areas of music, dance, exhibition, concert, drama, physical education, parenting, lecture, film, commodity, and package goods. The company was formerly known as Yucai International Marketing Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Kuang Hong Arts Management Incorporation in July 2014. Kuang Hong Arts Management Incorporation was founded in 2004 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

6597.TWO.summary: Ecocera Optronics Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells ceramics circuit boards in Taiwan. It offers direct plating copper products consisting high-power LED thermal dissipation substrates, LED thermal dissipation modules, concentrating type solar cell substrates, passive components, high power electronic components, etc. The company also provides direct bonded copper and high performance copper products. Its products are used in LED lighting, automotive lighting, mobile phone LED flash, UV, display, and other applications. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

6599.TWO.summary: Poindus Systems Corp. designs and manufactures POS terminal and touch display products worldwide. The company offers panel PCs, tablets, small and large size displays, box PCs, POS peripherals, and custom products. Its products are used in hospitality, retail, medical, and industrial applications. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6609.TWO.summary: Taiwan Takisawa Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells precision machine tools and printed circuit board drillers in Asia, Europe, the Americas, and internationally. The company offers machine tools, such as small and medium CNC lathes, and non-CNC high speed precision lathes for bicycle, motorcycle, and automobile industries, as well as parts processing plants supplying the aeronautic industry. It also provides horizontal, vertical, dual spindle, and extra heavy duty CNC lathes; high-speed precision drilling machines; and equipment sales and maintenance services. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan. Taiwan Takisawa Technology Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Takisawa Machine Tool Co., Ltd.

6611.TWO.summary: Cayenne's Ark Mobile Co., Ltd. develops and sells mobile games. The company is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

6612.TWO.summary: ICARES Medicus, Inc. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of ophthalmic medical materials. The company provides nanomedical lubricious coatings and various surface treatments for implantable or interventional medical devices; intraocular lenses for the treatment of cataracts, myopia, hyperopia, presbyopia, or astigmatism; and nanomedical devices. It has operations in the United States, England, Japan, Taiwan, Spain, Hungary, China, and internationally. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Zhubei, Taiwan.

6615.TWO.summary: Sofiva Genomics Co.,Ltd. provides genetic testing services in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers prenatal services, including thalassemia carrier screening; tests for microdeletion syndromes and single-gene abnormalities; detection of common chromosome abnormalities, selected microdeletions syndromes, and selected skeletal dysplasia genetic mutations; multiple genetic diseases detection; folate metabolism genetic screening; and spinal muscular atrophy carrier screening. It also provides cancer services, such as cancer scans; real-time monitoring of tumor dynamics; hereditary cancer related genetic tests; and hereditary women's cancer tests for breast, colon, ovarian, and endometrial cancer, as well as human papillomavirus screening. In addition, the company offers rare diseases genetic testing services; and preimplantation genetic diagnosis and NGS-based preimplantation genetic screening services. Further, it provides new-born genetic testing services comprising baby scans; hereditary sensorineural hearing loss screening; congenital central hypoventilation syndrome screening; congenital cytomegalovirus infection screening test; and atopic dermatitis genetic screening. Additionally, the company offers biochemical and chromosome testing, as well as advisory and support services. It serves expectant parents, patients with genetic disorders, and their families. Sofiva Genomics Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2012 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6617.TWO.summary: Gongwin Biopharm Holdings Co., Ltd., a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company, develops anticancer drugs. It is developing PTS302, which has completed Phase III clinical trials for the treatment of lung cancer; PTS100, which is in Phase II clinical trials for the treatment of liver cancer; PTS-02 for the treatment of adenoid cystic carcinoma; and PTS500 for the treatment of malignant pleural effusion. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

6618.TWO.summary: UHT Unitech Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells medium and high grade carbon fiber in Taiwan and internationally. Its products are used in aerospace, automotive, energy, and other sectors. The company is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

6620.TWO.summary: Handa Pharmaceuticals, Inc., a specialty pharmaceutical company, focuses on the development of drugs for various diseases in the United States and China. It is developing various general delivery systems, including matrix system, reservoir system, matrix plus reservoir system, osmotic pump system, and colon delivery system. The company also develops modified release dosage forms, such as orally disintegrating tablets, modified release orally disintegrating tablets, modified release suspension systems, and ophthalmic modified release systems. In addition, it develops 505(b)2 and generic drugs. The company is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.

6621.TWO.summary: UniPharma Co., Ltd. engages in the brand drug development activities. The company offers adhesion reduction, neurology, cardiovascular, and anesthesia solutions; and antidotes, as well as medical devices and in vitro-diagnostic products. It also develops bio-markers for the diagnosis of neurological disease; and operates a laboratory for neurological bio-markers. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

6622.TWO.summary: Bossdom Digiinnovation Co., Ltd. provides various content encoding services. It offers filming production, full feature post-production, VFX, animation, digital production, movie content aggregator, text localization, and digital color grading services. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6624.TWO.summary: Ever-Clear Environmental Eng. Corp. engages in the evaluation, design, construction, and commissioning service of wastewater treatment and organic waste gas treatment facilities. The company is involved in the evaluation/process design/detailed design of wastewater/sludge/underground water/organic waste gas treatment; upgrade or expansion of existed wastewater or organic waste gas treatment plant; reuse of industrial wastewater; and wastewater/sludge/underground water/organic waste gas treatment equipment manufacture and turnkey services. It also provides fine screens, flow measuring tanks, sludge scrapers, anaerobic biological treatment equipment, floating decanter system of sequential batch reactors, physical and chemical treatment equipment, sludge drying equipment, and air pollution control equipment. The company serves food, textile and dying, mechanical and automotive, leather, electric and optoelectronics, biotechnology and pharmaceutical, chemical, pulp and paper, and other industries. Ever-Clear Environmental Eng. Corp. was founded in 1999 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

6626.TWO.summary: GAME HOURS Inc. develops and publishes mobile/handheld gaming products. The company was formerly known as WeGames Corporation and changed its name to GAME HOURS Inc. in December 2020. GAME HOURS Inc. was founded in 2013 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

6633.TWO.summary: Somnics, Inc., a medical device company, focuses on developing technologies for the treatment of obstructive sleep apnea (OSA). The company offers iNAP One and iNAP Lite sleep therapy systems, which utilize oral negative pressure technology to treat OSA, a sleep-related breathing disorder. Somnics, Inc. was founded in 2011 and is based in Zhubei, Taiwan.

6634.TWO.summary: Sinew Pharma Inc., a biopharmaceutical company, focuses on the development and sale of drugs for the treatment of hepatotoxicity-free acetaminophen and fatty liver diseases. The company's products include SNP-610 drug, which is in Phase II clinical trial for treating patients with non-alcoholic steatohepatitis in Taiwan; and SNP-630, a pre-clinical drug for treating patients with non-alcoholic steatohepatitis. It is also developing SNP-810 for use in analgesic and antipyretic indications; and SNP-830 and SNP-840, which are used as hepatotoxicity-free analgesic medicines in the United States. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6640.TWO.summary: Gallant Micro. Machining Co., LTD. designs, manufactures, and sells front-end and back-end packaging and inspection equipment for manufacturing semiconductors in Taiwan, Hong Kong, and China. Its principal products include semiconductor process equipment, semiconductor detecting equipment, laser application equipment, precision machineries, and precision molds. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan. Gallant Micro. Machining Co., LTD. operates as a subsidiary of Gallant Precision Machining Co., Ltd.

6642.TWO.summary: Fuzetec Technology Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells circuit protection solutions for electronic and electrical industries worldwide. The company offers radial leaded PPTC, surface mount polymer PTC, battery strap polymer PTC, and low Rho SMD polymer resettable fuses, as well as PPTC chips and discs. Its products are used in various applications, including telecommunications, networks, Smart phones, tablet and notebook PCs, computers and peripherals, automotives, instrumentation and industrial controls, power supplies, consumer electronics, primary and secondary batteries, etc. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6643.TWO.summary: M31 Technology Corporation operates as a professional silicon intellectual property (IP) provider. It offers standard cell library, general purpose I/O library, special I/O, high level ESD cell, memory compiler, high speed interface IP, Analog IP, and other solutions. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Zhubei, Taiwan.

6649.TWO.summary: Taiwan Biomaterial Co., Ltd. develops and sells medical devices in Taiwan. The company provides Foamagen, an absorbable biomaterial for dura reconstruction after surgeries; stroke interventional treatment devices; and devices for the treatment of early degenerative arthritis, and tissue repair and regeneration. Taiwan Biomaterial Co., Ltd. is based in Zhubei, Taiwan.

6650.TWO.long_name: Art Emperor Technology & Culture Co., Ltd
6650.TWO.summary: Art Emperor Technology & Culture Co., Ltd operates an art information website in Taiwan. Its website allows access art information; and offers art auction services, as well as TODAAY art, an e-commerce platform for artists. The company also offers art e-commerce and art advertising services. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6651.TWO.summary: Cystech Electronics Corp. designs, develops, manufactures, and supplies power devices for the computing, consumer electronics, communication, and industrial markets worldwide. The company offers MOSFET and SCR products, bipolar and digital transistors, and AECQ transistors. It also provides universal high brightness LED drivers; PWM integrated circuits (IC); DC to DC ICs; and dual operational amplifier and voltage references, regulators, CMos regulators, and quadruple operational comparators. In addition, the company offers switching control, fast, zener, switching, and schottky diodes; general purpose, glass passivated, snubber damping, and high efficiency rectifiers; and bridge and TVS products. Cystech Electronics Corp. is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6652.TWO.summary: Eusol Biotech Co.,Ltd. focuses on developing drugs for unmet medical needs. Its pipeline includes ES135, a recombinant human acidic fibroblast growth factor (rhFGF1) for repairing neuron function; and SM-1, a 3-in-1 capsule containing 3 commercial drugs with sedative effect. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6655.TW.summary: Keding Enterprises Co., Ltd. produces and sells wood products worldwide. It offers prefinished furnishings, wood veneered panels, wood floorings, and interior wood doors. Keding Enterprises Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6657.TWO.summary: Energenesis Biomedical CO.,LTD. operates in the biomedicine industry in Taiwan. It provides ENERGI-F703, which is Phase II clinical trial for use in treatment of diabetic foot ulcers; ENERGI-F701, a topical tonic for the treatment of alopecia that is in Phase II clinical trial; ENERGI-F711, a burn cream; ENERGI-F702 to treat metabolic diseases; ENERGI-F704 for the treatment of inflammatory bowel disease; ENERGI-F708 for asthma treatment; ENERGI-F705 for Parkinson's disease control; ENERGI-F707 for the treatment of mitochondria deficiency; ENERGI-F706 to treat cachexia; ENERGI-F709, a vaccine adjuvant; and ENERGI-F710 for blood phosphate control. The company also offers scientific products, which include western blot, antibody production, protein purification, and proteome experiment reagents, as well as buffer solutions for scientific researchers. Energenesis Biomedical CO.,LTD. was founded in 2012 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6661.TWO.summary: Welgene Biotech Co.,Ltd. provides clinical testing services. The company offers research services, including sequencing, microarray, quantitative PCR verification, nucleic acid extraction/QC, LCM single cell experiment, and bioinformatics analysis services; and clinical application services, such as array-based genomic hybridization and non-invasive prenatal tests. It also provides reagents, consumable supplies, and instruments, as well as software services. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6662.TWO.summary: BioLASCO Taiwan Co., Ltd. provides bio-materials and surgical services in Taiwan and internationally. The company is also involved in the design of animal facility; and provision of contract management and training services. It breeds and produces SPF laboratory rats and mice, including outbreed stocks, inbreed strains, and immune deficient models, as well as offers special animal model services. The company also provides endotoxin detection, animal heath diagnostic, and serological kits, as well as biological indicators. In addition, it offers equipment, including IVC systems and ventilated houses; professional and automated animal watering systems; transponders; portable chlorine dioxide gas generators; mouse and rat tail cuff blood pressure systems, analgesia equipment, and animal behavioral equipment; metabolism and behavior systems, and trackers; cabinet X-ray systems; automatic cleaning equipment; workstations; isolation chambers; and foggers. The company is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6665.TWO.summary: Healthconn Corp. provides customized disease prevention and health management services. It offers personalized health services; health promotion services, such as nutrition, exercise, stress, and sleep management services; and health management services. The company also provides environmental food safety and clinical microbiological testing, infectious molecular biological detection, senior consultation, cancer genetic testing products, and pension planning services. Healthconn Corp. was founded in 2009 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

6667.TWO.summary: Trusval Technology Co., Ltd. provides solutions in the field of water supply system, waste treatment, and system integration. The company offers functional water supply systems, including CO2-DIW, O3-DIW, H2-DIW, and NH3-DIW dissolvers; and waste water treatment advanced processes that include waste acid De H2O2, waste solvent De H2O2, waste solvent De DMSO/DMSO2, waste water degrade IPA, and waste IPA and solvent reclaim, as well as reclaim of copper sulfate by electrolysis. It also provides system integration solutions, such as chemical supply, slurry supply, gas supply, waste chemical collection, and automatic electronics control systems; and engages in the planning, design, construction, and maintenance of equipment, instruments, and field pipes for the facility system in the hi-tech industries. In addition, the company is involved in the semiconductor business. Trusval Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Miaoli, Taiwan.

6669.TW.summary: Wiwynn Corporation researches, designs, develops, tests, and sells computing and storage products, and rack solutions for cloud infrastructures and data centers in Taiwan, the United States, Europe, Asia, and internationally. The company offers integrated solutions to enterprises that want to build, distribute, or resell cloud services to their clients. Its products include servers, storage products, open rack accessories, computer accelerators, OCP network mezzanine cards, storage cards, and system software products. The company also provides computer and peripheral equipment, data storage media products, electric appliances and media products, and information software. In addition, the company offers management consulting services; information software services; and data processing services. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6670.TW.summary: Fusheng Precision Co., Ltd. engages in the contract manufacturing of golf equipment primarily in Japan, the United States, and internationally. The company offers golf club heads, graphite shafts, and assembled clubs, as well as club head accessories; baseball bats; and precision casting parts for aerospace, automobile, and industrial uses. It also manufactures and sells medical equipment; sells titanium tableware and kitchenware; and researches, develops, and manufactures hardware, plastics, printing of packaging, and vacuum technology products. In addition, the company engages in the metal products import and export business; anodizing process; and vacuum coating processing. Fusheng Precision Co., Ltd. was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6673.TWO.summary: Innovision FlexTech Corporation manufactures and sells projection screens. It offers ultra-short throw front projection, telephoto, and rear projection screens. The company is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan. Innovision FlexTech Corporation is a subsidiary of Arisawa Mfg. Co., Ltd.

6674.TW.summary: Compal Broadband Networks, Inc. provides networking, home security, and home entertainment products in Taiwan and internationally. The company also offers wireless accessories. Its products include DOCSIS 3.1 CPE products, such as built-in WiFi 6 gateway and 2.5Gbps Ethernet to provide broadband cable services for DOCSIS user terminals; FTTx/PON products; routers; and small base station, CBRS, LTE private networks, and LTE/5G user terminal equipment. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Zhubei, Taiwan.

6677.TWO.summary: Anxo Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd., a specialty pharmaceutical company, develops, manufactures, and sells pharmaceutical products for medical professionals and patients in Taiwan and internationally. It offers prescription and over the counter drugs in various therapeutic areas, such as cardiovascular, metabolism, CNS, diabetic, gastroenterology, respiratory, anti-infection, dermatology, nephrology, urology, orthopedics, etc. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6679.TWO.summary: Zilltek Technology Corp. operates as an analog and mixed signal IC design house in Taiwan. It designs and develops micro-electromechanical (MEMS) heterogeneous integrated circuits. The company offers analog, digital, and optics MEMS microphones; digital barometric pressure and temperature sensors; audio amplifiers; DC/DC converters; LDOs; and touch screen controllers. Its products are used in PCs, wearable devices, and TVs applications. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

6680.TWO.summary: Sintrones Technology Corp. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells in-vehicle computing products in Taiwan and internationally. The company provides in-vehicle computing solutions, such as in-vehicle computers, CAN bus modules, GPS modules, in-vehicle displays, and video capture cards; embedded computing products, including fanless box computers and embedded boards; and AI GPU computers, as well as surveillance computers. Its products are used in the autonomous, smart factory, public transit, railway computer, fleet management, law enforcement, in-vehicle computer, outdoor video surveillance, wind energy, and military computer applications. The company is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6683.TWO.summary: Keystone Microtech Corporation operates in the semiconductor industry. It offers load boards, probe cards/substrate, and modules for load boards/probe cards. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Zhubei City, Taiwan.

6684.TWO.summary: Algoltek, Inc. provides building bloc IPs in Taiwan. The company offers solutions for video conversion in various formats, such as MHL, HDMI, VGA, DisplayPort, and type-C ALT mode; ASIC solutions for switching/splitting video signal between sink and source devices; signal extension and redriver solutions; and protocol controls for power delivery application. It also provides design assistance that enables IC designers to accelerate SoC designs from planning to SoC silicon. Algoltek, Inc. was founded in 2010 and is based in Zhubei, Taiwan.

6688.TWO.summary: Deepjoy Picture Corporation engages in the film distribution, digital and TV copyright licensing, home video and audio distribution, and film investment businesses in Taiwan. It operates 100 DVD-owned cooperation channels; 92 movie theaters; and 5 cable TV channels, as well as OTT digital platforms. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6689.TWO.summary: eCloudvalley Digital Technology Co., Ltd. operates as a cloud managed service provider and storage product distributor in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers cloud storage, disaster backup, server hosting, server monitoring, and Amazon Web Services (AWS) training; and solution for management consultant roles, such as examining existing information security risks, system architecture weaknesses, improving system performance, and lowering corporate expense on IT. It serves traditional industries; public sectors; banks; and media, gaming, and travel industries, as well as startups. eCloudvalley Digital Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2013 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6691.TWO.summary: Yankey Engineering Co., Ltd. offers engineering services in Taiwan. Its projects include clean room constant temperature and humidity engineering; HVAC commercial fine air conditioning; and high and low voltage transmission, fire system, process pipeline system, water supply and drainage system, process exhaust system, and monitoring and weak current system installation engineering, as well as green energy technology services. Yankey Engineering Co., Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in New Taipei, Taiwan.

6692.TWO.summary: Acmepoint Energy Services Co.,Ltd. provides engineering, procurement, construction consultancy, construction, and operation warranty and maintenance services for solar power stations in Taiwan and internationally. The company also offers solar systems, grid connected PV systems, standalone PV systems, solar hot water systems, biomass energy generation systems, and energy storage systems. In addition, it provides BIPV and BAPV system integration services, and solar system and station services. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6693.TWO.summary: Inergy Technology Inc. engages in the development and sale of integrated power components that are optimized for system applications. It also provides integrated power modules for motor drives and ceiling fan air cleaners. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Zhubei, Taiwan.

6695.TWO.summary: iCatch Technology, Inc. designs and sells fabless IC. The company offers automotive grade sensing camera module image signal processor for use in ADAS front cameras, intelligent rear view cameras, blind spot detection, and driver monitoring systems; and an automotive grade SoC for use in digital video recorders, and camera and driver monitoring systems. It also provides SoC for consumer imaging devices for use in digital still, action, home security, body worn, trail, 3D sensing, surveillance, and VR cameras, as well as digital video recorders, factory automation, automated stores, and home appliances. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

6698.TW.summary: FineMat Applied Materials Co., Ltd. develops and manufactures high-precision metal masks based on precision etching technology in Taiwan. It offers high-precision metal mask for display; flexible OLED display metal mask fabrication and Web services; OLED and semiconductor recycle and cleaning services; and products for various types of precision etching applications, as well as full-size precision frame manufacturing services. The company also provides design consulting, mask etching, frame preparation, spot welding, and cleaning and regeneration services. It offers its products for the OLED display panel industry; and products to biomedical equipment and optical lens masks. The company was formerly known as Yiqiang Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to FineMat Applied Materials Co., Ltd. in 2012. FineMat Applied Materials Co., Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is based in Tainan City, Taiwan.

6705.TWO.summary: MARTAS Precision Slide Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells ball bearing slides for various applications in Taiwan. Its products are used in server rails, cabinets, and cloud computing devices; tool cabinets, fire cabinets, ATM machines, ending machines, POS machines, and upright open showcases; and office furniture, computer desks, copy machines, and fax machines, as well as in kitchen cabinets, dish washers, ovens, and refrigerators. The company's products are also used for automotive applications, such as in sliding arm rests, under seat and glove box storage, and luggage compartments; and residential applications for living rooms, TV cabinets, bedrooms, closets, cupboards, and restaurants. MARTAS Precision Slide Co.,Ltd was founded in 1996 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6706.TW.summary: Fittech Co.,Ltd provides automatic equipment and system integration services for the optoelectronic, semiconductor, and laser industries. The company offers LED probing and testing equipment, including LED chip and wafer probing and testing systems; fully automatic LED wafer prober systems; auto flip-chip probers; auto LED chip probers and tester; high accuracy automatic chip counters; and automatic detaching tape systems. It also provides LD probing and testing equipment, such as VCSEL(PD) probing and testing systems, and edge emitting laser probing and sorting systems; and laser micromachining equipment comprising automatic dual-arm laser wafer and laser wafer marking systems, fully-auto laser marking (inking) systems, and semi-auto PCB laser drilling systems, as well as semi-auto laser cutting, drilling, and scribing systems. In addition, the company offers laser metal machining equipment, including handheld laser cleaning and welding machines; and OEM and LED OEM services. Its products are also used in other photonics and optics, electronics, automotive, and manufacturing industries. The company operates in Taiwan, China, and rest of Asia, as well as internationally. Fittech Co.,Ltd is headquartered in Taichung City, Taiwan.

6709.TWO.summary: Advagene Biopharma Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development of vaccine technology and related products in Taiwan. Its products in development include nasal spray influenza vaccine, allergy vaccines, other vaccines, etc. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

6715.TW.summary: Lintes Technology Co., Ltd. researches, designs, develops, and manufactures consumer electronics and communication connectivity products worldwide. The company offers active and passive electric cables, adaptors, travel docks, PD chargers, and dongles, as well as active optical and high-speed transmission cables. It serves original equipment manufacturers and original design manufacturers. Lintes Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2011 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6716.TWO.summary: PADAUK Technology Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells microcontrollers. Its products are used in interactive smart toys, remote control appliances, smart household appliances, industrial grade chips, and high-efficiency brushless DC motors. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

6717.TWO.summary: SmartDisplayer Technology Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells smart display cards in Taiwan and internationally. The company provides all-in-one cards; crypto currency cards; OATH card-type OTP tokens; and EMV display cards. It also offers IC, segmented e-paper, module, and firmware design; semiconductor and graphic e-paper integration; emulation kit; and credit card personalization services, as well as various OTP seed perso solutions. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Keelung, Taiwan.

6719.TWO.summary: uPI Semiconductor Corp., an IC design company, designs and manufactures analog and mixed-signal power management solutions in electronic systems in Taiwan and internationally. It offers Power Management products, such as DC/DC buck controllers and converters, DC/DC boost converters, power device drivers, low dropout regulators, power switch ICs, LED driver ICs, charging ICs, and voltage and current consoles; Battery Management products, including PTIC and charger ICs; and low, medium, and high voltage power MOSFET products. The company also provides application and interface, ultra speed, tiny package speed, high surge, and high voltage TVS products; OP-amplifiers; bio sensors; and GaN solutions. uPI Semiconductor Corp. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Zhubei, Taiwan.

6721.TWO.summary: Sincere Security Co. Ltd. engages in the property management, electrical maintenance, environmental friendly cleaning, and security businesses. The company offers community, factory, and parking lot property management; and director general, administrative secretary, and other manpower dispatch services, as well as generator equipment installation and maintenance, electrical maintenance, central air conditioning system installation and maintenance, air conditioning cooling tower cleaning, water system repair and replacement, fire equipment installation and maintenance, and monitoring system installation services. It also provides environmental friendly cleaning services, such as airport, station, hospital, and building cleaning; floor waxing polishing; stone crystallization grinding; carpet, sofa chair, and office chair sterilization; disinfection; pool cleaning and water quality inspection; exterior wall cleaning; gardening planting; and waste removal services. In addition, the company offers security services, including guardian, system, and personal security, as well as central monitoring system control management services. It serves science parks, hypermarkets, commercial buildings, schools, golf courses, villas and residential areas, and government units. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Zhubei, Taiwan.

6729.TWO.summary: Luminescence Technology Corp. manufactures and sells organic chemicals in North America, Europe, Asia, and Taiwan. Its product-range includes organic light emitting diode (OLED) material, OPV material, OTFT material, organic intermediates, boronic acid, and ITO patterned glass and components. The company offers patented materials, biomedical science, organic light emitting diode (OLED), thermally activated delayed fluorescence OLED, solution-processed OLED, organic photovoltaic, dye-sensitized solar cell, perovskite solar cells, organic thin-film transistor, flexible printed electronics, photonic and optical device, synthetic intermediates and reagents, and electrode/substrate and sealing. It offers organic optoelectronic materials in the markets of OLED, OPV, and OTFT have led luminescence technology. Luminescence Technology Corp. is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6730.TWO.summary: Lagis Enterprise Co., Ltd., a medical device development company, develops and markets medical devices for the laparoscopic and endoscopic surgical markets worldwide. Its products include trocars, single port surgery devices, and wound protectors; endo devices, such as hand instruments and advanced bipolar devices; specimen retrieval products; suction irrigation systems and irrigation pumps; training systems; and related accessories. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

6731.TWO.summary: Femco Steel Technology Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, markets, and distributes steel golf shafts to golf club original equipment manufacturers and distributors worldwide. The company offers steel shafts under the FST and KBS brand names. Femco Steel Technology Co., Ltd. is based in Chiayi, Taiwan.

6732.TWO.summary: Sensortek Technology Corp. provides a range of sensor chips. Its principal products include ambient light sensors, proximity sensors, and MEMS accelerometers that are used in various applications, such as mobile phones, smart phones, tablets, laptops, digital cameras, and consumer electronics. The company is based in Jhubei City, Taiwan.

6733.TWO.summary: BioGend Therapeutics Co., Ltd. develops regenerative bio-orthopaedic medicines. It is developing BiG-001 and BiG-006, an osteo-inductive bone graft substitute; and BiG-009, an autologous chondrocyte repair system. The company is also involved in developing bio-orthopaedic devices and treatment methods to fulfill unmet clinical needs. BioGend Therapeutics Co., Ltd. was founded in 2016 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6734.TWO.summary: iXensor Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and sells hardware and software systems for in-vitro diagnostic medical devices. The company's PixoTest technology uses the lighting and image sensing module of the smartphone to detect the color change reaction on the biochemical test strip. It offers PixoTest Blood Glucose Monitoring System and PixoTest POCT System for chronic diseases management; Eveline Smart Fertility System for women's health management; and systems for infectious disease management, as well as PixoHealth App, which measures, records, and uploads test readings to the cloud. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

6735.TWO.summary: AMIDA Technology, Inc. develops and provides electronic testing and measurement solutions for the semiconductor and optical industries in Taiwan. The company offers CMOS image sensing testers and VCSEL wafer measurement systems; analog and mixed signal testers; and high power 3600 series testers. It also provides PCI modules, such as GPIB cards with PCI interfaces; time interval counter modules for PCI computers; and single-channel PCI-based arbitrary waveform generators. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6737.TWO.summary: Solid Year Co., Ltd. engages in the production of various single-shot and double-shot plastic injection finished products. Its products include computer keyboard, USB network camera, USB network camera module, driving recorder, hunting machine, projector, gamepad, automotive electronics, in-car multimedia audio and video system, smart rear-view mirror, head-up display, iPhone Computer electronic peripheral products, such as Car Box, infant network surveillance camera, etc. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6738.TWO.summary: MAYO Human Capital Inc. provides human resources management solutions to various industries and enterprises. The company offers Apollo, a human resources solution that integrates functions, such as attendance punching, scheduling, leave, salary, recruitment, signing, organization, and management. It also provides STAYFUN, an employee benefits integration platform that allows the company to have choices for gifts and employee benefits. In addition, the company offers Cornerstone, an integrated cloud platform, which covers online learning modules, training goal setting, performance management and core talent data management, visual talent placement and analysis, enterprises implement talent management strategies, successor bench strength building, and perfect talent development system creation. Further, it provides customized internal training courses to companies related to professional staff-only human resource consultants; and personnel administration commission professional outsourcing services. MAYO Human Capital Inc. is headquartered in Hsinchu County, Taiwan.

6740.TWO.summary: Mobix Corporation operates mobile based e-commerce platform in Taiwan. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan. Mobix Corporation is a subsidiary of Kuobrothers Corp.

6743.TW.summary: AMPACS Corporation engages in the design, manufacture, and sale of smart electronics. It offers audio and imaging products, such as console gaming headsets, smart IP-cameras, smart audio, hi-res audio, and Internet of Things devices, as well as smart ear buds, smart cables, speaker drivers, leather carrying cases, and phone cases. The company offers its products for smart phones, tablets, PCs, game consoles, and connected home entertainment systems. AMPACS Corporation was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6747.TWO.summary: Brighten Optix Corporation researches and develops, manufactures, and sells specialty contact lenses in Taiwan and the Asia Pacific region. The company offers its products under the Ortho-K myopia management lens, HiClear gas permeable (GP) lens, Briomoist lens care systems, SynergEyes hybrid lens, and Large Diameter GP lens. It also provides OEM/ODM collaboration services. The company is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6753.TWO.summary: Lungteh Shipbuilding Co, Ltd. designs and builds ships. It engages in building work boats, including environmental services craft and other special purpose vessels, as well as passenger ferries and naval combat boats. The company was founded in 1979 and is based in Dongshan, Taiwan.

6754.TW.long_name: Rich Honour International Designs Co., Ltd.
6754.TW.summary: Rich Honour International Designs Co., Ltd. operates as an interior design company in Greater China and internationally. It offers various services, including branding, R&D, design, technology, construction, production, and project management services. The company was founded in 1977 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

6757.TWO.summary: Tigerair Taiwan Co., Ltd. provides airline services. It offers international transportation services for passengers and cargo; and ground handling services. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan. Tigerair Taiwan Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of China Airlines Co., Ltd.

6761.TWO.summary: Wendell Industrial Co., Ltd provides circuit protection component in South Korea, Japan, Singapore, and China. Its products are used in mobile phones, desktop computers, notebook computers, tablet computers, digital cameras, navigation systems, surveillance systems, industrial computers, medical equipment, communication equipment, Netcom products, wind power generation system, LED lighting system, and others. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6764.TWO.summary: Ace Edulink Co., Ltd. provides small to high school short-term study and tutoring services. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6767.TWO.summary: Wiltrom Co., Ltd. researches, develops, and produces a range of implantable medical devices. Its products include spinal fixation systems, interbody fusion systems, bone graft substitutes, vertebral body augmentation systems, and vertebroplasty bone cement. The company is based in Zhubei, Taiwan.

6770.TWO.summary: Powerchip Semiconductor Manufacturing Corporation provides chip design and manufacturing services. It offers foundry, design, overhaul, manufacturing, and memory wafer testing services. The company was formerly known as Maxchip Electronics Corp and changed its name to Powerchip Semiconductor Manufacturing Corporation in September 2018. Powerchip Semiconductor Manufacturing Corporation was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan. Powerchip Semiconductor Manufacturing Corp. operates as a subsidiary of Powerchip Technology Corporation.

6775.TWO.summary: Entire Technology Co.,Ltd. operates in the optoelectronics material technology industry in Taiwan. The company offers light guide and diffuser plates for various applications, including TV screens, commercial displays, computer monitors, notebooks, tablets, SATNAV, POS terminals, industrial computers, gaming machines, and advertising signs, as well as LED backlight modules car displays, edge-lit LED panels, emergency lights, commercial advertising lights, illumination components, and equipment lightings; composite plates for 5G applications and consumer electronics cases; polycarbonate composites injections for backlight module plastic frames, which are used in electronic, machinery, and automobile industries; and composite materials and optical films for used in smartphones or in-car displays. Entire Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

6776.TW.summary: Weblink International, Inc. owns and operates stores that sell software and information technology products in Taiwan. Its stores offer commercial and home information electronics, application software products, digital entertainment products, system integration, lifestyle products, SMBs solution services etc. It also sells products online. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan. Weblink International, Inc. is a subsidiary of Acer Incorporated.

6780.TWO.summary: Study King Co., Ltd. provides digital learning content. It offers high school audio-visual interactive teaching materials. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6784.TWO.summary: Tsky Co., Ltd. engages in the design, development, manufacture, and sale of GPS watches and bands, and wearable devices that are used for golf, running, cycling, swimming, and track record. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Zhubei City, Taiwan.

6786.TWO.summary: Istart-Tek Inc. provides memory testing and repairing solutions for SoC designers worldwide. The company is based in Zhubei City, Taiwan.

6787.TWO.summary: Kingray Technology Corporation, Ltd. engages in the semiconductor wafer, diode, and LED epitaxil wafer business. It offers narrow band pass filters, new blue glasses, organic blue glasses, blue glass filters, reflective and UV IR cut filters, optical filters, rectangle and octagon OEM dicing products, and circular OEM drills; high reflective filters, anti-reflective filters, IR pass filters, beam spiltters, and dichroic color filters; and mobile phone camera module assemblies and security surveillance camera modules. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

6789.TWO.summary: VisEra Technologies Company Limited manufactures and sells electronic spare parts in Taiwan. It also researches, develops, designs, manufactures, sells, packages, and tests color filters. In addition, the company offers image sensor foundry solutions, which include CMOS image sensor that performs the role of an electronic film in digital photography equipment; and wafer level testing and wafer level optical thin film services. Its CMOS image sensor products are used in various areas, such as digital cameras, camera phones, web cameras, notebooks, security devices, automobiles, and miniature imaging devices used in medical applications. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan. VisEra Technologies Company Limited is a subsidiary of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company Limited.

6790.TWO.long_name: Yuen Foong Yu Consumer Products Co., Ltd.
6790.TWO.summary: Yuen Foong Yu Consumer Products Co., Ltd produces and sells household paper in Taiwan. The company is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

6792.TWO.summary: Unictron Technologies Corp. engages in the development, manufacture, and sale of antennas and piezoelectric ceramic elements for use in various electronic devices in Taiwan and internationally. The company provides antennas, such as chip, patch, and custom-made antennas; and piezoelectric ceramic elements, including automobile parking sensors, ultrasonic transducers, weaving machine actuators, and touch panel sensors. It also offers over-voltage and over-current circuit protection components comprising spark gaps, gas tubes, thyristors, transient voltage suppressors, ZnO-based varistors, PPTC resettable fuses, and other fuses. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Hsin-Chu, Taiwan.

6793.TWO.long_name: Tien Li Offshore Wind Technology Co., Ltd.
6793.TWO.summary: Tien Li Offshore Wind Technology Co., Ltd. produces and sells wind turbine blades, wind turbine molds, and other products. It also provides offshore wind operation and maintenance, as well as blade or composite materials research and development technical advisory services. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6794.TWO.summary: UnicoCell Biomed Co., Ltd., a biomedical company, researches and develops stem cell therapeutic products, cell therapy technology, and regenerative medicine applications in Taiwan. It develops CT21-ELIXCYTE, which is in Phase 2 clinical trials for the treatment of knee osteoarthritis; and CT31-ELIXCYTE for the treatment of renal failure. The company offers Perfectin, a stem cell secretion and can be used as a raw material for skin care products; and UnicoVial, a cell storage container. UnicoCell Biomed Co., Ltd. was founded in 2018 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

6796.TWO.summary: Medimaging Integrated Solution Inc. provides digital and portable diagnostic solutions. It designs and manufactures digital hand-held diagnostic scopes, as well as auxiliary tools. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

6803.TWO.summary: ECOVE Environment Corp. provides engineering and environmental services to public and private entities in Taiwan, Macau, China, Southeast Asia, India, and the United States. It finances, plans, constructs, operates, and maintains energy-from-waste plants, hazardous and special waste treatment plants, water and wastewater treatment plants, photovoltaic power plants, and resource reclamation and treatment plants. The company's services include operations and maintenance, consulting, and investment and development of public and private entities. It also offers technical and consulting services, such as mechatronics system and equipment maintenance and upgrade, commissioning, and testing for energy-from-waste, railway, waste management, and public utility sectors. In addition, the company is involved in developing, operating, and managing photovoltaic power plants with a total capacity of 25 megawatts; and the recycling of PET bottles. The company was formerly known as KD Holding Corp. ECOVE Environment Corp. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan. ECOVE Environment Corporation operates as a subsidiary of CTCI Corporation.

6804.TWO.summary: Axman Enterprise Co., Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, tests, and sells bicycles. It provides road bikes, mountain bikes, and carbon fiber frames. The company was founded in 1985 and is based in Changhua County, Taiwan.

6805.TWO.summary: Fositek Corp. designs, manufactures, and distributes consumer electronic components. The company produces connecting rotating shafts, cantilever brackets, and other components for computers, optics, appliances, and communications and medical equipment. It markets its products in Asia, the United States, and internationally. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6806.TWO.summary: Shinfox Energy International Inc. engages in oil trading business. The company is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6812.TWO.summary: Saul Tech Technology Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells precision equipment. It offers IC products in various series, such as wafer to tray, wafer to wafer, wafer to tape, and multi-function sorter products; LED mapping sorters and mini LED die attachments; and LD bar attachments. The company is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

6813.TWO.summary: GeneTouch Corp., Ltd. designs and manufactures touch technology products. The company offers infrared touch, PCAP touch, and digital signage products, as well as wireless presentation solutions and accessories. It also provides electronics manufacturing service FOR OEM/ODM customers. GeneTouch Corp., Ltd. Was founded in 2009 is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

6814.TWO.summary: Lukas Biomedical Inc. engages in the research and the development of immunotherapy for cancer treatment. It is also involved in the rental of medical equipment. The company was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6816.TWO.summary: MetaEdge Corporation provides data warehousing and business intelligence (BI) consulting services to enterprise customers in China. Its solutions cover BI tools and software, and education and training related services. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

6817.TWO.summary: Winston Medical Supply Co.,Ltd. engages in the development, manufacture, and distribution of pharmaceuticals, nutrition supplements, and cosmeceutical products. It offers sterile ophthalmic preparations comprising gels, suspensions, solutions, and emulsions; hormone preparations, which primarily cover birth control and oral suspension for cancer related cachexia; external use preparations comprising ointments; and other oral preparations, which are in oral dosage forms, such as powders, troches, tables, film coated tablets, chewables, and capsules for the treatment of colds, gastrointestinal issues, or other indications. The company was founded in 1974 and is based in Tainan City, Taiwan. As of January 2014, Winston Medical Supply Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Medigen Biotechnology Corp.

6818.TWO.summary: Advanced Wireless & Antenna Inc. manufactures and sells computer and communication connectors in Taiwan and internationally. It offers Wi-Fi, NFC, networking, and 3D antennas; and NFC modules with antennas, as well as Netcom antennas. Its products are used in computer, electronic communication, telecommunications, automotive, medical, and Internet of Things and other related markets. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6820.TWO.summary: Acon Optics Communications Inc. designs, manufactures, and sells fiber optical components worldwide. It offers connectors, adapters, patch cords, FTTA cables with mesh cover and angled boot, accessories, fiber optic extenders, fiber optic and copper transceivers, and water repellent materials; MPO/MTP solutions; and data center solutions, such as cassette series, panel series, and cable management. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6821.TWO.summary: LinkCom Manufacturing Co., Ltd. designs, produces, and sells magnetic components, intelligent power supplies, and intelligent lighting control solutions worldwide. Its products are used in 5G, electric car, IoT, ehealth, network communication, and industrial control applications. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6825.TWO.summary: Qbic Technology Co., Ltd. develops and sells commercial and industrial grade devices in Taiwan. The company provides smart panel-PCs, embedded and fanless ARM box-PCs, fanless AI edge computers, embedded and fanless x86 box-PCs, single board computers, OQupancy manager devices, kiosks, and accessories It offers devices for facility management, embedded computing, retail and hospitality solution, interactive smart technology, and design and manufacturing. The company is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6LD1.F.summary: SemiLEDs Corporation develops, manufactures, and sells light emitting diode (LED) chips, LED components, and LED modules and systems in the United States, Taiwan, the Netherlands, Germany, Japan, Ireland, and internationally. The company also sells enhanced vertical, LED product series in blue, white, green, and UV; LED chips to packagers or distributors; and lighting products primarily to original design manufacturers of lighting products and the end-users of lighting devices, as well as packages and sells its LED chips into LED components to distributors. Its products are used for general lighting applications, including commercial, industrial, and residential lighting; and specialty industrial applications, such as ultraviolet or UV, curing of polymers, LED light therapy in medical/cosmetic applications, counterfeit detection, LED lighting for horticulture applications, architectural lighting, and entertainment lighting. SemiLEDs Corporation was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Chunan, Taiwan.

6ZD.F.summary: Oneness Biotech Co., Ltd. operates as a biopharmaceutical company in Taiwan. The company develops ON101, which is in Phase III clinical trials for treating chronic diabetic foot ulcers; and OB318, an anti- liver cancer drug that completed Phase I clinical trials. It is also developing SNS01, SNA02, and SNA03 that are in pre-clinical stage for the treatment of cancer; FB704A that is in Phase I clinical trial for the treatment of rheumatoid arthritis, cancer, and cytokine storms; and FB825, which is in Phase II clinical trial for treating allergic diseases and asthma. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan. Oneness Biotech Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Microbio Co., Ltd.

7402.TWO.summary: Brinno Incorporated designs, develops, produces, and sells imaging devices. The company offers time lapse, construction, and outdoor security cameras; camera kits; and smart home security products, as well as time lapse accessories. It also provides contact tracing COVID-19 products; and Friday home smart locks. The company offers its products through distributors worldwide. Brinno Incorporated was founded in 2003 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

7419.TWO.summary: Mortech Corporation develops and provides polyimide films in Taiwan. Its products include PIF, PIN, PIB/PMB, PIA/PAB, and PIT type polyimide films. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

7443.TWO.summary: Fluxtek International Corp. manufactures and sells RO water purification equipment in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers compact systems, residential systems, purifier systems, commercial systems, dispensers, filters/membranes, housing caps, pumps/transformers, tanks/faucets, fittings, and coconut shell carbon products. It also provides accessories, such as leak detectors, housing wrenches, shut off valves, pressure regulators, flow restrictors, mini digital TDS meters, pressure gauges, high and low pressure switches, solenoid and needle valves, and control boxes. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Pingtung City, Taiwan.

7507.TWO.summary: Enrestec Inc engages in the pyrolysis and recycling of used plastic, rubber, and organic wastes. It is also involved in the development of soil thermal desorption technology and application. The company was incorporated in 1994 and is based in Pingtung, Taiwan.

7547.TWO.summary: Intumit, Inc. provides artificial intelligence and CX solutions primarily in China. The company's products include SmartRobot, a solution to help enterprises in establishing automate smart service platforms across Websites, FB Messenger, LINE, WeChat, WhatsApp, Microsoft Services, APPs, and other channels; SmartKMS, a cognitive knowledge management system; SmartWork, a Microsoft 365 internal helpdesk; WFH solutions, a personal internal helpdesk assistant for information technology, human resource, call centers, and other areas; AOG, a Google assistant solution; SmartForce, a solution for customer interaction; SmartNow, a workplace management solution; SmartXP, a customer engagement solution; and Smartonnect, a solution to collect customers' interests and info from conversations and speech dialogues. It primarily serves financial services, insurance, healthcare, retail/FMCG, public service/education, tourism/transportation, and manufacturing sectors. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

7551.TWO.summary: Flashaim Inc. provides digital marketing services to major portals and messaging software of Yahoo, Google, LINE, Facebook, and Bing and other advertising agencies. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Tainan, Taiwan.

7556.TWO.summary: Yeedex Electronic Corporation provides parts, materials, and sub-systems for semiconductor process equipment in Taiwan and China. The company offers fine ceramic parts and materials; perfluoroelastomer seals; precision vacuum chucks; refurbish and repair precious parts, including ESC, heaters, vacuum chucks, ceramic coatings, anodizing products, etc.; plasma coated chamber parts; quartz and others parts; tungsten carbide blades; and heat resistant phosphor plates. It also serves flat display panel, passive electronic component, LED, solar cell, automobile, medical, and special material industries. The company also exports its products to other Asian and American countries. Yeedex Electronic Corporation was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

7558.TWO.summary: Bryton Inc. develops, sells, and retails GPS cycle computers and accessories in Taiwan and internationally. It also operates an online store for products. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

7561.TWO.summary: BioRay Biotech Co., Ltd. engages in the development and manufacture of biological agents. Its biological agents include functional probiotics, medicinal fungi, and immune cell preparations. The company was founded in 1994 is based in Pingtung, Taiwan.

7566.TWO.summary: Argo Yachts Development Co., Ltd. engages in the operation of water recreation activities and ship leasing business in Taiwan. The company was founded in 2003 is based in Tainan City, Taiwan.

7595.TWO.summary: PharmiGene, Inc. develops, manufactures, and sells diagnostic tests worldwide. It primarily develops DNA genetic tests. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

7TLA.F.summary: Taiwan Liposome Company, Ltd., a clinical-stage specialty pharmaceutical company, engages in the development and commercialization of nanomedicines that combine its proprietary lipid-assembled drug delivery platform with approved active pharmaceutical ingredients (APIs). The BioSeizer lipid formulation technology is designed to enable local sustained release and fast onset of APIs at the site of disease or injury with enhanced pharmacokinetic (PK) control by customization of lipid layers; and NanoX active drug loading technology enables the potential for reduced dosing frequency and enhanced distribution of liposome-encapsulated APIs to the desired site. Its lead product candidate is TLC599, an intraarticular injectable BioSeizer formulation of the API steroid dexamethasone sodium phosphate (DSP), which is in Phase III clinical trial for the treatment of knee osteoarthritis pain. The company's product candidates also comprise TLC590, a non-opioid BioSeizer formulation of the API ropivacaine that has completed Phase II clinical trial to treat post-surgical pain; TLC399, a multilamellar and multivesicular BioSeizer formulation of DSP, which is in Phase II clinical trial for ophthalmology indications; TLC178, an API that is in Phase I/II dose escalation trial to treat rhabdomyosarcoma; and TLC19 that is in Phase I clinical trial to treat COVID-19.Taiwan Liposome Company, Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

8016.TW.summary: Sitronix Technology Corporation, a fabless semiconductor company, offers display driver integrated circuits (ICs) and memory for entry-level mobile phones, industrial displays, and automotive systems. The company offers mobile display driver ICs, industrial display driver ICs, automotive display driver ICs, projected capacitive touch controller ICs, and medium-size TFT-LCD driver ICs, as well as alternator regulators. Sitronix Technology Corporation was incorporated in 1992 and is headquartered in Zhubei City, Taiwan.

8021.TW.summary: Topoint Technology Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells micro-drills, numerically controlled drilling machines, and peripheral equipment for printed circuit boards in Taiwan, Mainland China, and internationally. The company offers products, such as drill bit, a product used in PCB mechanical drilling process; router bit, a material used for achieving necessary outlines; and slot drills used in cutting forces, as well as logarithmic cylindrical roller, a solution for conventional bearing manufactures. It also provides standard cutting tools used in industrial milling applications, which include stamping, and profile and face milling; and customized cutting tools for metal casing production and metal injection process. In addition, the company offers drilling services comprising mechanical and laser drilling, routing, and CCD routing services. Topoint Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8032.TWO.summary: Koryo Electronics Co., Ltd. engages in the production, sale, and import/export of electronic parts and components, and computers and computer peripherals. It also imports/exports electric appliances and components, such as TV sets, video and radio cassette recorders, air conditioners, refrigerators, and microwave ovens; and acts as an agent for related products of Taiwan and international companies on sales, bids, and quotes. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8034.TWO.summary: OPNET Technologies Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and markets telecommunication network access and optical transport equipment worldwide. Its access network products include DLC/E1-MUX/IP-MUX, MSAN/SVG, Mini-DSLAM, VoIP gateway, and GPON; and transmission network products comprise CWDM/DWDM/ROADM, carrier grade switching platform, fiber optical multiplexers, TDMo-PSN, Ethernet over PDH, and G.SHDSL.bis bridges/routers. The company also offers enterprise network products, such as EPON; distribution network products that consist of telecom cables, ODF/FDC, FOSC, FDP/FDB, and box panels, as well as accessories; and submarine cable systems, including submarine power, submarine optical fiber, optical fiber composite submarine, special underwater, and high voltage power cables, as well as transoceanic communication system accessories. In addition, the company provides fiber optic sensor solutions; and supports network planning, installation, training, and maintenance services. It serves incumbent fixed-network operators, mobile operators, cable TV operators, utility companies, enterprises, and military entities. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

8038.TWO.summary: Changs Ascending Enterprise Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of rechargeable batteries and cell materials in Taiwan. The company offers vehicle batteries, including starter batteries for golf carts, forklifts, and hybrids and E-cars; and electronic storage systems (ESS) and uninterruptible power supply (UPS) systems for use in office and home applications, ESS UPC backup power, off the grid applications, and solar LED lights. It also provides grid and industrial ESS/UPS energy storage and back-up systems for large UPS, micro grid ESS, mission critical UPS, and traffic light back-up applications. The company was formerly known as Changs Enterprise Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Changs Ascending Enterprise Co., Ltd. in July 2000. Changs Ascending Enterprise Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

8039.TW.summary: Taiflex Scientific Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture, wholesale, and retail of electronic materials and components in Taiwan. The company offers polymer film based copper clad laminates, cover layers, photovoltaic module back sheets, flexible copper-cladded laminates, optical film materials, bonding sheets, composited PI sheets, and PI type stiffeners. It provides electronic materials for applications in cell phones, music players, DSC/DVC, HDD, and tablets; and energy materials for solar powered cell phones, rooftop systems, and vehicles, as well as solar street lamps and utility scale applications. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

8042.TWO.long_name: Taiwan Chinsan Electronic Industrial Co., Ltd.
8042.TWO.summary: Taiwan Chinsan Electronic Industrial Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and distributes electrolytic capacitors. The company offers aluminum electrolytic capacitors, such as radial lead type, snap-in lug terminal type, and screw terminal type capacitors; and aluminum polymer capacitors comprising polymer radial lead type and polymer SMD type capacitors. Taiwan Chinsan Electronic Industrial Co., Ltd. was founded in 1970 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8043.TWO.summary: Honey Hope Honesty Enterprise Co.,Ltd operates as a sales agent for electronic passive components in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers multilayer capacitors, chip inductors and capacitors, and other products. It serves PC, notebook, TFT-LCD, mobile phones, network equipment, communications equipment, wireless local area network, and information industry peripheral equipment manufacturers. Honey Hope Honesty Enterprise Co.,Ltd was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

8044.TWO.summary: PChome Online Inc. provides e-commerce and portal services in China and internationally. It operates through E-Commerce-Sales, Market Place, and Other segments. The company operates PChome 24h Shopping, PChome Shopping, and PChome Global Shopping Websites. It also operates portals that provide a range of network services, including news platforms, stock markets, email, Kaza personal blog, news, travel, car-buying, customized photo album, search channels, etc., as well as online adverting services, such as display advertising and display network. In addition, the company offers type II telecommunications, magazine publication, international trade and investment, online payment processing, travel agency, information, transportation and logistics, clothing sales, information processing, electronic information, and Internet services. PChome Online Inc. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

8045.TWO.summary: TWOWAY Communications, Inc. develops, manufactures, and sells broadband network equipment in Taiwan and North America. The company offers broadband amplifiers and optical workstation equipment under the ACI brand name. It also provides system integration services for network contracting, diagnosis and improvement, and upgradation; and security and monitoring services. In addition, the company offers optical transmission equipment, outdoor light workstations, fiber products, adjustable automatic gain module DSIM, and optical network terminals. TWOWAY Communications, Inc. was founded in 1992 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8046.TW.short_name: NAN YA PRINTED CIRCUIT BOARD CO
8046.TW.long_name: Nan Ya Printed Circuit Board Corporation
8046.TW.summary: Nan Ya Printed Circuit Board Corporation manufactures and sells printed circuit boards (PCBs) and IC substrates in Taiwan. It offers conventional PCBs that are used in the motherboards of desktops and notebooks, and home electrical appliances; high density interconnection PCBs that are used in smartphones, game consoles, GPS, PDAs, automobile appliances, and MP3 players; and rigid-flex PCBs for use in high-end portable devices and notebooks. The company also provides flip chip substrates comprising pin/land grid arrays for microprocessors; and ball grid arrays for graphic microprocessors, northbridge chipsets, high-end ASIC chipsets, and set-top box chipsets. In addition, it offers wire bond substrates for MCP, southbridge chipsets, communication, and networking applications, as well as for use in memory, portable devices, handsets, consumer electronics, and PC peripheral device applications. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan. Nan Ya Printed Circuit Board Corporation is a subsidiary of Nan Ya Plastics Corporation.

8048.TWO.summary: Ruby Tech Corporation manufactures and sells networking products in Taiwan. It offers PoE Ethernet and industrial switches; managed, Web-smart, unmanaged, PoE, mode, and industrial converters; fiber NICs; and OLT and ONU products, and splitters, as well as HW/SW customization services. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

8049.TWO.summary: Ampire Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells liquid crystal display (LCD) modules and touch screens for industrial applications. The company offers large, medium, and small TN, STN, FSTN, TFT, and capacitive TP modules, as well as graphic, character, and open frame products. Its products are used in non-consumer application panels, such as white home appliances, HMI, card reader, industrial instrumentation, medical devices, automobile display panel, touch panel PC/Monitor, maritime information display panel, on-board entertainment panel, smart home control display panel, kiosks, and multi-functional office machines.
