The company was founded in 1998 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8050.TWO.summary: IBASE Technology Inc. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells industrial PCs in Taiwan and internationally. The company primarily offers industrial motherboards, embedded systems, panel PCs, digital signage players, and network appliances, as well as RISC computing products, such as ARM-based Freescale i.MX6 SBCs, SMARC modules and carrier boards, and SMARC development kits for various applications in industrial automation, smart retail, networking and communication, intelligent transportation, medical, gaming, healthcare, smart factory, and entertainment and hospitality markets. It also provides original and joint design manufacturing services, such as board/system specification design, software design, manufacturing, validation, and after services. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

8054.TWO.summary: Alcor Micro,Corp., a fabless IC design company, designs, develops, and markets integrated semiconductor chips and software solutions for the personal computer peripherals and consumer electronics worldwide. The company offers human interface input and output solutions, such as flash media reader, USB hub, camera, and other multimedia related controllers. It also provides mobile device, data link, USB flash disk, and SSD storage controllers, as well as SD card controllers. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

8059.TWO.summary: CastleNet Technology Inc. develops, manufactures, and sells network communication equipment in Taiwan. It offers data cable modems, data and EMTA gateway products, and embedded cable modem modules, as well as products in the WAN, LAN, and wireless fields to MSO, telecom, and ISP companies. It also supplies its products to Europe, Japan, and Korea. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8064.TWO.summary: Contrel Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of LCD equipment in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers panel automation products, such as CF/TFT whole plant, LCD whole factory panel, and RTP/RTS whole line panel transmission equipment integration system, as well as pack/unpack equipment; panel process equipment; and glass appearance inspection, burr check, electrical testing, light on test, MACRO, and mini LED test equipment, as well as PAD inspection machine. It also provides semiconductor automation solutions, such as EFEM integrated system, OHS automated handling system, storage systems, and automatic optical inspection products, as well as laser cutting, pattering, drilling, and repair equipment. In addition, the company offers laser equipment, including TFT array and LCD cell repair equipment, LCD bright point repair systems, OLED dark point repair equipment, circuit missing line repair machine, carbonization machine, glass cutting machine, OLED mask clean equipment, and laser marking/automatic optical inspection systems; logistic systems, including sorting system, automatic warehouse and handling system, and intelligent logistics equipment; LED vacuum coating equipment, such as glue, evaporation, optical, and continuous sputtering machine; and micro nano products. Contrel Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.

8067.TWO.summary: Gish International Co., Ltd operates as a distribution company in Japan, Singapore, China, Canada, the United States, Australia, and Chile. It offers a range of products, including fragrances and beauty products. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8068.TWO.summary: Chander Electronics Corp. engages in the distribution and maintenance of electronic components, integrated circuits, and design and test equipment. The company is also involved in the maintenance of computers and related spare parts; and analysis, planning, designing, development, import and export, distribution, and maintenance of computer and software systems. It also provides cloud services. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8070.TW.summary: Chang Wah Electromaterials Inc. operates as an agency for packaging materials and equipment in Taiwan. The company offers various IC packaging materials; IC packaging devices, such as auto molding, trim and form, and package sawing equipment, as well as fluid dispensing systems; and TFT-LCD products. It also provides LED mold technology with liquid compound/compression mold and LED lead frames for ejection molding; EMC LED lead frames for transfer molding; and solar power systems. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

8071.TWO.summary: ABICO NetCom Co.,Ltd. operates as a pre-recorded disk manufacturing company. The company engages in the real estate investment business; film production/marketing/acting agent business; and investment businesses. It offers contact lenses; digital business machines, POS systems, and communication systems; sports related supplies; machines and printers; components and production molds; auto parts, modules, power tool machine gear packs, and residential appliances/ OA-related parts; mobile phones, digital cameras, 3C electronics products, metal and plastic chassis exterior parts, and internal components; and digital imaging products. The company was formerly known as ABICO-FS Co., Ltd. and changed its name to ABICO NetCom Co.,Ltd. in 2019. ABICO NetCom Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8074.TWO.summary: Aurona Industries, Inc. produces phenolic resin laminates of drilling backup boards, and insulating materials to print circuit board and mechanical industries. The company's product portfolio includes PCB drilling back-up/entry boards, routing back-up/entry boards, bakelites, diamond coating routers, medium-density fiberboards, aluminum lubrication entry boards, cushion craft papers, collets, and pressure brushes. It supplies its products to the high-end PCB and IC carrier fabricators, as well as for use in the PCB applications, including smart phone, flash memory chip, PBGA, flip chip drilling, etc. The company supplies its products to approximately 10 countries, such as Japan, Korea, China, Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand, Indonesia, Vietnam, Germany, and the United States. Aurona Industries, Inc. was founded in 1996 and is based in Tainan City, Taiwan.

8076.TWO.summary: Firich Enterprises Co., Ltd. engages in the design and manufacture of POS systems worldwide. The company offers XPOS and mobile POS products; POS and BOX systems; lite, fanless, and performance panel PCs; monitors; kiosks; and peripherals. It provides POS solutions for the hospitality and retail markets. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8080.TWO.summary: Taiwan Ostor Corporation manufactures and sells electronic components. It offers electrolytic capacitors for use in the motherboard and power supply markets; solid capacitors; and Trusted Platform Module, a microcontroller installed on the motherboard of a PC or laptop designed to provide security-related functions and create cryptographic keys and digital certificates. The company also offers fingerprint solutions, interquip electronics, and multilayer ceramic capacitors. In addition, it provides medical crystal products, such as scintillator. Further, the company offers crystalline solar modules, photovoltaic (PV) ethylene-vinyl-acetate films, PV backsheets, PV module automatic equipment, and PV junction boxes, as well as conductive silver paste. Taiwan Ostor Corporation was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

8087.TWO.summary: Homenema Technology Incorporation manufactures and sells professional pre-recorded optic discs in Taiwan. The company offers compact discs (CDs) consisting of audio and video CDs, as well as mixed mode, ROM, and card CDs; and digital versatile discs. It also provides packaging services. The company's products are used in digital music and videos, gaming, software, and business cards applications. Homenema Technology Incorporation was founded in 1997 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

8088.TWO.summary: Panram International Corp. provides electronic manufacturing services in Taiwan. The company offers services, such as ODM and OEM services, as well as product design, raw material procurement, logistic management, transportation, product testing, and RMA services. Its products include DRAM modules; flash memory products, such as pen drives and fingerprint drives; I/O products; keyboards, touch panel control boards, and VGA cards; and embedded storage products, touch screen controllers, and card readers. The company also provides SSDs, SD/microSD cards and USB modules, FDM modules, conformal coatings, and anti-sulfur modules. Panram International Corp. was founded in 1994 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

8089.TWO.summary: Comtrend Corporation designs and manufactures broadband communication equipment worldwide. The company offers switches, SMB wireless products, powerline and coax adapters, and power over Ethernet products. Comtrend Corporation was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8091.TWO.summary: Feedback Technology Corp. manufactures and sells components for semiconductor, LCD, LED, and vacuum industries in Taiwan. The company offers helium leak detectors, MV multi-traps, pureron gas filters, SiC coated susceptors, and silicon boat for vertical furnace; and high precision matching and surface treatment products; as well as provides repair and overhaul services. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

8092.TWO.long_name: Chien Wei Precise Technology Co., Ltd.
8092.TWO.summary: Chien Wei Precise Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells precise molding and measuring machines, and machine tools worldwide. Its products include 2D/3D precise measuring instruments, precision JIG grinders, machining centers, vertical grinding machines, IC-semiconductor special accessories, trimming and forming products, ultra-precision optics, and DVD molds. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

8093.TWO.summary: Enermax Technology Corporation manufactures and sells PC components and peripherals worldwide. It offers power supplies; cases comprising full, mid, and mini towers; fans; air and liquid coolers; peripherals, such as monitor stands, USB fans, air guides, headset holders, blackplane modules, mobile racks, card readers, HDD enclosures, keyboards, and notebook coolers; and audio products, including speakers and earphones. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

8096.TWO.summary: CoAsia Electronics Corp. provides components for mobile multimedia in Taiwan and internationally. It offers CMOS, 3D, and automotive image sensors; processors, PMICs, and NFC components; memory solutions; mobile and IT AMOLEDs; and balanced membrane drivers, chip solutions, driver IC's, and battery protection circuit packages, as well as micro controller units for remote controllers, small home application, and LCD applications. The company was formerly known as CoAsia Microelectronics Corp. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

8097.TWO.summary: ATW Technology Inc. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells wireless communication products in the United States, Europe, and Asia. It offers wireless indoor and outdoor APs/repeaters, including Wi-Fi range extenders and routers; wireless indoor network adapters, which includes Bluetooth speaker adapters, and display and wireless USB dongles; wireless outdoor adapters; indoor signal boosters; and networking adapters, such as Wi-Fi and USB adapters, PCI and PCI-E cards, modems, and modem cards. The company also provides 4G/4.5G products; switch hubs; smart IoT products; dual Wan xDSL 4G Indoor Wi-Fi routers; ADSL routers; routers with VoIP; and VDSL products. In addition, it offers cellular phone peripheral components, power adaptors, IP cameras, etc. The company was formerly known as L&K Precision Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to ATW Technology Inc. in September 2013. ATW Technology Inc. was founded in 1986 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8099.TWO.summary: Tatung System Technologies Inc. provides professional services and assistance in digital transformation. The company provides services, including intelligent solutions, consultancy services, cloud services, information and communication system integration and construction, protection of data security, and uninterrupted services, as well as AI medical image recognition system for mammography and smart medical services. It serves customers in a range of industries, such as telecommunication, financial holdings, manufacturing, media, retail, government, military, universities, and research organizations. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

8101.TW.summary: Arima Communications Corp. researches, develops, designs, manufactures, and sells mobile communication and Internet of Things products primarily in Taiwan. Its solutions include mobile devices; tablets; and LTE wearable trackers, smart rearview mirrors, barcode scanners, and RF modules. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8103.TW.summary: CviLux Corporation manufactures and sells connectors, flat flexible cables (FFC), and wire harnesses in Taiwan and internationally. The company's connectors include board to board, CCFL, coaxial, combo D-sub, DVI, FFC/FPC, IEEE, LVDS, memory card, mini-DIN, power, serial ATA, telephone/modular jack, USB, wire to board crimp style, wire to board insulation displacement, and ribbon cable connectors, as well as application tooling and IC sockets. It also offers cable assemblies; PCBA turnkey solutions; LVDS cables; and fiber optics connectors and cables. The company's products are used in consumer electronics, computers, communication, and electro-optical industries. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8104.TW.summary: RiTdisplay Corporation engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of organic light-emitting diodes in Taiwan and internationally. It also provides various flat-panel display products. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

8105.TW.summary: Giantplus Technology Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, development, production, and sale of thin film transistor liquid crystal displays in China, Hong Kong, Macao, Taiwan, Europe, Japan, the United States, and internationally. The company's products include industrial displays, electronic labels, credit card machines, engineering drawing computers, handheld terminals, medical equipment meters, white goods, wearable devices, satellite navigation systems, automotive displays, game educational machines, anti-peeping screens, printers, and digital cameras. It serves industrial and automotive markets. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Toufen, Taiwan. Ltd. Giantplus Technology Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Toppan Printing Co., Ltd.

8107.TWO.short_name: TAYIH KENMOS AUTO PARTS CO LTD
8107.TWO.long_name: Tayih Kenmos Auto parts Co., Ltd.
8107.TWO.summary: Tayih Kenmos Auto parts Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells automotive blow molding and filtration parts in Taiwan and internationally. It offers automobile cabin air filters, automatic transmission filters, home air purifier filters, face masks, and other products; running boards; and pickup sport bars, tonneau covers, and other exteriors. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.

8111.TWO.summary: Ligitek Electronics Co.,Ltd designs, develops, manufactures, and sells a range of optoelectronic components in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers LED products, such as through hole LEDs, PCB type surface-mount device (SMD), PLCC SMDs, leads type SMDs, invisible LED, automotive LED, ambient light sensors, smart LED, arrays, SMD type displays, LED displays, dot matrixes, and LED back lights. Its products are used in the LED lighting, mass transit and MRT system, automobile and motorcycle LED module, customized lighting, imaging lighting infrared module products and ODM, UV module group product and ODM, solar energy, and e-bike applications. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8114.TW.summary: Posiflex Technology, Inc. designs, manufactures, and sells point of sale (POS) management systems and peripheral equipment in Taiwan, the United States, Germany, Japan, India, China, Singapore, and Malaysia. It provides mobile POS, POS terminal, all in one POS, infotainment terminal, digital signage, POS box, and kiosk products, as well as android platform. The company also offers POS monitors, line displays, POS printers, cash drawers, POS keyboards, barcode scanners, magnetic stripe card readers, attachments, MT accessories, and IO boxes. It serves customers in the retail, catering, large-scale shopping centers, chain stores, entertainment venues, logistics, medical institutions, and e-commerce businesses under the POSIFLEX brand name. The company was incorporated in 1984 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8119.TWO.summary: Clientron Corp. provides integrated embedded solutions worldwide. It designs, manufactures, and supplies thin client solutions, POS systems, automotive electronics, and embedded computing solutions, as well as offers after sales services. The company was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8121.TWO.summary: Acme Electronics Corporation produces and sells soft ferrite products in Taiwan. The company primarily offers Mn-Zn ferrite cores, Ni-Zn ferrite cores, and Mg-Zn ferrite cores for use in telecommunication, power conversion, and interference suppression applications. Its soft ferrite products comprise inductance passive electronic components, such as power transformers, loaded coils, and choke and demagnetization coils, which are used in various 3C devices, including power supplies, desktop monitors, notebooks, broadband network systems, telephone switching systems, relay stations, mobile phones, PDAs, LCD TVs, digital cameras, digital video cameras, video games handsets, scanners, etc. The company also provides sapphire ingots to sapphire wafer customers. Acme Electronics Corporation was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

8147.TWO.summary: Nextronics Engineering Corp. provides connectors, and PICMG components and solutions for medical, aerospace, transportation, industrial, cloud/communication, and automation applications in Taiwan. The company offers high speed I/O, push pull circular, backplane signal, and combo power connectors; and embedded system connectors and components. It also provides terminal blocks, press-fit machine and tooling products, and customized-solutions, as well as Compact PCI, ATCA, and AMC and Micro TCA product solutions. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8150.TW.summary: ChipMOS TECHNOLOGIES INC. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells high-integration and high-precision integrated circuits, and related assembly and testing services in Taiwan, Japan, Singapore, and internationally. The company operates through Testing; Assembly; Testing and Assembly for LCD, OLED and other Display Panel Driver Semiconductors; Bumping; and Other segments. It provides a range of back-end assembly and test services, including engineering test, wafer probing and final test of memory and logic/mixed-signal semiconductors, as well as leadframe-and organic substrate-based package assembly services for memory and logic/mixed-signal semiconductors; and gold bumping, reel to reel assembly, and test services for LCD and other flat-panel display driver semiconductors. The company's semiconductors are used in personal computers; graphics applications, such as game consoles; communications equipment; mobile products comprising cellular handsets, tablets, and consumer electronic products; and automotive/industry and display applications, such as display panels. ChipMOS TECHNOLOGIES INC. was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

8163.TW.summary: Darfon Electronics Corp. provides eco-friendly technologies for IT peripherals, passive components, and green energy solutions. It offers human interface devices, including laptop keyboards, desktop keyboards, and IT accessories and gaming products; wired headphones and wireless headsets, mice, and keyboards; and point stick, full cap printing, RGB backlight, thin switches, and gaming switches. The company also provides capacitors, inductors, and bead products. In addition, it offers robot cleaners, server storage BBUs, and e-bike and high-voltage automobile batteries; and micro-inverter solar power systems and hybrid solar power systems. Further, the company provides battery pack products, such as vacuum cleaners, robot cleaners, multi-function cleaners, handheld cleaners, and portable TV and camera products; micro inverters, hybrid inverters and systems, and energy storage devices; and outdoor lighting rugged and panel backlight drivers, as well as charger and power supplies, such as e-bike chargers. It has operations in Taiwan, Mainland China, Japan, Korea, the United States, the Czech Republic, the Netherlands, and Germany. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

8179.TWO.summary: Subtron Technology Co., Ltd manufactures and sells IC carrier boards and soft boards in Taiwan. Its products primarily include system in package RF, LED lighting, optical communication module, sensor, 5G related, and PBGA/CSP/TFBGA products, as well as TAB, COF, EMV TAB, and INK products. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

8201.TW.summary: Inventec Besta Co.,Ltd engages in the design, research, development, manufacture, and sale of electronic and electrical dictionaries under the Besta brand. The company offers digital learning products, including computer and cloud dictionaries; digital life products, such as digital recorders, digital peripheries, driving recorders, power banks, tablets, and smart health products; and toddler learning products, including baby reading machines and picture books. It also engages in the cloud business, as well as investment management activities. Inventec Besta Co.,Ltd operates in Taiwan, Japan, China, Singapore, Malaysia, Mexico, and internationally. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

8210.TW.summary: Chenbro Micom Co., Ltd. engages in the design, manufacture, processing, and trading of computer peripherals and systems. It offers barebone servers; rackmount, tower server, and PC chassis; storage expansion kit; and OEM/JDM services. The company is also involved in the software design activities; and export and import of computer products and peripherals. It operates in the United States, China, Taiwan, and internationally. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8213.TW.summary: Taiwan Pcb Techvest Co., Ltd., a professional manufacturing service company, manufactures and sells electronic components and printed circuit boards (PCBs). The company offers PCBs for notebooks, servers, memory modules, etc., as well as LCD products. Taiwan Pcb Techvest Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

8215.TW.summary: BenQ Materials Corporation manufactures and sells material science products in Taiwan and internationally. Its product lines includes functional films, including polarizer films; optical films for touch panels; e-paper, a waterproof and surface treatment film for touch panel function; industrial tapes; and smart optical films. The company also provides healthcare products, including hydrocolloid dressings for moist wound management and silicone gel for scar prevention; clinical solution for rapid hemorrhage control of traumatic injury in the pre hospital setting; acne care products; and contact lenses. In addition, it offers separator, a component in liquid electrolyte batteries; and aluminum foil for lithium-ion battery of mobile devices or autos. The company was formerly known as Daxon Technology Inc. and changed its name to BenQ Materials Corporation in June 2010. BenQ Materials Corporation was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

8234.TWO.summary: NEXCOM International Co., Ltd. provides Internet of Things (IoT) automation solutions, intelligent platform and services, mobile computing solutions, network and communication solutions, intelligent digital security, and medical and healthcare informatics products worldwide. The company offers IoT automation solutions, such as industrial fanless computer, google cloud IoT ready solution, industrial wireless solution, industry firewall solution, IoT solution, industrial touch computer, machine automation, PC-based factory automation, and software solution; and smart system solutions, including AI accelerators, interactive signage solution packs, multimedia player application platforms, multimedia machine tablets, embedded computer, open frame tablets, TV wall digital electronic signage solutions, digital electronic signboard dedicated hardware platforms, point of sale terminals, and rack industrial computers. It also provides car computer suctions comprising AI edge telematics solutions, embedded add-on modules, mobile NVRs, car computers, car network equipment, car touch screen computers, rugged car displays, modular on-board computers, and railway computers. In addition, the company offers network communication solutions, including cyber security solutions, edge and cloud solutions, industrial gateway solutions, network peripheral solutions, and SoC capability and S/W services; and smart medical solutions, such as healthcare medical, IoT gateway, software package, and video conference system. Further, it provides intelligent monitoring solutions comprising 3D cameras, panoramic cameras, license plate recognition cameras, monitoring video platforms, and webcams; and smart system and movie and film solutions. NEXCOM International Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8255.TWO.summary: Actron Technology Corporation designs, develops, manufactures, and sells electronic components of vehicles for automakers worldwide. It offers high and low cup, and JP pressfit diodes; dish diodes; and TO-220, standard, micro, and jumbo button diodes. The company also provides alternators, regulators, and anti-lock brake system controls. Actron Technology Corporation was founded in 1998 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

8271.TW.summary: Apacer Technology Inc. researches, designs, develops, manufactures, and markets industrial solid-state drives (SSD), consumer digital products, flash memory cards, and memory modules in Taiwan, Hong Kong, Japan, Mainland China, the Americas, and internationally. It offers industrial solutions, such as SSDs, memory modules, and storage devices for network communication, military, medical, vehicular, and other applications; custom water-cooled PC case, AIO CPU liquid cooler, gaming memory, and SSD products; gaming products and peripherals; and consumer products, including SSDs, memory modules, memory cards, USB flash drives, portable hard drives, and other computer and mobile peripherals, as well as designs, integrates, and implements IoT environment control systems; and optical equipment sales and OEM services. The company serves distributors, equipment manufacturers, and retailers. Apacer Technology Inc. was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8277.TWO.summary: Unifosa Corp. operates as a memory modules ODM/OEM company in Taiwan. The company offers notebook and niche product memory modules, including DRAM and FLASH memories. It also provides storage products and polymer films, such as stretch hood, synthetic paper, PE and PP separators, multi-layer separator, and PE film products. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

8279.TWO.summary: Syngen Biotech Co., Ltd. operates as a biotech company in Taiwan. The company manufactures and sells active pharmaceutical ingredients, including Mupirocin, an antibiotic against gram-positive bacteria that is used for the topical treatment of superficial infections, such as impetigo and infections, as well as to control infected eczema, wounds, and burns; and nutraceutical ingredients comprising probiotics, medicinal fungi, and entomogenous fungi. It also offers biology fermentation, biology agriculture and aquaculture, and functional food products. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Tainan City, Taiwan.

8281.TWO.summary: Appro Technology Inc. engages in the design and development of a range of security and surveillance systems in Taiwan. The company offers cloud IP cameras, including Wi-Fi and IP cameras; professional IP cameras, such as box IP, fixed-dome, speed dome, bullet, and fisheye IP cameras; video servers; network video recorders; and accessories, such as racks and mounts. It also provides software solutions comprising AppPro APP and Central Management System 1030. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8284.TWO.summary: Mitake Information Corporation engages in the computer equipment installation, information software services, and electronic communication and information equipment trading business in Taiwan. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

8289.TWO.summary: Taitien Electronics Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells quartz frequency control components in Taiwan, the United States, Europe, and China. Its products include crystal units, crystal oscillators, VCXO, TCXO, OCXO, QCM, equipment, mini oven, and timing modules. The company serves automotive, consumer electronics, information technology, and telecommunication industries. Taitien Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8291.TWO.summary: ShineMore Technology Materials Co., Ltd. provides copper clad laminates and carbon and glass fiber composites. It offers FR-4 CCL, prepreg/bonding sheet, and metal CCL products. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

8298.TWO.summary: Genie Networks Limited provides networking and security solutions worldwide. The company offers GenieATM, GenieATM FLB, GenieATM visual portal, GenieATM MSP server, GenieAnalytics, and GenieAnalytics deep trace. It also offers network visibility, DDos protection, managed service enabling, and big data traffic analytics solutions. The company serves Internet service providers, government organizations, academic institutions, and large-scale enterprises. Genie Networks Limited was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

8299.TWO.summary: Phison Electronics Corp. designs, manufactures, and sells flash memory controllers and peripheral system applications in Asia, the United States, Europe, Australia, and internationally. The company offers controllers and modules of SSD; controllers and modules of embedded flash used on portable applications; controllers and modules of USB; and controllers and modules of memory cards. It also designs, researches, develops, produces, sells, imports, and exports storage devices, integrated circuits, and systems and electronics hardware and software, as well as technical support services. In addition, the company manufactures and trades in electronic components. Further, it is involved in the investment activities. The company serves consumer, industrial, and enterprise markets. Phison Electronics Corp. was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Miaoli, Taiwan.

8341.TW.long_name: Sunny Friend Environmental Technology Co., Ltd.
8341.TW.summary: Sunny Friend Environmental Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the medical waste incineration business in Taiwan and China. The company is involved in the collection, incineration, solidification, physicochemical, transportation, landfill, and treatment of hazardous, general business, and bio-medical wastes. It also manufactures and sells pollution control equipment. In addition, the company engages in the installation engineering for waste cleaning activities; environmental engineering consulting activities; and environmental protection engineering construction activities. Further, it is involved in the waste treatment, waste removal, material recovery, resource recycling, environmental testing and sanitation activities; and design and manufacture, test set-up, and operation of equipment. The company was formerly known as Sunny Friend Waste Disposal co., ltd. and changed its name to Sunny Friend Environmental Technology Co., Ltd. in July 2000. Sunny Friend Environmental Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Yunlin County, Taiwan.

8342.TWO.summary: I Jang Industrial Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells commercial storage equipment, and custom-made and household products worldwide. The company offers store display products, such as fruit, display, and flower racks; display, shopping basket, and mesh shop display stands; display tables; and wire rotary displays, as well as healthcare products comprising binder, shelves binder, and medical trolley carts; and shelving covers. It also provides moving storage rack systems, cylinder and cargo trolleys, warehouse cages, trolley and tool carts, and metal pallets for logistics and warehouses; and stainless steel trolleys and storage racks, working carts, stainless steel work tables, and storage racks for food services and restaurants. In addition, the company offers customized display stands, AGV pallets, and foldable display racks. Further, it provides home furniture products, such as wagons, heavy duty and corner shelving, slimline and other shelving, and magazine racks. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Changhua City, Taiwan.

8349.TWO.summary: QST International Corp. manufactures and sells automotive fasteners and metal parts worldwide. It provides proprietary fasteners, such as screws and induction hardened bolts; and auto fasteners, including weld bolts and weld studs, screws and washer assemblies, multi-die headed pins and rivets, and special screws per print, as well as internal, external, and non-fasteners. The company also offers third party testing and consulting services, as well as training services; and logistics services, including tailored services that consist of JIT, kanban, VMI, Bar Code, 2 Bin, in-house crib and products integration, localization, joint design, and value analysis and engineering to OEM assembly plants, as well as operates Halofast.com/VMI, a Web-based EDI platform to provide remote VMI service. QST International Corp. was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Tainan, Taiwan.

8349A.TWO.summary: QST International Corp. manufactures and sells automotive fasteners and metal parts worldwide. It provides proprietary fasteners, such as screws and induction hardened bolts; and auto fasteners, including weld bolts and weld studs, screws and washer assemblies, multi-die headed pins and rivets, and special screws per print, as well as internal, external, and non-fasteners. The company also offers third party testing and consulting services, as well as training services; and logistics services, including tailored services that consist of JIT, kanban, VMI, Bar Code, 2 Bin, in-house crib and products integration, localization, joint design, and value analysis and engineering to OEM assembly plants, as well as operates Halofast.com/VMI, a Web-based EDI platform to provide remote VMI service. QST International Corp. was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Tainan, Taiwan.

8354.TWO.summary: Koan Hao Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells self-adhesive labels in Taiwan. It offers release papers, including PE coated Kraft, glassine, clay coated Kraft, and super calandered Kraft paper; film release liners, such as PET, PP, and HDPE release liners; and adhesive tapes, such as surface protective films, adhesive transfer tapes, and film and non-woven tissue double sided adhesive tapes. The company also provides PSA label materials comprising paper, film, tamper evident, and re-sealable labels; and thermal and UV release film tapes, and PE laminated non-woven products, as well as contract coatings. It serves decorative, electronics and optoelectronics, automobiles, logistics, food and beverage, and consumer commodity industries. The company was formerly known as Koan Hao Enterprise Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Koan Hao Technology Co., Ltd. in 2013. Koan Hao Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Nantou City, Taiwan.

8359.TWO.summary: Cashbox Partyworld Co., Ltd. primarily engages in the karaoke business in Taiwan and China. The company conducts its operations through Services Industries segment. It offers karaoke entertainment services. The company is also involved the distribution and trade of karaoke equipment and supplies; sale of food and beverages; retail of stationery, toys, entertainment products, books, and tobacco; and management consulting business. It operates 12 branches and 16 direct stores. The company was formerly known as Cashbox Consulting Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Cashbox Partyworld Co., Ltd. in September 2000. Cashbox Partyworld Co., Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

8367.TW.summary: Chien Shing Harbour Service Co.,Ltd. provides customs declaration, transportation, warehousing, ship stevedoring, and container terminal services in Taiwan. The company offers customs declaration services, including import and export declarations of general and bonded goods, and project production machinery; customs declarations of triangular trade and entreport trade; export and import declarations of the whole plant equipment; applying letter of tax exemption for import goods duty from industrial development bureau; consultation service of tariff laws and regulations; and consolidation service of bonded warehouse, warehousing, transportation, stevedoring, and container terminals. It also provides transportation services comprising drayage of local and long distance shipments; less than truckload and full truckload; shipments moving from port, warehouse, and factories, as well as arranges local pick-up and delivery shipment integration and shipments through one point for shipping locations; and configured transportation solutions. In addition, the company offers warehousing services, such as general warehouse, warehouse rental, distribution center, bonded warehouse, and outdoor piling field; integration of reforming the goods, processing, packaging change, labeling, etc.; and ship stevedoring services, including warehouse cargo turn-in and out, and longshoring services. Further, it provides container terminal services comprising empty container services, such as cleaning, repairing, and checking services; information of containers and goods movement; accounts receivable collection on behalf of freight ship companies; CFS import and export cargo handling, distribution, and measurement services; pre-cooling, power, and inspection services; customs declaration and transportation arrangement services; and receiving and delivery, crane unloading, storage, inspection, and transfer services. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Taichung City, Taiwan.

8374.TW.summary: Ace Pillar Co., Ltd., an industrial automation company, distributes automatic mechatronics components in Taiwan and internationally. It offers automation controller and monitor systems, such as human machine interfaces, PLCs, magnesensors/laserscales, CCD cameras, CNC machine tool solutions, and fanless embedded systems; and automation drive control systems, including servo systems, linear servo and direct drive motors, PACs, and high-speed motion control systems. The company also provides inverters; automation mechanical transmission systems comprising couplings, harmonic reducers, precision bearings, planetary reducers, linear guideways, and ETP bushings; and pneumatic components, such as air-operated valves for chemical liquids, air conditioning units, solenoid valves, pneumatic cylinders, multi axis stages, and power pack with inverters. In addition, it offers technical services for the automation manufactures and customers. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8390.TWO.summary: Jiin Yeeh Ding Enterprises Corp. engages in recycling and refining precious metals in Taiwan. It operates professional cleaning and recycling facilities that clean shutters, recycle precious metals, sift disintegrated materials, and prevent pollution, as well as owns recycling and cleaning vehicles. The company serves semiconductor, printer circuit, computer components, electro-optical, passive components, telecommunication, and other industries. Jiin Yeen Ding Enterprise Corp. was founded in 1997 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

8403.TWO.summary: ShareHope Medicine Co., Ltd. provides integrated medical services in Taiwan. It engages in the health management and operation activities; human resource dispatch of professional medical staff; provision of medical, pharmaceutical, and health devices, as well as long-distance health care services; and rental of medical devices. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

8409.TWO.summary: EBM Technologies Incorporated develops and markets software and integrity solutions to the health sector in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers Enterprise PACS (picture archiving and communication systems), including SoliPACS that unites various products of the radiology, mammography, and dental fields; SoliPACS Gateway, a DICOM gateway; SoliPACS Server, an interface between HIS and RIS patient data and PACS; SoliPACS Web Viewer, which enables radiologists and physicians to view DICOM-compliant images, compare them to examination results, utilize image enhancement tools, and select images for review; SoliPACS Report that offers a tool for generating customized reports; and Advanced Server Archive, a PACS storage system. It also provides MobiPACS applications, which allow clinicians to retrieve, view, and compare various medical images; MobiPACS Server to store, process, and retrieve image files for mobile devices; MobiPACS App, an in mobile medical image viewing app; MobiPACS Web Viewer for viewing images from Internet-enabled end devices; and MobiPACS Share, a cloud-based platform. In addition, the company offers MobiPACS Multi that supports doctors to connect various iPads/iPad Pros for image display; Vital-Sign On-the-Go, a patient monitoring solution; Rad@, which enables doctors and radiologists to view medical-grade images and diagnose; and Digital Pathology scanner. Further, it provides Telemed, which interlinks medical facilities; Electronic Medical Record, a digital version of the paper-based individual medical record for patients' medical history; Personal Health Record that offers electronic access to the individual's medical history; and eHealth solutions for retrieving and reviewing patient images, sign data, and ECG waveforms, as well as technical and after sales services. EBM Technologies Incorporated was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

8410.TWO.summary: Sentien Printing Factory Co., Ltd. produces, supplies, and sells heat transfer, insert mold, and in-mold label and release foils in Taiwan. Its heat transfer films are used in house wares, cosmetics, stationeries, appliances, and janitorial applications; and in-mold labels are used in plastic plates or cups applications. The company's in-mold decoration films are used in consumer electronic products, appliances, and automotive interior components applications; and insert molding films are used in smart appliances, and interior and exterior of automobiles and motorbikes applications. Sentien Printing Factory Co., Ltd. was founded in 1956 and is based in Tainan City, Taiwan.

8415.TWO.summary: Brighton-Best International (Taiwan) Inc. sells screws and nuts primarily in Taiwan, North America, and Oceania. It also engages in import, export, and sale of aluminum products; and investment activities. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Tainan, Taiwan.

8416.TWO.summary: Solidwizard Technology Co., Ltd. provides software, hardware, and consulting service solutions in Taiwan and China. The company offers CAID, CAD, RP, RE, CAE, CAM, and PDM solutions. It also provides subscription services; 3D CAD, product data management, simulation solution, technical communication, CAM, and education software products; 3D printer and scanner products; and collaborative robots. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

8422.TW.summary: Cleanaway Company Limited operates as an intermediate treatment solidification company within the waste disposal process in Taiwan. It offers waste solidification and excavation, waste landfill, and waste clearing services. The company is also involved in waste disposal, waste clean-up, waste management, general investment, and enterprise management consultation activities. Its principal customers include those in the steel and iron, electronics, optoelectronics, petrochemicals, electroplating, leather processing, metal processing, and tenders of other public and private enterprises. The company was formerly known as Cleanaway Kang Lien Co Ltd. and changed its name to Cleanaway Company Limited in May 2009. Cleanaway Company Limited was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung City, Taiwan.

8424.TWO.summary: Wellpool Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells fireproof and environmental protection green building materials. It offers calcium silicate and fiber cement boards. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

8431.TWO.summary: Superior Plating Technology Co., Ltd. operates as a surface treatment company in Taiwan. The company engages in the research and development of metal and plastic surface treatment technology and manufacturing services. It also provides plating services for the semiconductor lead frames, terminals, strips, and LED stents. In addition, the company provides plating services for HDD products, medical equipment, auto parts, connectors, and OA products; and anodizing services to 3C products and industrial products. Superior Plating Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

8432.TWO.summary: TSH Biopharm Corporation Limited develops and markets medicines for chronic diseases in Taiwan. It offers products for cardiovascular, central nervous, gastrointestinal, and others, as well as liquid-biopsy diagnosis. The company is headquartered in Taipei city, Taiwan. TSH Biopharm Corporation Limited is a subsidiary of TTY Biopharm Company Limited.

8433.TWO.summary: Bon Fame Co., Ltd. operates in fashion market in Taiwan. It offers hair accessories, jewelry, hairstyling products, beauty tools, bags and purses, fashion accessories, and novelty products, as well as event products, such as kid's masks. The company was founded in 1985 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

8435.TWO.summary: Zimmite Taiwan Ltd. engages in the industrial water treatment activities in Taiwan and China. It offers cooling water treatment agents, such as corrosion inhibitors, scale inhibitors, algaecides, biocides, rust removers, and cooling water all-in-one tablets; and boiler water treatment agents, including internal treatment additives, oxygen scavengers, neutralizing amines, and filming amines. The company also provides boiler fireside treatment additives comprising fuel oil additives and soot removers; and oil refinery and petrochemical process additives consisting of corrosion inhibitors, antifoulants, desalting agents, demulsifiersÂemulsion breakers, antifoamers/defoamers, metal passivating agents, polymerization inhibitors, and antioxidants. In addition, it offers wastewater treatment agents, including polymer flocculants, dewatering aids, heavy metal chelators, deodorants, and COD degradation agents; slow release tablets, such as cooling water treatment tablets, drain pan slime preventive tablets, and chlorine donors; and RO and scrubber chemicals. Further, the company provides environmental protection testing and technical services; water treatment technology supports; and oil mud dispersants, as well as sells water treatment raw materials. It primarily serves oil refineries and petrochemicals production plants, steel mills, power generation plants, office buildings, textile manufacturing processes, plastic manufacturing plants and processors, electronic manufacturing sector, and public facilities. Zimmite Taiwan Ltd. was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8438.TWO.summary: Amia Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells copper sulfate in Taiwan. It also offers oxides and carbonates. The company also exports its products. Amia Co.,Ltd was founded in 1974 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

8450.TWO.summary: Pili International Multimedia Co.,Ltd. produces and distributes dramatic puppetry series in Taiwan. It is also involved in the Pili satellite television station; production and distribution of DVD's and soundtrack; performance and movie activities; publications and posters, etc.; and licensing development of peripheral products. In addition, the company fan club and cosplay activity; operates puppetry community Website; manages allied counters and boutiques in Taiwan; and produces and distributes 3D animation. The company was formerly known as Da Chih Entertainment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Pili International Multimedia Co.,Ltd. in August 2000. Pili International Multimedia Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

8454.TW.summary: momo.com Inc. engages in the software design, TV and radio production, radio and TV program distribution, radio and TV advertising, issuing of magazine, and retailing businesses in Taiwan and internationally. It operates through two segments, Television and Magazine Department, and Internet Department. It also offers TV home shopping, online shopping, mail order service, travel service, and property and life insurance sales service. momo.com Inc. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

8463.TW.summary: Ruentex Materials Co.,Ltd. produces and sells cement in Taiwan. It offers Portland blast furnace cement, Portland cement, and hearthstone powder. The company also provides mortar material, surface powder, adhesive material, caulk, non-shrinking mortar, mud, and elastic cement, as well as offshore grouting and home improvements. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

8464.TW.summary: Nien Made Enterprise Co., LTD. engages in the research, development, design, manufacture, and sale of various types of window coverings and related components in the United States, Europe, and internationally. The company operates through two segments, Window Coverings and Other. It offers various types of blinds, shutters, shades, and related components; wood blinds and shutter semi-products; cellular, roman, and roller shades; plastic blinds and accessories; and chair covers. The company also designs, manufactures, and sells automated appliances and PVC tubes. In addition, it also engages in manufacturing and selling dehumidifiers and air purifiers; the provision of logistics support services and window coverings documentation processing services; and trading and servicing in window coverings. The company was formerly known as Huan Qiu Shi Jing Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Nien Made Enterprise Co., LTD. in March 2008. Nien Made Enterprise Co., LTD. was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

8465.TWO.summary: Tekho Marine Biotech Co., Ltd researches and develops aquatic and aquarium products in Taiwan and internationally. It offers blood fish, larva fish, and adult fish, as well as giant, leopard coral, tiger, and orange-spotted grouper. The company also develops hardware-software products; and imports peripheral products of aquarium fish. In addition, it publishes aquarium books. Tekho Marine Biotech Co., Ltd was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.

8472.TWO.summary: GOMAJI Corp., LTD provides e-commerce and advertising services in Taiwan. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

8477.TWO.summary: Kuobrothers Corp. operates B2C e-commerce business under the Living Bazaar name In Taiwan. The company provides online shopping platform for daily consumables, electric apparatuses, household commodities, storage and decoration devices, and delicacies. It also operates online trading platforms under the MobiX and MySport brand names. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

8481.TW.summary: Transart Graphics Co., Ltd. operates in the screen print industry worldwide. The company manufactures and sells customized stickers and water transfer/heat transfer decals for the purpose of corporate identity and decorating products. It also offers self-adhesive sticker serial, nameplates and graphic overlays, dry rub-on transfer, color printed thermal forming plastic, brushed metal-like nameplates, and titanium flash. The company primarily serves bicycle, sporting goods, and various other industries. Transart Graphics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1973 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

8482.TW.summary: Shane Global Holding Inc. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of indoor furniture. The company offers sofas, beds, footrests, dining chairs, etc.; and other products comprising indoor furniture accessories, fluff-filled toys and leather garments, etc. It sells its products to retail stores in North America. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

8487.TWO.summary: ELTA Technology Co.,Ltd. operates platform for digital content in Taiwan. The company has library of digital content and broadband-delivered AV materials. It offers IP/TV (STB or MOD), PC/TV, VOD, and mobile TV, as well as large-sized data transfer technology and wireless communications support services. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

8489.TWO.summary: Samebest Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development of digital cloud curriculum systems primarily in Taiwan. The company also develops personalized action learning solutions through the integration of virtual reality. Its products cover high school, junior high school, middle and upper grades primary school, lower middle grade primary school, kindergarten, and preschool. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8905.TWO.long_name: Eagle Cold Storage Enterprise Co., Ltd.
8905.TWO.summary: Eagle Cold Storage Enterprise Co., Ltd. engages in the processing and trade of vegetables and meat products in Taiwan. It offers frozen beef, hot pot meat, and canned products, as well as imports and sells meat, french fries, green beans, and other commodities. The company also develops, constructs, leases, and sells residential houses. In addition, it is involved in the cold storage, warehousing, logistics, and distribution business. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Taichung City, Taiwan.

8906.TWO.summary: Forward Graphic Enterprise Co., Ltd. operates in the printing industry in Taiwan. The company provides product design, prepress, printing equipment, and post press services. It offers printing services for various packages, such as boxes, gift boxes, chocolate boxes, and bags; books; notebooks; catalogue/flyers; calendars; and special, DIY, and ECO friendly products. The company was founded in 1968 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8908.TWO.summary: ShinHsiung Natural Gas Inc. supplies natural gas in Taiwan. The company was founded in 1975 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

8916.TWO.summary: Kwong Lung Enterprise Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells apparel in Taiwan, China, Vietnam, and Japan. The company operates through Apparel department, Down Material Department, and Home Textile Department segments. It offers down and bedding; wholesale of outdoor supplies, household wares, clothing, and related packaging materials; food; and import and export of goods and technology. The company provides down products, including natural down, water repellent down, antibacterial deodorant down, color down, and flame retardant, as well as Thermobrid plus products for use in outdoor and home textile. In addition, it provides clothing products, such as snowboard wear, skiing wear, mountain climbing jackets, seamless wind and rain-proof jackets, biking wear, sportswear, jeans, casual jackets and pants, etc. Further, it manufactures winter quilts, cushions, seating pads, sofas, pillows, sleeping bags, gloves, and home decoration products. It also offers bedding products under the Kong lung brand. Kwong Lung Enterprise Co., Ltd. was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

8916A.TWO.summary: Kwong Lung Enterprise Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells apparel in Taiwan, China, Vietnam, and Japan. The company operates through Apparel department, Down Material Department, and Home Textile Department segments. It offers down and bedding; wholesale of outdoor supplies, household wares, clothing, and related packaging materials; food; and import and export of goods and technology. The company provides down products, including natural down, water repellent down, antibacterial deodorant down, color down, and flame retardant, as well as Thermobrid plus products for use in outdoor and home textile. In addition, it provides clothing products, such as snowboard wear, skiing wear, mountain climbing jackets, seamless wind and rain-proof jackets, biking wear, sportswear, jeans, casual jackets and pants, etc. Further, it manufactures winter quilts, cushions, seating pads, sofas, pillows, sleeping bags, gloves, and home decoration products. It also offers bedding products under the Kong lung brand. Kwong Lung Enterprise Co., Ltd. was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

8926.TW.summary: Taiwan Cogeneration Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, operates cogeneration plants in Taiwan. The company invests in independent power plants (IPPs), cogeneration plants, and renewable energy power plants utilizing solar, wind, geothermal, and biomass energy. It also offers engineering planning, design, procurement, project development, installation, construction, financing, commissioning, operation, maintenance, and management for IPPs, cogeneration plants, and transmission projects. In addition, the company provides technical support and consulting services for power project investment, project development, construction execution, and power plant operation and maintenance. Taiwan Cogeneration Corporation was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

8930.TWO.summary: CKM Applied Materials Corp. develops metal building materials in Taiwan. The company offers ceiling suspension systems, such as exposed T grids and partition frame systems; metal ceilings, including flat, perforated, embossed, mesh, baffle, curve, linear grid, honeycomb, extrusion, crossing, triangular, strip, and cell ceilings; and micro-perforated acoustical panels. Its products are used in governmental buildings, hospitals, schools, department stores, hotels, factories, public and residential buildings, and commercial buildings. The company was formerly known as CKM Building Material Corp. and changed its name to CKM Applied Materials Corp. in July 2017. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Tainan city, Taiwan.

8931.TWO.summary: Ta-Yuan Cogeneration Company Ltd. generates and supplies electricity and heat to Dayuan industrial park in Taiwan. It operates and manages cogeneration plants. The company also engages in operating and repairing equipment, processing waste disposal, managing incinerators, producing petrochemical materials, and processing refuse derived fuel. Ta-Yuan Cogeneration Company Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

8932.TWO.summary: Max Zipper Co., Ltd. manufactures and markets zippers worldwide. It offers nylon, delrin, metal, invisible, specialized, water repellent, heat transfer, pattern tape, coil vacuum, satin tape, chameleon, reflective, spear teach, weave tape, delrin inkjet, and contrast slit zippers; invisible, nylon, delrin, metal, and tape attachable sliders; plastic and spring lock sliders; and metal, plastic, diamante, cord, leather, woven, and stone pullers. The company also provides special slider treatment, such as pattern coating and double plating services. Max Zipper Co., Ltd. offers its products under the MAX brand. The company was formerly known as Horng Dah Zippers Co. Ltd. and changed its name to Max Zipper Co., Ltd. in September 2009. Max Zipper Co., Ltd. was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

8933.TWO.summary: Ideal Bike Corporation manufactures and sells bicycles worldwide. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

8935.TWO.summary: Pontex Polyblend Co., Ltd. engages in footwear injection molding and engineering plastics compound materials businesses in Taiwan. It offers ABS, PC, nylon, PP, PBT, NPE, TPU, PLA, PBS, and r-PET plastic products for applications in the areas of 3C/electronic products, industrial equipment parts, auto/moto parts, household goods, sports/toy parts, and medical supplies. The company also provides sports equipment, such as baseball, football, soccer, and bicycle outsoles; and shoe components, including midsoles, shanks, and counters. In addition, it manufactures various women vamps injection products on an OEM basis for the CROCS' brand. Pontex Polyblend Co., Ltd. was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Taichung City, Taiwan.

8936.TWO.summary: Kuo Toong International Co., Ltd. designs, produces, and assembles water supply and division pipes in Taiwan. The company offers various concrete products, including prestressed concrete cylinder and non-cylinder pipes, reinforced concrete pipes, reinforced concrete cylinder pipes, concrete pipes for sewerage in jacking method, prestressed beams, precast prestressed concrete culverts, manholes for sewerage, shield-segments, and other concrete products. It also provides ductile iron pipes, DI flexible pipes, connecting closures, and accessories; and various steel pipe items comprising coated steel pipes for water service, polyethylene coated and lined steel pipes, steel pipes by jacking method, steel flexible pipe joints, connecting closures, fittings, and weight-coated offshore pipes. In addition, the company offers services for the design, manufacturing, and construction of water supply and division pipes through no-dig jacking methods; and specific mechanical equipment and plant set up, and operation of seawater desalination, water, and sewage water. Kuo Toong International Co., Ltd. was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

8938.TWO.summary: Advanced International Multitech Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells golf club heads, shafts, golf club sets, golf balls, carbon fiber components, aviation products, and composite materials worldwide. The company offers various golf products, including metal woods, irons/wedges, putters, graphite shafts, and club assemblies; carbon fiber bicycle components, such as frames, forks, and parts; DIZO bicycles; and investment casting services for components of aircraft interior, bike, industrial, and hardware in titanium and stainless steel. It also provides composite products, such as aircraft interiors comprising seat backrests, seat pads, and seat arm rests; automotive products consisting of engine covers, spoilers, and driving shafts; electronic device protectors, such as laptop carbon covers and pad soft goods; and industrial structures, including robot arm accessories, frame tubes, and assistive devices. In addition, the company offers prepreg products. Advanced International Multitech Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

8940.TW.summary: New Palace International Co., Ltd. operates restaurants. The company provides food, wedding banquet, and catering services. New Palace International Co., Ltd. was founded in 1971 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

8942.TWO.summary: Xxentria Technology Materials Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells metal composite materials worldwide. The company develops products with metal and plastic components. It offers exterior facades cladding and interior furnishing for new buildings, as well as refurbishment; and lacquer coated solid aluminum panels, as well as anodized and PVD-coating materials for architectural applications. The company also provides solar receiver tubes and tube coatings; and reflective composites materials for solar thermal applications. In addition, it offers wall and door panels for truck and trailer bodies; galvanized steel composite panels; and high tensile aluminum composite panels for transportation applications. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Tainan, Taiwan.

8996.TW.summary: Kaori Heat Treatment Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells heat exchanger solutions in Taiwan and internationally. It offers brazed plate heat exchangers for use in HVAC, refrigeration, cooling, heating, heat recovery, green energy, and other industries, as well as for residential applications; and accessories, such as connectors, flanges, insulation foams, and stud bolts. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

9103.TW.summary: Medtecs International Corporation Limited, an integrated healthcare products and services provider, manufactures and distributes medical consumables for healthcare distributors, pharmaceutical companies, and hospital groups worldwide. It operates through Manufacturing, Hospital Services, and Distribution segments. The Manufacturing segment produces and sub-contracts a range of medical consumables, including patients' apparels, disposable surgical masks, boot covers and surgical gowns, underpads, adult diapers, crochet blankets, bed linens, and medical bandages. The Hospital Services segment provides laundry and leasing services, including hospital linen rental and laundry, management of hospital laundry facilities, hospital automation, and other non-core hospital functions for hospitals in Taiwan and the Philippines. The Distribution segment markets Medtecs-branded medical consumables to hospitals, pharmacies, and other end users in the Asia Pacific. This segment also supplies other branded medical supplies and equipment comprising wheel chairs, syringes, nebulizers, and blood pressure monitors. Medtecs International Corporation Limited also manufactures, leases, trades in, and sells woven and knitted fabrics, and other made-up articles of textile products; trades in hospital textiles and garments, pillow cases, bed sheets, gowns, and other apparel products; and provides garters and other garment products. It also engages in the subleasing activities; and manufacture and supply personal protective equipment. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

9902.TW.summary: Tidehold Development Co., Ltd. engages in the international trade business in Taiwan. It sells oil, gas, garbage, and resource recycling trucks; rents small passenger cars; and develops and sells residential and other buildings. The company was formerly known as Tidehold Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Tidehold Development Co., Ltd. in 1998. Tidehold Development Co., Ltd. was founded in 1949 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

9904.TW.summary: Pou Chen Corporation manufactures and sells athletic, casual, and outdoor shoes in Taiwan and internationally. It operates as an original equipment manufacturer for international brands, as well as original design manufacturer for athletic footwear, leisure shoes, and sports sandals; and manufacturer for footwear accessories, apparels, and others. The company also engages in the retailing of sporting goods and brand licensing business. In addition, it is involved in the real estate development activities; and tourist hotel business. Pou Chen Corporation was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

9908.TW.summary: The Great Taipei Gas Corporation supplies natural gas in Taiwan. The company's business area covers seven districts, including Song-Shan, Sin-Yi, Da-An, Da-Tong, Manka, Zhong-Zheng, and Zhong-Shan, as well as two counties comprising Fu-Hua and Ming-Sheng in the Su-Lim district. It serves approximately 380,000 customers. The company was founded in 1964 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

9910.TW.summary: Feng Tay Enterprises Co., Ltd. produces and sells athletic shoes worldwide. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Douliu, Taiwan.

9911.TW.summary: Taiwan Sakura Corporation manufactures and trades in kitchen appliances in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers gas cookers, water heaters and filters, furniture, dish dryers, building materials, metal hardware parts, sports equipment, electric hand tools, range hoods, sanitary equipment, and bathroom products, as well as cabinet of kitchen systems. It also leases real estate properties, as well as trades in various kitchen electrical appliances. The company sells its products through distributors and sales offices. Taiwan Sakura Corporation was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Taichung City, Taiwan.

9914.TW.summary: Merida Industry Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells bicycles and related parts in Taiwan, China, Hong Kong, and Europe. It offers machine bicycles, e-bikes, fitness bikes, road bikes, and trekking and city bikes, as well as bikes for youth, kids, and women. It also provides speedometers; handlebars, stems, grips and bartapes, pedals and quickreleases, saddles, seatposts and clamps, and EQ and spare parts; bags, backpacks, brackets, lights, pumps, bottles and cages, tools, and locks; and apparel, such as jerseys, shorts, jackets and vests, gloves, socks, and sunglasses. Merida Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Changhua, Taiwan.

9917.TW.summary: Taiwan Secom Co., Ltd. provides security services in Taiwan. It operates through four segments: Electronic System, Static Guard Service, Cash Delivery Service, and Logistics Service. The company manufactures, processes, and sells security-related equipment and parts, as well as offers corporate and building security guarding services; in-flight catering and related services; and cash delivery, logistic, air cargo transporting, building management, automated teller machine, custom broker, vehicle maintenance, educational and recreational, car parking lot, light controlling system, and technology support services. It also sells electric, telecommunication, fireproof, and other products; produces and sells instant foods; connects police-citizens; retails POS system; and rents automated external defibrillators and mini-storage, as well as rents and sells videos. In addition, the company manufactures and sells digital signage and monitors; wholesales and installs fire safety equipment; and retails and rents medical equipment. Further, it is involved in the provision of international trade, as well as acts as an insurance broker. The company was founded in 1977 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

9919.TW.summary: KNH Enterprise Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells household goods, non-woven fabric products, and machinery equipment in Taiwan, China, Hong Kong, Australia, Korea, the United Kingdom, and internationally. Its personal care products include feminine care products; wet wipes, including canister wipes, boxed wipes, refilled packs, travel packs, sachet packs, and towelettes; skincare products, such as facial puffs, beauty masks, and makeup removers; baby diapers; and incontinent care products. Its nonwoven products consist of air through, calender bond, air laid, spunlace, melt blown, composite, and laminated nonwoven products. The company also offers filter media, air filters, and wastewater treatment and water purification solutions for industrial and municipal sectors. KNH Enterprise Co., Ltd. was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.

9921.TW.summary: Giant Manufacturing Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells bicycles, electric bicycles, and related parts worldwide. It operates through Bicycle, Materials, and Others segments. The company offers on-road, x-road, off-road, youth, rider gear, bike gear, and service gear bicycles. It markets its products through approximately 12,000 retail stores. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Taichung City, Taiwan.

9927.TW.summary: Thye Ming Industrial Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells lead alloys and lead oxide in Asia. It provides litharge, red lead, antimonial and calcium lead alloys, and lead ingots. The company's products are used in storage battery, PVC stabilizer, lead glass, ceramic glaze, pigment, crystal and optical glass, paint, terminal connector, type metal, casting metal, fishnet sinker, lead oxide, solder, lead brick, and lead plate applications. It also operates lead recycling smelters. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

9933.TW.summary: CTCI Corporation provides engineering, procurement, and construction services in Asia, the Middle East, and the Americas. It offers services, such as project management; feasibility study and front-end engineering design; engineering; procurement; fabrication; construction; commissioning; intelligent solutions; automation and control; intelligent structure jacking and movement; ground freezing; and operations and maintenance services, as well as clean room, mechanical, electrical, and plumbing engineering solutions The company also provides stationery equipment, including pressure vessels; piping pre-fabrication and heat exchangers; pre-fabricated parts of package equipment; and assists with engineering works that comprise basic design, equipment sizing, engineering, and shop drawings; and performs equipment inspection/revamping, plant shut-down inspection, and plant maintenance works. In addition, it offers chemical additives consisting of antifouling agents, anti-polymerization additives, and corrosion inhibitors for petrochemical plants; antifoam, antifouling, additives, and emulsion breaking additives as well as corrosion inhibitors for refinery plants; and heavy metal chelate agents, heavy metal stabilizers, boiler water treatment additives, and active carbon products for incineration plants. Further, the company provides intelligent energy management system, an integrated software that monitors, analyzes, adjusts, and manages energy consumption. It serves hydrocarbon, power, environmental, transportation, and industrial markets. CTCI Corporation was incorporation in 1979 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

9935.TW.short_name: CHING FENG HOME FASHIONS CO LTD
9935.TW.summary: Ching Feng Home Fashions Co.,Ltd designs, develops, manufactures, and sells home decor products in Taiwan and internationally. It offers aluminum venetian, faux wood venetian, and vinyl venetian and vertical blinds; roman, pleated, and cellular shades; and coral fleece throws and blankets, flannel throws and blankets, faux fur throws, dÃ©cor throws, and comforters. The company also provides decor pillows; and bath products, such as shower curtains and accessories. In addition, it offers beddings, table linens, cushions, and kitchen appliances. The company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Changhua, Taiwan.

9938.TW.summary: Taiwan Paiho Limited manufactures and sells touch fastener, webbings, elastic, easy tapes, and fabrics in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers general footwear and webbings for garments, shoelaces, and pull strings; touch fasteners; knitted elastic, flat woven elastic, jacquard elastic, and multi-directional textile with elasticity; easy tape products for applications in paper diapers, medical equipment, computer pipelines, outdoor sporting goods, car seats and interiors, and other accessories; bamboo charcoal yarn, bamboo charcoal insulation cotton, recycled pet yarn, and other processed products; powder coating products for use in furniture, appliances, etc.; and jacquard digital woven fabric and jacquard engineered mesh that is used in fabrics for shoes, garments, and hats and bags. It also sells houses and apartment buildings. In addition, the company engages in the production and marketing of computerized embroidery, consumer electronic accessories, chemical fibers, and masks and non-woven products; commercial property management; planning consultant, sale, development, and leasing of real estate; and provision of design decoration services. The company was formerly known as San Ho Hsin Limited and changed its name to Taiwan Paiho Limited in 1986. Taiwan Paiho Limited was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Changhua, Taiwan.

9939.TW.long_name: Taiwan Hon Chuan Enterprise Co., Ltd.
9939.TW.summary: Taiwan Hon Chuan Enterprise Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells beverage packaging materials for beverage manufacturers in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers aluminum, plastic, and metal lug caps; PET bottles/perform products, label products, and tobacco and liquor packaging products; caps, bottles, and labelling production equipment; and LDPE shrinkable films. It also provides hot fill beverage, aseptic beverage, and bottled water filling OEM services. The company was formerly known as Hon Chuan Metal Development Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Taiwan Hon Chuan Enterprise Co., Ltd. in 1999. Taiwan Hon Chuan Enterprise Co., Ltd. was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

9940.TW.summary: Sinyi Realty Inc., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the real-estate brokerage and development businesses in Taiwan, Mainland China, and internationally. The company develops, constructs, rents, and sells residential buildings and factories. It is also involved in the real estate management and identification, and real estate marketing planning activities; market information consultation; provision of management consulting, information software, data processing, and electronic information services; and publication business. In addition, the company offers professional construction, building decoration construction, interior decoration, hardware, and general merchandise products and services; and construction materials, furniture, sanitary ware, and ceramic products, as well as engages in the wholesale of building materials. Further, it develops commercial buildings and auxiliary facilities. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

9941.TW.summary: Yulon Finance Corporation provides various financial services in Taiwan, China, and internationally. The company operates through Financing, Leasing, and Others segments.
